address: Albufeira Portugal
description:
We are a Transfers & Tours, Travel company based in ALBUFEIRA-ALGARVE region, first place for Holidays in our Country! 
We are able to picking you up everywhere in Portugal and southern SPAIN. The Passion and the knowledge achieved by working on tourism industry above 30 years, made us embrace this project. After your Airport Transfer we need to show you the best of what this amazing country has to offer. Our aim is to make you feel at home, to make you feel as a local. We can give you the Historical insights, Landscapes, Secret Spots, tell you all about our country, but can show you a lot more. 
We can take you to taste the wonderful Wines at the region Vineyards, advise you on local Restaurants and our typical Gastronomy, Waterparks and attractions for a good time with your children.
Be very welcome to this Country by the sea where you will have amazing adventures, we will pick you up and take you there, from anywhere to everywhere !
name: Xclusiv4u Transfers & Tours
reviews/0/text:
We highly recommend the transfers with Miguel and Vanessa. We got to know Miguel 2022 and decided to book their airport transfer again for 2023. Both Miguel and Vanessa are lovely and very friendly people. The communication via whatsapp is great. They even send you a reminder the day before. They are very punctual and our journeys were pleasant and smooth.
Thank you! Anna and Catalin
reviews/0/title: The airport transfer from Faro of our choice
reviews/1/text: Searched for the best quote including our hotel for airport transfers. This company was the cheapest, not only that the communication was excellent. I received a WhatsApp message the day before confirming pick up. When we landed we received a message saying where to meet. Was simple and straightforward. I have traveled many places and I would say that this is other best company I have ever used. The cars are fresh and clean. I would highly recommend Xclusive4u. When we return to Portugal I will use this company everytime. It’s a family run business and you can see the pride put into it. Excellent!
reviews/1/title: The best In Portugal! Excellent service.
reviews/2/text: Hi Miguel and Vanessa, we have used Xclusiv4u many times and they are helpful, friendly, professional and always on time. Thank you for everything Matt and Eileen x
reviews/3/text: Second time using Xclusiv4u Transfers and yet again amazing service! Vanessa picked us up and drop us back off at the airport. Car seats provided for our two young children. Vanessa was lovely, very friendly, and provided great knowledge of the best local beaches. They really go the extra mile nothing was too much , even when our little girl didnt feel well in the car, Vanessa was happy to stop, kept cheking she was ok and fresh bottled water was provided for the journey. Great service! Would reccomend! Will definatly use Xclusiv4u when we come to Portugal again, thank you and see you soon Miguel and Vanessa.
reviews/4/text: Wish I could give 6 stars for our experience. miguel was such a great guy, took us everywhere and nothing was too much for him. Always on time and made are holiday amazing. Thank u
reviews/5/text: Great way to see the county . We drove from Lisbon to Lagos. After a long fight then one night stay in Lisbon.Vanessa was a great driver and had lots of information for us. We would totally use them again.
reviews/6/text: I can’t recommend Xclusiv4u transfers enough from the moment you meet them there’s a friendly vibe about them So punctual on arrival and departure also cabs are immaculately clean and full of knowledge about the Algarve too
reviews/7/text: Fantastic service all round! Great communication from Miguel, very prompt and professional. We had lovely chats from and to the Airport, he could not do enough for us! Will be recommending to all our family & friends travelling to Portugal!
reviews/8/text: Amazing service, and great communication. Our journey from Faro airport to Albuferia was lovely we enjoyed our chat with Vanessa, she was so informative about the area. Will definitely be using Miguel and Vanessa for our next trip to the algarve.
reviews/9/text: Just been dropped off at Faro airport by Miguel. He turned up at the accommodation right on time as always. He and his wife Vanessa are both lovely people. A pleasure to do business with. We have used them for the last two years. Great price and service. I would 100% recommend this company. Ignore any negative (false) reviews.
reviews/10/text:
Vanessa and Miguel are amazing! It’s always a pleasure to have a ride with them! I love them ! 
I recommend them!
Thank you so much for who you are my friends!
reviews/11/text:
Vanessa and Miguel were the most attent hosts (yes, the hosts, we are not able to call them just taxi drivers) we ever had. 

All the small details were well taken care off: some fresh water after a long flight, a child seat without even asking for it, a kind and very appreciated reminder before every trip, loads of knowledge about the environment and very warm conversations if you’re up to it. 

No doubt, next time in Algarve we’ll call them again! Thank you so much❤️.
reviews/11/title: It’s not just a taxi, it’s the most warm welcome you can ever have!
reviews/12/text: Excelente service, Miguel is the best, very helpful and friendly, should be one of the best embassador's of Portugal, I have been filling at home with im...
reviews/13/text:
Vanessa and Miguel are lovely , the service they provide is excellent and professional.
They are friendly and helpful in every way.
reviews/14/text: A lovely family run taxi service. We were picked up by Vanessa and she is so friendly and nice. If I come back to Portugal I'd definitely book a taxi through them. Thank you Miguel and Vanessa
reviews/15/text:
Really friendly service! 
Highly recommended amd i will be definitely be using from now on.
Thanks again!
reviews/16/text:
Vanessa Picked me up promptly and took me to my destination. 
The communication beforehand meant I knew I had a transfer waiting for me. As a sole traveller this was important to me. 
The car was clean and the drive was comfortable. Being able to communicate in English was also great. 
An added bonus was all the local information Vanessa shared with me which was very useful indeed. 
Would recommend 100%
reviews/17/text:
Vanessa is so lovely and friendly, nothing too much trouble. 
Totally efficient and professional. Can highly recommend. 
Will definitely use this transfer again
reviews/18/text:
If you are looking for a reliable and affordable service for a airport transfer you can't go wrong booking Xclusiv4u 

They collected us on time and when everyone was quoting double for new years day the guys at Xclusiv4u charged us the same as normal and were outside our hotel bang on time (7:30 am) for collection 

Little touches like a text the night before reminding us of collection time and amazing communication at all times

Simple and amazing
reviews/19/text: Picked up at airport on time and delivered to our accommodation promptly. Nice touch to have bottles of cold water for customers. Kept in contact via WhatsApp in case anything changed for our return trip to the airport. Competitive price and very well spoken English, lots of information on the local area. Will definitely use again next year.

address: Alvor, Portimao 8500-028 Portugal
description: Ttaxi Travel Faro Airport Transfers - is a Travel Agency for Airport transfers from Faro, Lisbon, Beja Airport or Seville airport to all resorts in the Algarve Portugal. We provide a professional and responsible, efficient and friendly service. The best quality for the best price...
name: Ttaxi Travel Transfers
reviews/0/text: Very reliable and professional taxi service that we use for all our airport transfers and also any evenings out .Cannot recommend highly enough .
reviews/0/title: Impeccable and friendly service that is 100% reliable .
reviews/1/text: Easy to book and very efficient.  Very pleasant driver. On time ,no problems at all.For sure, I will use it again ........
reviews/2/text: Driver was waiting,holding tablet with our name when we arrived. Easy to find and ever so pleasant. Will definitely use again.
reviews/3/text: We had several trips during or weekend , each driver was punctual pleasant polite and very helpful, can highly recommend
reviews/4/text:
We have used this taxi service for a few years now. Always reliable and professional.
Would not book with anyone else.
reviews/5/text: Cheapest price. We went to Lagos from faro airport for €84 for 7 people. The driver was waiting outside the arrival. We booked it again coming back to Forum Algarve shopping centre it was €84 the driver arrived 5 minutes earli. We had same driver both times. driver was nice, it helped that he spoke English.  bolt is good for short journeys
reviews/6/text: This company is completely professional,from the spotlessly clean and comfortable cars to to the friendly and welcoming drivers. They are always on time and completely reliable. We have used many times and wouldn’t use any other company
reviews/7/text:
Superb service and very reasonable price. Marco met us and was the perfect driver. Got to our destination (Carvoeiro) very quickly via the A22. 
I will definitely use again and highly recommend.
reviews/8/text: I have used them since 2016 and, as said many times, will continue using them. Top service, friendly drivers and always on time
reviews/9/text: As always Ttaxi provided an excellent service. Driver was punctual and car was very clean and comfortable
reviews/10/text: Always reliable. We have very good experience with this service. Since we live in Portugal and travel a lot we truly recommend this company.
reviews/11/text: Excellent service as ever. Prompt pick up, clean taxi and friendly, helpful driver. Always happy to recommend this service
reviews/12/text: Reliable, professional and friendly service. We have used Ttaxi a couple of times this year and on each occasion the drivers were waiting for us at the agreed time. Modern clean vehicles and careful drivers meant we began our journeys relaxed and comfortable. Highly recommended. Thank you Ttaxis.
reviews/13/text: All excellent! We always book our airport/hotel transfers with Ttaxis as we know we can rely on them to be there waiting for us. Also, always good price and friendly, courteous drivers. Thank you Ttaxis.
reviews/14/text: Ttaxi are super reliable and offer a highly professional service. I have used them over many years. All the drivers are very friendly, highly competent and always punctual.
reviews/15/text: Use this company for many years now and continue to do so. Always on time. Friendly people, informative and very helpful.
reviews/16/text: We have used Ttaxi several times but this is our first visit to algarve since coved. We did not hesitate to contact Ttaxi for our transfers as have always found them to be reliable,friendly and accommodating and we were certainly not disappointed this time. We hope to be back in Algarve in the spring and will definitely use them again
reviews/17/text: We have used this taxi service for years now. Always waiting for you on arrival. Punctual on departure. Very professional and polite. Greeted with a smile! Would not use any other taxi service.
reviews/18/text: Great service - reliable and very friendly, helpful drivers. I would not hesitate to recommend TTaxi for your airport transfer
reviews/19/text: First time using Ttaxi travel, excellent service lovely friendly driver, nice greeting. Very reasonable, nice clean vehicle would definitely recommend and will be using again in May

address: Avenida 5 de Outubro Cais T, Olhao 8700-307 Olhão Portugal
animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.
description:
In this year of 2023, our team is full of energy and we are prepared to provide you with a unique, educational and rich experience of unforgettable special moments!

Visit our website where we have several pages where we explain in detail the Ria Formosa, each of the Islands, the species and much more!

For more information: www.odysseytours.pt or call + 351 938 555 612!
name: ODYSSEY Traditional Boat Tours - Olhao , Ria Formosa
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Ria Formosa - Boat trip to the 3 Islands: Armona | Culatra Island | Lighthouse
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Ria Formosa: 3 hour tour with stops at Ilha da Culatra and Ilha da Armona
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Ria Formosa & Ilhas: Sunset Boat Trip
offer_group/offer_list/3/title: Ria Formosa: Private Boat Rental (from 2 to 8 hours)
offer_group/offer_list/4/title: Ria Formosa & Ilhas: Private Tour for Two or in Group
reviews/0/text: We booked the sunset boat tour stopping at Sumatra and Armona and had a great time. William was great guiding us and making our trip enjoyable. Was not the best sunset that day, so we watch it from the beach as was a better option due to day conditions
reviews/0/title: Boat trip to Sumatra and Armona and sunset
reviews/1/text: One of the best days we had on our trip to Portugal. Captain was amazing, so friendly, booking was so simple. Great to see authentic Portugal.
reviews/2/text: Absolutely lovely 5 hour tour of Ria Formosa. Our guide was so informative and such a delight. Would definitely do a tour with Odyssey again if ever in Olhao.  But next time I will make sure to have plenty of sunscreen and wear a hat!
reviews/3/text: William our captain was very easygoing and accommodating. Our tour got extended as we ve seen 4 dolphins and William drove the boat slower not to scare them. At some point the dolphins became playful and came pretty close to us. I enjoyed the islands too. On Culatra, he recommended a nice, quiet lagoon.
reviews/3/title: Islands + dolphins, a two in one trip
reviews/4/text:
Lovely trip!
Carlos is a really nice guy, willing to go the extra mile for a superb experience. William was our captain. Could wish for a better one. Thanks a bunch!
reviews/5/text: Excelent boat trip with stops in the islands of culatra and farol and free time in the islands. Very nice employees.
reviews/6/text:
If you really want to feel the soul of Algarve this is you can not miss. We live here for some time and never experienced something more authentic and beautiful. Greta tour and gray people
Managing it
reviews/7/text: My husband and I researched the various boat trip providers and chose Odyssey in Olhao for our day out visiting the local islands. Our expectations weren’t just met, but were exceeded. The islands offered an insight into the Ria Formosa National Park. We visited three island and lunched at the Captain Will’s recommended restaurant, which was fantastic. Will’s knowledge of his local area was outstanding, and amusing at times. His fluency to switch from English to French, was impressive and afforded all onboard to feel included in the tour. We would highly recommend Odyssey and in particular Captain Will…the best Captain in the world, probably! Caron & Tony from Kent.
reviews/7/title: Odyssey Island Trip - Ria Formosa, Ohlao
reviews/8/text: Excellent service from the vendor and guides. Provided lots of interesting information about the history of the area. super enthusiastic and welcoming
reviews/9/text: I did the three hours boat tour yesterday and really loved it! Our guide was so passionate and knowledgeable, I would absolutely recommend it.
reviews/10/text: Amazing tour guide. Very knowledgeable and funny. Got to experience three of the islands and go for a swim
reviews/11/text: The tour was amazing. Claudio is very good guide and explain to us all the stories of the island. we had a lot of fun and The restaurant was excellent also we had a good time on the wonderful beach...the water was a little bit freezing but it's normal we are in marsh!!! .I  recommend your trip 200 %
reviews/12/text: William is a great tour guide and a very thoughtful heartfelt man! Our tour only was meant to be about 3 hours but he extended it till last sunset so we could get the whole experience! We got to spend a lot of time on the individual islands and he showed us beautiful hidden beach spots :) I went alone and the tour guide was very considerate in showing me places I could relax and read, I can be introverted but honestly everybody was so friendly. 10/10
reviews/13/text: We had a great experience with Odyssey Boat Tour. The guide was brilliant, provided needed information, gave us enough time to explore the little islands, and we saw a beautiful sunset. Would recommend to anyone.
reviews/14/text:
Brilliant tour! We had booked the night before but recieved a message to forewarn that the trip may be cancelled due to bad weather. This allowed us to plan the next day with enough time without any disruption to our weekend.
Our tour guide was Claudio. He was very informative. The tour was the perfect mix between knowledge and time to explore the islands. Our trip lasted from 11am to 4pm. Would recommend to anyone, great experience!
reviews/15/text: I had an amazing time during this tour. I had a knowledgeable, patient & charismatic tour guide, Cláudio. He catered to what the group wanted and allowed time to ask any questions that arose. It was a wonderful experience!
reviews/16/text: My wife and I enjoyed taking a boat tour for our anniversary. My wife organised the tour through Carlos who was very helpful and informative. We took a boat trip through the Ria Formosa and to the islands or Armona and Culatra. Our tour guide Claudio was really helpful, very knowledgeable, entertaining and made our trip extremely enjoyable. We enjoyed walking around the islands and exploring them in our free time, as well as a delicious fresh local meal on the Culatra Island. I'm not usually a fan of seafood but we wanted to try a local dish so Claudio suggested we try the seafood cataplana- it was incredibly tasty, full of flavour and well cooked. We started with crusty bread, fish pate and olives. My wife had a large glass of wine and I had a coffee plus we had a large bottle of still water and it all came to just under 37 euros- which was a bargain for very generous portions and fresh local ingredients. We enjoyed sailing through the Ria Formosa learning about the life of fisherman, wildlife, seahorses and local culture from our guide. It was a truly memorable experience and I would definitely consider going on another tour with Odyssey tours if we return in the future- I would love to try the sunset tour next time. Thank you again for a wonderful experience and memorable trip.
reviews/17/text: Absolutely fantastic from start to finish! The team were friendly, welcoming and helpful. The boat tour was relaxing and informative. Our guide was very knowledgeable, funny and spoke different languages. Our trip took us through the beautiful national park Ria Formosa, around the marina and finishing port plus included stops at the Armona and Culatra Islands. We enjoyed a calm and quiet walk around the rustic island of Armona as well as a stroll on the beautiful sandy beach. We were lucky enough to sample some delicious local cooking and fresh seafood on the Culatra Island. Our guide recommended the local delicacy of seafood cataplana. The delicious dish included clams,mussels,oysters,seabass, king prawns and bacon in a tomato garlic and olive oil sauce..  served with fries and accompanied with fresh bread, fish pate and olives! Not only was the food incredible, but the prices were very reasonable and we enjoyed this cultural experience. The culatra island itself is a lovely self contained fisherman's Isle that is beautiful to explore especially when the sun is beaming. Throughout our boat tour the guide told us all about the history, culture, wildlife and experiences in the local area as well as recommending some local activities and restaurants for us to try. The boat tour was the highlight of our trip to Olhão so we highly recommend to anyone who wants to tour and experience the region. Thank you to Carlos and Claudio for a wonderful trip! We will definitely consider taking the tours again if we return to Olhão.
reviews/18/text: We enjoyed our tour a lot! Our guide Claudio gave us very interesting and extra information about the whole area and about how they grow oysters there, about fishing, about the islands and the people that live on those islands. It was not just a tour, we felt very welcome! We can really recommend this tour and this company!
reviews/19/text: My friends and I are studying abroad and went to Portugal for the weekend!! So happy we decided to take a boat tour it was such a highlight!!!

address: Avenida 5 de Outubro Cais T, Kiosque Rota das Ilhas, Olhao 8700-307 Portugal
address_obj/street2: Cais T, Kiosque Rota das Ilhas
animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.
description: Route of Islands is a small family business whose aim is to introduce the beauty, resources and culture of the Natural Park of Ria Formosa, one of the 7 Natural Wonders of Portugal through boating. Being native of the island of Culatra, I will have the pleasure to get to know the customs, culture, history and habits of the people, and the other islands (Armona, Hangars, Farol and Deserta). we make nature boat tours to visit the clams and oysters farms, seahorses observation, lunch tour with apperitiv in a fisherman house, etc
name: Rota das Ilhas - Boat Tours
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Islands + typical lunch at a fisherman's house
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: 2h Dolphin Watching and Marine Life Ria Formosa Natural Park
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Boat Trip (5h00) 4 islands 3 stops Ria Formosa
reviews/0/text:
Fantastic experience on board the boat and on the various islands
Exceptional meal at the fisherman's house
The host was super.The various meals were tasty

The whole experience gave us an insight to the lifestyle on the islands

We returned a few more times to enjoy the Sandy beaches and the Chameleon Beach Bar
reviews/1/text: On our 3 hour tour with a stop at 2 islands we had a fantastic experience. Philippe, our guide and captain was genuine, enthusiastic and so knowledgeable about the area. We loved every minute as did our friends’ 2 teens who were with us. Thank you for sharing your paradise with us.
reviews/2/text:
This tour was the highlite of our vacation.
We did the lunch at a fisherman home.  The lunch was authentic and we had oysters picked up on the way.  If you are a bird watcher, Rui, the guide is amazing. Binoculars provided - saw an eagle, flamingo, spoonbills +++.  The island visit were a great combination of tour and free walk around time.
Rui and his mom made you feel at home and the tour was magical in every way.  If ever back in the Algarve we will do over.
This trip was recommended to us by 3 different friends in Canada.  We will be telling everyone we know to take this trip when in Portugal.
reviews/3/text: We were a bit nervous before joining this trip as we didn't know what to expect, but the experience has succeeded all our expectations. It was extremely authentic (the guide's mother cooked us superb local food and gave us a unmatched glimpse in his families history and the life of the locals). I can definitely recommend this experience. Portuguese, French and English speaking friendly. An example on how tourism can be really authentic!
reviews/3/title: Most authentic experience I had in the Algarve. Informative, patient, insightful, authentic, honest and definitely worth the tim
reviews/4/text: Our guide and captain (José) was relaxed, informative and funny throughout the entire three hour tour of the barrier islands of the Ria Formosa with their clam and oyster farms and the island of Culeta. There are many tour companies offering this type of service but we believe Rota das Ilhas is the best.
reviews/5/text: We spent a great day experiencing portuguese kindness and hospitality in unique way! Rui shared his knowledge, passion and treasures of his land with generosity and modesty. A big thanks to him, his mom and his dog for this precious moment.
reviews/5/title: Immersion in nature, hospitality and generosity
reviews/6/text: José gave us a 5 hour tour of the islands. He was really funny and charming, and knew a lot about the area and local wildlife. We stopped at a great restaurant in a fisherman’s village for lunch. We had a fantastic time in Olhão but this was by far our favourite day. Would highly recommend.
reviews/7/text: I highly recommend taking the tour around Ria Formosa. You can choose different tours and the fantastic guide explains a lot about the habitat, wild life and the fishing industry. You will also get the chance to visit Armona or Culatra. Consider proper clothing as offshore can be windy.
reviews/7/title: Fantastic boat tour and a lot to learn
reviews/8/text: Not often you are 100% sure You are on the golden trip ! Superbe José as schipper and guide who makes the trip one with a golden feather! Thank you for being so super friendly too !
reviews/9/text:
Very nice tour with knowledgeable guide that has a real passion for his job.
Duration is appropriate  for the things to see (3 h30).
You can be sure to see birds during this time of the year
reviews/10/text: Rui showed his island and its treasures with great passion. We saw lots of birds, we learned about local fishing  culture and enjoyed a walk & swim on a quiet beach. A really nice morning that I highly recommend
reviews/11/text: It was a great day, we so enjoyed the boat ride and the delicious lunch in good company.  Rui showed us his island with passion, totally authentic!
reviews/12/text:
Great travel by boat to watch the dolphins 
Mr Rui is the best guide and  knows the birds perfectly It is always a pleasure to be on his boat
reviews/13/text: Wonderful 3 hour boat trip with Jose as our guide. Learnt about the natural habitat, the ecosystem, the local way of living based on fishing, clam and oyster farming and visited typical village and then the most beautiful deserted beach you would not believe. Wear swimming gear. Very Covid aware - we wore masks throughout and had own benches with binoculars provided. Worth it for that final beach alone! And Jose’s little jokes of course..
reviews/14/text:
Amazing experience, amazing views. Great and friendly service. The person leading the trip was well prepared in terms of content, he talked beautifully and heartily about the ocean and dolphins. I recommend it with all my heart.
Wioletta UK
reviews/15/text:
We spent a fantastic day in a boat with Jose telling us all about the history, geography and local culture in the Ria Formosa.  We visited two villages and a deserted beach. 
We had a wonderful lunch cooked by Luisa, mother of the company’s owner.
reviews/15/title: Fantastic tour of the Ria Formosa with even more fantastic lunch
reviews/16/text: We learned so much on this lovely tour. Jose was enthusiastic and extremely knowledgeable about the fish and other wildlife in the lagoon, the eco system and the lives of the people on the islands. The boat was comfortable and we could use binoculars to view the birds. Later, we had the most delicious and generous lunch in a traditional house, The weather was also perfect! I don't think you could improve this trip at all and its also extremely good value for money
reviews/17/text:
Absolutely wonderful tour guide José, very funny and educational, and perfect English (and very good French). We went as a couple in the morning at low tide so we were able to see people working the clam farms and lots of birds too. 

When we stopped on the island 40 min we walked to the Atlantic ocean and the view was breath taking, incredible seeing the difference in the sea's choppiness compared to the lagune.

Great value for money too, highly highly recommend.
reviews/18/text: If you like incredibly interesting tours with a lot of awesome information, authenticity, personal touches, and a guide that makes you feel at home, than this is the tour for you. Thank you Rui for an amazing day and a wonderful insightful experience. We'll be back to see chameleons, seahorses, and dolphins with you  (will upload pictures later).
reviews/18/title: The best tour guide in Olhão!
reviews/19/text: A really excellent boat trip which was scheduled to be 2 hours but in the end was more like 3.5 hours because the guide (Rui) was so enthusiastic about telling us things!!! He was local and clearly had a passion for everything about the area. He switched between English for us and French for the others on the trip. We visited an island which was a lovely insight into local life and we saw lots of birds which we particularly wanted. Binoculars and bird identification details were provided. Highly recommended!!!

address: Alameda da Orada Marina de Albufeira, Albufeira 8200-394 Portugal
animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.
description: Allboat is located in Albufeira's marina and is characterized by professionalism and quality in the services provided. Come and enjoy a semi-rigid experience with the most emblematic algarvian caves and secret beaches, search dolphins or dazzle yourself with a fantastic sunset. With us your day will be unique.
name: Allboat
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Dolphins and Benagil Caves from Albufeira - Allboat
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Benagil Sunset Boat Tour
reviews/0/text: Amazing experience with a wonderful crew who could speak numerous languages and provided lots of interesting facts along the way as well as witty jokes which only made the experience better. Was able to see and explore all the caves as well as the dolphins, would most definitely recommend as it was one of the best experiences I have ever had and was the highlight of my holiday.
reviews/1/text: Excellent way to spend a few hours. Great crew, the 2 Jonnies. Beautiful caves and we got to see the dolphins
reviews/2/text:
Amazing trip, highly recommend. Our Captains: Kieran, Nelson and Juan [I hope I spelt their names right] were so friendly, communicative, informative and ....had an amazing sense of humour. We were very lucky as we managed to see the dolphins: breathtaking experience. Our Captains showed so much respect for dolphins, we stayed in the right distance, they turned off the music, stayed calm and peaceful and we all submerged into that very special moment.
We also had a fun adrenaline packed ride back to the marina which completed the tour. 
10/10
reviews/3/text: Great lads who done the trip Fabio and Nelson, very friendly and informative trip to bengal caves. Really enjoyed the trip thank you
reviews/4/text: We had an amazing boat trip this morning with Arno and Nelson. Amazing knowledge of the area, great boat handling skills especially in the caves and we all had lots of laughs. They also told us they were the best at finding the dolphins and they didn’t disappoint, we saw around 9-10 dolphins at the same time at one point so we were very lucky. I would definitely go out on a trip with Arno and Nelson on future visits to Portugal. Thank you for an amazing, fun experience, you are both great at what you do and we can tell that you both truly enjoy what you do. Thank you for helping us to make special memories on our holiday! xx
reviews/5/text:
We were lucky to see some dolphins on the trip, as they hadn’t been seen the few days prior. They swam really close to the boat and were absolutely beautiful! 

Stunning scenery along the coast and the Benagil Caves were amazing, accompanied by a world-class tour from Arno The Flying Dutchman and expert boat steering by Julio The Pirate 

I can hands down say it was the best part of my week in Albufeira!
reviews/6/text:
We had the pleasure of travelling with Arno the flying dutch man and Julio the pirate of the marina. Brilliant duo very passionate and knowledgeable they are a great credit to the team and we would come back just to be on the boats with them as they are great entertainers! 

They cared for all the passengers making sure everyone was warm and happy throughout with music and light jokes. My little boys were throughly entertained throughout and you can tell these men love what they do. 

The first boat to find the dolphins! They went above and beyond to make sure everyone got the best shots of the dolphins and in the caves while educating us of the sea life around. 
Very impressive communication skills thank you :)
reviews/7/text: Amazing experience. Caves were beautiful and got to witness the dolphin pods with a few babies, had Ally and Nelson. Catered to the younger kids and the adults! Lovely boat ride and very informative. 10/10 recommend to anyone thinking about booking :)
reviews/7/title: couldn’t have asked for a better one!
reviews/8/text: This was one of the highlights of our holiday in Algarve. The duo of Ardo, the guide and Julio, the driver are simply spectacular. Ardo is so knowledgeable and a great guide. He knew all the places ( caves and shoreline) like the back of his hand and explained everything to us. Julio is an expert driver and knew exactly when and where the dolphins would emerge so we had a really great view of these marvellous creatures. Highly recommend these guys. Well worth the money.
reviews/8/title: A fantastic way to see caves and dolphins
reviews/9/text: Great trip accompanied by the best guides Arno and Julio, lots of information and a trip in good company. Recommend 100%
reviews/10/text: So beautiful to see dolphins in the wild and not in an awful aquarium or marine park. I felt emotional watching them all swim together.  No opportunity to jump in and swim but we saw sooo many caves. In October wear a t-shirt as it gets cold going at high speed. The flying Dutchman goes above and beyond. He knows everything about the area and even tho they ask for tips at the end they deserve them because they take you to so many caves and take photos for you. He also talks when we are going fast which is no point as you can't hear him lol. They play music as you're going along which is nice. Lots of boats out on same tours
reviews/10/title: Lovely tour of the caves and beaches and dolphins
reviews/11/text: Omg. We just ended our tour. With Arno the Flying Dutchman and Captain Nelson!! They were unbelievable !!! The experience was truly amazing. Very knowledgeable. We had a great time! Highly recommend !!!
reviews/12/text:
Did a tour with Arno the Flying Dutchman from Africa and Nelson the pirate of the Marinha. 
We had the best time! Full of stories, humor, information, passion and energy. We saw all the caves of Benagil including the Algar. 
God blessed us and we saw an entire pack of dolphins which we were able to follow for 40 minutes. Our guides still get excited to see the dolphins and other wildlife, and it makes it so fun to see their enthusiasm. Arno provided a lunch recommendation for afterward that had us eating plates of fresh fish for cheap. Could not recommend this more highly. Great tour.
reviews/12/title: Benagil caves and dolphin tour with Arno and Nelson
reviews/13/text: Excellent friendly  crew of Nelson driving the boat and Arnault the Flying Dutchman as our guide. Who seemed to be multilingual as spoke quite a few different languages. A very informative tour and lots of fun too. I would definitely recommend doing this boat tour. You won’t be disappointed. Managed to see a lot of Dolphins and also learnt a lot about the caves and coastline of this area.
reviews/14/text: Absolutely amazing tour, our tour guide the Flying Dutchman and Nelson the captain made the trip!
reviews/15/text:
Fabulous trip out of Albufeira Marina to see the Benagil caves and if you're lucky some dolphins. We were really lucky and saw dolphins twice. A nice touch is that all the excursion boats radio each other and let them know if they've seen any and where to head. The caves and coastal landscape is stunning. Ali and Joel kept us safe and informed all the time. Trip is 2 and a half hours long and well worth it. 
Photos do not do it justice.
reviews/16/text:
Thanks to Arno the flying dutchman and Nelson the captain of the sea we had a really nice adventure, cool stories and beautiful nature. 
You can hop in the water as well. 
Cheers Nico
reviews/17/text: I cannot comment about specifics until the law suit is finished. I can say that this was my fifth dolphin and cave tour. All our friends and family want to do this activity.  It can be a lot of fun and safe however,  I urge anyone considering a tour to look at all the boat options.  Consider safety along with the  price.
reviews/18/text: Traveled on Allboat with Captain Nelson and The Flying Dutchman. They made the experience fantastic.
reviews/18/title: Captain Nelson and the Flying Dutchman. All boat great experience.
reviews/19/text: Kayak Tour of caves - unbelievable beauty and experience.  Guide Hugo and crew great - safe, informative, organized, fun.   Highly recommend.  With kayak about to go deep into all caves, amazing!
tags/animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Allboat tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Faro 8150-101 Portugal
description: Come and experience our services in your Holidays (or on Work) and be transported in Mercedes vans with Air Conditioning, Free Internet Wi-Fi, from Faro International Airport to and from your destination. The best way to start your holidays. See you soon!
name: Sunline Transfers
reviews/0/text: First time with these guys. They were on time, so proved reliable, and friendly. Will use again without doubt. Well done !
reviews/0/title: Friendly, on time and super clean taxi.
reviews/1/text:
Great communication throughout. Clear & precise instructions sent for meeting the driver. Despite our flight being delayed by 2 hours our driver was waiting in the designated spot for us. 
Our journey to the hotel was good & the driver was nice & friendly. 
For our return journey the driver was ready & waiting for us before the pick up time. Communication again was good & he was nice & friendly. We arrived at the airport with plenty of time & right in front of departures. 
Both journeys were in clean minibuses with the right child seat I had specified in my booking. 
I’d highly recommend this company.
reviews/2/text: Fantastic experience. The driver arrived on time. They are professionell and helpful too. Will definitely return again
reviews/3/text: Booking this tour was very easy. There are several options for payment such as paypal, and standard credit and debit card.If you choose to pay in cash, I believe you can too. Carlos communicated with me before the trip so everything went smoothly even though our flight was delayed to Faro (they track your flight so don't worry!). They arrived on time so that was helpful especially since we had an early departure.
reviews/4/text:
Very reliable and friendly, warmly recommend!
Had a fantastic trip from Faro to Lagos!
The vehicule was also very good, and the driver very friendly!
reviews/5/text: We have hired cars in the past so a first time with a transfer. Our inbound flight was delayed but our amazing driver was there and waited until we found our Villa - there was no pressure. The return leg was equally easy - I had my bikebox so Carlos simply suggested the right pickup/drop off vehicle and it was hassle free. I would really recommend Sunline. A slick professional outfit
reviews/6/text: We booked this transfer from Faro to Albuferia at the last minute and cannot fault the service at all.
reviews/7/text: Sunline transfers were so easy to book each time u have used them. They were on time, professional, friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend and use again!
reviews/8/text: We used Sunline Transfers for our recent transfers to and from Faro Airport as we have used them in the past and they have always been very reliable. The service was just as efficient this year, from the ease of initial booking, to the cleanliness of the cars, and the friendly, competent drivers, The price was also competitive.
reviews/9/text: Cannot fault the service provided. Booking system was really efficient, quick to do and accommodating (even when I changed my mind twice about pick up and departure times). Carlos was very helpful in his email communication and his command of English is excellent. The vehicles were spotlessly clean and well driven with polite and professional drivers. I had a WhatsApp message one minute after the departure time to apologise for the driver being delayed - that would never happen in the UK - and in the end he was only 7 minutes later than expected!
reviews/10/text: We loved the immaculately clean saloon we travelled in, and the friendly, knowledgeable driver. As usual I cannot recommend sunline transfers enough, they are always punctual and extremely professional. We have used this company now for over 7 years, and cannot fault them.
reviews/11/text: The best service ever.  Punctual and patient with our ever changing bookings.  Reasonably priced. Will recommend them to everyone and we will definitely be using them next time again.
reviews/12/text:
Group of 11 golfers and clubs from Faro airport to Amondeira, and return.
GREAT service!  Waiting for us on orrival both ways. Good communication for booking and payment. Very reasonable price.
Can't fault them, would definately use again.
reviews/13/text: great service; detailed information received by e-mail well in advance; kind and professional driver waiting in agreed place; good and clean car
reviews/13/title: Good experience with a pick up at Faro airport
reviews/14/text:
Having used Sunline previously we had no hesitation in contacting Carlos to book our transfers for this latest trip.
As expected the email was replied to promptly and a further one actually on X-MAS DAY.
Pick-up in Faro was on time with the driver polite & professional throughout the journey.
Payment is made on arrival and within minutes i recieved  my email receipt.
Return transfer was slightly early which was not a problem, even a plus.
Once again a superb experienced driver, so overall a great service.
As iv'e said before, book Sunline they won't let you down.
Many thanks to Carlos & the team.
reviews/14/title: LOOKING FOR THE BEST ?  CHOOSE SUNLINE.
reviews/15/text:
No problems on arrival just followed the directions given in email.
the driver had my name displayed after I exited airport, he was on time and comfortable journey on his minibus and easy to find.
reviews/16/text: Travelled from faro airport to Albufeira and had a great service, especially with two children. Had children’s car seats too. Staff are excellent. Thank you!
reviews/17/text: Excellent personal service. Easy to book, met on arrival, polite, on time and speedy comfortable transfer.
reviews/18/text: Amazing service as usual with professional and punctual drivers. See you again soon as we would NEVER use any other company. Thank you.
reviews/19/text: Drivers were on time and efficiently transported us to our destination. Have Sunline in the past and they have never disappointed us.
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Sunline Transfers tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Rua Sao Sebastiao n 4 RC DIR, Faro 5200-246 Portugal
address_obj/street1: Rua Sao Sebastiao n 4 RC DIR
description: More than a tour is a lifetime experience! We are a small local tour company that provides you with the best experience in the Algarve, with the friendliest environment that will make you feel at home.
name: Choose Your Route
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Benagil Cave Marinha Carvoeiro From Faro Full day Tour
reviews/0/text: We had a lovely time exploring this beautiful coastline. Juliana was great fun to spend the day with and was super knowledgeable about the area.
reviews/0/title: Amazing way to explore the caves and beaches
reviews/1/text: Juliana was amazing! She had plenty of good tips, advices and stories along the way. We had a great time and a very full day with lots of amazing landscapes, adventures and memories to bring home with us. Highly recommend!
reviews/2/text: Had such a great time with our guide Juliana! Went to some beautiful spots and had lots of fun, a great day all round!
reviews/3/text:
We had a great day with our guide Juliana. We discovered the most famous areas of the region but also some nice little secrets spots.
We travelled with a small group of 8 people and it seemed way more dynamic and fun than those gigantic 50 people tours.
Highly recommended.
reviews/3/title: A very fun and beautiful day
reviews/4/text: Amazing day to see the Benagil Caves with a fabulous guide (Juliana). It was well organized, felt very personalized.  Highly recommended.
reviews/5/text:
We had an amazing tour in a small group! Juliana is such a great guide showing us all the beautiful places and photo shooting places of algarve! 
Thanks again Juliana ☺️
reviews/6/text: The tour was so cool and I especially recommend it for young people! you will go to so many cool and secret spots with your tour guide (Juliana) and have a lot of fun. the landscape was so beautiful and it was a cool mix of adventurous and relaxing activities. totally worth the price!
reviews/6/title: cool tour with cool tour guide
reviews/7/text: Great tour to travel to some beautiful spots along the coast. Our guide was brilliant and was able to take us to some really nice places
reviews/8/text: A wonderful friendly and informative guide, who made everyone feel like they were part of a family. I can't recommend highly enough. No more than 8 people on the tour and everyone was catered for in a kind manner.
reviews/8/title: A wonderful day out in Faro
reviews/9/text: Juliana was an awesome guide, and we had an amazing tour! It was fun, relaxing and informative. Would definitely recommend it for anyone travelling to Algarve.
reviews/9/title: Had the best time on this tour with Juliana (our guide)
reviews/10/text: The day trip lasted a whole day (from 9:30 am to 6 pm, roughly). We visited some of the highlights of the region, such as Praia da Marinha and Benagil cave. Our tour guide (Juliana) was especially nice and helpful! Highly recommended tour.
reviews/11/text: It was a wonderful experience! The places were beautiful and we have very interesting information. The tour had be done in a good mood with an excellent guide, I recommand !
reviews/12/text:
A word : just amazing.
Juliana was the kinddest she is very funny and passionate about her job. 
She is very patiente and very easy with the timing. We stayed at least 40 mins in the benagil cave taking pictures etc and the experience of swimming to getting there was so amazing and refreshing. the hike is very easy as well for those who are not too adventurous. During the afternoon we can have 1h30 of free time on the beautiful beach. We highly recommend the tour trust me you won't see the time fly. 
And we really really liked the surprise at the end ! Thank you so much Juliana !
reviews/12/title: Tour with Juliana, an amazing experience.
reviews/13/text:
Joining this tour was the best thing that we did on the whole trip! The spots we visited were mostly unavailable by public transport. We got to see some of the most beautiful beaches from various places, we swam into the cave, and got to spend some time on the beach, sunbathing and relaxing. We also got to make new friends with the fellow travelers. 

Juliana, our guide, was phenomenal! She explained everything, was really patient while we took countless pictures, helped us swim to the cave and gave us some time to be on our own on the beach in between the stop. 

Fun tour. Amazing guide. Perfect day!
reviews/14/text: I had the best experience ever. Juliana was a perfect guide. She is really sweet and kind. She showed to us the perfect spots and the best away to explore them. I had a great day with her and our group!
reviews/14/title: The best guide ever! Amazing experience
reviews/15/text: It was a great day tour, I definitely recommend it to anyone visiting Algarve.  Simao was super friendly and helpful and he adjusted everything to the needs/wishes of the group. All day was very well organised and it was a unique opportunity to see many beautiful places in one day - it is very difficult to make it on your own and impossible without a car. I am happy that I attended this tour and thank you!
reviews/16/text:
The trip was well organised with minimal fuss. This trip was booked in less than 48h online and it was easy to check if the dates were available. 
The trip  was very personal as the group was small.  Simoa was a superb host throughout the whole journey. Very friendly and approachable. Nothing would faze him!  He took us to all the lovely spots with picturesque views.  It is definitely worth the money and time well spent. 
This is one of the very few tours that is fr Faro and definitely worth the money !
reviews/16/title: Fabz trip from faro to Benagil cave and surroundings
reviews/17/text:
Really good day with juliana  
We were exhausted at the end of the day but it worth it. 
You must see the Benagil cave !!
reviews/18/text: We enjoyed the Benagil caves. It was very beautiful! Our tourguide was very enthusiastic and helpful. She shared A lot of facts about the places.
reviews/19/text: A very good experience to get to know the caves if you don't have a car. The guides are aware of you at all times so that everyone enjoys the experience.

address: Praia de Vale Centianes Vale Centianes Beach, Lagoa 8400-525 Portugal
description: The beach of Vale Centianes, near Carvoeiro, is where you can get the boat to visit the most beautiful sea caves of Algarve. We have a special equipped and licensed motorboat to make this kind of trips. The captain explains you in different languages some clues during the trip. Between Vale Centianes and Marinha beach you visit around 20 caves and also you learn more about other beaches such as Praia do Carvalho, Benagil and Praia da Marinha, one of the finest in Portugal. The journey takes one hour and costs 25 euros for adults and 12.50 euros for children (3-10). Children up to two years old do not pay. A young and lovely team welcomes you at the ticket office. We speak in different languages: Portuguese, English, German, Spanish, French and even Swiss German. After the ride you have the possibility to enjoy the beautiful beach of Vale Centianes, a beach, which is hidden in a beautiful bay. Highly recommended if you want to take an unforgettable experience from Algarve to home!
name: Centianes Boat Trip
ranking: #5 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #5 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: Just home from a great trip with this Company. We were picked up from our apartments and taken to the start of the trip. Fabulous views, caves, great commentary and the highlight was seeing dolphins. Safe and enjoyable for all ages.
reviews/1/text:
Alex, Paolo and the rest of the team are amazing! They have alot of charisma and make the tour very fun and informative. I really enjoyed this boat trip! And I highly recommend to anyone who visits Algarve to take this tour to visit all the caves and structures along the coastline. It's beautiful and completely safe!!

Emanuel/basketball star! 2023
reviews/2/text: Fabulous trip- great crew, really friendly. Great value for money- they even gave us a lift from and to our hotel. Can’t recommend them highly enough
reviews/3/text: Great guys taking us out on the boat- friendly and fun tour guide and captain, nice small boat able to get into caves that looked far too small to get into! Would recommend and would do again.
reviews/4/text: Fantastic trip! In fact the best boat trip I have been on. Really fun experience. The caves and scenery were stunning. The guide was really knowledgeable and obviously passionate about the local environment. The boat went quite fast and really close to the caves but it all felt very safe. Definitely worth the money and something you really must do if you are visiting this part of the Algarve.
reviews/4/title: Not to be missed if you are visiting this part of the Algarve
reviews/5/text: Great boat trip, very interesting and entertaining. Bonus to be in a small boat to really explore all the caves as n  dad beautiful coastline, our son was in awe!   Very friendly, funny and informative guides. I’d really recommend this trip to anyone, you won’t be disappointed!
reviews/5/title: Fantastic tour to immerse yourself in the caves
reviews/6/text:
Great little trip with captain Paolo and guide Alex taking us to over a dozen nooks and crannies along the Portuguese coast. 

You don’t leave the boat, so other than getting in it, you won’t get your feet wet. 

One bit of advice would be try and do this towards the start of the holiday as it gives you lots of ideas what to do. 

Speedboat was a bit spine shaking on the charge back to the beach, because the wind was causing the waves to be a little choppy so beware. 

Amazing part of the world though.
reviews/6/title: Alex and Paolo opens up the coast
reviews/7/text:
Amazing views - entertaining guide!   Alex was very entertaining and made sure,  as the only English speakers on the boat, we weren’t left out.   Really beautiful views, lots of caves with their own stories.  
Photo taking was encouraged and the guides ensured we all had the opportunity to take great shots.   The return trip at speed over the waves was great!
reviews/8/text: We did a 1 hour boat trip from Carvoeiros Beach and it was fantastic!  Our guide, Alex, and captain, Johnny, were fun and informative.  The caves were amazing and the boat ride was great fun!
reviews/8/title: Great exploring caves of Carvoeiro by boat!
reviews/9/text: An excellent experience that kids absolutely loved! Jonny the captain and Alex the guide offered a great combo of fun and info, and were all about making a great time for the kids!
reviews/10/text: 5 star tour and crew. We went on the first boat of the day when it is not too crowded and not too hot. I would recommend to others to do the same.
reviews/10/title: Fantastic tour of some of the more famous caves, beaches, and cliffs in Europe
reviews/11/text:
If you are looking for a change from sitting by the pool or on the beach then don't miss this boat trip.
Very well organised with a great crew on land and on the boat. We had Paolo and Alex manning our boat and they were excellent. Plenty of caves to see with a description of each one. And between the caves some great open water high speed action. Jamie took over as Captain for a bit and nearly pitched his mother overboard by going fast over the waves.
Don't miss this boat trip.
reviews/11/title: A great experience- good crew and nice scenery
reviews/12/text: Paulo and Johnny were so much fun as tour guides on the boat tour!! They made the ride entertaining and fun. Highly recommend taking this tour.
reviews/13/text: Today I made with my family a boat trip to visit the caves and it was simply amazing. The captain Paulo and the skipper Alex were so nice and professional that made all the difference! I really recommend this experience in June.
reviews/14/text: We took this trip this morning and it was superb. I have mobility problems and the crew could not have been more helpful in getting me to and on and off the boat. The views were stunning and they are certainly expert boat handlers. Highly recommended.
reviews/15/text: I’d highly recommend this tour. The staff are well organized, efficient and knowledgeable. We were originally scheduled for a tour leaving from Praia do Vale de Centeanes, just a short walk from where we’re staying, but the sea conditions necessitated moving to the pier in Parchal. This was all handled very professionally and efficiently. And in hindsight, I think this is the better option for sightseeing. The tour itself was excellent and the crew’s narrative and commentary made it both interesting and fun.
reviews/15/title: Seeing the caves of the Algarve coastline
reviews/16/text: Amazing trip and the stuff make a great and funny experience, jony and Alex were the patrones! Just excellent
reviews/17/text:
What a fantastic experience this was. We boarded the boat at Praia do Vale de Centeanes and was greeted by the lovely Paulo who introduced us to our driver, Jonny.
The trip was excellent and Paulo was a very experienced guide, spoke excellent English and was funny with it too.
Excellent value and well worth it.
This trip is a MUST...
reviews/18/text: Wonderful boat trip - a real must to view the beautiful caves and beaches along the Algarve coast!  Fantastic, passionate staff who made this experience a holiday highlight.  Picked us up from our accommodation and dropped us back afterwards.  Really knowledgeable about the cliffs, history and generally the local area.   Lots of fun and so glad we managed to take the trip today - thanks to the team!
reviews/19/text: Amazing tour. Everything was fine! Attentive staff, speedy boat, awesome landscape! Unforgettable experience!
subcategory_ranking: #5 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve

address: Avenida dos Descobrimentos 3nd stand from the Marina Bridge, Lagos 8600-645 Portugal
animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.
description: Lagos Grotto Trips is a small Portuguese family business based in Lagos, Algarve. We have provided tours to the caves at Ponta da Piedade, the Benagil caves as well as Dolphin watching for more than 10 years. Our excellent multilingual team is always ready to receive our adventurers, delivering a truly magnificent personalized service as each of our clients is very important to us! Our boats are safe and comfortable and allow us to offer all customers an enjoyable voyage, showing the true beauty of the Algarve. Come and discover all the wonders our coast has to offer and experience an unforgettable memory.
name: Lagos Grotto Trips
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Boat trip to the grottos at Ponta da Piedade, Lagos
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Boat trip to the caves of Benagil
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Dolphin and Whale Watching in Lagos
reviews/0/text: Ricardo and goncalo were very nice, the tour was very enjoyable and worth every moment. Look for Ricardo!!
reviews/1/text: Excellent adventurous trip.  Angelo and Ivo were very informative and entertaining.  Very skilled driving.   We just loved it.  I would highly recommend this tour group.  We booked with Connie  She was great too
reviews/2/text: Great trip with Angelo at the helm and Ivo giving commentary. Just the right amount of information. Would recommend these trips!
reviews/3/text: Unique boat experience around beautiful rock formations in Lagos, Algarve. Connie will give you a helpful and informative overview at the reservations desk. Ricardo demonstrates incredible skill guiding the boat into and out of tight spaces, while Goncalo provides an entertaining and informative commentary about the geology of the grottos as well as the history of the area. Thoroughly recommend this tour when visiting the Algarve.
reviews/4/text: We appreciated Connie’s frankness with respect to sea state conditions for trip. Based on her advice we waited for perfect day. Great crew, cliffs and information Highly recommend.
reviews/5/text: It was a great trip. Was never this close to such beautiful rock formations. Our guides, angelo and gongulo we’re well informed, energetic and entertaining. They took us very close, inside and out of the beaches, caves and narrated funny stories the entire duration of the tour. Highly recommend!!
reviews/6/text: This boat tour of the numerous grottos and beaches west of Lagos was excellent and a great way to get the lay of the land.  Angelo and Gonzalo were excellent guides with some masterful boat driving getting us in to some interesting grottos. Fair price for this tour from arranging our tickets on short to the tour itself.
reviews/7/text: Excellent trip, excellent surroundings, excellent guides. Thank you very much Gonsalo and Angelo, you were fantastic
reviews/8/text: Tour was awesome and the view was spectacular. Angelo and Antonio were informative and funny. Enjoyed so much!
reviews/9/text: Amazing experience, excellent and knowledgeable captain.  Took us into grottos that seemed too small for the boat, giving us views most people don’t see.  Would highly recommend!
reviews/10/text: Wonderful tour of the caves! Gee and Ivo were the best tour guides. Our tour was fun and informative!
reviews/11/text:
What an unforgettable experience! Four years ago I chose this company based on a very informative connection with Connie. I returned this year with my wife and was delighted to find her again. We booked immediately and were treated to another amazing and informative grotto tour guided by Juo and Gee. We viewed unique rock formations, cave entrances and grottos right up close, thanks to the skillful boat handling of the captain. My wife was thrilled by the experience. I am grateful to Connie and her company for the safe and professional tour.
Highly recommended!!
Chris and Nancy, Victoria, Canada
reviews/11/title: Amazing, professional, not to be missed!
reviews/12/text:
Connie was friendly and very helpful in describing what we expect from the trip and advising when to go.  Not pushy at all either - always a plus !

On the trip itself, Jack was a very skilled captain and gave out helpful information throughout.

Enjoyable experience - recommended.
reviews/13/text: We did a combined dolphin-tour and Benagil cave. It took some time to find the dolphins, but it was worth the wait - our crew (Humberto and Gui) found a school of more than 150 dolphins! An amazing experience! The captain was an excellent driver in the choppy ocean. Our guide was also excellent, very enthusiastic and contributed to the expererience. They were also very careful not to "crowd" the dolphins, showing them the respect they deserve! After this unbeatable experience we went to see the beautiful caves and coastline as well. The trip was well worth the money, and we can warmly recommend this operator! Connie was also very nice and answered swiftly on messenger when booking the trip.
reviews/14/text: I have been coming to the Algarve for years and Hureberto was by far the best tour guide I have experienced. Very knowledgeable and chatty. Highly recommend.
reviews/15/text: We used Humberto's services to go to the Grottos around Lagos. He is very experienced and knowledgeable skipper, we felt very safe when he was navigating the boat. He has great knowledge of the currents and the sea too. We recommend his services and for sure will would like to use some of the other trips when we come back to Lagos.
reviews/16/text: We went out for a dolphin trip, but unfortunately we didn’t see dolphins. The tour guide offered us another free trip the next day, which was very kind. The next day we saw a large group of dolphins. The tour guide gave us a lot of time to spend with the dolphins! Great experience! !
reviews/17/text: We booked a trip on 20 Dec 2020. It was Sunday and we were only people on the boat + captain Jack. It was one of my best Birthdays ever! Captain Jack gave us amazing experience: with beautiful locations and a little bit of extreme that we loved a lot! Thank you for your amazing service!
reviews/18/text: The grot trip with Pedro was wonderful. Even if the ocean was rough I felt completely save. Pedro is a really lovely captain and he gives you a lot of interesting informations about Lagos. If you have the possibility you should make a trip with him. It's a 100 % worth it!
reviews/19/text: From our arrival at the boat, the most amazing and fun tour and then back to the harbour. Capt Jack had us all enthralled with his local knowledge and Portuguese sense of fun. Due to current COVID situation the team ensured we had a private boat for our party of 8. Fantastic team highly recommend.
reviews/19/title: Capt Jack looking after the family

address: Faro 8200-126 Portugal
description: Yellowfish Transfers is based in the Algarve, Portugal and is in business since January 2010 providing private airport & golf transfers in the region and also to Lisbon, Alentejo and southern Spain areas. We provide private transfers from Faro Airport to all resort in the Algarve. Our fleet consists of 90 comfortable vehicles, all equipped with air-con and free on board Wi-Fi. Child and baby seats provided for free for a secure transport. No hidden costs; the price is final. We are here to drive you there.
name: Yellowfish Transfers

reviews/0/text: We have used Yellowfish Transfers many times (at least a dozen). They are always very courteous, reliable and friendly. We recommend them highly.
reviews/1/text: Clean cars, always got a car seat for my boy and they were always prompt. Drivers were friendly too.
reviews/2/text: Excellent service, no hesitation to recommend. Will be using again in the future. Car seats for the children are a bonus too.
reviews/3/text: Excellent experience made very easy by expert, friendly drivers. We travelled as a large family group with young children and Yellowfish made everything so easy and pleasant including the provision of free child seats to keep the little ones safe! Thank you
reviews/4/text:
The drivers were very punctual and professional. The vehicles were neat and tidy. I was with my family and 2 young children. They had child seats ready as well. 
Will definitely book them again
reviews/5/text: Punctual, friendly service from this company. Will definitely use for our next visit to Faro. Highly recommended, booking experience was so efficient.
reviews/6/text: Booked an airport transfer from Faro to our hotel in Quateira for myself and my elderly parents. This was their first time travelling to Portugal and we were met by the nicest, friendliest and kind driver. Fatima was so nice and welcoming and left a great first impression on our arrival. I will be booking with Yelliwfish again next week as I return with my husband. Excellent service!
reviews/7/text: Professional. Punctual , reliable and a lovely profesional driver, definitely takes any stress out of travelling back to the airport
reviews/8/text: Staff is very friendly and professional! I used their service more than once and I highly recommend Yellowfish Transfers.
reviews/9/text: Perfect! Excellent service, Correct car seats for children available. Definitely recommended for airport transfers.
reviews/10/text: Have just come back from Portugal and again used Yellowfish services, and as always an excellent service would highly recommend anyone visiting Portugal to use there team, thanks again to Yellowfish
reviews/11/text: Great service    Punctual and very friendly drivers. Picked up at Faro airport and taken to Praia da Luz.
reviews/12/text: Fantastic transfer company the best in the Algarve in our experience.  Wouldn’t use anyone else always a pleasurable experience.
reviews/13/text: Brilliant service.  Punctual for pick up to and from hotel,  vehicles clean and well kept. Drivers both polite and helpful and journeys were smooth. Drivers are also easy to recognise wearing bright blue and yellow tops and also got picture of driver sent to my phone so that I could recognise her at airport.  Company kept in contact with me on run up to my journeys.  Will ise again.
reviews/14/text:
I have used Yellowfish transfers for many years because they are always polite, professional, reliable and excellent value.
I highly recommend Yellowfish and will book with them again when I return to the beautiful Algarve!
reviews/15/text: Silver. Best peri peri chicken  ever.Beautiful town with Castle.  Lagos beautiful  old town and castle  a must
reviews/16/text:
Private transfer from Albufeira to Faro Airport.
Perfect service in every aspect. Highly recommended.
reviews/17/text: Private transfer from Quarteira to Faro Airport. Perfectly on time, large good quality vehicle, very calm and steady driver. Have used yellowfish regularly for the past few years and have never been let down, even when arriving plane has been several hours late,
reviews/18/text:
Could not fault this service. Perfect from.start  to finish. Booked collection from Faro airport to apartment  in Quarteria. Driver was easy to find with their  jersey visible with yellow fish on it. 
Cost 68 euro for the return trip for 3 people. 
Driver very professional  and friendly.
reviews/18/title: Could not fault this service. Perfect from.start  to finish. Booked collection from Faro airport to apartment  in Quarte
reviews/19/text: Amazing Drivers as always, polite friendly and helpful as always a pleasure!!!! Faro airport pick up with these guys you can’t go wrong

description: We are the only company in Vilamoura operating Luxury Sailing Yachts on a daily basis. We can offer ticket tours and private tours. Coastal tours and Sunset tours are our specialties. The staff is all multilingual, the Sailing Yacht is very well maintained and always very clean. We take all the measures by law about COVID-19 and the staff is tested on a regular basis.
name: Algarve Sea Sights

ranking: #13 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #13 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: Lovely trip,  staff on the boat were super and up for a laugh and very informative, would recommend for anyone thinking of taking.
reviews/1/text: My husband, daughter and I had a beginners 3 hour sailing lesson with André. It was a fabulous experience. André is an excellent teacher and the conditions were ideal. The yacht is beautiful and very comfortable. All three of us would like to take another trip on the ‘Awakening’.
reviews/2/text: Great day out on the water with André and his mate on a very comfortable sailing yacht. Excellent sailing and…catering. Service with a smile! A lot of fun with the kids!
reviews/3/text: o skipper foi rude ou pouco amigável, Casas de banho a cheirar mal, Bocados de rolha nos copos de vinho,As tostas servidas estavam moles
reviews/4/text: Um bom local para visitar no final da tarde e tomar um café. Muito agradavel e limpo, a vista com os barcos é muito bonita
reviews/5/text: Андре и его команда - реально профессионалы своего дела, все было четко и надежно. Несмотря на то что мы были в однодневной поездке, удалось походить довольно прилично под парусом, а когда на обратной дороге ветер кончился,- добрались на моторе. Под парусами был полный кайф! Дети были полностью поглощены процессом, развлекались установкой парусов, изучением узлов и прочими яхтенными делами. И конечно, купаниями с корабля, находящегося на якоре. Вся еда (и прекрасные португальские напитки ;) была запасена заранее, продукты отличного качества, так что не имеет смысл тащить свои, но имеет смысл предупредить команду если у вас есть специфические запросы! Удивила красота пляжей в направлении Портимао, именно со стороны моря. Яхта оборудована современно и в хорошем состоянии . У капитана особый талант развлекать малышей, для них даже подготовили маленькие подарочки, все остались довольны!
reviews/5/title: Крутая поездка под парусами, идеальная организация и большой фан
reviews/6/text:
Realizámos um passeio em família durante a tarde, foi verdadeiramente maravilhoso, pela simpatia e profissionalismo do Skipper André e do seu auxiliar. Sentimento incrível de segurança, depois de fundear-mos tivemos a possibilidade de mergulhar, andar de paddle de lanchar a bordo, aliás a oferta de catering é imensa, variada e de excelente qualidade, tanto para adultos como para as crianças, tudo pensado ao pormenor. As condições estavam tremendas e foi possível velejar, sensação tremenda para quem só tinha experiência em barcos a motor.
A cabine interior é igualmente excelente, quartos confortáveis, em que as crianças descansaram, wc's individuais e com limpeza irrepreensível e uma sala de refeições muito versátil.
Não tenho um defeito a apontar e tenho a certeza que irei repetir esta excelente experiência na Algarve Sra Sights!
reviews/6/title: Experiência Magnífica! Um verdadeiro momento em família para recordar para sempre!
