reviews/0/text:
We went with friends from Toronto, Canada to the Benagil cave trip. 

The whole experience was amazing, the most beautiful views of the caves near the water, the lighthouse on the way, the experience of going into caves, the turquoise water and the sounds of the waves in those caves - the whole atmosphere is very adventurous, relaxing and unique.

I would like to mention about Sonja, she is simply an amazing host, very welcoming and smiling. She is by the canal in a turquoise t-short, definitely recommended.

It was absolutely great experience and 100% worth the money spent. We would do it again with family and friends when they visit, will explore other routes.
reviews/0/title: Benagil with SONJA from Happy Times
reviews/1/text: Great experience! The rep, Sonja was very helpful and knowledgeable. The grotto boat trip was amazing and the captain and guide were excellent. Would 100% recommend.
reviews/2/text:
Last week on a Tuesday 6 of us spoke with one of your coworkers, Sonja, who provided us a wonderful trip along the coast in Lagos.
The only way I can describe her is an energetic force with a magnetic energy. 
That same day we called her for said boat trip to which she replied informing us it was too windy for us to enjoy our ride. She asked us if we would be okay with going the next morning for a ride at about 11:30AM for more or less 1 hour and 15 mins.
We enjoyed ourselves so much that when we revisit Portugal, we’ll ask for her again.
Thank you again, Sonja!
See you shortly, 
my best regards, Rebecca
reviews/3/text: Took the Benagil Caves tour. So many marvelous views and visits to the caves. Captain was very knowledgeable and gave us lots of interesting facts about what we were seeing. Sonia was very helpful with the different tours and the best times to go, great person to find to buy tickets!
reviews/3/title: Benagil Caves tour was so wonderful!
reviews/4/text: Had a great cruise out to the caves from Lagos. Small boat onwards to the caves was great fun and then an hour splashing around on the trampoline and snorkelling. Recommended
reviews/5/text:
Cruise to Benagil cave on a bigger boat (not speed boat) was the option recommended for our family by a warm saleswoman Sonya. We enjoyed the trip as the views are magnificent. You can't come as close to the caves as with other boats but you have room to move around and more peaceful way of sailing.
Only a pity for the ship crew :(.
Vanessa and Co was more busy with her phone than the tourist and only "woke up" around the caves for a while and when we were nearly back at the harbour. We did not really feel the Portuguese hospitality onboard.
reviews/5/title: Nice views and pleasant boat but the ship crew should shape up for the summer.
reviews/6/text: We had a great grotto boat tour with Mario and Maria. Highly recommend this company they gave us a really fun and enjoyable experience. Mario was a pro at getting the boat into the smallest of caves and Maria was a really great guide with fun and interesting information. They kept us very entertained. There is a lot of completion with boat tour companies around the Marina but I think we picked the best. Thank you.
reviews/7/text: It was such a great boat trip! I can recommended the 2  ,45 h trip for everyone! They explained a lot of the history and gave us some advises for visiting Lagos. We went swimming and snorkeling and saw all the caves very close. The boat driver and the guides are very professional. Sonja, the sales woman is amazing. She didn't promise too much. thank you!
reviews/8/text: Sarah who booked our tickets gave us an honest account of what to expect. We paid €15 each for an hour long trip. It is definitely worth the money. The caves were spectacular and our guide Maria was very informative and the captain Mario thrilled us with his boat manoeuvres and kept us safe. Not to be missed. Thank you.
reviews/9/text: Took the boat tour of the caves out from Lagos Portugal. Great trip! Full of stories an up close & personal. Sonia was fantastic. Happy energetic, she really loves her work and people. She promised a fantastic tour and delivered. I would recommend this boat tour to anyone. Great driver who made it very exciting and wonderful gal explaining everything out there. So worth the small fee!
reviews/10/text: Wonderful trip to the Grottos, the experience was everything Sonja promised.  Great sales work!!  Highly recommend Happy Times
reviews/11/text:
Met Sonia on the Avenida and chose Happy Time because of her bubbly nature and enthusiasm.
Took a boat to the grotto with my girlfriend and it was fantastic. Our boat driver was excellent and had full control of the boat and sailed us right into the caves. The tour guide was very knowledgeable and explained everything about the cliffs and the grottos.
Enjoyed the trip so much that went again two weeks later with a friend who also thoroughly enjoyed it. Vanessa and Manuel were very knowledgeable and skilful in piloting the boat.
If you visit Lagos you must do this trip, you won’t regret it!
reviews/11/title: Excellent Grotto trip with Happy Time.
reviews/12/text: Such a fun boat ride this morning. A great way to see the city and beach. We were able to go into caves and the water was a gorgeous blue. Thanks to Sonia for making this such an easy and enjoyable excursion.
reviews/13/text: Don't leave Lagos without doing a Happy Time Boat trip! Absolutely recommend Happy times for the best experience of the caves at Ponta da Piedade. My daughter and I were very impressed by our skilful captain and also enthralled by his engagement with the passengers and his witty sense of humour. A huge thank you to Sonja who made all this possible. Look out for her on the Promenade. You cant miss her she is the chatty lady with an award winning smile and a greeting for everyone. I will definitely be back again in the summer for another trip. Obrigada!!
reviews/14/text: Great service- we got a water taxi to Alvor. We met Julio  at the Marina in Lagos , He was friendly and very helpful. He organised our service immediately and insisted that if we needed any help with anything during our holiday to come back to him. We were very happy with this service and would recommend it to our friends.
reviews/15/text: This truly was a happy time! Very impressed with our skilful captain, the waves were big and other tour operators were not capable. Best thing we have done in Portugal. There were some hair raising turns round narrow passages in the rocks as the waves crashed. I nearly cr@pped myself; it was great!
reviews/16/text: Hello, my family and myself are from Gibraltar. On the 24/10/2021 we visited Lagos and whilst walking the promenade near the marina we were approached by one of your staff. Her name is Sonia and with her friendly and expert advice she convinced us about taking a trip on one of your boats to see the caves.  My husband and myself had been there twice and the idea was for the  other members of my family to go but she was so nice and so convincing that we all went.  I would also like to thank the young man who took as on the boat although i unfortunately do not remember his name. I would like to congratulate your team for having  these professionals working and who make us feel so welcome and want to return to Portugal. Please pass my thanks to Sonia once again. Thankyou
reviews/17/text:
The tour itself was good - the guide was a little quiet. He did not speak at all outside of pointing out the sites but it's off season and there were 3 of us on the boat and we were quiet so no big deal there. 

When purchasing the ticket, I walked up the the stand and the lady there was super friendly and welcoming. She offered me a choice between the City Shoreline and the Benagil caves. I mentioned to her that I was staying in Armacao de Para and would be touring caves the next day and asked whether those were the same caves as the Benagil caves and she said no, it was something different, so I elected to go for the Benagil caves tour. When she tried to book me, it was already sold out and there would be no more tours for the day as they were only doing one tour a day since it was off season and there was not a lot of demand. So I went for the City Shoreline tour instead, and just selected the next available time which was in 20 mins.

Once I had paid, she said, don't miss the Benagil caves while I was here and I was closer to it since I was staying in Armacao de Pera - turns out the tour I  had already booked for the next day was the same thing... and seems like she was just trying to make a sale.

As per the lady's instructions, I headed to the boarding area to meet her colleague. Once I got to him, he mentioned that they had a requirement to have a minimum of 2 people per trip and since I was traveling alone, they were attempting to find other people for the timeslot to join me but if not, they would have to delay the trip and that his colleague had probably already mentioned this to me. She did not. Luckily they were able to find a couple to join on time and we were off. 

We had a pleasant tour along the shoreline but where back in under an hour, even though the tour is sold as a 1 hour 15 min experience. 

Once we came back, I tripped getting off the boat and fell but the guide did nothing. Stayed in his spot feet away from the boat and didn't even try to help me up or ask how I was. The random strangers who were on the boat with me helped and checked if I was ok...I get that current times require us to distance and be careful about contact but would have been nice if he at least asked of I needed assistance. 

Overall, I recommend the tour, but not the company. There were a lot of other companies providing the same tour so I would go with them instead.
reviews/18/text:
Our trip for dolphin watching couldn’t be any better! We went for 2 hours with a catamaran. I would highly advise you to take the catamaran because the dolphins like those boats more than the speedboats. Sonia gave us great tips and welcomed us with a lovely smile. She made the trip that little extra special. 

The dolphin watching is a 99% guarantee that you’ll see dolphins and you will have an experience you will remember for the rest of your life. 

Also very suitable for 65+ and parents with young kids!
reviews/19/text: We had a really happy time with Happy time. Sonia at the tourist office is amazing. She is very nice funny and took care of our satisfaction. Mário was waiting for us on the ship, who took care of great experiences and full glasses of Sangria. we had a lot of fun thank you Happy time

address: Marina de Lagos Portao - Gate A,B,C,D, Lagos 8600-780 Portugal
description: Professionals with many years of experience in the sea and with deep knowledge, in what it have best to offer. We provide fun for everyone who wants to join us. The Algarve Coast is our habitat, our passion. Enjoy with us, the experiences that nature offers us, enjoying to the maximum, always with good mood.
name: Lagos Adventure
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Kayak 2H30 Grottos Ponta da Piedade - Lagos
ranking: #9 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #9 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: Amazing trip along the shore and into the caves.  Humberto and his crew were great.  We are beginners at kayaking and felt safe the whole time.  Would definitely recommend if you like an adventure and close up view of the coast.  5 stars
reviews/1/text:
We highly recommend kayak trip with Lagos Adventure. Couldn't have asked for anything more. While showing us these amazing grottos and other views the guides told us interesting information and recommendations. After kayaking there was time to chill on the boat and swim, which was really nice. They also took a lot of great pictures which they sent afterwards.

They did everything they could to make the trip perfect. On the day before the date we had booked they suggested to reschedule the trip because of weather forecast promising big waves. We really appreciated this, since we have previous experience of companies that do the trips regardless of the conditions so that you won't get the most out of it, e.g. are not able to enter the grottos at all. Lastly, they were most understanding when I had to cancel on the same morning before the trip due to sickness - they rescheduled our trip without any extra charges.
reviews/2/text: Humberto, Richardo and Nuno make a great time and together, provided a really great experience.  Highlight our out holiday!! They made sure everyone felt safe and were having great fun.  I recommend adding this to your list of things to do when visiting the Algarve.  Sending on photos of the day at no extra charge was the icing on the cake. Thanks guys for a great day out!
reviews/3/text: Such an amazing time! I highly recommend to book with them if you are thinking about doing a kayak tour. They had such good energy and let the crazy people (like me) jump into the cold water after the kayaking part was over! Will do again when I am back in Lagos!
reviews/4/text: We had an amazing time with Humberto and his crew!  They were so much fun and very entertaining. Not only was the kayaking top tier, I would totally recommend the activity, we also got lots of local recommendations for things to see and eat. Humberto was taking photos the entire time, which were sent to us, a very nice touch as your phone would definitely get wet on the kayak. It was amazing to see the coast from the sea and get a totally different view.
reviews/5/text: We would highly recommend Lagos adventures. Our family thoroughly enjoyed the kayak adventure along the Lagos coastline. Our guide was very knowledgeable about the area and had a great sense of fun while at the same time made us feel we were in safe hands.  We will be back to Lagos adventures next time we are in Lagos ☀️
reviews/6/text: The tour guide staff were incredible — informative, entertaining and supportive. The kayak route was amazing, going through rock structures and cave entrances and on the open water.
reviews/6/title: Incredible kayaking experience with excellent staff
reviews/7/text:
My boyfriend and I did the tour on a wonderful sunny day in November and we really enjoyed it. Great kayaking, interesting facts about the region and Portugal and even some fun discussions on board. In the end we received a lot of beautiful photos of videos (included in the price) which enlighten my camera roll now :)
The crew was fun, helpful and personal. In the end we had the chance to take a bath and water was also included!
Thanks guys!!
reviews/8/text: Fantastic trip with great guides! Would thoroughly recommend to anyone considering a kayak trip, it's an incredible way to see the coast.
reviews/9/text:
Funny and good guid, amazing views and friendly people !!!!
Nice weather and amazing experience !!!!
reviews/10/text: The team was perfect! Umberto, Ricardo, Nuno were our captains, guides, mother- ducks! The cliffs of Lagos are the best view in region Algarve. I am happy that we  proffered this activity! Guys, you are the best!
reviews/11/text: We were very excited to go on our Kayaking tour with Lagos Adventures. Unfortunately due to circumstances out of our control we weren’t able to meet our starting time. We had been in regular contact with Humberto, who clearly prioritised safety over all else, and he telephoned on the day of our tour to check in on us. When we explained that we were likely to be significantly late, he regretfully informed us that the tour would have to proceed without us. He was very considerate and even processed a refund the same day. A pleasure to interact with, and we will certainly book with him in the future. Thanks!
reviews/12/text: We had a private tour bcos we were the only customer in the morning (during covid). Ricardo and Umberto  made it an amazing experience: very friendly, very informative and easy to understand instruction, easy to make conversation with, offer safety but relaxing atmosphere. Their skills combined the beauty of natures (beaches, caves, rocks, sea) made it a must-do-activity.
reviews/12/title: Must Do Activity in Lagos with the best team
reviews/13/text: Amazing trip from the guys, great sense of humour, made us feel very comfortable. Explanations about each of the caves, and rock formations. Time for a swim and photos sent over at the end - Well worth it!
reviews/14/text: well organised and the hosts on our trip were excellent. Nice small group with the boat and kayaks all in excellent condition.  Highly recommend these operators for an excellent day out.
reviews/14/title: excellent attraction in an idyllic location
reviews/15/text: Booked the kayaking as a last minute activity towards the end of our holiday, didn’t know what to expect but was a fabulous, interesting and factual trip run by 2 amazing guys ‘Ricardo’ and unfortunately the other chaps name has slipped my mind :-/ we learnt so much history about Lagos & Portugal in general which was fascinating, especially about the earthquake that hit in the 18th Century.  The kayaking was brilliant and our 2 teenagers thought it was cool..thank you guys for such a memorable experience!
reviews/16/text:
We went on the kayak adventure to visit the grottos. The 4 m time slot was extremely busy with many other boats and kayaks in the water. Not that it’s the company’s fault but the number of tinnies and their large motors just charging in amongst kayakers and into small places is a disaster waiting to happen! One of our group was hit by one of these tinnies with just sheer arrogance from the driver.
Despite this was very pleasant, scenery awesone and the guide very good !
reviews/17/text: We did this with our 2 boys (13 & 11) and really loved it. The team is really friendly and fun and very professional - well organised with good quality equipment. Would love to do it again and would highly recommend it.
reviews/18/text: We took a trip with Lagos adventure and kayaked around the caves, as a novice kayaker I need not have worried, we had excellent guides who were funny and knowledgeable, a must to do if you visit Lagos!
reviews/19/text: Everything about this company is just right, we got picked up at the gate and were immediately greeted friendly. The tour started on the boat with safety instructions and an explanation on kayaking. After we arrived at the starting point and entered the water. This is one of the few (if not only) companies to bring you to sea with their boat, instead of towing your kayak. The groups are small, the guides are friendly and humorous and told a lot about the history and surroundings. Our boat always was close by and the pictures made by the crew can be downloaded for free the next day. We would definitely recommend this company!!
subcategory_ranking: #9 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve

address: Lagos 8600-325 Portugal
description: South Explorers intends to offer comfort tours to places that are distinguished by their natural beauty, history and culture. Come and discover the most beautiful villages of Portugal.Discover the historic village of Sagres and the amazing views at St. Vincent Cape. Visit the Museums and Castle of Mertola and enjoy a breathtaking landscape on the Costa Vicentina!
name: South Explorers
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Small-Group Day Tour of Silves and Monchique with Wine Tasting
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Sagres Sunset Small Group Tour from Lagos
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Wild and Wonderful West Coast Full Day Tour
offer_group/offer_list/3/title: Sagres & Cape St. Vincent Half-Day Tour
offer_group/offer_list/4/title: Monchique Half Day Small-Group Tour from Lagos
reviews/0/text:
We had an awesome time discovering the coast and small villages with Antonio, he was the best!!! It was really interesting and we saw wonderful places that we would not have seen without him (less touristic places). If you read this comment, book now!!! :) Thanks again Antonio for the great tour! 
Pat & Sophie
reviews/1/text: Everything was extraordinary. António is such an amazing guy with a lot of knowledge. Everything was well coordinated and we enjoyed every last second of this tour. Honestly, we didnt want this tour to end because of how much fun we were having. António always kept the ball rolling and kept giving us fun facts as we drove along the west coats. We were so lucky to go on this tour and if you have the chance you should absolutely get on this tour. You get to see a lot of secret locations and hidden gems.
reviews/2/text: The trip was amazing. Antonio was a marvelous guide with so much knowledge about the places we visited. Many breathtaking views.
reviews/3/text: We had a fantastic day with Antonio exploring the west coast. He was polite, friendly and very knowledgeable on the areas that he was showing us. We saw several beaches, cliff edges and landmarks and despite it being a windy day, it was brilliant. He also took us to a seafood restaurant on a cliff edge which was incredible. A must do if you're in the Algarve.
reviews/3/title: Great day exploring the West Coast!
reviews/4/text:
We had a blast with Antonio!  He picked us up in Evora and drove us south to Lagos for three days!   On the way he was awesome to learn from and laugh with. He was punctual, knowledgeable and flexible to everything we wanted to do and see!

Highlights for us (family of four including 12 and 15 y.olds) were the Benagil Caves tour Antonio helped arrange for us, a trip to hike around Ponta Da Peidade, and Cabo de San Vincente. 

He was also great with our kids - especially getting into Geo-cache’ing!
reviews/5/text: We had such a fun time on the full day Silves, Monchique, and wine tasting tour. Our Airbnb host recommended South Explorers to us. António is the very best guide. He is passionate and kind. He truly cared about making sure we all had the best time. We appreciated being picked up from our Airbnb. It was very convenient. Throughout the trip, we felt like António was a our friend that we were spending the day with. We would have never thought to go to the destinations on our own. Silves is so cool! Monchique was amazing! The best part was going to the winery at the end of the day. Everything was very organized and executed flawlessly. We wish we could have done more tours with him while we were here, but he gets booked up quickly. Don’t hesitate to book with South Explorers when visiting Lagos!
reviews/6/text:
On our recent trip to the Algarve Antonio was our guide on two excursions.  He is the perfect guide - professional, considerate, reliable and knowledgeable about the region, people and culinary specialties.
He showed us the most beautiful landscapes and views - also at places "off the beaten tracks".  We saw and learnt much more than on the usual tours.
His kindness, pleasant disposition and good sense of humour made the two days with him a truly unique experience which we will fondly remember.
Thank you Antonio!
reviews/7/text: The tour was great.  Our guide Antonio was really good and provided a lot of useful information.  We recommend booking the tour at the beginning of your vacation.
reviews/8/text:
Antonio was great, we went first in a boat to see the Benagil Cave and then we had a walk with Antonio, we have a lovely time exploring all the Caves from the top.
Thank you so much Antonio you are a great tour Guide
reviews/9/text: Antonio was a very good guide for our trip. We had a lovely time exploring Sagres and Caoe of St Vincent as well as an excellent viewpoint of the western coast.
reviews/9/title: A great with a very amiable guide! Highly recommended.
reviews/10/text: Antonio was fabulous!  Picked us up in sintra and transported us to Lagos during a very atypical rainy day. We stopped in evora to sightsee and have lunch. He was punctual , friendly and very informative.  I highly recommend his services.
reviews/11/text: Spent two days touring eastern and western Algarve on full day private tours with Antonio of South Explorers. He's friendly, capable, responsible, knows the entire region top to bottom. The vehicle is excellent, he's totally flexible as to plans-itinerary, never felt rushed, he knew just what to do and where to go. Unlike larger impersonal tours, Antonio personally handles each trip so you know who-what you are getting. On top of everything else he's  truly likable person who is a pleasure to spend time with.. Can happily recommend him 100% with no reservations.
reviews/11/title: Absolutely perfect guide to The Algarve
reviews/12/text:
Antonio from South Explorers was the best guide! Very friendly and knowledgeable about all the areas we toured. I went on three tours- 
1 Benagil caves, Carvoeiro and Algar Saco.
2 Monchique, Slives and Wine Tasting. 
3 Wild and Wonderful West Coast. 
All trips were absolutely amazing and unforgettable. I really enjoyed each one and they were all so different and I couldn’t choose just one I liked the best as they were all so great. It was so wonderful seeing so many different areas that were also so diverse in landscape. I will defiantly use South Explorers again when I return to the Algarve. I love that they also do personalized tours too which is a great option.
reviews/13/text: We enjoyed half day west coast tour.  Antonio is a very knowledgeable and friendly guy and looked after us very well.  Tour does various view points and beaches along the Atlantic coast where surfing is popular and the beaches wonderful.  Will go on another tour next time we are in Lagos.
reviews/14/text: A nice tour to beautiful places with a friendly guide, comfortable minivan, a lot of explanations to the places
reviews/15/text:
It was a day full of adventure, as it happened to be quite foggy and most of the beaches in the south west were not clear.
Antonio did everything to show me the beauty of the West Coast from constantly checking live web cams to taking me as far north as he could, away from the fog. I really appreciate the effort, as it was my last day before I flew back home and therefore my last chance to see the wild west coast.
Antonio is also very knowledgeable and provided me with a bunch of interesting information about the area as well as answered all of my questions:)
I totally recommend this tour, this part of the country is not to be missed!
reviews/16/text:
Silves, Caldas & Monchique- one day with wine tasting.
Fantastic tour about the history in Algarve combined with the stunning views in the mountains and the Algarve nature ending with enjoying high quality local wine at a wonderful quinta. António is a very knowledgable guide in many subjects for example history, nature, farming, tourism yes and knows a lot about local life in Algarve. All day he easy kept our interest and we enjoyed a fantastic day in the most comfortable and relaxing way.
reviews/16/title: Enjoy and learn about Algarve in a fantastic and local way
reviews/17/text: We were picked up by our guide Antonio in his comfortable van at the hotel. On the way to the cape we did 2 stops to admire beautiful high cliffs and the spots we would hardly find on our own. Then we arrived to the cape right on time to take a good seat at the cliffs and look at probably the most beautiful sunset in the world. Antonio was so caring. He even brought blankets for us to keep warm. Last but not least he invited us to a cap of a portwine and a delicious Local pastry tarte de nata. During the whole trip Antonio told us a lot of stories about the places we were going to and many interesting facts about Portugal, Algarve region and Portugueses. He was smiling, patient, caring and we could really take our time there. No rush! The trip took about 3 hours and these were well spent hours and the money. Strongly recommended.
reviews/17/title: Excellent sunset guided tour in Saint Vincent Cape and Sagres
reviews/18/text: We had a really great evening for the sunset tour with Antonio. The tour guide is really knowledgeable and he explained many things about the city. The views let alone are worthy the tour. Highly recommend!
reviews/19/text:
absolutely wonderful afternoon with António yesterday visiting the cliffs of Portugals south coast Europes most western point. the scenery was breathtaking and the day was perfect.
António was very informative on the history of the region and the people.
Thanks António for the nice conversation along the way truly a pleasant afternoon i will remember for a long time.
reviews/19/title: Sagres St. Vincent half day tour

address: Marina de Lagos Gate ABCD Passeio dos Descobrimentos 10, Lagos 8600-315 Portugal
address_obj/street1: Marina de Lagos Gate ABCD Passeio dos Descobrimentos 10
description: Your Dream Tours Start Here! Lagos Boat Tours is a small, local, family owned boat tour business that provides boat tours to Ponta da Piedade in Lagos, Portugal. Our services include: Grotto Tours, Coastal Tours and Sunset Tours. We have a crew of dedicated people with a passion for the sea. Our commitment is to quality and to make other people happy and enjoy what our beautiful Ponta da Piedade coastline has to offer. Our customers have plenty of time to take photos. Our captains/guides are Local & Multilingual.
name: Lagos Boat Tours
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Ponta da Piedade Grotto Tour in Lagos, Algarve
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Ponta da Piedade Sunset Tour in Lagos, Algarve
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Ponta da Piedade Coastal Tour in Lagos, Algarve
reviews/0/text:
Rui and Daniel are incredibly nice people! They went above and beyond to make sure we had one of the best boat tour experiences in our life. 
This boat tour is incredibly highly recommended. We've had boat tours in Santorini Greece, and Venice Italy, and though every one of them are charming in their own way, this boat tour is unforgettable and probably even one of a kind due to the beautiful stone structures and caves in the ocean, which Rui safely took us into see them! Amazing!!!
reviews/1/text: Really lovely boat tour, the skipper and crew were friendly, funny, very knowledgeable and incredibly good at driving the boat between the beautiful rock formations. Highlight of our trip highly recommend!
reviews/2/text: Wow! It was a beautiful experience, more like a private tour. Our captain, Rui Pedro, was exceptional. He was attentive and answered all the wired questions my 9yr old was asking. He also speaks excellent English. I highly recommend Lagos Boat Tours
reviews/3/text: Was amazing to be on the tour of the Lagos Boat Tours. We really enjoyed every minute of it and learned a lot while seeing the magnificent coast from the ocean. The scenery was beautiful and the captain explained in detail every step of the tour. We loved it!!
reviews/4/text: Very nice private trip around the coast and cliffs of Lagos with local and skillful captain Rui Pedro from Lagos Boat Tours. We really enjoyed the cruise going through the most narrow passages what other boats around us haven't done. Muito obrigado!!
reviews/5/text: Super friendly tour guides that bring you along the Lagos coast to see the cliffs and caverns. Nice activity to do for a reasonable price.
reviews/6/text:
Amazing how they navigated in and out of the formations. The only real way to experience it!!
Double exclamation.
And hats off to Augusto from tours by locals to get this done!
reviews/7/text: We chose Rui and Daniel for our river cruise and we made a great choice! Rui, a native resident of Lagos, and the river boat industry, is very knowledgeable and shares stories while pointing out the many landmarks. His boat maneuvered through the waterways expertly while also giving rightaway to others enjoying the coastline’s intriguing features. This is a “must” adventure for the Lagos visitor.
reviews/8/text: As you approach the closest of the beaches off the main drag of Lagos, the reception "desk"  looks a little gimmicky.   Anybody with experience with tourist traps will be wary of the hard sell of the local charmer selling can't miss boat tours.  But this is different.  You are taken in a small boat through the wonderful caves and grottos which lie just outside of fair Lagos and, depending on your driver, you should be in for an enchanting 30 minute voyage through a veritable paradise.   Aside from the ubiquitous kayakers and a scattering of paddle boarders, you will be charmed by the captivating surroundings : an paralleled combination of sky, light, color, rock and water.   Portugal at its best !!!   Obrigada !!!
reviews/9/text: We had a great day, it was very funny. The staff is very friendly and reasonable price. Highly recommend!
reviews/10/text: I highly reccomend the trip. We were four friends and we really enjoyed the views and the explication of the guide.
reviews/11/text: Very nice. Wonderful guide and boat. Amazing pictures.Highly recommended. An incredible experience. .
reviews/12/text: It was a great experience! Great views, beautiful sunset and the explanation of our guide. Recommend 100%
reviews/13/text: Great experience! Good explanation to all graves and beaches! Thank you for your guidance! See you next year;)
reviews/13/title: Great experience! Thank you for your guidance!
reviews/14/text: Out guide was brilliant. Tbe voat was big but not too much so we could go inside many cabes. Its a perfect trip for the holidays
reviews/15/text: Our guide was very informative.  I truly believe our experience was far and above better than all the other kiosk booths selling cave and grotto boat tours.  The boat Lagos Boat Tours uses is small, so we could explore all the caves, scooting in and out of every possible site imaginable.  The length of the tour was perfect and the Tour company is excellent!  Do it if you get the chance!
reviews/16/text: This boat tour was absolutely fantastic! The guide was knowledgable and friendly and supplemented the information with wonderful stories from his childhood. We laughed and chatted the entire time!
reviews/17/text: I LOVED Lagos boat tours! The guide is born and raised in Lagos and had amazing stories to tell of the area and unique rock formations. The tour is conducted on a small motor boat, so there were only 7 of us and we were able to go in and out of the caves and arches, etc. Unbelievable value for such a great experience.  Highly recommend!!
reviews/18/text: Lagos Marina quayside is packed with stalls all offering a boat trip along the coast to visit the caves. We chose one at random - Days of Adventure - and we were lucky enough to have Diogo as our Skipper. He was fun, he was knowledgeable and he gave the kids on the boat the time of their lives. Thank you Diogo for the best trip ever!
reviews/19/text: Visite fabuleuse commentée par Ruy Pedro et Daniel dans un bon français. Nous vous recommandons cette compagnie, vous ne le regretterez pas.

address: Largo da Praia Next to the coloured Steps, an identified wooden ticket shop, Carvoeiro 8400-517 Portugal
address_obj/street2: Next to the coloured Steps, an identified wooden ticket shop
description: Boat trips by sea in easy boarding modern small boats, visiting breathtaking unique Benagil coastline caves, from Carvoeiro, through Benagil up to Praia da Marinha, considered most beautiful beaches in Europe. Only smaller boats can explore the caves at will - the larger boats are too big to enter the caves. Carvoeiro Caves has a fleet of 4 small, modern boats that zip along the coast and can easily be manoeuvered in the caves. All the boats have an easy boarding system making them accessible to the mobility impaired - no wading through waist-high water before clambering aboard. And all boats are equipped with all safety gear as required by law
name: Carvoeiro Caves
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Benagil Long Boat tour (From Carvoeiro to Praia da Marinha)
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Superb Private caves tour with highly skilled skipper
photo/caption: Benagil Cave Visit, we enter as far in as possible so everyone can get the perfect picture or video
ranking: #8 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #8 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: The tour was awesome!  Our guide was wonderful and extremely informative about the caves histories.  We had our 1 year old daughter with us on the tour and they were wonderful with her.  Would recommend this company and if we ever need another Benagil Caves tour, we will definitely rebook.
reviews/1/text:
Benagil Sea Caves - 1 hour tour.
Was unsure if we should have taken the longer tour to Marhina, but the tour to Benagil was perfect, as we visited Marhina on foot earlier in the day (defo recommend).
We took the 1500 trip which was on choppy waters, which added to the excitement, yet we still felt super safe and could still stand up to take photos. (The girls sat at the front of the boat got soaked by a big wave as we boarded from the beach). Top tip - wear short legs.
Our captain and guide (wish I could remember their names) were great, itinerary was delivered with good command of English and with humour. 
The caves visited were amazing, a truly great experience.
reviews/2/text: What an amazing experience and one I would do time and time again. Joào & André were fantastic and really made the trip perfect. I was unsure about a boat ride as I get sea sick and the thought did not enter my head once on the boat, the amazing tour guide full of knowledge and the driver was incredible. Many thanks we will be sure to return.
reviews/3/text: Daniel and Antonio made the tour very funny and informative. I definitely recommend taking one of their tours. Thank you to both of you!
reviews/4/text: Fantastic views and access to the caves along the Algarve coast. Also great views of some very scenic beaches. Excellent story telling. Would recommend if you have a few extra hours and would like to explore the coast.
reviews/5/text: An absolutely fantastic experience. Our ship’s “captain” and “first mate” (Daniel and Antonio) were very welcoming, knowledgeable and entertaining. The caves are a must see and this way of doing so was first rate. I can’t recommend this tour company highly enough.
reviews/6/text: We took the 1 hour tour along the coast which entered a number of caves during the trip. There were several trips leaving at the same time and it was a bit unclear how it was being organised but it was. Easy to board the boat and once we were on the guide was knowledgeable and explained some history as well as the geography of the area. The trip was better than expected and well worth doing.
reviews/7/text: Went out today with Daniel and Pablo from Carvoiera Tours. Can't recommend them enough! Highly skilled sailing manoeuvres within small caves, great stories delivered with a sense of humour. We had lots of children onboard and they were amazing with them!
reviews/7/title: Excellent trip! So glad we booked it
reviews/8/text: Fantastic experience! We did the 90 min tour including Praia do Marinha. At first we were a bit apprehensive to spend the money but we ended up loving it! The captain and tour guide were funny and knowledgeable and went above and beyond to make sure everyone had a good time. Muito obrigada!
reviews/9/text: We did a morning tour with Joāo and Edgar and it was the very best! The captain was an expert boatman, and his mate was kind, informative and helpful. The water was calm, the tide was low and they took us into every cave they could. We highly recommend this company! The coastline is breathtaking, a trip of a lifetime for sure! These folks work hard. Make sure to bring tip money for them!
reviews/10/text: Small modern speedboat able to access the caves.  The skipper and tour guide great and friendly.  Tour guide knowledgeable and made it a really enjoyable experience.  We did the 90 minute tour which was a perfect length of time.
reviews/11/text: Joao and Fabio offered a fabulous and fun boat trip to Benagil and back for four ladies over 70. We had a great time with their entertaining travel log along the way. The views of the Algarve coastline are spectacular. We felt very safe and comfortable in their very clean Covid safe vessel. Thank you Joao and Fabio!
reviews/12/text:
Unforgettable boat tour with Carvoeirocaves.com
Thousand Thanks to Carlos and João for this fantastic journey!!!
reviews/13/text: Great experience visiting the caves from Carvoeiro till Praia da Marinha. Our captains João and Carlos were very professional and friendly. Definitely a must do activity if you’re in the area, as you’ll be able to see beaches/spots only accessible by boat. Also recommended for kids.
reviews/14/text: The caves are unbelievably beautiful and the tour guides Fabio & Bruno were very friendly and knowledgeable. Highly recommend
reviews/15/text: Had a great experience with João and Fábio on our recent trip to Carvoeiro. We did the hour tour (the perfect amount of time) parting from the village center and cruised along the coast seeing beautiful cliffs and caves. João was a nice, friendly and knowledgeable guide while Fábio was a very skilled and fun boat captain. These caves are amazing- we even saw a fossilized starfish and I even found a “new” one they haven’t seen before! You can’t skip this!! It’s a must when visiting the South of Portugal! I was in the region a few years ago and I’m mind blown I missed all of this until this time time around. Highly recommended!!
reviews/16/text: We would like to thank Antonio and Carlo(s) for an amazing experience! During "Covid Times" boat was desinfected, hands desinfected before boarding, need to wear masks, but all well managed! You can storage your shoes near to their kiosk a few steps from boarding place, on the boat you need to be barefood. We enjoyed the longer tour and it lasted really 90+ min, both gentlemen knew a lot about caves and beaches, added funny comments:) It was a highlight of our trip to Portugal, you should not miss this!
reviews/17/text: Best way to see the coast of Portugal and its caves! Funny skippers and Fabio showed us all beautiful places. We even had time for a short swim before Marina Beach  great time for a good price! We highly recommend
reviews/17/title: Best way to see all the caves!!
reviews/18/text:
This experience was totally awesome. 

Miguel and João took us to explore some beautiful caves whilst also controlling the boat and making it an extremely fun ride.

When can I trade life in Manchester for life on the waves?
reviews/19/text: Well worth doing.  The guides were very informative and knowledgeable, with a great sense of humour.  Saw all caves with great photo opportunities, really enjoyed it, highly recommended!

reviews/0/text: Excellent. The guide was very enthusiastic and helpful and had a wealth of knowledge about the caves geology and history. He was great fun too! Thanks
reviews/1/text: We loved our time with the local guides, their carisma combined with the local knowledge made our trip a very special time! To get involved in those magical caves is a must do if you're around the Algarvian coast!
reviews/1/title: A Must Do around Algarvian coast!!
reviews/2/text:
Merveilleuse expérience ! 
Maman solo avec une ado ce n'est pas toujours facile de trouver LA bonne activité safe et plaisante...
Et bien c'est chose faite ! 
Caio est génial, les 2h sont passées super vite.
Apprentissage, explications pendant la visite, il ne nous a pas fait prendre de risque inconsidéré, il nous laisse le temps de faire des photos, les paysages sont magnifiques ... top !
Oubliez la balade en bateau bruyante et impersonnelle !
Je recommande à 100% de la réservation jusqu'au dernier moment.
reviews/3/text: La experiencia superó mis expectativas, hice el Tour  privado a las cuevas con Francisco, Me contó todo sobre las diferentes cuevas muy  amable y competente, súper  profecional, es mas al finalizar le pregunte con mi marido sobre que otras playas y lugares visitar y tal y como el nos indico fuimos y conocimos lugares increíbles, muy contentos y agradecidos, lo recomendamos al 100x100. En mi opinión la experiencia por Mar se vive mejor porque puedes entra a todas las cuevas y bajar a ellas cosa  que no  puedes hacer en barco. No se lo pueden perder!!!!!! Las Cuevas de Benagil Increíbles Muchísimas gracias
reviews/3/title: No te lo podes perder!!!!! Súper

description: Stand Up Paddle is a perfect activity for everyone, regardless of their age or fitness level. You can Paddle with your family, a group of friends or even with your dog. Ilovesup Paddle School & Tours offers you great Paddle experiences, book with us and get to know the Algarve coast. Take a break! Let's Paddle.
name: Ilovesup
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Stand Up Paddle in Benagil Caves
reviews/0/text: Pick up and drop off @ your hotel with company van by enthousiastic team, energy directly good. Pre-trip info is crystal clear and they are helpful. On the water, they take good care of the group's safety. The owner goes ahead with a small hover with motor and he takes pictures that he sends later via Wetransfer. The tour itself is truely amazing, stunning views on the cliffs.
reviews/1/text: Such an easy experience, run by very nice couple! highly recommend! they were not too bothered by us being a little late back ! views phenomal
reviews/2/text:
When in Albufeira SUP is definitely something you must do. 
Friendly team, eager to teach and provide you with the best experience possible :)
reviews/3/text:
Amazing! Nog aan het nagenieten van een fantastische sup tour. Je wordt meegenomen naar grotten en uiteraard de bekendste en magische grot van Benagil waar je de tijd krijgt om de mooiste foto’s te maken!! Geschikt voor zowel beginners als gevorderden. Onze gids Márcio was geduldig en neemt de tijd voor iedereen. Een echte aanrader!

Amazing! Still enjoying a fantastic sup tour. You will be taken to caves and of course the most famous and magical cave of Benagil where you will have the time to take the most beautiful pictures !! Suitable for both beginners and advanced users. Our guide Márcio was patient and takes time for everyone. Highly recommended!
reviews/4/text: It was first time I have done paddle in my life and I liked it so much, I fall in love... me and my friends had a lot of fun.. In 1 word.. AMAZING.. And I have to mention our instructor (Marcio) such a great job mate, very patient and super friendly, he was super. I really recommend Ilovesup for beginners or for who likes to something different or even if you what to have a different day visiting nice caves at the Algarve coast. For  Ilovesup a huge thank you for the amazing day we had.. I hope to see you again.. definitely
reviews/5/text: I had a really great time with Marcio the friendly and helpful guide. We went through a few caves and beaches which were absolutely beautiful and not to crowded. Thank you!
reviews/5/title: Amazing stand-up paddling experience on the sea!
reviews/6/text:
My dream come true! I would love to share my feelings about private lessons with I♥️Sup.This is the best what I could do on my vacation!
As a beginner I had lot of fear,but same time with all my heart I wished to learn SUP‍♀️! And I did it!

Guys,  according to my experience I could say you are  amazing,very caring,professional,positive and responsible team! 

Thank You Marcio,for your professionalism,easygoing way to explain, show the unforgettable places and sharing useful information with us!!!

It is very competitive and affordable prices. 
quality of service is 
 pick up flexible ( for was very important)
friendly and helpful with around activities,restaurants,etc.
reviews/7/text: We had an amazing SUP tour in September along the Benagil caves. Marcio, our guide, was very friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. The equipment was first class! Great experience, highly recommended!
reviews/8/text:
Was my first time on a sup board and it was amazing, Márcio was very professional, he show me the best caves and beaches and took good pictures.
Next summer i will book another tour to see the west coast.
All the people should try it.
reviews/9/text: It was my first time trying SUP and I couldnt find better place than Ilovesup :) Honestly it was sooo much fun, our instructor was super professional and fun the same time. Beautiful tour with amazing views, great equipment and great photos as a souvenir :) HIGHLY recommended!
reviews/10/text: We went sunset paddle boarding with Marcio and it was so beautiful! He was very patient with us (esp. me who was initially afraid to stand up on the board). He took us to different caves and Praia da Marinha and also took some amazing pictures for us. Would definitely recommend trying it out!
reviews/11/text: Me , My sister and her son tried Sup (stand-up peddling). it was an amazing experience...Our guide Marcio and Mina were great. They were very kind and helped us a lot. We all 3 are amateur in swimming but these people motivated us and made it possible. It was one of our best experience and i am glad we did it.
reviews/12/text: From the very start the guys were very keen to help and give info, the paddles and the van that takes us to the places are all brand new and of a very high quality. you can see how much they care about the experience of the costumer. The route is amazing, during the time of the paddle and inside of the grouts they are always taking pictures of us, very high quality resolution. Truly amazing tour, for beginners or experienced people that want to discover the beautiful sights of South Portugal. Thank you Márcio and Fábio.
reviews/13/text:
The paddle experience was fantastic. We visited some most beautiful caves in that area including paradise cave and the famous benagil cave, and above all we could  get off the board and rest inside them. The best view you can imagine. 
The guide was nice and professional. He recommended us the best time to do the tour and took nice pics. 
Absolutely worth the price.
reviews/14/text:
Me and my girlfriend deceided to try paddle boarding during our holiday to the algarve. It was our first time doing it. We had such a great time and it was a fantasic expereince. We had a lot of fun falling off the board into the ocean and seeing the wonderful caves. We was picked up at our hotel by our guides who drove us to the the place to SUB. We was briefed really well and they answered all of our questions. The guides were brillent and we would not have had the great time we had without them. They dropped us back off at our hotel afterwards. Overall I would defiently recommend this tour to anyone, familys couples or even if you was on your own. I have left a few pictures of our experience below. The guides spoke  clear english for us too which made the tour even better for us.

Thank you so much sub tours. You were 5 star :)
reviews/15/text: Fantastisch om het suppen te ervaren en helemaal in deze omgeving. De begeleiding is top, behulpzaam en zorgt dat het veilig is.
reviews/16/text: muitos sustos pois tem alguma ondulacao, mas muito bom de se voltar a fazer novamente o passeio de barco aconselho, o verão
reviews/17/text: A nossa experiência no I Love Sup em albufeira foi excelente. Aconcelhamos a 100%! O instrutor 5*****
reviews/18/text:
Muito bom, instrutor super amigável, divertido e de confiança.
Iniciou com uma breve instrução e depois ao longo da aula ia sempre dando dicas
reviews/19/text:
A aula com o Márcio foi excelente! Explicou o essencial sobre material, técnica e ventos para nos preparar para a água. Dentro de água, foi paciente mas atento, deu espaço à nossa autonomia, mas sempre a acompanhar e incentivar a evoluir. O mais positivo foi mesmo o acompanhamento aos miúdos(12A), acompanhou-os enquanto os adultos tentaram começar a equilibrar-se e isso deu-nos muita segurança.
Nunca nos sentimos em risco, ele fez-nos sentir sempre seguros.
Sem dúvida, a repetir!

address: Avenida dos Descobrimentos 180m from Repsol, Lagos 8600-645 Portugal
description: Tours in the Lagos area, old and new town, beaches, countryside, golf resorts, neighboring villages such as Vila da Luz, Odiáxere, to the Bravura dam, tours and tastings in award-winning vineyards and everything you can ask for or imagine. With an electric tuk tuk that comfortably accommodates 6 people (but the tour is private - you book just for you, your family/friends) and always accompanied by local guides. Are you here for just one day? This is the best introduction to the city. In a short time you will see and hear about our history, churches, museums, statues, main squares and narrow streets, traditions, rock formations and beaches. Or you can simply escape the hustle and bustle of the city! Are you in Lagos for a longer stay? These are funny moments and you will see new things (we guarantee you will)!
name: Tukano Tuk Tours
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: TUK TUK Tour around Lagos Old & New Town & beaches - Best way to know Lagos
reviews/0/text: Really enjoyable afternoon. We did the “Natura” tour. Carla was so nice, knowledgeable and informative explaining all about the nature of the local area with many examples provided. Highly recommend.
reviews/1/text:
Nuno, our guide was fantastic, really knowledgeable and clearly loves Lagos where he was born and the surrounding area.
He explained everything to us really clearly and took us to visit places we wouldn't have seen otherwise, stopping to let us look around and take photos.
Would highly recommend the tour. Took 1.5 hours and cost 35 Euros. Great value.
reviews/1/title: Tuk tuk tour to Vila da Luz
reviews/2/text: We had a fabulous nature tour with Nuno. Nuno was quick to respond to my enquiry with helpful information and  availability. We needed to change our tour at short notice as I was feeling unwell and it was no problem. Nuno was friendly and the drive was  comfortable. There were blankets in case we felt chilly but we didn't need them. Nuno was knowledgeable and we learned a lot about  farming in the local area as well as where to buy the freshest and cheapest seafood in Lagos. Just a lovely, relaxed trip with great guy. Highly recommended. Thanks Nuno. We will be back for another tour next time
reviews/3/text: We had previously taken a trip with Nuno three years ago and we were delighted to travel with him again. He is the most knowledgeable and interesting guy who is from many generations of family within the local area. Last time we took the town/beaches tour, this time we explored the nature trip which took us along the coast and inland, learning all about the crops, fruits, plants and animals. His excellent English and sense of humour made the tour come to life as out Portuguese is very limited  The time flew by and we were sorry to have to say goodbye at the end but will definitely book with Nuno again. Be sure to book Tukano Tuk Tours, he and his wife are the best!
reviews/3/title: Brilliant two hours of local knowledge and insight
reviews/4/text: The tour around Alvor river & countryside was amazing: the beauty of the landscape, the authenticity of the villages and mostly Nuno's knowledge & love for his cultural heritage made this an unforgettable experience: I got to see and taste carob, wild asparagus, fennel, learned about customs, agriculture, wildlife. Thank you for this experience and keeping ancient wisdom alive
reviews/5/text: We went with Nuno on the 90 minute tour to Praia de Luz. He pointed out all the areas we travelled through and gave us a back story about everything. Very informative and entertaining. We found out that Luz was bigger than we thought. The comfortable Tuc was small enough to go everywhere. And it's electric. A completely enjoyable trip. This review is not doing it justice. Perfect, 10 out of 10. Thank you Nuno.
reviews/5/title: Best value tourist type trip ever
reviews/6/text: So informative and lots of fun. Carla was lovely and great with the kids. She showed us amazing spots and we had a great time. Thank you
reviews/7/text: Absolutely the best trip and nunu was great as to stop at many trees for us to see the many fruits and stop on many locations for us to take in the fantastic views and my best stop by far was the church to light a candle for my dad.will definitely be returning next year and many years to come god willing.thankyou so so much xxxx
reviews/8/text: We had a great tour with Nuno, his knowledge of his area was superb, lots of historical facts and beautiful views. We did the historic tour and then did the beach areas. Nuno also told us about his cliff fishing adventures and told us about the different fish species he catches. Nuno is a very knowledgeable local man and his pride in his hometown shines through on his trips.
reviews/9/text: Our tour was perfect, even on a cloudy and rainy day! Nuno could not have been nicer and more welcoming, giving us a really detailed historic tour of Lagos and also showed us the amazing beaches and coves. Highly recommend during your visit to Lagos, rain or shine!
reviews/10/text:
Had a nice time in the back of Nuno's electric tuktuk. He picked us up from our hotel and drove us all over Lagos, showing us his favorite beaches and telling us about his cliff-fishing.
Would recommend it to anyone who's arrived for the first time and wondering what paces to visit.
reviews/11/text:
Nuno was our guide today (the 11th of September). He arrived right on-time at our place. He was extremely knowledgeable of Lagos and make sure we got to see all of the best sites, taking time to allow us to take our pictures.

If you have the time, take the 1,5 hour tour. Excellent service well worth the price...
reviews/12/text: We enjoyed the 1,5 hours tour with Carla so much. We visited  the historical old town and the most beautiful beaches we ever saw. Carla gave us time to take pictures and gave us the Information we were interested in. All that for a more than moderate price. There is no risk in regards of the virus because Carla provided is with desinfectants and we were outside all the time. Thank you for discovering the beautyful city you were born in.
reviews/13/text:
Good service and we enjoyed a lot on tuk tuk 
In this hot weather its awesome to ride on tuk my children were very excited to ride 
They were very happy and we enjoy the view of lagos
Great service 
The driver is very awesome guy
reviews/14/text: Walked past sign a couple of times on the main de stopped to take a look a lady gave us some information but no hard sell. Booked it up that evening with a quick phone call to collect us from hotel next morning. Collected by Nono, husband of earlier lady, and he took us on a tour of all the important historical, cultural and tourist parts of the city. His knowledge of the cities history, and want to explain it meant went well over the 1.5hrs, but he quickly made you his friend and understanding what interests you. Got to know a lot about Nono and his family. Honestly could not recommend enough, fantastic service at very reasonable price, would say do early in your Lagos stay, as gives you do many ideas for the days shelf
reviews/15/text: Nuno is the absolute best, and I don't give reviews easily. We stumbled upon Nuno's tuktuk after a boat ride and got to talk a bit. He offers one hour tours to the centre of the village, or to the beaches or the country side. Or combos of 1.5 hrs. So we said, can we do all of it with a two hour drive? No problem, price agreed up front, thinking out of the box. Best tour ever, Nuno knows a lot about his area and gives it a personal flavor talking about his rock climb fishing for example. I strongly recommend Nuno and his tuktuk!
reviews/16/text: We cannot recommend this company and Newno, our guide, more highly!  He is a wonderful guide who is passionate about his Country. Very very very knowledgeable about Lagos , the  country side, and near by village of Praia da Luz and it’s’ history and overall historical background of Portugal.Such a wonderful tour in his tuk tuk ( which is environmentally friendly). He showed us all the historical places... many bits of info on Old Town and the beautiful beaches. We took a second tour to Praia da Luz  which included not only the lovely scenic village but many facts about the flowers, Almond and Fig trees, Asparagus and Algarve oranges in the country side. Additionally he is most thoughtful. I had recently had knee surgery and had trouble getting into the tuk tuk. We booked a second tour and he brought a special step for me to use. He brings blankets in case anyone is chilly. He showed us all sorts of things with multiple additional facts and tidbits of knowledge. We had friends visiting us here in Portugal and first thing we did together was Newno’s tuk tuk tour. They were not disappointed to say the least.  Please do not miss if you have opportunity to experience!
reviews/17/text: Thank you to Nuno for an absolutely amazing tour! We fell in love with Lagos and all of the beautiful sights it had to offer. Highly recommend this tour for a great history of the city, lovely views, and a local perspective!
reviews/18/text: Nuno gave an enthusiastic & wonderful tour of old town, new town, the beaches with a generous sharing of his love of his country & culture.  It was the highlight of our time in Lagos.  Abrigada!
reviews/19/text:
We decided to see Lagos in the best possible way. The private tour with Nuno was super fantastic.  We definitely highly recommend 
Obrigado Nuno ✌️
reviews/19/title: Nuno is the best in show

address: Praia de Benagil, Lagoa 8400-401 Portugal
name: Taruga Benagil Tours
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Express Tour - Benagil Cave
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Benagil Kayak Rental
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Benagil Sup Rental
ranking: #7 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #7 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: We took the traditional tour so were for about 1h15min on the boat. It was a verry great experiance. We also got the chance to hop off in to benagil cave to take pictures. Our great captains  were Jean and Raul. They were verry talented in driving the boat in and out of the caves, they told some funfacts about the caves and the rocks and they were also verry humorous.
reviews/1/text: We loved everything about this tour. Our guides were friendly, fun and knowledgeable. The caves were amazing. Would highly recommend Taruga tours. We loved it!
reviews/1/title: Great fun with Taruga Tours exploring the Benagil caves
reviews/2/text: We experienced the traditional tour today. Great experience & the scenery was awesome. Leo & Miguel made the trip a lot of fun.
reviews/3/text:
The day we visited Benagil, the waves were huge and unsafe for kayaks and paddle boards - we originally booked a kayaking trip with another company which was ultimately cancelled. Worried that we would not be able to get to see the caves on our trip, we walked up to Taruga Benagil Tours and they happily accepted us. 

We took the Traditional 1hr 15min boat tour with an excellent guide, Victor! Victor did an incredible job of educating us on the various caves and sights along the tour and was impressive with his ability to speak to all of us visitors (in English & German!). Our captain was Super Mario - who truly earned that name! He managed to navigate the rough waves and still get us to see many of the caves, including Benagil Cave! I was incredibly impressed with his driving skills!

I highly recommend this bout tour when visiting Benagil as we got to see much more of the coastline and cave than we would have if we did our original kayak tour with the other company!
reviews/4/text:
We had the best boat trip with Rafael and Vitor. 
We took our grandmother (78 years old) and you were very kind and took good care of her. She only understands Portuguese, and you translated to her alone. 
It is my second boat trip (2021) with you and both times were amazing and I will 100% recommend you to everyone. 
We will be back ♥️
reviews/5/text: Fabulous experience. We took the hour and 15 min boat trip. The crew were both funny and the had amazing driving skills in and out of the caves.  We were able to get out of the boat inside Benagil cave for about 10-15 mins.  It was just perfect.  Highly recommend.  Note, your feet and legs up to knees will get wet.  Wear flip flops or water shoes.
reviews/6/text: We went on the morning Traditional Tour with Vitor and Rafa, and it ended up being the highlight of our trip to the Algarve! Would absolutely do it again and recommend to anyone visiting the area. Our guides were not only friendly and informative but they were also very good at maneuvering our boat in the caves - we were very impressed! There was plenty of free parking as well which made the whole experience very easy and enjoyable :)
reviews/6/title: Highlight of our trip to the Algarve!
reviews/7/text: We were hoping to take the kayaks out to see Bengali Cave, however, to my husband’s disappointment, the waves were too high and not allowed—so we took the Traditional 1 hr 15 min boat tour instead. It was absolutely fantastic!!! I was so glad that we weren’t able to do the kayaks as we got to see so much more. Our guide and skipper were top notch. Professional yet very friendly, funny and personable. Would highly recommend!!!
reviews/8/text: We did an Hour Tour. They showed all the caves. It was high tide but still the driver took us inside the caves. Low Tide or High, these caves are great for a quick explore. It's not like one goes into deep discussions within the caves and how they were formed and the type of rocks etc . Quick in, quick out of the cave . The way we like it. We went in March 2023 and it was a big cold. One jacket would do the job. Would not recommend it to people with weak tummy's, if it's a high tide.
reviews/9/text: Amazing traditional tour with Rafael and Leo ! It was very funny and we had the chance to stop to the Benagil cave to take pictures. Merci beaucoup guys !
reviews/10/text: Amazing experience! Daniel and Leo were fun and knowledgeable, and Daniel was so impressive maneuvering the boat in the caves. Definitely a highlight of our trip to the Algarve!
reviews/11/text:
We had a great time while doing the traditional tour! The experience was very adventurous and informative since our guide Miguel provided us with loads of facts about the caves. It was a really fun and pleasant ride with our captain Eric. 
10/10, would recommend
reviews/12/text: Amazing tour! Amazing boat Capitan Daniel and even more amazing guide Gonzalo!!! That was super interesting and so many stories and jokes and beautiful pictures!!!! Will book this tour again for sure!❤️
reviews/13/text: So much fun. This is a don’t miss while staying in the Algarve. Glad we made the trip to Benagil without any plans or booking ahead. Our guide Gonçalo and captain Yuri were amazing. The skill needed to drive the boat in and out of the caves was wild… and it wasn’t even high tide.
reviews/14/text: Had a great tour with  Cap'n Super Mario and Erikson.  Very knowledgeable and friendly and importantly very safe. Handled the boat so professionally and got us deep into the cave. Definitely worth the price.
reviews/15/text: We loved the Taruga 75 minute cave tour so much that we took it three times!  Every time is different because your highly skilled driver will take you into as many caves as possible given the ever changing tides, swells, and winds. Daniel is a particularly masterful pilot and took us into Paradise cave twice!  As you gun through pirates tunnel you’ll be so glad you’re on a Taruga boat!!  Benagil cave is stunning. This is the mightiest little company…Ana oversees a dozen boat handlers and tour guides, and together they manage hundreds of customers, all the while switching from one language to another with great facility!!! Arrive early and get coffee or a meal at the bar and watch these young men launch the boats!!!  That alone is worth the visit to beautiful Benagil town and beach!!!We are in awe of Ana and Taruga and the Algarve caves.
reviews/15/title: Taruga is the best company for Benagil cave tours.
reviews/16/text: Juan and Leo were the best tour guides ever!!! Really knowledgeable and super interactive making the trip extra fun. Very experienced and we had so much fun on the waves, and ofc beauriful views. Thanks to them!
reviews/17/text: Had an awesome time on our tour, our kayaking trip got cancelled due to the current so got w boat tour instead and had an amazing time. Views were amazing and our tour guide, Joao, had great energy and positive attitude. Would definitely come back in the summer and do it again.
reviews/18/text: The trip was amazing Erickson and Daniel were amazing tour guides and so much fun. I took the 30 Minute trip and it will be remembered for a long time.
reviews/19/text: Awesome once in a lifetime try!! Super Mario and Consoles were very professional and made sure the experience will be remembered!!
subcategory_ranking: #7 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve

description: Hi, I'm Sebastião, I'm 45 years old, I like to show the natural beauty of my region (Algarve). I'm communicative and I want to put a smile on my clients while they discover the secrets of the tour.
name: Sebastiao Goncalves De Assuncao
