address: Estrada da Albardeira, Lagos 8600-302 Portugal
description: The Watersport experts in Lagos. Kitesurfing & Windsurfing We are one of the oldest Kitesurf & Windsurfschools at the Algarve. Our "teaching ground" is the Ria do Alvor, a safe and windy lagoon between Lagos and Portimao . Our experienced and friendly instructors teach beginner and advanced kiter and windsurfer in group and privat lessons. We are providing and renting equipment from: Neil Pryde, Cabrinha and JP Australia. Surfing Our surf vans take beginner and advanced surfers for lessons or rentals every to the beautiful surf spots of the West Algarve. Included in our daily surf trips is a surf sessions with certified, multilingual instructors, transport to the spot, all necessary equipment like soft or hard boards and a wet suit. Stand up Paddle Explore the spectacular grottos and cliffs of Lagos with during one of our morning Stand Up Paddle trips or ride the waves of the west coast on a SUP. Accomodation We offer accommodation for our students at the kite house our camp in Lagos.
name: Algarve Watersport
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: 2 Hour Surf Lesson at the Beautiful Algarvian West Coast
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Small-Group Windsurf Lesson in Lagos
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: 2,5-hour Semi-private Kite Course with your own Kite!
photo/caption: surf lessons at the west coast Monte Clerigo
reviews/0/text:
Perfect camp. Lots of different types of watersports, very good food. Very well organized. 
We had surf classes with Alex and Ansan, both super nice and professional. Alex is so super nice, fun and loving with kids. My two kiddos love the surf classes with him! Thank you so much
reviews/1/text: Really cool camp with lovely people and really good surfing-lessons! We had a great week and especially enjoyed the lessons with Angel, Alex and Ansan (I think every instructor was really good, but I spent most lessons with them and they had really good tips and were so friendly and Patient). Food and Location were also really good!
reviews/2/text: Angel took his time to explain all necessary theory facts about surfing. We did a warmup, exercised on land and went into the water. Even there he watched and helped every single one to improve the skills. Thanks, we had a perfect day!
reviews/3/text: We had a lot of fun! Angel is a very chill and good teacher. After a little theory and practice on land, we went straight into the water and had a great time. After 2 hours we all were very exhausted but happy :)
reviews/4/text: We had an amazing surf lesson. Our instructor Emilio helped me to improve my surfing with some very useful advices! Even tho it was suuuper windy and there was no sun at all we had soo much fun and the mood was great. Thank you again!
reviews/5/text: We took two lessons with Alex and had a lot of fun there on the beach! The conditions were perfect and Alex really tried to get our knees and hips right to ride that wave! Thank you!
reviews/6/text: I initially only booked for one surf lesson with Angel as a try out. But because I enjoyed it so much and Angel being a really chilled and patient teacher, I signed up for 2 more days. Angel explained everything very well and it nearly felt like a one-on-one session since we were just three in the group. On day 2, which I was told was the hardest day for the body, I was quite tired and Angel just told me to have fun, which I very appreciated and I had an amazing day on day 3 with being able to stand up and making some turns. Highly recommend it.
reviews/7/text:
Amazing to get back out there. Thank you Angel for taking the time to work on my duck dive.
I'll continue practicing! All the best on the renovations. See you next time we are in Lagos
reviews/7/title: Paddle paddle paddle and duck dives
reviews/8/text:
good choice if you’re travelling solo, great location and not too far from the city center. the food was amazing and always well prepared.
thanks to the volunteers didi, james, lukasz and matias for making us feel very welcome and making sure we‘re having a great time! 
Unfortunately I was missing a bit enthusiasm from the other staff members, especially when I arrived - since we were a small group of guests and +20 staff people around not really talking to us, that created sometimes a weird atmosphere but I guess it was also due to the end of season…dorm is nice but the bathroom situation for so many people (especially in a sportscamp) is inedaquate for the price of the room.
thanks to all the nice surfinstructor - alex, angel, Leo, Emil and orlando - learned a lot and always made us smile! obrigada and see you next time!
reviews/9/text:
We had a great time! Thank you so much!
Also the breakfast of James was amazing…good start to go surfing with the instructors! 
And thanks to Didi for the clean and nice bungalow! Was a pleasure to stay there!
reviews/10/text:
I wanted so badly to give this experience a 5 star review, as there is so much potential and the instructors for the water sports are great. However, the overall atmosphere, especially nearing the end of the season, was uncomfortable and uninviting. The amount of staff overpowered the visitors and yet made little efforts to engage with any of us. Nobody seemed to care much, and the level of indifference created an awkward atmosphere. In addition, it was noticeable that they expected more work from their volunteers, who were being compensated far less with much more expectation to work and who were noticeably far more interactive with the guests. If not for these people, I would have wanted to leave early for feeling uncomfortable and out of place. I understand that it’s the end of season and people are tired and may not feeling like socializing with new guests that are coming and going, but unfortunately it affects the experience of people who are paying to come on their vacation and aren’t feeling very welcome. 
Shoutout to Adam for being a wonderful and patient windsurfing instructor, and to James and DiDi, who went above and beyond to make the experience far more enjoyable for me.
reviews/11/text:
Great Food, Great Team and awesome instructors- Emil, Angel and Alex -thanks! 
Also places are super easily reachable from the camp which makes going out in Lagos fun!
reviews/12/text: Awesome surf experience! Emil, Leo, Andras, Angel and Orlando did an amazong job passend on their knowledge. Absolut recommendation! See you guys next year! :)
reviews/13/text:
It was amazing!
Delicious food and the best instructors ever!! Thank you so so much for your advice and help, Emil, Andras, Leo, Angel, and Orlando! You did such an amazing job in the waves and during our theory lesson.
reviews/14/text:
It was amazing. The peopel at the Camp are super cool and the food was delicious.
Special thanks to Our instructors: Angel, Andras, Emil, Leo and Orlando
reviews/15/text: Had an awesome time! Amazing surf instructors Angel, Leo, Andras and Emil! And the food was so good!
reviews/15/title: Great place for learning how to surf!
reviews/16/text:
Food and the appartement was really, really good!! A big variety on the buffet and everyday something different.
The appartement was big, comfy and clean.
The organization and communication wasn’t that good, they have a lot of different people working there and it doesn’t seem that they really talk to each other.
Sometimes it wasn’t enough space on the table for the guests to eat, because all of the staff ate at the same time.
reviews/17/text: I really enjoyed staying at the Algarve camp. The staff is really nice and helpful with any last minute requests. The surf lessons with Leo, Emil, Andris, Alex and Orlando were very helpful and fun!
reviews/18/text:
The camp and the food were amazing. It’s a nice place to get to know new people.
Surf lessons with Alex and Angel were amazing.
Going to miss this place!
reviews/19/text: We stayed a whole week in the camp including 5 surf lessons for two people in one of the bungalows. We can highly recommend booking this experience, as we learned a lot and the whole surrounding in the camp (food, people, adaptability,…) was amazing. A special thanks to our instructors Alex, Angel, Leo, Anders and Emil for taking their time to teach us according to our individual levels. We can highly appreciate the experience!
reviews/19/title: Amazing and instructive week of surfing

address: Avenida da Marina, Vilamoura, Quarteira 8125 Portugal
description: Real Guided Tours along the Algarve, Lisbon (Sintra and Cascais), Fátima, Spain (Seville), Évora, private or groups. Visit the coastline and the mountains, the cities, villages, countryside. The castles, palaces, wine taste, typical restaurants, cliffs, caves and beaches. We provide airport transfers, golfs, theme parks.
name: VTours Algarve
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Lagos and Sagres Premium - Shared small group > VTours Algarve
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Lagos and Carvoeiro Premium - Shared small group > VTours Algarve
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Silves and Monchique Wine Taste Premium - Shared small group > VTours Algarve
offer_group/offer_list/3/title: Carvoeiro and Silves Premium - Shared small group > VTours Algarve
offer_group/offer_list/4/title: Lagos and Sagres Premium - Shared small group > VTours Algarve
reviews/0/text: A wonderful, informative and completely enjoyable day spent with Pedro showing us the best of his country - the Algarve, Portugal.  We were on a scouting trip so Pedro tailored our day according to what and where we needed to be, changing the itinerary as we went along to accommodate our requirements.  Transport was a super comfortable and luxurious Mercedes mini bus complete with bottled water as required.  The commentary was factual and interesting, and helpful.  A highly recommended day particularly if you give him a clear brief of what you want.
reviews/0/title: A wonderful, informative and completely enjoyable day
reviews/1/text: We had wonderful day with Pedro at Silves and Monchique , visiting a beautiful spring,  going up to Foia and ending the day with wine tasting. He also made us reservations at a really good restaurant with an amazing view.  Transport was very comfortable and Pedro provided us with cold water and hats. He also took lots of great photos for us. Thank you for the fun day exploring the Algarve!
reviews/1/title: Relaxing and fun day exploring the hidden side of the algarve
reviews/2/text:
Pedro is fantastic. He helped us arrange a mobility scooter for a family member, arranged airport transfers, a vineyard tour and took us to an amazing market. 

Nothing was too much trouble, we had a great time on the tour and found Pedro to be extremely knowledgeable and accommodating. 

If you are looking for a contact in the Algarve who will arrange tours and transfers, Pedro is a great person to contact.
reviews/2/title: Fabulous service from a great local company.
reviews/3/text:
We had two tours with Pedro, if you want a professional service with unlimited support and knowledge look no further.
From booking V Tours over the Internet "found on Google", this company was excellent, every question we had before we travelled to the Algarve and during our visit was answered quickly.
As a group on females we felt very secure at all times and were very well catered for.
Nothing was too much trouble.
Our first tour from Vilamoura to Lisbon a full day was packed with lots of local information from start to finish. A great day out.
From the famous pastry shop to the beer museum, the markets were incredible. 
Our second was to a vineyard with a tour and wine tasting. We felt like royalty turning up in our immaculate Mercedes vehical.
reviews/4/text: We used VTours Algarve on a regular basis on our recent holiday in Algarve. Pedro is professional, courteous, reliable and always on time. He made us feel very welcome and was willing to help with anything we needed. We will definitely be using him again. First class service.
reviews/5/text:
Picked up from hotel in Albufeira by Pedro our driver and guide for the afternoon. Very lovely guy and very knowledgeable. We were in a party of six to which Vtours accomadated with a spacious vehicle. Along the drive to  Silves Vineyard Pedro pointed out many interesting factors and stopped along the way whenever we requested to admire any views we wanted to see. 
Upon arriving at vineyard we were guided with interesting factors around the premises to see how everything worked as and when the grapes were ready to process.(Being February no grapes available on vines yet). then we sat in the Bar/History lounge and tasted 3 different wines and had tapas snacks before our journey back to the hotel. Good tour for the price.
reviews/5/title: Wine Tasting & Country Tour Plus Tapas in Silves Portugal
reviews/6/text: In november 2019 we go to Portugal for first time. And we take tour from Faro to Carvoeiro and Lagos. This with guide Pedro were be very good organized, we listen very many informantion and saw beautiful places. Pedro take care of us, we had very tasty lunch, made foto and now we love your country and plane to go next time to Faro.
reviews/6/title: Nice day in Carvoeiro and Lagos
reviews/7/text:
Two couples traveling together from Seville, Spain to Ferragudo, Portugal - wonderful pickup at our hotel in Seville and drop off at a private residence In Ferragudo. Plus s nice stop at Silves Castle with a guided tour by Pedro Abrantes. Another stop for lunch and to pick up gifts for friends we would be visiting. Always with a smile and great informative information about our surroundings. Beyond the usual tourist information, Pedro explained many of the water resource and energy projects of the Algarve. Mercedes was immaculate and plenty of room for all our luggage. 
Two Thumbs up for VTours! Highly recommend we will use again!
reviews/7/title: Door-to-Door Pickup/Dropoff Service Plus Silves Castle Guided Tour
reviews/8/text: Professional, prompt, reliable and very knowledgeable of the area, made our trip outstanding.. Can’t wait until we are back next April to do another tour with Pedro, A+++ cannot recommend enough.... Hope to use this service again for our wedding next year, thank you so much for a great day x
reviews/8/title: Visit to the medieval town of silves the wine tour and tasting
reviews/9/text: Best day of our visit Portugal. Our driver Pedro was very knowledgeable. We were picked up at our hotel and treated to a great day. Stopped off a Castle and fort from the 14th century and enjoyed it a lot . Pedro took to us a restaurant for lunch on the beach that was fantastic. Great food and atmosphere. We would recommend this company . When we go back to Spain we would use again in a heartbeat. Obrigato.
reviews/9/title: Drive from Faro to Seville Spain.
reviews/10/text: I booked transportation through My Day Trip and they arranged for Pedro to drive us from Lisbon to Seville, and it was such a comfortable ride! Pedro is also a tour guide so he gave us really interesting information about both Portugal and Spain along our 5 hour drive. He was very accommodating, communicative and considerate. The small touches he added to our ride like bottled water, neck pillows and blankets made for a very comfortable ride. While we did not book him for a formal tour, we received an informal one and it was great!
reviews/11/text: The four of us were extremely pleased with Pedro's transport from Algarve to Lisbon.  He was well dressed, prompt, and drove a clean Mercedes SUV.  He provided water and blankets. We had a scheduled stop in Evora.  Pedro escorted us through the town and showed us the the best sights.  He made a great recommendation for lunch.  We were able to make the most of our time before traveling on to Lisbon.  We would definitely schedule any trips in Portugal with Pedro if we ever get a chance to return to Portugal.
reviews/12/text: Fantastic service and guide. Extremely knowledgeable and helpful with follow up info. Very comfortable vehicle and flexible with timing of stops. Interesting conversation about environmental and political issues facing Portugal. Passionate about the beauty of the country. Glad to have met and tallied about a shared interest in cycling.
reviews/13/text: Pedro is a very professional driver and tour guide, this was the first time we have met Pedro on one of our several trips to the Algarve, I would recommend anyone to use this company He is very proud of his country and is full of information that he shares with you on your trip, nothing is to much trouble.
reviews/14/text: Pedro of VTours drove our group of 4 from Lagos to Lisbon.  He is incredibly charming, knowledgeable and was so happy to share with us so much information on the Algarve, Portugal and Lisbon.   We were so happy to have him drive us on this leg of our journey.  When we got to our hotel in the very busy centro district, there was no parking.   Pedro found a place to park a block or so from our hotel and walked us to the hotel.   He followed up with a text of things not to miss in Lisbon.   He is the real deal.   Can wait to return to the Algarve and book a tour with him.  Thanks Pedro — Chris, Al, Kathy and Betty.
reviews/15/text: We only had a short taxi ride with Pedro from Faro Airport into the the town and although we were then going on to hire our own car to travel independently, he gave us some great tips on things to do and see, and good places to eat. So friendly and so helpful, highly recommend. Our first feel of Portugal as we stepped on the plane was very positive thanks to him and his tips.
reviews/16/text: Pedro was absolutely awesome!  He took us from Lagos to Sevilla on a long day trip with sightseeing in Zahara de Sierra, Grazelma, and Ronda.  His van was very comfortable. His English was excellent.  He was very flexible in meeting our needs.  He was very friendly and knowledgeable and did his best to make our trip very special and tailored to our interests.  Pedo and VTours--perfect!!
reviews/16/title: Lagos to Sevilla transfer with extensive sightseeing in Andulusia White Hill Towns
reviews/17/text: Pedro was a great tour guide, adding an extra stop at a beautiful scenic spot  before bringing us to our wine tasting tour. Full of knowledge!
reviews/18/text: Pedro collected us from the airport and we done a tour of faro &when our holiday was over he brought us back to the airport. Pedro is a lovely kind gentleman, he is full of information and I would highly recommend him .
reviews/19/text: Pedro was an amazing host. He picked us up promptly from the airport. Right away he offered us water, pillows and blankets. He was extremely accommodating. He gave us a tour of Slives but basically the entire ride was a tour. Very knowledgeable. Our Airbnb wasn’t ready until 3:00 pm but we had arrived at 11:30 am in lagos. Pedro offered to show us some local beaches (so we knew the area) as well as took us to St. Vincent (30 mins northwest of lagos) he also stopped for lunch a long the way. He was very engaging the entire time and went out of his way to make us feel comfortable. I would definitely recommend him to anyone needing a friend in Portugal.

address: Marina de Lagos Esrada de São Roque, Lagos 8600-318 Portugal
animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.
description: Boat trips and tours from Lagos: Grotto trip, Coast trip, Dolphin Watching, Blue Cruise (with lunch), Algar de Benagil and Blue Kayaking
name: BlueFleet - Boat Trips and Tours
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Boat Trip to Ponta da Piedade from Lagos
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Half Day Cruise to Ponta da Piedade with Lunch and Drinks
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Dolphin Watching from Lagos
offer_group/offer_list/4/title: Coast Cruise Trip to Ponta da Piedade from Lagos
photo/caption: Ponta da Piedade and Catamaran Freddie II
ranking: #14 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #14 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: Really happy to have booked with this company the dolphin tour: amazing trip and guides, Regie and Jan! (apologizes if names are wrongly written!) We were very lucky because it didn't take long till we saw a group of 10-14 dolphins (in wild nature it's always luck!), also we could enjoy them a long time. And while Regie kept the boat with the dolphins always on sight, Jan was giving us a lot of information regarding to the dolphins and their habitat, answering to all our questions as well. On the way back they even took us to see a few caves in Ponta da Piedade! Thanks a lot once again for the wonderful experience!
reviews/0/title: Wonderful experience: great trip and guides!
reviews/1/text: It was an amazing experience that I suggest to everyone! I love dolphins, and this experience was extraordinary!  Two marine biologists guided us to understand this superb mammal. Mafalda, one of the biologists, was really impressive and you can feel that she loves her job. What I loved most, is how they conducted the tour with maximum respect for the animals.
reviews/2/text: My boyfriend and I had the best time on this boat tour. Our guide was informative and fun, the views were INCREDIBLE, we were comfortable on the boat and got great pictures. Highly recommend to anyone visiting Lagos!
reviews/3/text: I highly recommend Blue Fleet for any water tours. Four of us did the Grotto tour out of Lagos on a day when swells were high and we felt very safe with Jaoa driving the boat. We saw a group of kayakers out with another company and I was impressed to learn that Blue Fleet wouldn’t run kayaking trips in those kind of water conditions. Sandra our guide was knowledgeable and both she and Jaoa were so friendly and welcoming. Great time and great value for the money.
reviews/3/title: Enjoyable water experience with safety conscious company
reviews/4/text: Easily booked online, got the tickets fast via email/app. Good price. Really good customer service. Perfect weather
reviews/5/text: The tour with BlueFleet was a great experience! The stuff was very friendly, our tour guide gave us interesting and fun infos! We visited couple of caves. The boat was very comfortable and clean. The views were priceless. I highly recommend it :)
reviews/6/text: My boyfriend and I went on a boat tour around the caves and beaches in Lagos. The views were breathtaking and the tour guides were brilliant, giving us facts about the city and were a great laugh too. Lovely experience.
reviews/7/text: We booked the Bootstour - Ponta da Piedade. It was a fun trip with very friendly stuff. I can highly recommend  it and will be back for sure :-)
reviews/8/text: I cannot recommend BlueFeet enough, it is simply your best option if you want to go dolphin watching. Our guide was very kind and knowledgeable. He truly made the experience even more especial. Plus a big plus point for BlueFeet is that their boats are smaller meaning your experience will feel more intimate. I’ve seen dolphins on three different continents, but this trip might have been the most special one.
reviews/9/text: The boat tour itself is an ok experience. We had already visited the cliffs of Ponta De Piadade from the top and walked around the coast... that was very beautiful. And we did a boat tour of the Benigal caves and coast, which was much more adventurous and covered a lot more caves and areas. So compared to that, this tour was just ok. If you are time-constrained, prioritize Benigal caves tour over this one. If you have time for both, go for it.
reviews/9/title: BlueFleet was excellent in communication and rescheduling tour due to weather
reviews/10/text: We went for a boat trip to see dolphins. We had a great time. The captain and his assistant did a great job! They kept on searching untill we found a wonderful group of dolphins! Thank you for this experirnce!
reviews/11/text: We had a great time on our tour, the crew was very knowledgeable and entertaining. They gave us plenty of time to take photos. A special thank you to Rogelio Lourenco, it was really nice meeting you. Rita
reviews/12/text: Completely unexpected we saw dolphins! When we left unfortunately the waves were too high for entering into the grottos. But the staff did all their best to give us a good time anyways. So they were actively spotting for dolphins. And succeeded! As a big surprise a big group of dolphins accompanied us back to the harbour. Thanks Cesar and Inga!
reviews/13/text: Fabulous private boat tour of the caves near Lagos. The guides were great. Very entertaining and informative. We loved it!
reviews/14/text: Excellent afternoon out with blue Fleet. Would recommend. Limited to 18 on the boat so lots of room for everyone and the lunch was very good. Beer and wine or soft drinks included in the price. 10 out of 10!
reviews/14/title: Coastal Tour with lunch and swimming
reviews/15/text:
We took a private tour of the grottos and caves along the beaches.  Staff at the office was experienced, courteous and knowledgeable.  Made it easy even when our voucher had the wrong day.

The captain and guide were not just pleasant, but all you could want for this type of tour.  Knew what to say and when.  We were their prime responsibility and satisfied everything we needed.  Even suggested a restaurant for lunch.

This is the way tours are supposed to be.
reviews/16/text: Robert and his team took excellent care us me and my fiancé. We opted to do a private tour so we could see Benagil and Ponta de Piade. We saw much more than just those two sites and truly enjoyed our time!
reviews/17/text: Luis and Margarita were so friendly and fun. The tour was a blast, and the area was beautiful. The guides told a great story about each area.
reviews/18/text: Very nice friendly guides. Very careful. Nice relaxing coast trip to coastal grottos. They show ins and outs of stone outcrops. We had lovely time
reviews/19/text: My Family had such an awesome time on the dolphin tour! We saw so many dolphins up close! Everyone at Bluefleet was truly fantastic and i would book with them again in a heartbeat!
subcategory_ranking: #14 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve

description: School and diving center with 18 years of experience. Wide range of diving and snorkeling services, as well as boat trips.
name: WeDive
ranking: #19 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #19 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: Great  diving school, very nice instructors, friendly  competent reassuring professional ! Would recommend without hesitation !
reviews/1/text: We had an amazing day with our 2 boys, the staff was very professional, friendly and caring. Highly recommended!
reviews/2/text:
We had the pleasure of taking a boat trip to Ponta da Piedade, where we can enjoy the magnificent landscapes, including Dona Ana Beach.
Calm and crystalline waters and a wonderful coastline, we also made a stop to refresh and do some snorkling to see marine life.
Just amazing
EVERITHING
reviews/3/text: I did the open water diver course. The whole personnel was very friendly and helpful. Federico (the instructor) was very committed, explained me everything very well and got me a feedback on everything I did good or needed correction.
reviews/4/text: If you like diving or are curious about trying it WeDive is the place to be. Great friendly and professional staff (Delfina, Federico, Nuno and Roy) that make you feel safe and want to learn more after every dive. The equipment is top notch.
reviews/5/text:
It was an amazing experience. We did four dives in 2 days and were lucky enough to do the wreck diving as well. I definitelly recommend that, the sights are amazing! The diving guides are great and very professional, so everything went perfect.

Also if you have never done wreck diving and/or deep diving before (like me) you are in good hands with them.
reviews/5/title: Amazing guides and great diving experience!
reviews/6/text:
We had such a nice diving experience!
The staff was phenomenal, they always made sure we were content. They guided us the entire time with patience and a smile.
reviews/7/text: Yet another great experience with Nuno and team. It’s our 4th visit and this time it was to get my elder son certified. They way the staff looked after him was phenomenal (thank you Rico). And as always, Nuno is a pleasure to deal with and an absolute gentleman.
reviews/8/text: I can really recommend this amazing and very friendly people! Everything was perfect and we had a lot of fun! I felt so safe.
reviews/8/title: Perfect team - very organised and super friendly!
reviews/9/text: Always a great pleasure to dive with one of the instructors from WeDive. The outstanding skills gives you a lot of comfort.
reviews/10/text:
Fantastic manager and staff.
Nice, helpful, friendly.
There are both toilets and showers.
If you have your own equipment, it is ok to have them stored at the divecenter
reviews/11/text:
We really enjoyed their open-minded and flexible help during our trip. The team provided us with cookies and water on the boat and everybody was professional and kind.

There was only one thing we noticed: Considering the fragile underwater flora we suggest everybody diving such area that more caution should be paid to underwater finning and anchoring since some plants were harmed.

We do appreciate WeDive very much and look forward to our next visit there!
reviews/12/text:
I have been diving for the first time in my life and I am very glad to had the chance to learn diving in such a professional and kindhearted dive center. Because of the good vibes at WeDive I even decided to do my Open Water Certification and had the best Dive Instructor you can get. If you decide to learn diving, ask for Frederico! 
I always felt very safe with him and he is very qualified in every part of his job. A nice extra of the dive center is that they are making the whole experience very comfortable for you. You don’t have to carry the bottles or wash your wetsuit. 
If I come back to Portugal for diving, I would always choose again WeDive to take me under water again!
reviews/12/title: Best Dive Center to learn diving
reviews/13/text: I had an amazing experience with the team of WeDive. I went just as company of my boyfriend because I wasn't prepared for the diving they were going to do, but they welcomed me in the boat and explained to me a lot of things about the diving course. Unfortunately I was only for one day in Lagos so I couldn't take the course this time but based on the experience of my boyfriend and what I was able to see and hear from the instructor Miguel, I'll definitely be back on September to take the course. Thanks to all the team for the great experience!
reviews/14/text: Diving with WeDive today was amazing! We went on boat to the easiest spot as my buddy was doing a refresh and other person in the group was diving for the first time. Being myself a divemaster, I can assure these guys know what they are doing! The instructor (Mogli, as they call him) perfectly managed everything, and everyone had fun and felt safe during a really good dive. We saw some squids, a cute cuttlefish and an octopus, besides other small fishes. The equipment was on point, and on the way back the skeeper showed us a bit of a cave. Regarding the COVID, they were using individual bags for the regulators to ensure they were desinfected and cleaned. Was a really good morning, I'm only sad we already had flight back today. Recommended!! Till next time!!
reviews/15/text: I had a wonderful experience diving with Wedive! The dive center has great facilities and all equipment and gear is in excellent condition. The staff is extremely friendly, experienced and attends to every detail to make your dive the best possible! I also tried free diving for the first time and it was loads of fun! I totally recommend visiting them if you want to dive in Algarve! The dive sites in Lagos are also really cool, including reefs and wrecks :)
reviews/16/text: A great dive centre with well-maintained dive kit (new dive suit). Dive crew is so helpful in every way. We booked for 2 fun dives and Our guide, Co has a calm manner - he never rush the descend and ascend, to help the other divers equalize and avoid problems. Overall, a very professional service, spacious boat for the utmost comfort and fair price! We didn't have a problem changing the planned dive to the next day due to blocked ears. Thanks so much for this great memory! I would also recommend diving the wrecks at Ocean Revival Park.
reviews/16/title: Professional service with safety as priority
reviews/17/text: We have just completed our SSI Open Water Diver Course with WeDive in Lagos. We found Nuno and his team to be highly professional, charming, helpful and very supportive. The tutoring was fantastic (thank you Frederico!) while the equipment, boats and facilities were all of a high standard. We would not dive with anyone else in Lagos!
reviews/18/text: An absolute gem of a dive shop - from the efficiency of the staff, the cleanliness and sensible design of the shop, to the enthusiasm from the off of our guide Mogli, WeDive to date is the best dive shop that we’ve ever come across. The equipment is top notch as well, and the rig super convenient and comfortable. And finally - the dive sites. The Ocean Revival Park is just incredible and Mogli showed us a great time at the Hermenegildo Capelo (frigate) and Almeida Carvalho (hydrographic ship). All of this for perhaps the fairest prices we’ve ever come across. All in all, I can’t recommend WeDive highly enough.
reviews/19/text:
I finished my AOWD here and a friend did some fun diving. We mainly did wreck diving. 
The dive center is well organized and the stuff is very friendly. My dive instructors Rico and Philipp have been great to talk to and seem to be very experienced. The briefings were easy to understand and I always felt safe and comfortable in the water. 
All the rental gear is in excellent condition.
It is by far the best dive center I went to in Portugal!
