address: Av De Ceuta, Quarteira 8125-116 Portugal
description: Taxi Quarteira disponibiliza um serviço personalizado com viaturas que podem acomodar até 8 passageiros, cómodo especialmente para passageiros que transportam bagagem. Dispomos de uma frota moderna disponível a qualquer hora do dia para o levar a qualquer local, rapidamente e de forma segura. A equipa é constituída por profissionais portadores do certificado de motorista de táxi.
name: Taxi Quarteira
reviews/0/text: Alex, Paulo and the team are first class. Very easy to deal with. Always and I mean always on time (usually a bit early just in case). Extremely friendly and helpful. Can’t speak more highly of them. A friend of mine has a place in Vilasol and we use these guys every time we come without fail. Look forward to seeing them again soon
reviews/1/text: The best cab driver in Portugal. Punctual and friendly and good value for the service provided. If I could give 6 stars I would ! Obrigado
reviews/2/text: Alex was a very friendly and personable guy, very knowledgeable and good fun. He was always on time and helped us with lots
reviews/3/text: Alex is very punctual, and also loaded our clubs onto the taxi. He was never late, and responsive on texts. The car is new and he drives respectfully
reviews/4/text: We used Alex for all our taxis during our golf break. He was extremely punctual and diligent. Can’t fault.
reviews/5/text: Alex and his team are great. Always on time, once a trip is booked there is no need to reconfirm. You can count on them 100%
reviews/6/text: Booked for airport run from Vilamoura to Faro for 6 people and 3 cases. great communication when booking and prompt arrival
reviews/7/text: Alex and his taxi company are great. I live in quarteira and use him all the time for both myself and for friends and family. Airport trips. Going out trips. Unexpected transport needs. He always accommodates.
reviews/8/text: Alex was such a great snd friendly driver! He picked us up from the airport and returned us to the airport and did us some other trips during our holiday. He was reliable and so knowledgable, giving us lots of information and tips! Thanks Alex!
reviews/9/text: Exceptional service used to and from airport and for trips during family vacation. Trustworthy, friendly and knowledgeable. Highly recommended, thank you Paulo… look forward to our next visit!
reviews/10/text: Excellent and friendly service, always on time, easy to contact, will definitely be booking with them again!
reviews/11/text: Amazing taxi driver and very helpful. Fetched us and dropped us 3 days in a row from Rolling Loud.  Thank you !
reviews/12/text:
Very professional! 10\10!!

Very friendly and professional lads! Always on time and willing to negotiate:) lovely people!
reviews/13/text: Amazing service and Alex and Paulo are a really good team who are very knowledgeable re the area too
reviews/13/title: Prompt and excellent airport and resort taxi
reviews/14/text: Fabulous service all round! Drivers were professional,  personable and very reliable! Would highly recommend this company
reviews/15/text: Alex is our go to taxi driver each year in Vale Do Lobo he is reliable always on time we use him for getting around and airport trips too and he has a lovely personality which makes the trip enjoyable.
reviews/16/text: Both Alex and paulo are friendly helpful and courteous. Extremely reliable and always happy to accommodate changes. We would not use anyone else when we are in Portugal. Even if they cannot provide transport for our trips they organise an alternative for us
reviews/16/title: Best most reliable taxi service in the algarve
reviews/17/text: Very prompt , really goes above and beyond .Fabulous humour and happy with the service. We would like to recommend the service for future clients.
reviews/18/text: Fantastic service. Funny friendly guy full of great recommendations and helpful local information. Take his advice you won’t be disappointed
reviews/19/text: Amazing service, reasonable prices and fantastic advice on where to go. Extremely reliable service with great local knowledge

address: Praia de Armacao de Pera, Armacao de Pera 8365-101 Portugal
description: Boat trips to the caves from Armação de Pêra to Benagil. Tours made by experienced captains and in modern and small boats that allow to enter inside the caves. Boarding is done at Fisherman's Beach and you will visit stunning caves and wild beaches such as Praia da Marinha, the Captains' Grotto and the world-famous Benagil Grotto.
location_string: Armacao de Pera, Faro District, Algarve
name: Tridente Boat Trips
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Boat Tour to Benagil Caves from Armacao de Pera with Small-Group
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Benagil Caves - Private Boat Tour
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Small-Group Sunset Benagil Caves Boat Tour from Armacao de Pera
offer_group/offer_list/3/title: Benagil Caves at Sunrise or Sunset - Private Boat Tour
ranking: #16 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #16 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text:
We had an amazing time with trident boat trips. The tour was for 1 hour but felt much longer. The boat driver was exceptional, made us feel very secure even when the water was somewhat rough.

Our tour guide was so friendly, funny and very  knowledgeable. We also had a photographer who was brilliant, she was such a delight to have along in the trip.

It was the highlight of our week in portugal and we will 100% do it again when we return.

Thank you to the whole team, you made an engagement for 2 people very very special.
reviews/1/text: Very enjoyable trip for me and my family. Would recommend for anyone. Shorter trip, small group. Worked out well.
reviews/2/text: So well organised, safety paramount and lovely people. Caves are great, fun boat trip. Recommend ⛴️
reviews/3/text:
Good trip , good commentary, explained features etc
Only problem was the launch off the beach , hit wave and everyone drenched! Just unlucky
reviews/4/text: Trip was great. Boat was clean, new and crew was nice. All Caves and beaches was fascinating. 1 hour is enough to see all.
reviews/5/text:
Fabulous small boat trips to see the various beaches and caves.  They use small boats with about 6 passengers and go into the caves (and obviously back out again )
An excellent English commentary by a knowledgeable guide made the whole experience perfect. Easy boarding from the beach but make sure you hold on...I didn't realise they had waves in the Atlantic and took a trip!  We'll be back  !! Many thanks
reviews/5/title: IF IT'S THE ONLY THING YOU DO......
reviews/6/text:
Perfect idea for spending time while im Alvarve.
IT took an hour to go around all the beaches with absolutely stunnig pictures.
reviews/7/text: We booked the one hour boat trip and had a great time. There was only one other family on the boat so it was a very personalised tour. The guide spoke good english and explained well all the different areas. The price for the trip at 90 euro for four of us was also reasonable. Would definitely recommend this tour if you are in the area.
reviews/7/title: Great boat trip to the Benagil caves and beaches
reviews/8/text: Fantastic coastline, great visit with friendly and expert guides. The navigation into the caves is a unique experience. Really worth it!
reviews/9/text: I recommend it if you wish to have  a great experience on the sea with a new boat ,professional skipper, that gives you infos about the points visited,have patience with tourist and it is empathic.We will go in the heart of all the caves even the smallest.
reviews/10/text: A Portuguese friend recommended taking a boat trip along the coast visiting the caves. We have just had the most amazing experience.  Make sure you go with a local guide like this one.  He is very knowledgeable and the smaller boat with an expert navigator means you go into the caves where the big boats can't go. Cannot recommend this trip enough.  We would give seven stars but trip advisor only allow 5!!
reviews/11/text:
We booked our 1 hour boat tour through TripAdvisor which issued us with electronic tickets via Vialtor.
Tridente Boat Trips operate from a stand directly in front of the Holiday Inn - Armação de Pêra - just at the end of the formal beach lounges with the sun shades.
We arrived to be greeted by the owner who was expecting us and made us feel welcome.
The boat itself must be quite new and was flawless in it’s appearance- obviously well maintained.  We were assisted with wearing our life jackets which were also well maintained and compact so not intrusive to wear.
Our ‘captain’ was Wagner Lopez who was friendly, helpful and spoke sufficient English to explain the various caves and point out other interesting facts.
Our tour lasted an hour - the first 45 minutes were spent winding in and out of coves to see the many amazing caves along the coast - it was close to high tide so there were a couple of caves that we couldn’t get totally inside but our adventure was certainly enhanced by Wagner’s expertise in navigating through the caves.  
Our favourite was the Captain’s cave - Benagil is the most spectacular but it’s also extremely popular.
We could not recommend Tridente Boat Trips more highly.
Our only regret was that we didn’t have more time to enjoy some of the other watersports they offer from the same location.
It will remain a highlight of our time at the Algarve.
reviews/11/title: A ‘not to miss’ experience- Professional and friendly
reviews/12/text: Booked this very reasonably priced trip at Tridente’s base on the beach below the Holiday Inn hotel. Spotless clean boat, expert skipper and a very nice friendly service. Trip lasts about 1 hr 20 mins for 20 euro per person. Can highly recommend.
reviews/12/title: Cave boat trip in Armação de Pêra
reviews/13/text: Amazing trip, the Captain takes you into the caves, very friendly, very skillfull, excellent value for money
reviews/14/text: Incrível! Todo o passeio foi incrível, o barco é super confortável e o staff super prestativo e atencioso!
reviews/15/text: Recomendo vivamente. Pontualidade, simpatia excelente experiência. Informação sobre as grutas bastante clara e com exactidão
reviews/16/text: Excelente organização por parte de toda a equipa ( desde a do check-in à  equipa que acompanhou durante a viagem )
reviews/17/text: Guias muito simpáticos e conhecedores da zona. Muito atentos a todo o grupo, mostraram os pontos de interesse e proporcionaram a melhor experiência a todos. Recomendo!
reviews/17/title: O Algarve como nunca o tinha visto
reviews/18/text:
Motoscafo veloce per visitare i principali punti di interesse delle spiagge algarviane. 
Ben organizzato e personale simpatico e preparata
reviews/19/text: Visita de barco as grutas benagil, lindíssimo vale a pena visitar. Adequado à época. Equipa bem organizada e simpatia dos capitaes. Recomendo este passeio.
subcategory_ranking: #16 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve

address: Marina de Lagos 10, Lagos 8600-780 Portugal
description: This year Bom Dia Boat Trips celebrates it's 40 year aniversary. This makes the company one of the oldest operating boat companies in the Lagos area. It all started in 1980 with the 2 mast traditional Portuguese sailing boat "Bom Dia Lagos". In the 1990's joined by the 1 mast traditional Portuguese sailing boat "Falcao Veloz". And nowadays also a small fleet of smaller Grotto boats.
name: Bom Dia Boat Trips Lagos
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Grotto tour Ponta da Piedade Lagos
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Sailing cave tour Ponta da Piedade Lagos
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Half-Day Sailing Tour in Baia de Lagos with Lunch
ranking: #15 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #15 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: Winding through the caves and cruising along the beautiful Lagos coastline was one of my most memorable experience during a recent trip to Portugal. This boat trip was an added option to our tour and I was so glad I signed up for it. Bom Dias’s very friendly, informative guides really made a difference and made our visit more enjoyable and memorable.  Thank you to Fernando, Helio, Ruben and Xana for their great service and hospitality throughout the trip. It was amazing!!
reviews/1/text: Easy to book online, find the concession in the Marina and then the boat. Nice length trip (2 hours) on an historic boat, interspersed with trip into the caves via a smaller motor boat. Also the opportunity to take a dip in the sea. Friendly English speaking crew. Very good!
reviews/1/title: Fun two hours by sail to explore the caves
reviews/2/text:
It was amazing! We saw a lot of rock formations, the water was so clear! Beautiful day! Pedro and Diogo were great skippers explaining every single detail! 
I recommend going!
reviews/3/text: We had a great Tour to Ponta da Piedade in March. Pedro and Diego were super nice and gave lots of information about the coast and all the Rocks and Beaches and all you can see. We went with our Boys who are 2,5 and 5 years old and it was no Problem. Everybody had a great time.
reviews/4/text: Aime and Xana were terrific!!! Weather was beautiful, which of course they don't control. But it was just a fun, fun trip with excellent commentary in English!
reviews/5/text: Amazing Dolphin search trip, Guide/Biologist on the trip were superb and very professional. Overall an excellent and highly recommended. A value for money trip
reviews/6/text: Great trip on old sailing ship.  Crew was great.  Enjoyed time on the big ship along with ride in smaller boat through the water caves.  Excellent.
reviews/7/text: Such an amazing experience. We ended up with just the two of us on a kayak tour as the entire group, and they went ahead and took us out on the water anyway. Esteban took us on an amazing trip around the sea caves, into some he'd never been in but we could access because of a weird confluence of the tides. Overall a ton of time on the water. When we got back to the boat Pete and Aurora shared stories of trips they'd taken and how they'd gotten to Lagos. They were really enthusiastic, on and off the water, and we had a wonderful time. We would absolutely go again, I'd love to just go out to dinner with any of them if we're ever back in the area. Highly recommended!
reviews/7/title: Amazing tour kayaking through hidden sea caves
reviews/8/text: Very good service and nice caves the boot was very fast. Very good drinks and chips. A lovely Tour all in all
reviews/9/text: Awesome kayak trip around the coastal caves. Crew and guide were very informative and helpful. Pete took us through the caves and explained a lot of history along the way.  Absolutely loved it and hope to return again next year. Many thanks from Steve and Linda
reviews/10/text: We had a wonderful trip on kayak in Lagos caves. The guide was very nice and fun and make us feel confortable even if we were newbie in kayak. Very nice way to visit the caves, I recommend strongly
reviews/10/title: Wonderful kayak trip in the caves
reviews/11/text: I really liked it you could go for a swim and we also saw dolphins (it was just a coincidence!!!). At the they give you a card ant say that you should write a review and mention their names (which I didn’t like). So thank you to: Fernando, Luisa, Hélio and Samoà (can’t really remember their names).
reviews/12/text: We rented Bom Dia for a private half day sail with our group of ten…it was perfect and exceeded our highest expectations by a mile. We visited the caves, we swam several times, we had a FANTASTIC lunch, sipped on their signature cocktails( the Bom Dia), chatted with the crew, and everyone….from our youngest of two to our eldest at 73 and all ages in between exclaimed at the end that it had been the most wonderful fun spectacular day!!!The whole crew…..Fernando, Xiana, Jow, and Silvas were attentive warm gracious and lovely. If I. Outdoor give a rating beyond excellent I would. The day will live on in all of our memories as a highlight of our trip to the Algarve!!!
reviews/13/text: Our group of 6 enjoyed the two hour boat trip to the caves departing from Lagos, lead by the lovely team of Luis, Chico, Mauricio and Pedrio.  They were very welcoming and very attentive, whilst explaining the history behind the grottos/caves.  Would definitely recommmend!
reviews/13/title: Great 2 hour boat trip to the caves!
reviews/14/text: I went on the Lagos boat trip with Bom Dia in May of 2022.  Our crew (Xico, Brumo, Jommy, and Xanna)  were great.  They are terrific sailors and very informative about what we were seeing.  Much to my delight there was even a decent sized head on this ship so I could change in and out of my bathing suit to swim and could use the facilities.  It was smooth sailing, and a wonderful experience
reviews/14/title: Beautiful trip, amazing caves, affordable, great views
reviews/15/text: We did a boat party with sangria with our Erasmus club and it was really really cool, the whole staff was soooo nice as well!! Loved it loads - 10/10 would recommend! :) (pro tip: drink responsibly bc sangria and waves can be interesting for your stomach)
reviews/16/text: We had a fantastic 4 hour trip on one of Bom Dia's historic wooden boats.  Very friendly staff, lovely lunch and even a swim in the sea.  Can't recommend it highly enough!
reviews/17/text: Went out to see dolphins from Lagos and wow it was amazing, once we got out away from the land they were everywhere, right up next to the boat jumping all around us, the crew and staff were so friendly (just like the dolphins) and it was a truly amazing experience. Thank you bom dia !
reviews/18/text: We went with Bom Dia In Lagos for a kayak trip alongside the coast and could not be more happier. The rocks, caves and beaches were beatiful and the guide with the rest of the crew were super friendly and funny. 10/10 would recommend.
reviews/19/text: We booked the Kayak tour through Bom Dia and had a fantastic experience. We were taken to the nearby beaches, caves and grottos by a very friendly, relaxed and knowledgeable guide. The trip is suitable for all levels of kayaking experience and is a brilliant way to see some of the most beautiful parts of the Algarve. Also we had a chance to swim at the end and have a few beers which was a great way to end the trip.
subcategory_ranking: #15 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Bom Dia Boat Trips Lagos tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Cais da Porta Nova Rua da Porta Nova, Faro 8000-250 Portugal
animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.
description: Estrela da Ria Formosa, offers its customers a variable range of products : * Guides Tours on a comfortable Catamaran through the most beautiful waters of the Algarve, always taking a fauna and flora of the Natural Park of Ria Formosa, where are located 4 islands : Deserta Island, Farol Island , Culatra Island and Hangares Island. * Guided Tours in a Speed Boat to Observe the Dolphins. * Guided Tours to visit the Salt Ponds and Bathing in the " Dead Sea". * Private Boat for events.
name: Estrela da Ria Formosa
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: 4 Stops | 3 Islands & Ria Formosa Natural Park - From Faro
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: 2 Stop | 2 Islands & Ria Formosa Natural Park - From Faro
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Dolphin Watching + 2 Islands Tour - From Faro
offer_group/offer_list/3/title: Sunset Tour | Ria Formosa - From Faro
ranking: #17 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #17 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: Joâo was a friendly guide who could give us a lot of information about the islands, the oysterbeach, the fisherman, the people who leaves in te small towns of the islands. He was also funny, he made a lot of jokes. He gave us a tip for dinner but he was not pushy when you chose another restaurant.
reviews/1/text: I liked the scuba diving on the boat, Thiage was a great guide aswell. The boat itself was good, and the stops on the islands were beautiful.
reviews/1/title: Awesome trip to see the islands of Portugal
reviews/2/text: An amazing day out with amazing views. We were well looked after by Joao and he had a wealth of knowledge about the Islands and of Portugal- he was a great skipper and looked after everyone on board. Well worth the trip.
reviews/3/text: It was really nice and beautiful! Can recommend it a lot!! The driver was really nice and explained everything important
reviews/4/text: Our guide Joa was awesome. He was knowledgeable about Oyester and Clam culturing. We enjoyed our trip with him. Do take his suggestion for food.
reviews/5/text:
It was very nice, with a beautiful view on the sunset 
Tiago is a really good guy he let us the time to take pictures and memories on the desert island ; thank you very much !
reviews/6/text: Ivan was an amazing informative guide that made the experience unforgettable. We especially loved the desert island
reviews/7/text:
Really great afternoon on the boat to visit 2 traditional island ! Ivan was really nice and explain to us all we needed to know about the area ! A big plus the very comfortable seat on the boat ! 

Thank you Ivan
reviews/8/text: The best part of my trip was riding the boat really fast and feeling the spray of the seawater on my face! The guide (Ivan) was very knowledgeable and helpful.
reviews/9/text: Ivan is an amazing tour guide, as he was so knowledgeable of the area. He also manged to find a flamingo spot. great experience
reviews/10/text: John was a really great tour guide, very friendly and informative. Even got to see some flamingos on the way round
reviews/11/text: João was a brilliant tour guide, very friendly and full of interesting facts about the Ria Formosa area. Thanks for the trip!
reviews/11/title: Lovely boat tour with a great guide
reviews/12/text: Three-hours tour with Ivan was perfect.  He was friendly and knows the area well.  Highly recommend for nature lovers
reviews/13/text:
Great Host! Beautiful islands! Yummy food! Made new frimeds! Had a lovely time. 

I would recommend it
reviews/14/text: Joao was an amazing guide! Very friendly and made the trip fun. The sunset was absolutely gorgeous - a MUST when in Faro! Would highly recommend and ask for Joao  the weather was beautiful but was a little chilly at the end so would recommend a light jacket to stay comfortable the entire time.
reviews/15/text: Wonderful experience w a magical sunset ride. João was very knowledgeable and fun! Would totally recommend to any couples.
reviews/16/text: A very nice boat trip, this morning to desert island and to lighthouse island, with Tiago and Juan, made our day! ☀️
reviews/17/text: Great tour with TIAGO !!! I strongly recommend to spend some time in Ria Formosa with him ! Bonus: you can book a place with shadow for babies !
reviews/18/text: Very nice boat ride to see the islands close to Faro, João was the best part of the travel always in a great mood engaging with everybody on the boat. He can speak any language
reviews/19/text: Awesome tour with Joao. Nice weather, nice island. 45m is a bit short to appreciate the beaches and chill.
subcategory_ranking: #17 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
tags/animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.

address: Rua Comandante Francisco Manuel Av. da Republica, Faro 8000-250 Portugal
description: Islands 4 you Tourism and Nature does guided boat tours by the Ria Formosa Natural Park with regular departures from Faro at 11h00 and 15h15. The journey is made by the Ria Formosa channels with stops at the islands Farol and Deserta. The duration is 4 hours including stops on the islands. The boat is a comfortable catamaran for the maximum of 12 people. We also provide nature tours and sunset tours.
name: Islands 4 You
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Ria Formosa Natural Park and Islands Boat Cruise from Faro
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Ria Formosa Sunset 1 hour Boat Trip in Faro
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Private Ria Formosa Natural Park Boat Cruise from Faro
offer_group/offer_list/3/title: Romantic Sunset Tour in the Ria Formosa: From Faro
offer_group/offer_list/4/title: Ria Formosa Catamaran Sunset Islands Tour from Faro
ranking: #21 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #21 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: The Sunset Tour was amazing! Our skipper Ricardo was very friendly and accommodating of our group. He played music and gave us a bit of history of the National Park. The boat was comfortable and it was a very relaxing tour, sunset was beautiful! I Recommend for anybody to go on the store whether it be with a partner or your friends.
reviews/1/text:
Super great experience Sandra and Nico at the top. 
French English Spanish speaking. Good explanations
reviews/2/text: We took the tour of the 2 islands (Deserta and Pharol) and returned at sunset. A very kind guide who gave us some information about Rio Formosa. Three years later we returned to Faro and found Mr. Ricciard again. 10/10
reviews/3/text: Absolutely amazing experience! Would highly recommend - boat was very comfy and played some very enjoyable music, Sandra made the booking process very easy and she was so lovely and friendly which made us feel very welcomed. Ricardo our tour guide drove the boat very smoothly and made us feel very safe, he was very knowledgeable about a lot of nature and the islands nearby - he also stopped to let us dip our feet in the sea and we even saw some flamingos! 10/10 book the sunset tour or other tours if you are thinking of doing so :)
reviews/4/text:
Small group! Guided tour.  Very funny and knowledgable skipper- Miguel!

Tour was for 3 hours with a small group of 8, Miguel made sure to keep us entertained.
reviews/4/title: Brilliant tour, skipper Miguel is wonderful !
reviews/5/text:
Me and my wife went for the island tour with Miguel as a guide.
March is a great period,not crowded and lovely weather.
Fantastic trip,very well explained by Miguel that is a fantastic,funny and well prepared tour guide.
We definitely suggest this company for your trip in Faro's islands.
Let's not forget the other Miguel that is a talented seller in the kiosk!good job guys
Thanks for the experience.
reviews/6/text: We loved our experience with Islands 4 you. Our only regret was not doing a longer boat tour. It has been one of the highlights of our trip to Portugal.
reviews/7/text: so much packed in to 3 hours! our tour guide miguel was so funny and made the experience 1000 times better! would recommend!
reviews/8/text: We enjoyed the tour so much! Our guide was funny, entertaining and knowleadgable. Thank you so much, it is a must do in Faro.
reviews/9/text: Excellent captain Miguel! Knowledgeable about the lagoon,  the sea life and the islands.  He had a great sense of humour too! Faultless 3 hours. Highly recommended trip organiser.
reviews/9/title: 3 hour 2 Island catamaran trip. Great value for money.
reviews/10/text: Had an excellent evening loved being able to stop off on the islands Miguel was our guide and very good
reviews/11/text: We had a wonderfull guide Miguel. Showed us many birds and taught a lot. Would recommend if you are looking for something to do in Faro.
reviews/12/text: Went on the morning Faro Islands boat trip.  Very nice comfortable boat - maximum 8 people so small tour group.  Our guide Miquel was a great and had lived in the area his whole life so loads of knowledge of the history and wildlife.  Really nice stops on Deserta Island and a lovely beach shack lunch on Ilha dol Farol.  Both places had stunning beaches.   We had a fantastic day and highly recommend this trip!
reviews/13/text: Miguel our guide was very knowledgable and managed the trip superbly. He went the extra mile as nighttime fell to take us to see flamingos. Overall the trip was extremely rewarding and full recommendation.
reviews/14/text:
The whole Boat Tour was just beautiful and soo well done!
Our Captain Miguel was the best! He told us everything about Ria Formosa and the beautiful islands, an experience i will never forget.
Thank you Miguel!!
reviews/15/text:
We had a great tour around the lagon for about 4h with a local guide named Miguel who was born in Faro and knew the place like no one else.
Such a great experience and definitely recommend.
Thanks again
reviews/16/text: I found the whole experience just lovely! Perfect weather, wonderful view, amazing sunset! Amazing Nico! Obrigada!
reviews/17/text: We sent on a 3h30 Cruise with Ricardo! Everything was ready on time and the guide was very friendly and gave a lot of interesting information. Definitely recommend this company for a boat tour.
reviews/18/text: Myself and my girlfriend  bought the tickets at the stand at the port, the women we bought them off was extremely friendly and helpful, she also gave us suggestions of things to see in faro. We went on the the trip with Ricardo, the guide, he was very friendly and knowledgeable, the islands are beautiful & the boat is very well maintained, we would 100% recommend.
reviews/19/text: We enjoyed a nice boat trip visiting a couple of wild islands just in front of Faro. Well organised and arranged. Comfortable and safe boat. Our skipper, Ricardo, was awesome: he’s kind and speaks Italian too!
subcategory_ranking: #21 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve

address: Avenida Nascente 130, Faro 8005-520 Portugal
description: It's the size of your SMILE that matters! When your WILL is bigger than your fears. When your EFFORT pays you off, your chest gets higher & your confidence increases. When U forget all the stress & troubles. Those little moments that bring more joy, laughter, smiles & great energy to our lives! That’s WHY we love what we do! Thank U for making our days special, Mili & Vítor
name: AMAR Surfing Academia
ranking: #25 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #25 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: Great course, i totally recommend it. Mili is really a nice instructor, she gives good advice and explains the techniques clearly, and it's a pleasure to spend time with her
reviews/1/text: I had an amazing first surfing experience here! These people know what they are doing and they do it well!! I was standing up on my first wave and continued getting better because of all the feedback that i was getting! They are very enthusiastic and will motivate you to catch those waves!
reviews/1/title: These people will motivate you and teach you the best!
reviews/2/text: Had a great time with the girls :) the instructors gave very individual advices. We felt safe at any time and would love to go back one day!!
reviews/3/text: Excellent instructors, always helpful and kind. If you are on Erasmus in Faro, this should be at your to-do list for sure. It's 100% the thing I enjoyed the most during my study period in Portugal. If you are there for longer period of time, I could get discount for more lectures as student, so you can progress more and enjoy the most of surfing.
reviews/4/text: One of the best experiencies I had in Faro. It's definetely a must if you happen to visit or study in Faro!
reviews/5/text:
Both instructors, Mili and Vitor were amazing and had great energy! Thank you again for both of our boys’ behalves who experienced surfing for the first time!

We highly recommend this lovely community of crazy surfers if you happen to be around Faro.
reviews/5/title: Great experience and loads of good energy!
reviews/6/text:
Amazing day out, amazing people, amazing beaches, amazing surf. Millie and Pedro were great, super friendly, great with the kids, laid back people who seem to just love life..... they just made it a really enjoyable experience all round.  
The lessons are a few hours long (which fly by), so make sure you account for the ferry times. 
The only downside for us was that we had to leave :) 
Thanks to Millie and Pedro.......this was the highlight of our holiday!
reviews/7/text: The best teachers and the most fun and crazy people you will ever meet! Thank you for everything and stay crazy!!
reviews/7/title: Best surflessons to get in Portugal
reviews/8/text: We came in 6 for our first surfing experience. Had ton of fun and had nice time with the instructors, who were wonderfully prepared and charming. I’d say that for the price and the time they offer, it’s pretty much a very good deal! If you have some days to spare, get your stuff and have some amazing surfing among the waves.
reviews/9/text: I can highly recommend a surf course at AMAR! We had so much fun and the price is fair. Mili and Pedro are great teachers. They both spread really good vibes and are full of energy and motivation. The beach (Praia da Barrinha) is a few minutes to go but is something special. Thanks and hopefully until next time!
reviews/10/text:
It has been a pleasure for me spending part of my free time with Mili, Vitor and the whole crew. 
In addition, Praia da Barrinha is something unique where to surf. They’ll bring you in paradise
reviews/11/text:
Had the best time with Millie, Vitor and all the other guys! Great teachers, but more importantly great people! Wether you're a total novice or already know your way on a surfboard, you will enjoy your time in the water and leave in the best mood.
Definitely an experience you can't miss if you're in Faro!
reviews/11/title: Super fun times and major surf improvements
reviews/12/text: Really great school with really really lovely Coaches and Great energy!! I would recommend it!! Learned a lot and had fun
reviews/13/text: Amazing instructors and great experience I enjoyed it a lot. Highly recommended if you visit Faro beach
reviews/14/text: Great people, they give really good tips, are always helpful and I really enjoyed the time with AMAR. I had one surf lesson and I also rented a surf board and wetsuit a couple of times. The price is fair and it was a lot of fun! Hopefully until next time!
reviews/15/text: Great vibes & guidance! The classes I took as a beginner helped me a lot. Additionally, it was very important to the instructors to maintain the enjoyment for the participants.
reviews/16/text:
I found the school searching on internet before take the plane and wow! Amazing!
Mili is a great teacher and transmits happiness and energy!
Best school in Praia de Faro!
Hope to see you in a couple of weeks to surf again! :)
reviews/17/text: Surfing has been one of those things I always wanted to do, and Amar Surf School has provided me with everything I need to learn!!! It is not only about technique (which is very well taught by Amar teachers), but also about inspiration and good memories, so in this way making this experience unforgetable and happy.Thanks Amar School!
reviews/18/text:
I can highly recommend a surf course at AMAR! We had so mich fun, we booked direct a class for the next day. Mill is such a great teacher! We will definitely come back if we around that beautiful place.
We even saw dolphins  after our lesson. Soo Lucky!
Such a great experience! 
Many thanks
reviews/18/title: Beautiful place and lots of fun
reviews/19/text: A great place to start your surfing experience! Fun & professional instructors and an amazing atmosphere make the surfing classes one of the bests things to do in Faro. I’ve had such a great time and met so many fantastic people. Awesome time! :)
subcategory_ranking: #25 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve

address: Vila Nova de Cacela Portugal
description: Experiências de voo sobre as Reservas Naturais da Ria Formosa, e do rico patrimonio natural existente no Concelho de Castro Marim, merecem destaque a area da reserva natural do Sapal de Castro Marim e Vila Real de santo Antonio, as Barragens de Odeleite e Beliche, a Mata Nacional das Terras da Ordem. Sobrevoar também em Girocóptero Portugal Continental, Ilhas e outros Países! Experiências de voo com 15, 30 e 60 minutos, ou PERSONALIZE o seu voo! Várias localizações ao seu dispor. ECO Pista exclusivamente licenciada na Praia Verde, em plena Reserva do Sapal, onde poderá observar a flora e fauna! Dê voos às suas experiências e sinta emoções inigualáveis vendo novos horizontes em autogiro. Estamos munidos de acessibilidade em todas as situações de MOBILIDADE REDUZIDA.
location_string: Vila Nova de Cacela, Faro District, Algarve
name: SkyXpedition
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Gyrocopter Flight Experience in Algarve
reviews/0/text: This is a Must when you like to eXperience the Algarve from a different perspective! Pedro is a super professional guy with a passion for his business, what shows while flying above the stunning views of the coastline of the Algarve! Addictive, what makes that you want to stay in the air forever... Congratulations to Pedro for his passion, professionalism and dedication!
reviews/1/text:
30 minutes of an amazing and safe flight over Algarve shore and via Formosa Natural Reserve with excellent pilot, Pedro.
A MUST DO here
Unfortunately too short !
reviews/2/text: The Algarve from a different angle, more beautiful than ever in the evening sun, and great views of Vila Real de Santo Antonio, Tavira, Cabanas (and our house too!) and Castro Marim. The shapes and colours of the salinas are a large-scale stained glass window, and you get to see flamingos from above. Altogether a fabulous birthday present. Thanks to Pedro and the team for the experience.
reviews/3/text: Mon petit fils a gardé un souvenir imperissable de ce vol. J'attend avec impatience de monter a bord de ce petit bijou.
reviews/3/title: A ecouter mon petit fils, la balade en vaut vraiment la peine
reviews/4/text:
Un moment exceptionnel ! Un super accueil, deux personnes très sympathiques qui font l effort de parler dans notre langue, des conseils, des informations sur le gyrocoptere, ils prennent le temps de répondre à nos petites questions... Vraiment que du positif ! Mon mari a fait une découverte de 10min, balade très agréable mais un peu rapide donc à refaire avec grand plaisir un peu plus longtemps ! Ma fille de 13 ans balade de 20min elle a beaucoup apprécié, super moment avec un guide très sympathique !
On recommande ++++++
reviews/5/text: Viagem incrível, experiência altamente recomendável. Ótima experiência também para quem queira perder o medo de voar. Viagem muito suave, bela e fica-se com a sensação que poderíamos assim ficar o dia todo a viajar. Ver o Algarve e as suas zonas tão belas assim de cima, deixa-nos sem ar. Staff muito simpático. O Pedro é um excelente profissional.
reviews/6/text: Vol offert à notre fils pour ses 20 ans, le voyage lui a beaucoup plu, survoler l algarve sous le soleil dans ce merveilleux petit hélicoptère lui laissera un souvenir extraordinaire ! Merci à Pedro et Rodrigo pour cet accueil et cette organisation parfaits! À recommander!
reviews/7/text:
Já o tinha visto a voar na praia....tenho que experimentar...pensei eu...e assim foi, pela manhã de dia 22 fomos ao encontro do Pedro Cotovio , Bem...só experimentando...a sensação de segurança...as vistas aéreas de Castro Marim, Cacela, VRSA, praias , ria formosa ...foi magnífico. Ficou a vontade de repetir !
Parabéns à equipa muito simpática  e profissional, (o complemento foi brincar com a Sal...uma cadela muito activa e obediente que nos entretem enquanto esperamos a nossa vez)
reviews/8/text: Voo maravilhoso seguro, vista muito linda, muito atencioso e simpático Pedro. Aeronave maravilhosa. Obrigado a todos da empresa pela atenção.
reviews/9/text:
Merci pour ce moment extraordinaire et inoubliable. Très grand professionnalisme , sécurité au top et des images plein la vue. Incroyable chance d'avoir vu les dauphins au bord de la plage.
Je recommande sans hésitation cette expérience merveilleuse.
reviews/10/text: Ein einzigartiges Erlebnis! Das Team kompetent , sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend! Helikopter in top Zustand, Preis-/Leistung stimmt total !!
reviews/11/text:
D'abord il y a le pilote, Pedro.
Très professionnel il a pris soin la veille du vol de nous appeler pour en expliquer le déroulement.
Parlant parfaitement plusieurs langues dont le français il a su par sa parfaite connaissance de sa machine et des vents (et ça soufflait pas mal ce jour là) être rassurant et faire apprécier en toute sécurité, complicité, et compétence cette merveilleuse balade aérienne.
Ensuite il y a la machine. Un autogire judicieusement conçu pour que le passager puisse contempler le paysage à 180 degrés.
Et puis il y a la merveilleuse Ria Formosa avec Cacela Velha, Cabanas, Tavira, les 4 aguas, une vue à couper le souffle sur Santa Luzia et Praia Tavira et puis le survol spectaculaire des plages ...etc... 
Et encore Praia Verde, Monte Gordo, Isla de Christina , Ayamonté, le Guadiana et surtout ... surtout la réserve naturelle de Castro Marim... tout simplement sublime avec ses flamands roses.
Mais il faut aussi parler de la piste d'envol fantasmagorique chargée d'histoire .... puisque c'est ni plus ni moins que l'ancienne piste de l'aérodrome de Vila Réal où se posaient les avions des  fortunés des années 50 et 60 qui venaient jouer au Casino de Monte Gordo.
Merci à Pédro et sa charmante collaboratrice pour ce moment inoubliable.
Maryse  Jean-Louis
reviews/11/title: Merveilleuse et inoubliable balade aérienne avec un grand professionnel...
reviews/12/text:
Ich habe SkyXpedition per email und später per Whattsapp kontaktiert. Schnell und unkompliziert wurden alle meine Fragen beantwortet und wir haben einen Flugtermin für den nächsten Tag ausgemacht.
Der Flugplatz liegt etwas versteckt im Naturschutzgebiet, war aber mit der Wegbeschreibung sehr gut zu finden.

Vor Ort durfte ich dabei sein, als der Gyrokopter für den Flug vorbereitet und überprüft wurde. Skyxpediton legt sehr viel Wert auf die Sicherheit und der Gyrokopter sah fast fabrikneu aus. Alle meine vielen, typisch männlich deutschen, technischen Fragen wurde mir vor und während des Fluges beantwortet.

Doch das wichtigste ist der Flug an sich. Ich habe bereits 10 Tage hier verbracht und dachte ich kenne die Landschaft, aber aus der Luft kann man die Schönheit erst richtig erkennen. Es war ein fantastisches Erlebnis über dem Naturschutzgebiet, von Via Real über Monto Gordo bis nach Tavira an den Stränden entlang über funkelndes Wasser, Salzbecken und an den Burgen vorbei.
Es ist jeden Cent Wert!

UPDATE: Ich bin kurz entschlossen nochmal geflogen um den Sonnenuntergang aus der Luft zu genießen.
reviews/12/title: Nur so erlebt man diese Gegend richtig!
reviews/13/text:
Um voo simplesmente maravilhoso repleto de vistas fantásticas.
Bom para todas as idades.
Uma experiência para recordar e voltar a fazer.
reviews/14/text:
Fantástica experiência!!! Num dia de vento, com dúvidas se voávamos, fiz um voo calmo e espectacular, disfrutando de paisagens maravilhosas do Sotavento algarvio.
Uma equipa cinco estrelas! Obrigada, Comandante Cotovio!
reviews/15/text: Sublime moment. Une expérience merveilleuse pour visiter une région magnifique de l’Algarve. Pedro et Marina partagent une passion avec gentillesse et professionnalisme. Une expérience et un souvenir inoubliable. A ne pas manquer! Merci et à bientôt. Steve
reviews/16/text: Little paradise from the skies!!Experiência fantástica!!Para quem  gosta de "voar"☺ recomendo vivamente 10*
reviews/17/text: Uma muito desfrutável, pacífica e tranquilizante experiência. A sensação de voar num aparelho tão estável e portátil permite absorver a paisagem e desfrutar dum voo pacífico e sensação de leveza sem precedentes. Recomendo vivamente.
reviews/18/text: Experiência fabulosa pelo céu de Vila Real de Santo António, Castro Marim, Vila Nova de Cacela. Um voo inesquecível pela beleza da paisagem e pelo profissionalismo do piloto. Maravilhoso.
reviews/19/text:
Passeio fantástico na zona do Sotavento. 
Vistas incríveis apenas possíveis desde o ar.
Total respeito pelas regras de segurança e  ambientais.
Equipamento bastante seguro. 
Recomendo a todos.
Parabéns pela iniciativa.
Piloto fantástico!

address: Lagos Portugal
description: Learn to Surf with Mike Raven Former English ,British and European Surfing Champion, Level 4 ASI/SGB surf Instructor, surf Instructor/Lifeguard trainer. In the Beautiful Algarve Beaches. SMALL GROUP - PERSONAL ATTENTION - FUN - SAFE
name: Raven Surf School - 1 Day Lessons
ranking: #23 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #23 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text:
We were on a family villa holiday to Lagos in Portugal, we got talking to a family round the pool who have been coming for many years and they gave us some great recommendations, places to go, restaurants, bars, local festivals etc, they also suggested that if my brother and I (15 & 17) wanted to have a go at surfing we should try the Raven Surf School. 
Mum and Dad did a little internet research and could that Mike Raven, who runs the school with his wife, son & sheepdog Nelly is an British & European surf champion who had relocated to the Algarve from Cornwall in 2004.
We took the plunge, telephoned the school and talked to Mike’s wife Nicky about the classes, she explained everything to us and we decided as neither of us had any surfing experience to book the 1 day beginner session. 
Wow, from the time that we met Mike & the family on top of the cliffs above the beach we knew that we were in great hands, by halfway through the session we were both up on our feet and thoroughly enjoyed the whole day.
I can’t recommend Mike and his team highly enough.
ANYONE visiting the Algarve, from beginner upwards who wants to learn or improve their surfing should book with the Raven Surf School, the groups are small enough for loads of 1to1 tuition and for sure next time we are in Portugal we will be booking again. 
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
reviews/1/text: Excellent family based Surf coach, Mike works in small Groups so that each person gets detailed feedback on how to improve. so me and my grilfreind really felt the progress by the end of the three hours, highly Knowledgeable and Fun, the family came along too and brought snacks and took photos, very nice atmosphere! Many other schools are solely business orientated and basically throw you all in a group of 15 to 20, with mininal advice or interaction so you are essentially just hiring the equipment and getting frustrated. Would highly recommend Raven Surf Lessons for a  quality experience.
reviews/2/text:
My girlfriend and I were in holidays in Lagos for a few days. I had a low surfing experience and my gf had none. We decided to go for Raven’s day lesson after taking a look at the great reviews. The least we can say is that we were not disappointed ! We had an amazing experience ! 
They accepted to take us two on a one day notice which was a nice gesture. Mike was very nice throughout the entire session, gave us great advices and managed to easily handle our different levels. Mike’s wife took care of us like a mother which was super pleasant. 
My gf ended up standing on the board several times and I know I have progressed a lot as well. 
I know I will call them as soon as I come back to Lagos and I would recommend them to any friend going there. Thank you again Mike for this experience !!
reviews/3/text: Amazing 2 days surfing, plenty of time in the water and personal attention and correction for each participant, not overcrowded like some other schools so as a beginner you can actually practice your technique a lot, instead of waiting for the path to clear. Great communication from the team + photos/videos for the memories
reviews/3/title: Fun, engaging with personal attention from the coach
reviews/4/text: Great day for the whole family, and one of the highlights of our Portugal trip. Great fun, safe and very good instructions by Mike. Small group, thus good attention and tips. Also nice pics shared afterwards by Nicky.
reviews/5/text:
Éramos um grupo de 4 amigos que nunca tinhamos surfado e adoramos a aula do Mike. Ele é bastante fixe e profissional. Fomos até a bela praia da Bordeira e so eramos so os 4 a ter aula portanto foi quase como aula privada. O Mike foi adaptando as técnicas especificadamente a cada um de nós consoante a aula foi decorrendo. Recomendo bastante. O Mike e a Nicky são pessoas espectaculares e também têm uma cadelinha adorável que faz a experiência ainda melhor! Muito obrigado Mike e Nicky! 

We were a group of 4 none of which has ever surfed before and we loved Mike's class. He is very cool and professional. We went to Bordeira beach and we had the group class just for the 4 of us, so almost the same as a private class. Mike would teach us and give us feedback as the class went through and would adapt new techniques tailored for each of us individually. Highly recommended! Mike and Nicky are very nice and easy going people and they even have the cutest dog ever that makes the whole experience even better. Thank you very much for this class Mike and Nicky!
reviews/5/title: Fantastic experience for first time surfers!
reviews/6/text: I went along to spectate while my husband and two teenagers did the lesson. Firstly, the location is stunning, Nicky and Mike were very friendly and professional, and my family thoroughly enjoyed the experience, all managing to get up on the board (although some for longer than others)! A special mention to Nellie and Taylor also, who managed to keep me entertained throughout!
reviews/7/text:
From the moment we met in the morning the experience was brilliant all the way to when we said goodbye. 

Mike and Nicky were great, with clear instructions and personal attention.  Would totally recommend for someone who wants to try something new. Suitable for all ages, which made it a great family activity.
reviews/8/text: We had a great experience with Raven Surf School. Mike is a very good and experienced instructor and gives truely valuable advice. The equipment was in excellent condition. In between the sessions we were provided with a bag of snacks to get ourselves fueled again. The icing on the cake were the beautiful photos we received (for free!) via email. Highly recommended!
reviews/9/text:
We‘ve booked a two day course with mike and Nicky. The meeting point was easy to find and from there you have a lovely view over a beautiful beach which is perfect for beginners because you are able to easily walk into the water and therefor get quicker on the board. Mike is a very experienced and good Surf instructor. Without any knowledge we’ve manage to stand on the board quite quickly. 2 days are perfect to really get the grip of it. 3 days would have been a little bit to exhausting for me, you definitely feel the 3 hours. 

We can definitely recommend a surf lesson with mike and Nicky! Both of them are really carrying and kind! We would book another lesson if we would come back to Portugal!
reviews/10/text: Could not be happier with our choice! Mike and Nikki were super friendly and really knowledgeable. They quickly made us feel comfortable with the board and had us catching a wave standing before our first break! Highly recommend it, seeing all the other groups I really felt like we got a lot more out of it based on the coaching we got. Thanks again for a great day!
reviews/11/text:
Mike is a fantastic and patient teacher and you really spend maximal amount of time in the water. I can’t emphasize enough how spectacular and encouraging Mike was. He was in the water with us and would correct us each time. For those who struggled standing, he would physically get you started on the wave so you could just focus on getting up. 

Other Pros:
-The lesson starts early so you get the first choice of spots in Bordeira
-Max class size of 8
-Mike’s wife takes great photos of you so you can focus on the lesson
-Only about 20 minutes total on land for the theory and the rest of the day in the water 
-Earliest ending surf day (back by 3) so you can maximize time in Lagos. You’ll be tired anyway. I wouldn’t have wanted to do longer 
-Really authentic, family-run business complete with dog 

Cons:
-You have to carry your boards 10-15 minutes each way to the van (this beach is difficult to access for everyone)
-The beach doesn’t have bathrooms
reviews/12/text: My partner is normally a whiny creature, Especially with sports. Now her attitude has changed and she wants to become a surfer for life. Mike and family are wonderful hosts and fantastic Teachers. Very thorough, attentive and careful. Absolute professionals with a warm touch. Recommend highly. Thanks for a great day out
reviews/13/text:
Booked 3 days for our teen children in August 2019 . We had been in 2018  with another surf school which was good but this was a much better experience for us. Smaller groups, lunch included and fab photos taken and sent on to us after the day. The day started early but enabled Mike to get the best spot on the beach. Mike was very safety conscience with regards surfers in his group. 
Our prime recommendation if you are planning more than one day would be to leave a gap between lessons. Even at 15 and 17 our two children found it very tiring so a break to give their muscles time to recover was ideal!
Raven Surf school were extremely friendly and we will definitely book with them again.
reviews/14/text:
All I can say is, if you have ever just been ‘thinking’ of giving surfing a go, then DO IT! 
This was an amazing day, Mike was a great instructor who didn’t over complicate anything...... I was actually surfing!! Thank you Mike and Nicky for such a friendly welcome and making the day so perfect... I will definitely be back.
reviews/15/text: Went to Lagos specificaly for these surfing lessons. Had three days, best experience we had for the whole vacation. The lesson day is perfectly organized, you just get to one of the pickup locations and get driven to the best spot, be given the suited equipment, and be fed the neat lunch. Mike teaches how to surf in a group and then individually. Nicky prepares individual snack boxes and takes photos. And the whole group is accompanied by the cutest dog you have ever seen. If you book several days just be sure to workout a bit before lessons, to avoid the pain in your arms and legs.
reviews/16/text: Mike’s energy and enthusiasm really came through his lesson and individualized advice/coaching. I received great tips that I will take home with me! Mike and Nicky really thought of everything to make the day smooth and enjoyable from snacks to photos to gear needed so you don’t have to worry about a thing.
reviews/17/text: We had a great experience and day - highly recommend .mike was very attentive and offered personal tips and suggestions to all in our group
reviews/18/text:
I really enjoyed Mike lesson! All was awesome
Small group (up to 8 people), best spot, perfect coach and good mood - this is recipe for success! During the lesson Mike  gave really helpful advices after that I have got real progress. He was very involved in the learning process! 
Also I can not mention his wife Niky that was very caring and made cool photos and their funny dog
Hope some day or other I will get more  lessons again!
reviews/18/title: Awesome day with Raven Surf School!
reviews/19/text:
Mike is a very good instructor, we all managed to get some waves on our first day.
He gave us very clear instructions and some tips. It was fun and a very friendly atmosphere. Our group was small, the beach we went to was beautiful, Mike, Nicky and their son are all very happy and enthusiast people. Would recommend to anyone. Thank you guys, we had a blast
subcategory_ranking: #23 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve

address: Urbanizacao Sao Vicente Beliche, Sagres 8650-390 Portugal
description: Your guide, Jean-Louis FEUNTEUN, is a certified instructor of Stand Up Paddle (SUP) and goes with you during all the activities. I am an enthusiast of water sports (windsurfing, surfing, sailing), and have been practicing SUP for ten years. I want to share my passion with all lovers of the sea and bring you along to discover the beauties of the wild coast of the Algarve, all while respecting nature.
name: SUP Sagres
ranking: #26 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #26 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text:
If you like to do SUP in your travel add this way for....
I did and it is a good adventure on the sea.
reviews/1/text: Jean Louis is a great instructer! During the journey he shares technical tips, safe instructions and a lot knowledge about the area! 2 hours of fun enjoying the incredible views of our sea. Thanks again!
reviews/1/title: Incredile way to visit Sagres's caves!
reviews/2/text: It was an amazing experience. The incredible nature, the challenge of your own abilities and the professionell, funny and warm guidance of Jean-Louis made that day unforgettable. Merci beaucoup et bonne chance.
reviews/3/text: For the second time in 5 years we really had a fantastic suptour with the friendly and superguide Jean-Louis! Many thanks!
reviews/4/text: It was a great experience we made with Jean Luis who always kept the nice balance of having big fun and being safety. This has made the trip unforgettable. Thank you for this !!!
reviews/4/title: Fighting until the very tough end :))
reviews/5/text: Fantastic experience with Jean-Louis to discover the Algarve hidden nature in the ocean. Worthwhile and highly recommended!
reviews/6/text:
I highly recommend SUP Sagres. From the great, and easy communication with Helena, to the experience, passion and enthusiasm of Jean Louis.
We were a family group ages from 22 to 60 with experienced to a complete novice (myself). JLs briefing was short but to the point. He encouraged and guided. At the start of the tour my wobbly legs meant I thought I'd have to do it all on my knees. Not so. Constant encouragement and patience had me standing and enjoying it so much.
We visited caves, did some snorkeling and even some rock jumping. 
JL is very knowledgeable about the area, the tides, weather etc we really appreciated his Land rover defender.
From being picked up at our hotel to being dropped back the whole experience has created fantastic memories that will always stay with us.
Once again a massive thank you to Jean Louis and Helena for a magical tour.
reviews/6/title: Magical tour from wobbly knees to confident stand up paddle boarder
reviews/7/text: If you are thinking of booking an activity whilst in Sagres, then you must book with SUP Sagres.  Jean-Louis is a great instructor, he’s very funny and welcoming as was Helena.  We were complete beginners but that wasn’t a problem at all, he got us up and running in no time.  The caves are amazing and the water is so clear, has to be seen to be believed. We all had a great adventure!
reviews/8/text:
We booked a cave sup tour with Jean-Louis and Helena unfortunately due to the weather conditions we couldn’t go and they offered us to go to martinhal islands. The islands are approximately 1 km away from the shore. It was such a lovely trip! We had a fantastic group and Jean-Louis is the most perfect guide I ever had! He was funny and told us a lot of information about the island and the surroundings and the ocean. Almost all of us were beginners and it was no problem at all! Plus he took a lot of pictures which were also included in the price. Helena is also really friendly and really good with the Planning of the trip 
If you want to book a SUP tour book with Helena and Jean-Louis! Thank you we will definitely come back again!! Hope to see you soon!
reviews/8/title: SUP Sagres Tour to the Martinhal Islands
reviews/9/text: This is a super fun experience and Jean-Louis is a fantastic instructor! You do not need to be a pro at this, we were complete beginners and it is completely safe and easy thanks to Jean-Louis. He is a great expert and he is going to show you fantastic spots along the coast. He knows everything about the place. We loved the caves and swimming into them. Helena is super friendly and on top of things, with reservations and communication. 5 star experience. Of note, on the day of our tour the weather was awful and we were even thinking to cancel our reservation. Jean-Louis promised us that the weather would be great on our spot--it was hard to believe, but when we arrived there it was indeed perfect! So trust JL: if he tells you that the tour is possible and safe, it is!!! We suspect he even controls the weather ;) Thanks again for a great tour!
reviews/10/text: It was overall a great experience. So much fun and very nice tour guide, he's the funniest and the most helpful. I would give this even 6 out of 5 stars! The caves are beautiful and the water is so clear.
reviews/11/text: Fantastic experience, Jean-Louis is a fabulous guide able to combine safety and the pleasure of discovery and adventure, without forgetting the sportive nature of the experience. Highly recommendable!
reviews/12/text:
My Boyfriend, my Mum and I went paddle boarding with Pablo. Had such a fantastic trip. The water was crystal clear and Pablo was a great instructor. He was really helpful to my mum who had never done anything like that before. 
All 3 of us thoroughly enjoyed it and would definitely recommend the tour.
reviews/13/text:
We took our first SUP tour with Jean-Louis four years ago and loved it so much that when we came to Sagres this year, we booked it again. This tour is fun and our total recommendation. Jean-Louis takes only small groups, so attention to every participant and safety is guaranteed. 
Regards,
Yana and Denis
reviews/13/title: The best way to explore the Algarve caves
reviews/14/text: Wonderful experience guided by An experiences Aquaman. Great overal atmosphere combined with useful information. Throughout our trip we tried different surf/SUP rentals, but they did not come close. It made us do a U-turn & spend our last days in Sagres. Thanks again to JL & Helena for helping us out.
reviews/15/text: We had an amazing experience with SUP. Helen helped us with the booking process and Jean Louis was the most amazing instructor. Definitely a wonderful experience in Algarve. We strongly recommend this guys! Thanks for a perfect Day!
reviews/16/text: We had a great 2 day SUP surf course with Jean Louis. He is extremely competent and gave us constructive feedback that allowed us to improve our sup surf skills. Helena also replied immediately when we contacted her about a course. You are a great team and we look forward to our next visit. Thank you for a lovely time.
reviews/17/text: We hired 4 SUP's from SUP Sagres. Jean-Louis and Helena were very friendly, spoke great English and gave us some great advice on where to go. The boards were excellent and we had a fantastic morning exploring the coastline. We saw Jean-Louis with a group he was touring with and he kindly took a few photos for us and emailed them. We will be back to Sagres and will definitely hire from them again. Fully recommend.
reviews/18/text: Best tour guide you can have. Had a really great time. 10/10 would go again  #TeamCroissant #J-L #GreatTime
reviews/19/text: The best SUP tour in Algarve! We only tried two;) but we're pretty sure it cannot get any better:) Remote and picturesque hippie beach, charming and competent guide (thank you, Jean-Louis!), awesome caves and cliffs, virtually no people (very different from Lagos), a bit of snorkeling too (goggles provided)! We even had a chance to hold a starfish in our hands:)) The pictures Jean-Louis made turned out great! Pretty much the highlight of our surfing trip to Algarve. Highly recommended!
subcategory_ranking: #26 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from SUP Sagres tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Praia da Rocha Yachthafen Portimao Marine, Portimao 8500-345 Portugal
description: "Leash off!" Welcome to the traditional boat Gageiro! Enjoy a beautiful trip along the stunning Algarvian coastline with its imposing rocks, picturesque bays and sandy beaches! Come and have a wonderfull day with us.
name: Gageiro Sailing Portimao
ranking: #22 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #22 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text:
It's been one of the best experience ever! 
Enjoy the lovely cost of the Algarve. Enjoy the food and a nice glass of wine to the sound of the see! Amazing sun set!! The crew of so much fun and very attractive. Thank you for the wonderful day!
reviews/1/text: Amazing boat, amazing trip, amazing captain, we had a lovely time with Fernando. If you want to book a boat to have a good time at sea or close to the coast, make sure to go for this one.
reviews/2/text: Was an extraordinary experience to go out for the sunset with Jana and Fernando! Beautiful ship, beautiful sunset and nice wine and food! Really good organisation, also with the transfer. Me and my friend really enjoyed the whole trip and would recommend it highly! Got some good information for future trips as well. Thanks you for that amazing view over the ocean!
reviews/3/text: We booked a private tour for 13 family and friends, which included 5 boys. All of us had a great time. Fernando and Jana were wonderful hosts, and made all of us feel welcome. The boys had great fun jumping off the boat into the clear water, and Fernando swam with us into a secret sea cave. Plenty of scrumptious tapas and enough for all of us to drink.  It was a spectacular afternoon, and if we return to this area, we will schedule another trip and take their advice for making it a sunset cruise. It was a very special day.
reviews/4/text: Want to see the magnificent Portuguese coastline from a sea perspective from a traditional Portuguese boat and the best skippers in town? Then you found the right place: Gageiro Sailing Portimão! Fernando and Jana are the owners and hosts during the whole trip. Not overcrowded, enough private place for everyone on board and all the drinks and fingerfood you like are included. It feels like a little private cruise, whilst feeling at home from the first moment. A wonderful experience that will stand out of your holiday adventures. Highly recommended!
reviews/4/title: Most excellent sailing experience in the Algarve!
reviews/5/text:
This is a must do when visiting. Francesco, Jana, and Miguel were welcoming, friendly, funny, and a pure joy. We went on the sunset tour. That part was incredible but we also lucked out and were able to enjoy the full harvest moon rise as soon as the sun went down. The pictures do not do it justice. 
The sail boat was build in 1926 and is in great shape. The portion of the trip with the sail up was sweet. 
Do yourself a favour and book this trip. Don’t think twice about it. You will not be disappointed.
reviews/6/text: Fernando and his team are fantastic. The overall trip led us along the coast, we stopped twice for a swim, great food. More than recommended!
reviews/7/text: Fernando an Jana are incredibly sweet and friendly people, they took great care of me, my family, and the others on board. The first time I went we went up the coast with the engine on and laid anchor at a scenic location to jump from the boat into the refreshing water.  The entire time we were being served beverages and snacks and the crew was there to answer all our questions and enjoyed talking to us. Thanks to ideal weather conditions, we were able to sail all the way back without the aid of the motor, as we snacked on a delicious food platter. I took a long nap on the way home as the kids fished off the back of the boat with Fernando and our skipper, Miguel. It was a lot of fun and I will be back next year! Thank you Fernando and Jana for the amazing time!
reviews/8/text: We as a couple booked a Gageiro sailing trip in Portimao via facebook. Very friendly service, and easy to book. Fernando and Yana are very hospitable and cannot do enough for you to make sure you are comfortable and enjoying the trip. They arrange either a 3 hr trip or 6 hr (includes food). We had a lovely relaxing time and highly recommend this trip
reviews/9/text: Die Segeltour hat uns grossen Spass gemacht, wir hatten ein paar tolle Stunden mit Fernando! Leider war das Wasser etwas kalt, um in die Grotten zu schwimmen, auch die Delfine hatten heute keine rechte Lust, sich zu zeigen...dennoch war es rundum gelungen :-)
reviews/9/title: Schöne Segeltour zum Seele baumeln lassen
reviews/10/text:
Wir hatten eine wunderschöne Segeltour auf dem alten Segelboot vor der beeindruckenden Steilküste von Portimaio mit dem überaus netten Kapitän Fernando.
Es ist ein tolles Erlebnis, das sich niemand entgehen lassen sollte, der in dieser Region seinen Urlaub genießt.Einfach nur schön!
reviews/11/text: Das Beste was ich je erlebt habe!!! Ein wunderschöner Sonnenuntergang, toller Kapitän, super Essen. Würden wir jederzeit wieder buchen. Unser absolutes Urlaubs-Highlight.
reviews/12/text:
Desde o começo até ao final da viagem, Capitão Fernando e o staff , todos simpáticos, cordiais e atenciosos.
Cp Fernando explica tudo muito bem sobre as diversas praias ( e as suas”caves” ) do nosso bonito Algarve. 
É interessante ver as nossas praias noutra perspectiva.
Recomendo.
A repetir para o ano com outros amigos.
Obrigada Fernando.
reviews/13/text: Abseits des Massentourismus auf einem tollen Segelschiff aus dem Jahr 1943 mit wunderbaren Gastgebern entlang der Küste segeln - für uns ein echtes Highlight unseres Urlaubs und absolut weiter zu empfehlen! Vielen Dank an Fernando und Antonio für das schöne Erlebnis und die klare Empfehlung einen Tag auf der Gageiro zu verbringen.
reviews/14/text: Toller Nachmittag/Abend mit gutem Essen, besonderen Weinen und sensationeller Atmosphäre....Fernando ist ein toller Skipper und Gastgeber, der für eine familiäre Stimmung an Bord sorgt....wir machen den Trip bei unserem nächsten Albufeira-Urlaub bestimmt wieder...
reviews/15/text: Magnifique! Tout en simplicité et en modestie pour un voyage hors norme comme l algarve a le secret  ! Fernando sait nous emmener où il faut - dans le secret de ses petites grottes extraordinaires avec sa petite plage de sable fin. N hésitez pas ! Avec un service tout en gentillesse ! Merci à  Fernando et à son équipe
reviews/16/text: Tolles Erlebnis! Von Anfang an willkommen gefühlt auf dem Boot. Sehr netter und freundschaftlicher Umgang. Die tapas an Bord waren außerdem hervorragend !
reviews/16/title: Super Ausflug bei dem man sich sofort willkommen gefühlt hat!!
reviews/17/text:
Wir waren im Rahmen einer Strandhochzeit an der Algarve und wollten noch etwas Abenteuerliches machen. 
Ursprünglich sollte es an einem Dienstag stattfinden musste aber kurzfristig wegen zu starkem Seegang abgesagt werden. Glücklicherweise konnten wir es auf den Sonntag ( unseren letzen Urlaubstag) schieben. 
Was soll ich sagen?! BESSER HÄTTE ES NICHT KOMMEN KÖNNEN!!!

Das Wetter und der Tag waren perfekt!

An Bord waren Fernando mit seinen zwei Crewmitgliedern und uns 18 Passagieren. 
Zu erst ging es motorisiert an eine Badestelle wo wir uns einige Zeit aufgehalten haben. wir durften sogar die bootseigene Musikbox kapern und unsere eigenen Lieder abspielen. Neben ein paar Salti und erfrischenden Getränken haben wir dort noch Tapas zum Abend gegessen. Alles wurde von Fernando frisch am Boot zubereitet und es war sehr lecker. Selbst für Vegetarier konnte was gezaubert werden. 
Anschließend ging es zwischen Felsen und steilen Klippen so nah dran vorbei, dass man sich wie auf der Titanic fühlte 

Danach ging es raus auf hohe See wo auch kurzerhand das Segel gespannt wurde. 
Das war schon ein Highlight für sich da hier alles per Hand gemacht wurde und die Besatzung schon gut ins schwitzen kam. Bei anderen Anbietern ist das wohl schon automatisiert und da fehlt dann einfach diese Action. 

Fernando hat es anhand der See und Wetterdaten so angepasst das wir zum perfekten Zeitpunkt ankamen und den Sonnenuntergang in vollen Zügen genießen konnten!
Das war der SCHÖNSTE Moment den wir (natürlich nach der Strandhochzeit) hatten. 

Zum Schluss sind wir bei Dämmerung wieder in den Hafen eingelaufen und war alle heile wieder an Land. 

Nochmal GROSSEN DANK für das Erlebnis!
Wenn wir wieder da sind kommen wir nochmal!!!
reviews/18/text:
Wir haben mit der Familie (17 Erwachsene) die Sunset Tour gemacht. Das war das Highlight des Urlaubes an der Algarve.
Wir sind erst mit dem Motor an eine schöne Stelle gefahren und konnten dort baden. Dann gab es leckere Tapas (für Vegetarier gibt es extra Platten). Wir wurden während der ganzen Fahrt mit Getränken versorgt! Die Musik Box wurde aufs Deck gestellt und somit war die Atmosphäre perfekt! Nach dem Essen sind wir auf den Atlantik gesegelt und konnten der Sonne beim untergehen zugucken. 
Das Essen, die Getränke waren sehr lecker. Die Stimmung und Fernando waren total entspannt. Die Atmosphäre unbeschreiblich. Ich empfehle die Sunset Tour gerne weiter!
reviews/19/text: Wir haben die 5 Stunden Tour mit 15 Leuten gebucht. Es war eine herausragende Tour, bei der es an nichts gemangelt hat. Super essen, kühles Bier, kühler Wein und schöne Ausblicke. Also ein überaus schönes Erlebnis welches perfekt von Fernando organisiert wurde.
