address: Marina de Lagos, Lagos 8600-780 Portugal
description: RYA sail training school offering all levels of training from Competent Crew to Yacthmaster plus mileage, charter and lots more
name: Rusailing Sail Training Academy - Day Classes
ranking: #27 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #27 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text:
I spent 5 days on Annecy in September 2022. It was an experience week before progressing to Day Skipper qualification.
Very good organisation (thank you Jules!), great boat and expert tuition. Rob is a great teacher - he is very patient and teaches in a way that makes it easy to ask questions. I had good time despite the rainy weather at times as the training was always adjusted to take into account the weather. Definitely planning to come back in 2023!
reviews/1/text:
I took this sailing course with my sister, brother and his girlfriend. We learned everything we need to know about the boat, sailing and how to dock. 

As a bonus you also get to explore the beautiful Algarve coast. 

It was a blast having Rob onboard! He is an amazing instructor, easy going and with a ton of knowledge. Jules is also really nice and easy to communicate with. 

Top class sailing course that we really recommend
reviews/1/title: Top class sailing course in Lagos
reviews/2/text:
Expert organisation and efficiency prior to visit. I was kept informed at all times. 
The course was well run and the coaching was first class. Very professional. 
The boat and equipment were well maintained. 
I look forward to returning in the future to partake in more training.
reviews/3/text:
Fantastic trip!  Did a one week Day Skipper refresh trip with my brother and a coastal skipper candidate. 
I have to say it was excellent!!!
The boat. The food. We didn’t have to shop for or bring anything. All of our requests were catered for! The cabins. The bedding. 
Rob was a first class trainer he has so much experience and a great training style. 
Jules looked after us with home made soup and cake and made sure we had all info we needed for trip. We made lifelong friends with them both. And with Andy who was coastal candidate! Fantastic. 
Will defo go out again with RUSailing. Totally recommend.  Brilliant. Thank you!
reviews/4/text:
I recently completed my Day Skipper course in July 2022.

The tuition we received was not only well paced but expertly drew all the students on the course into learning and understanding thoroughly what is required to Skipper a boat safely and effectively. This enabled us to start working as a team as the week wore on despite varied levels of knowledge, experience and ability amongst us. It was especially interesting how Rob trained us to take all the theory and then apply it practically to plan days effectively but then execute the plan in an easily understood way to communicate to each other exactly what we had to do on any given day. I was particularly grateful for the level of ´hands on´ experience Rob afforded us right from the beginning which, in my opinion, breeds the confidence needed to be a Skipper. He did this very calmly and when we made mistakes he ensured we learned the necessary lesson from the exercise. There are many elements to sailing and I certainly have begun to understand more thoroughly what they are by the time the course ended. A really valuable and excellent experience.
reviews/5/text: We did our day and coastal skipper courses with them - very well maintained yachts, excellent instructors (thank you Gordon), a perfect experience. We strongly recommend them to anyone who is serious about learning sailing. It was a beautiful week :)
reviews/6/text:
A friend and I completed the Competent Course in May. The tuition, the boat and the service were all high class. The experience was everything I hoped it would be and more. Everybody was willing to go the extra mile to make the training a success and an enjoyable experience, particularly Richard our skipper who was hugely knowledgable, patient and a great instructor. The home made soup from Jules was the icing on the cake, eaten at anchor for lunch in the attached photo!

We will be back next year for Day Skipper and plan for some more family members to complete the CC.

Top class service. Thank you.
reviews/6/title: Fantastic Competent Crew course. Highly recommend.
reviews/7/text: Two of us did the RYA competent crew course here in May 22. Communication was great all the way through the booking process, and nothing was too much trouble for Jules and the team. The actual course itself was excellent and pitched just right for us with some sailing experience, but equally a beginner was on the course and he was catered for just as well. The boat was immaculate and setup perfectly. Rusailing have a real passion for sailing its not just about numbers and box ticking - we'll be back to do Day Skipper as soon as possible and will be putting other family member through competent crew course here also.
reviews/8/text:
Did my day skipper with Rusailing. 
Very satisfied with the service from Rusailing. Extremely professional and helpful. Both Gary and Rob were amazing teachers. The boat was fully equipped with everything you can possibly need. The tuition was super professional and well paced to my needs. I was so grateful to have Rob as our instructor as he’s clearly so knowledgeable and so talented at sailing, I felt like I’ve left the course with so many tools to work on at home and to improve on.It was nice that after a full day of sailing and learning, our instructor made an effort to get to know each and every one of us and It was wonderful to be able to sail and stay the night in different ports in Algarve as other schools in Algarve  don’t offer this amount of variety, so with that being said I totally recommend Rusailing if you’re wanting to do your RYA courses because they’re extremely professional and offer more in the long runI definitely will be coming back to Rusailing for my next course! Thanks Rob and Jules you are amazing
reviews/9/text:
We recently completed a one day Diesel Engine training with Rob on our own sailing boat in Lagos marina.

Rob did a very great job linking theory and practice while “customising” the content of the course around our engine and our many questions.

Cannot remember when we felt so satisfied after completing a course!
reviews/10/text:
I would like to sincerely thank RUSailing for the recent Yachtmaster Exam Preparation course, which helped me to pass the exam.  From first email contact months ago to leaving the boat after the exam last week, I was impressed with this school.

Jules' administration leading up to the week was flexible and thorough.  After dates were agreed the money transfers were easy, and the pre-course information was timely and useful.

Rob was my instructor for the tough week of preparation.  Under Rob's instruction and the many challenges he set, I was able to brush up on some rusty theory topics, fine-tune some practical skills and learn some new skills and theory, giving me the confidence to take the examination at the end of the week.  It was a fun week.

SY Annecy (Jeanneau 37) was an ideal boat for this training week.  She is fully equipped and very well presented.  There was more than enough food and drinks 
for lunches and snacks each day.   Annecy also served as comfortable accommodation allowing me to study the boat and her equipment, revise theory topics and practice chartwork long after the training day was finished.

I would certainly recommend RUSailing.com to anyone who is looking for a well-organised sail training program at any level.

Thanks again Rob and Jules.
reviews/10/title: Yachtmaster Exam Preparation Week - Thanks RUSailing
reviews/11/text: Undertook Day Skipper course with Rusailing this September.  Cannot recommend highly enough.  Great boat to learn on (and to stay on), fantastic instruction, and clear, prompt, and informative communications before the course.   Will be back.
reviews/12/text: Experience everything you'd expect from the reviews. Amazing support prior to, during and after the course from Jules. Great boat , great instructor and the extras like being aloud to stay on the boat before and after the course made a huge difference. Lovely area and the whole experience was not just fantastic learning but a fantastic holiday.. hooked..ill be back
reviews/13/text:
We just completed two weeks of training with rusailing (starting as novices and doing the RYA Competent Crew + Day Skipper courses), with instructor Rob on yacht Annecy. We were hugely impressed by the entire experience and would recommend rusailing to anyone with any interest at all in learning to sail (including at more advanced levels though we cannot speak directly to that). All of the five star reviews on this page are thoroughly merited.
- The organisation and advance communication by Jules were top notch and super clear, including not least giving helpful explanations and offering different options in light of the pandemic.
- The food options were delicious and carefully took into account dietary needs.
- The yacht was pristinely maintained and seemed ideal as a training yacht.
- We couldn't have been more impressed by the excellence of Rob's sailing knowledge and teaching (and are confident that he would only choose other instructors of similar quality). It genuinely felt like a privilege to have been able to spend two weeks learning with him. Everything was explained patiently and very clearly, and in multiple different ways, taking into account different learning styles, including demonstrating how it worked in practice to help it stick. No matter how many questions we asked he had detailed answers for everything, and delivered them in a way which built effectively on our growing knowledge base as the courses went on. We really can't say enough about what a brilliant learning experience it was.
- The Algarve is simply beautiful with good northerly winds coming in from the Atlantic (and on low wind days the teaching can be tailored so as to make good use of the time). Lagos Marina is a great home base. The sea swimming is very nice!
- Our tip: we paid a bit extra to have the yacht to the two of us mostly to be "Covid safe", but we thought it was thoroughly worthwhile and would recommend to anyone interested in a more intensive learning experience (plus the benefits of a bit more flexibility).
Rob and Jules are lovely people running a great small business and we were delighted to support them. With any luck we will be back!
reviews/13/title: Don't hesitate - rusailing is the real deal, book now!
reviews/14/text:
All information was clear prior to booking and also in-line with expectations after booking. The school was always responsive to our questions and proactive about getting us prepared and informed prior to arriving to the course. The boat was very well equipped and no material was noted to be missing, it also had adequate provisions and with a much cozy and comfortable atmosphere. The tuition was very complete and well-paced to cover the course syllabus and no problems were encountered during the course

All together a great course with our instructor Richard, a great teacher that is always willing to answer questions, challenges his students in a constructive way and always willing to allow students give something a try while coaching and ensuring safety and some more extras given out by Rob on to perfect fine tuning sails and maximizing wind power.

An overall great experience with a very professional team and school.
reviews/15/text: While attending R U Sailing at the end of July ’21 for Coastal Skipper Practical training I was reminded of days long gone. Those days when the customer was right and a quality product was delivered. Never have I been treated and trained so well.  It’s worth the journey to the winds and tide off sailor city Lagos. Many an added bonus @ RU Sailing to include advice on my own boat maintenance, live theory, camaraderie, how to follow dolphins under sail, clews, custom and courtesy, MOB “no stress” technique, touch trimming, mnemonics, how to safety brief by demo, new knots, and many other secrets, along with! meeting all requirements set out by the RYA syllabus.   Am I Sailing with more confidence? Yes, Thank you RU Sailing, so far and by far the best RYA school.
reviews/16/text: A fantastic week on Annecy . Top class tuition from Rob, excellent organising from Jules and an amazing location. I learnt an incredible amount in such a short space of time, with the highlight of sailing a Force 6 to Sagres and a night sail back. I won't forget it, thanks to RUSailing and hope to see you again.
reviews/16/title: First class Day Skipper practical course
reviews/17/text: Me and two friends sailed with Rob for a week, completing the Competent Crew and Day skipper levels respectively. We had an amazing time--learning, practicing and gaining confidence by the hour!  Rob is extremely patient, clear, and thorough in his teaching and has a great approach to explaining everything in a way that each individual can grasp (everyone is different, after all). Jules handled all the booking and information prior to our trip and made everything very clear so that we could arrive with confidence, knowing what to expect. I would definitely come back to complete more sailing courses when possible! It was super-empowering and I would highly recommend this to women who want to learn how to sail in a safe and friendly sailing school.
reviews/18/text: Just back from a fabulous week sailing, tuition was brilliant, boat and facilities first class. Many thanks to Rob & Jules, already looking forward to my next trip to the Algarve with rusailing!
reviews/19/text: My wife and I just finished a week with Rob on Annecy, day sailing out of Lagos with Rob helping me to be a better sailor. This was really a first rate experience. Firstly the hardware. Annecy is a superbly equipped and maintained yacht. She delivered a safe and comfortable sailing experience at the full range of conditions we experienced. Over all we had great sailing conditions, with the heaviest weather up to perhaps 20+kts. Annecy was very well behaved and generated confidence to the crew in those conditions. Secondly, Rob is an excellent instructor. Patient, thoughtful and full of sailing knowhow and he also can communicate that information in a clear, understandable manner. I was not working on a specific course of instruction, but wanted to have Rob help me be better in areas where I have little experience. Rob and I discussed this prior to our week of sailing and Rob was great with helping me with what I wanted and additionally seeing where I had other gaps in experience and knowledge and helping to fill those gaps. If you are looking for superb instruction on a beautiful, well maintained and configured yacht, you have found the place. I'm looking forward to having another session with Rob and his team this fall.

address: Travessa do Forno 13, Lagos 8600-632 Portugal
animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.
description: We believe that life should be enjoyed. For us, this means being out in the sunshine and water, sharing good food, good wine and good stories, laughing with friends, family, and always being open to new possibilities and adventures. We want to welcome you as guests and friends to the Algarve, to help you discover its natural beauty and local culture, the unique cuisine, hospitality, and history.
name: Volta do Mar
reviews/0/text:
Would recommend to cyclist's of all abilities. 

Ricardo was very friendly and knowledgeable. The ride was not very strenuous which suited me in the Lagos heat.

Had a really good time.
reviews/1/text: My son and I had 2 fantastic half days of climbing, first with Ricardo at Benasfrim then with Andre at Rocha de Peña. All on bolted routes, the guiding and encouragement were first class. The locations were easy to access and during each session we managed around half a dozen climbs, with my last being a 25m 6A. Hugely entertaining and demanding at the same time, grades ranged from 4-7 at the smaller Benasfrim site and 4-8b at Rocha, so plenty for the novice and the experienced. Just do it.
reviews/2/text: Great experience from start to finish. André was amazing and made it a really enjoyable day out, I couldn't recommend them enough.
reviews/3/text: Andre is simply a delightful human being who made both organizing the trip and actually going climbing a fabulous experience. We were a mixed group, and he was attentive to everybody's experience level and goals. My friends and I do guided outdoor experiences frequently, and Andre is one of those rare gems of a guide - knowlegable, funny, safe, flexible, informative, easy-going and organized. Highly recommend and hope to climb with him again.
reviews/4/text: Although this was our first outdoor climbing, Ricardo made us feel at ease. We received great tips and good guidance during the climbs. After the first easier climb we grew a lot more confident and a lot less afraid (I'm not the biggest fan of heights). One of the most memorable activities on our holiday so far! Very satisfying to complete a climb.
reviews/5/text:
We were a bit last minute with booking the climbing session but the team was very flexible. Having direct contact with Andre the climbing instructor in the evening before got everything arranged smoothly. We had the luck we could go to Rocha de Pena which was at our backyard almost. 

Having bouldering experience made it a bit easier for us but still rock climbing is something different. 

They were professional, strict on safety, giving good instruction, having the time to guide you, and above all very friendly guys, funny, and all of that with a big smile. We can highly recommend the team and when we will return we will book with them again. 

Andre and David, thank you, we had a perfect Sunday climbing session with you guys.
reviews/5/title: Perfect Sunday climbing at Rocha de Pena
reviews/6/text: Excellent bike tour around Lagos and to see the cliff views, incredibly friendly and helpful guide (Andrea) and the customer service from Ricardo in organsing the tour beforehand, and giving me other local tips, was exceptional. Highly recommend!
reviews/7/text: Simple one of the best experience I already have in my life. The instructor was very friendly, patient and a real expert in climbing. Even a first try rock climber like me was able to understand everything. If you are thinking about do climbing for first time, this is the place. My instructor was Ricardo, he even give me some tips about good and cheap local restaurants and nice places to go in Lagos region.
reviews/8/text: We did the Chuck Norkeling excursion and it did not disappoint! It was our favorite thing we’ve ever done and the guys were awesome guides! Highly recommend!
reviews/9/text:
We had an amazing climbing half day, would 100% recommend to anyone. The location was awesome, our guide Pedro was amazing; super friendly, helpful, very experienced, a great teacher and really went above and beyond for us. The team even emailed a long list of recommended restaurants and locations around Lagos based on our chat during the day. Thanks again for a brilliant day, for your invaluable lessons and for the great company.

Muito obrigado,

Jackson & Jason
reviews/10/text: Had an amazing day climbing the cliffs in Sagres! This was exactly the kind of experience I was looking for in Portugal. Adventurous, local, great climbing and beautiful location. Best part was how it felt like hanging out with a friend and getting to climb with the local climbing community.
reviews/11/text:
I've done two half day climbing trips with Volta do mar already. One in 2017 and one two weeks ago (July 2020).
In 2017 me and a group of friends from my Hostel did a lovely tour with Pedro and I was so stoked that I convinced my boyfriend, we booked the tour again and I didn't regret it one second. 

This year we met André in Sagres to climb the "kindergarden wall" for climbing beginners. We had the ability to enjoy the view while he prepared everything for us to go down the wall to land on a platform. From there we went up different paths that suited our abilities. We had a lot of fun and had cool challenges with beautiful views from the cliffs over the ocean. 
After the last climb up André collected all ropes and we were allowed to chill and rest :) We had a good conversation and got some insider tipps for restaurants and spots to go. This tour animated me to go climbing at home too and I can't wait to start. 

Your money is very well spent when you book a tour with Volta do Mar! They have different tours depending on how advanced you are, even if you've never been climbing before they can give you a good insight and help you to start.

Pedro as well as André are such sincere Persons and they put so much heart in their tours and their hobbies that you have no other choice than like them as they are :) 
Thank you so much for this great experience and I hope we'll see each other again.
reviews/12/text:
Back in February before the Corona was the international crisis its become,  I inquired about a wine tasting experience day with Volta do Mar. Their guidance ended in me booking the full day experience for myself and husband during a trip in May. The contact and advice given leading to that booking had me excited for the holiday. As the situation expanded I further contacted André voicing my concerns.  I found the advice reassuring and agreed to monitor the progress.  With sadness we had to cancel our holiday earlier this week and once again I contacted André.  With a speedy response  my FULL refund has been organised. 
One of the best points of this experience with Volta do Mar,  every step of the way   via prompt emailing customer consideration has been paramount, expressing relief that we are at least well! 
When we manage to reschedule our holiday   rebooking our wine tasting will be an absolute given! 
Thank you
reviews/13/text:
We did a 4 hour walking tour and we had a great time! ...  Ricardo was friendly, helpful, informative ... don't hesitate to call him !
Penny & Ken
CANADA
reviews/14/text:
I booked a private guided outdoor rock climbing session with Volta do Mar and it was the best experience ever! I wanted to climb the cliffs of Sagres because they looked so beautiful, and was worried I wasn't a strong enough climber.  But after some emails back & forth, the team at Volta do Mar assured me that knew of the perfect area to match my experience. 

Pedro was a wonderful guide, very personable and enthusiastic. As he set things up at the top of the cliff, he explained all the knots and safety systems he was using. The rappel that I had been a little nervous about was actually a blast and not scary at all. Pedro had planned 4 routes for me to climb, they were fun and just challenging enough to make me feel accomplished. The rock is limestone, so be prepared for some sharp edges. After the first 2, he got out some home-made cookies (so yummy!) and fresh orange juice for me to enjoy while he moved the ropes over. For the last route, he belayed me from the top. It was a perfect afternoon of climbing, with the gorgeous views and the peaceful sounds of the waves below.

The entire experience with Volta do Mar was top-notch. They were very responsive to my emails when I was planning my trip, and Pedro picked me up from my lodging in Salema which was very convenient. I can't wait to come back with some of my climbing friends so they can share in this great climbing experience, and hopefully we can also venture out to Rocha da Pena.
reviews/15/text: Had a fully day food and wine tour with Andre on December 23rd. What a brilliant experience, Andre is so passionate about Portugal. It really was a off the beaten track day, we discovered lots of beautiful places, ate the most tasty local food and drank the very best of local wines and spirts. Highly recommended.
reviews/16/text:
We did a sport climbing course with Andre and it was absolutely spot on.

We are travelling with 2 cats in our motorhome and Andre scheduled the course in such a way that he would meet us and we would never be to far away to do a quick check on the cats.

Our first day was at Bensafrim, a small climbing area, but perfect for a first time leading a climb.

Day two was done at Rocha da Pena, a bit higher, longer and more exposed but massively worth it.

He explained and taught everything in a very easy way.

We are still climbing in Rocha da Pena now.

Definitely recommend these guys 5☆
reviews/16/title: Climbing Bensafrim and Rocha da Pena
reviews/17/text: Volta do Mar was fantastically accommodating while we were in Lagos.  Pedro and Arnu specifically made our local bike tour more than memorable.  I can’t wait to come back and do more tours with them.  Pedro's knowledge of Portuguese history inspired me to get a book about it and read it on the way home!  I highly recommend this company while you are in Lagos to experience a very authentic local experience!
reviews/18/text:
We went climbing with ricardo as our guide, and what an amazing guy he is!! Drove us to our destination, packed us water and snacks, what more could you want! Oh yes and then there was the climbing, while standing on ledge 20m above the sea crashing beneath, i had the chance to meet the amazing man that is ricardo. He will make you feel comfortable and give you laughs all for free! Climbing up the rockface, ricardo knows these routes like the back of his hand. 
Cant recommend this guy and his buisness enough! Spoke to others that have done similar trips while being out here and they have wished they did ours, So stop searching and book with these guys!
reviews/19/text:
After being cancelled last minute by my original guide, these guys stepped in last minute to take on my half a day climbing tour in seagres and I was SO happy my other guide cancelled! 

The communication from the beginning was fab, quick responses and lots of help. 
We had Ricardo for our tour guide, we met at his shop, he was helpful in the emails with regards to where to park etc. 

We were then taken to the climbing spot seagres, had great conversation on the way! 

Ricardo was so helpful and patient making sure we were and felt safe, he also brought some amazing snacks and drinks, he was super knowledgable and helped us conquer some really difficult climbs! 

All the equipment was either new or in fab condition. 

We will definatly be booking again.
Fabulous company.
