address: Vilamoura, Quarteira 8125-449 Portugal
description: The concept of YES i DO! Transfers, emerged over a number of years working in the famous holiday resort of Vilamoura. Rodolfo is a driver with over 19 years experience and is punctual, reliable and responsible! He was also a waiter in a famous sport bar on the Vilamoura Marina! As well as being your driver, Rodolfo and his team, is a great source of information on restaurants and nightlife around Vilamoura Resort!
name: YES i DO! Transfers
photo/caption: Our Vito 9 seats and Viano 8 seats
reviews/0/text:
Great bunch of guys who are real professionals. Fluent in English too & very familiar with the area. Cars are always clean, always on time & very courteous. The chief organised a day trip for us which covered most of the famous landmarks. He also booked us some restaurants with quality food. 
I’ve saved the number for future use. Highly recommend them.
reviews/1/text:
I personally highly recommend these guys. What we like about their service is Always on time no matter what time is it. 
Recently our stays in Vilamoura, Portugal and  these guys are by far the best one can get in vilamoura.Seriya,the owner always comes on time and takes us to our destination on time. We loved our day trip around Vilamoura side seeing and the owner book best restaurant for us to eat out in the night and day time,the owner and rest of the drivers are very professionals. Really comfortable and reliable service.
reviews/2/text: We found this company by accident at the supermarket and used them everyday during our 10 stay at Vilamoura. They are always on time, friendly , helpful and speak great English. If ever I needed a taxi, day or night, I would WhatsApp Rodolfo the owner and he would reply instantly. The company went out of their way to accommodate us and provide us with transport. Furthermore, they always had baby seats ready to go which was useful for us as we had 3 children aged 3. When we come back, we will definitely use Rodolfo and his drivers again.
reviews/2/title: Reliable, friendly and always on time!
reviews/3/text:
These are the consummate professionals, perfect service on several journeys. 
We will use every time.
reviews/4/text: Absolutely brilliant service from Rodolfo and his staff, very professional and friendly, would highly recommend contacting them if you are travelling to Portugal and need a friendly and reasonably priced transfer
reviews/5/text: Very good service and confortable transports, Rudolfo is a very professional and friendly person, 5 star recommended
reviews/5/title: The best transfer in the algarve
reviews/6/text:
Thanks Rodolfo and hes team for super service, we had a great time in Vilamoura and we are so happy with their company. Always friendly, on time and good price. Absolutly recommended!! Untill next time!
Wich you the best!
Mr. Romero
reviews/6/title: Best transfer in Algarve, Vilamoura area
reviews/7/text:
Came across this company on trip advisor and so happy we did. They took 11 of us in 2 big vehicles all over the area during our ten day holiday in Quarteira. I used what’s app to communicate and they were very quick to respond to us. They were all amazing vehicles, drivers very professional and dressed very smart. Fully air conditioned. 
100% reliable. Would absolutely recommend to anyone. Good prices fast professional service what more can I say x
reviews/8/text: Rodolfo was a pleasure dealing with! He was always punctual and replied very quickly. He seems to go the extra mile in making sure everything is made easy for you and your travels. We went to Rolling Loud the music festival where he was picking us up at 2am in the morning. Not being too familiar with the area, he sent us pinned location of which we was able to walk to in order to meet him at the exact spot. Him and his team are great and really nice people. I will be using him again in the future and will recommend the company to anyone that comes to visit!
reviews/9/text: Rudy and his drivers were excellent, always on time and very friendly. Do our airport transfers and several trips to the Marina and back. Would highly recommend and will use again. Taxi’s were very clean and drivers always asked if the temperature was okay.
reviews/10/text: We first met Rodolfo 3 years ago when he picked us up from a golf course when our our own transfer company had let us down. Having kept his business card, I contacted him for a quote for airport transfers along with transfers to and from 5 golf courses during our stay. His response was immediate and his quote very competitive. Throughout our weeks stay either Rodolfo or Joel were on time for every pick up and always extremely courteous and friendly. The vehicles which are Mercedes are very comfortable and always extremely clean. I would highly recommend using YES i DO! Transfers  if in the Vilamoura area.
reviews/11/text:
Rodolfo & Joel were very reliable, very friendly & reasonable rate. Highly recommend them both 
Elaine Donnelly
reviews/12/text: Rodolfo is a very friendly guy who was extremely helpful and very flexible with our transfers to and from the airport and golf courses. He will definitely be my first choice when I next visit this area.
reviews/12/title: Excellent service from a very friendly guy
reviews/13/text: Very reliable, professional transfer service. Rodolfo was welcoming and friendly. I travelled  on my own so felt safe and the journey was smooth. The vehicle was spotless. Hand sanitizer available. Will definitely use again and highly recommend to all you holiday makers visiting Portugal. Thank you so much  10/10
reviews/14/text:
Rodolfo was very prompt in responding to all my queries when I was booking an airport transfer from Faro Airport.

Our flight landed early and we were concerned that we had to wait for our transfer, but Rodolfo had used his initiative and checked the flight arrival times and was there to greet us at the arrival gate.

Rodolfo was smartly dressed and very polite.  His vehicle was a big Mercedes Vito people carrier which was immaculate and was air conditioned and very comfortable for the 4 of us plus 4 suitcases.  During the 20min journey from the airport to the hotel, Rodolfo chatted to us and was very informative of the local area.

During our stay, we were able to communicate with Rodolfo via Whatsapp, I thought this was a great idea, as it felt like having a personal chauffer services on call.  Rodolfo was never longer than 30mins to come and pick us up during peak times and when he was busy he sent one of his team in an equally similar standard vehicle.  Otherwise he was there in 5 mins. But he always communicated well.
Another good little trick Rodolfo used was the Whatsapp locator to locate exactly where we were for pick up, when we had been at the beach or at a shopping centre.

Prices for the airport transfer were very reasonable, at 35 Euro each way and also to and from the beach and marina from our hotel for 6 Euro each way.  Although there were companies out there that may have been slightly cheaper, Rodolfo was always reliable and very efficient and always responded almost immediately.

A great service and would definitely recommend and use again when visiting Faro next.
reviews/14/title: Great, Efficient & Honest Service at Great Prices.
reviews/15/text: I can’t thank Rudi & his team enough for his hospitality whilst we’ve been on holiday in Portugal. The service & customer support has been fantastic he really has made a massive difference to our trip away, and a pleasure to travel with. I would highly recommend his service whilst you’re away, airport transfers, trips to waterparks or even just to nip to the supermarket - Rudi & his team are always on hand to support your needs. Rudi we’ll see you when we’re back next year. Thanks Louise
reviews/16/text: Superb service throughout our stay can’t recommend highly enough and will be 100% be using when we return! Thanks Rudy
reviews/17/text: fast service, very good quality and correct price, friendly and kindly, we highly recommend this company
reviews/18/text: Rudolfo and team were amazing for the 3 weeks we were in the Algarve.  He is a genuine nice guy and was always punctual, professional, reliable and friendly (and very well dressed).  He made our holiday extra special with his great service and was very patient with us changing times etc.  Would recommend YES I DO TRANSFERS to anyone traveling to Vilamoura and will be using him next time for sure.  10 out of 10 Rodo x
reviews/19/text:
During our staying in Vilamoura we had a remote villa and we used Rudi on an evening. What a taxi service this is! 
A luxury  and comfortable cab with little perks like chilled water and mints. ( with hand santiser ofcourse!). 
This service is Child friendly with a range of car seats and boosters available if needed. Contactable on whatsapp to confirm and arrange times for pick ups. We are currently back in praia de salema and we found this taxi service so exceptional, friendly and reliable that we booked for an airport transfer with Yes I do rather than using anyone else. Rudi was Stood waiting with a name sign  at cafe Central at the airport for  a very prompt transfer with lots of room for luggage. I don't travel lightly either.lol. He drives like a professional too without you feeling like he is rushing to the next job. 
 I have to say he is always impeccably dressed too! 
The kids (6 and 13) think Rudi is great too. He  is so friendly and youngest is shy, the journeys are amazingly laid back  with chilled music and when asked Rudi will recommend places to go and will even give  a mini portugese lesson if you ask! 
Outstanding service beyond words.
reviews/19/title: Friendly and luxurious travel with outstanding service. Child friendly too!

address: Sector D Lote 65 Vale da Telha, Aljezur 8760-156 Portugal
animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.
name: Adventure Riding
photo/caption: Riding the cliffs above the Algarve coastline.
reviews/0/text: One of our most beautiful moments in Portugal! Yvonne is an energetic and caring person who knows how to make the people around her feel confident. The comments had made me want to take a ride with her and her horses, and they are true! We can feel Yvonne's love and gentleness towards her animals, including her horses. We can clearly see that the horses are well in their heads and in their skin, which makes the ride all the more pleasant and relaxing! Another big bonus point for Yvonne is that she instructs the riders on how to communicate with her horse: it is the rider's job to adapt to the horse, not the other way around. We rode on the Cliff Top, where the landscapes are breathtaking. A big thank you to Yvonne for allowing us to have such a good time, we will definitely come back during our next stay in Portugal!
reviews/0/title: One of our most beautiful moments in Portugal!
reviews/1/text: Yvonne led a Cliff Top trail ride for three family members last week and it was one of the most memorable highlights of our two week visit to Portugal.  She expertly managed three different levels of riding ability and ensured it was fun for all.  The horses were happy and responsive and the views from the cliff were spectacular!  Highly recommend Yvonne and her horses.
reviews/2/text: Well trained, relaxed and HEALTHY Horses!! Beautyful surrounding and an unforgettable expierence. First I did a partial Ride with my not experienced boyfriend.. next day i did the beach Ride. Both were fantastic. I will come back :)
reviews/2/title: Well trained, relaxed and HEALTHY Horses!!
reviews/3/text: This was the best riding-experience i ever had! The horses was so amazing, safe and energetic. Fantastic wives and surroundings and a lot of fun at the beach. Will definitely come here again when i visit Portugal.
reviews/4/text:
My wife felt that her cliff ride with Adventure Riding was a superb experience. The terrain was challenging without being terrifying, and the views of the ocean were beautiful.
Beach rides are available but completely dependent upon the tide, so if one wants to do that, advanced planning is necessary.
reviews/5/text: We went on the sunset tour and it was so much fun and the natural park is also beautiful. Highly recommended
reviews/6/text: Excellent experience! Yvonne takes you to a nice ride with the well-being of the horses at heart and a lot of joy! Also, she can adapt to both experienced and beginner rider. Thank you!
reviews/6/title: Excellent experience pour découvrir un morceau d'Algarve
reviews/7/text: If you only do one activity on your trip to Aljezur, make it this one. The horses here are healthy, happy and very relaxed. Most of them were once-upon-a-time rescued and have blossomed into great riding horses with kindness and excellent training. All the rides are tailored to the experience of the participants - beginners are fully catered for and would be comfortable but even the most experienced rider will be challenged with lots of galloping and exciting terrain. The countryside is second to none. On my two hour ride yesterday we scrambled down a trail to gallop around a reservoir and through the dunes and we saw the sunset from the breathtaking cliffs. Can’t recommend highly enough.
reviews/7/title: Wonderful ride on healthy, happy horses through possibly the most beautiful countryside in the world.
reviews/8/text: We were visiting from California with our two children, both horse lovers and with some limited riding experience.  Yvonne was very thorough and thoughtful as she chose the right horse and prepared us for a safe, very enjoyable 90 minute ride.  The horses are well looked after and trained very well by Yvonne.  The trail provided a mix of forest and the most spectacular views of the Atlantic Ocean.  We highly recommend organizing your horse riding adventure with Yvonne and her “front yard horses “!!
reviews/8/title: Explore the natural park coast trail by horse!
reviews/9/text:
One of the adventures you will carry your in your heart for a lifetime. Exploring nature, together with horses that are enjoying the ride with you, while you hear the waves  breaking down there at a wild coastline is breathtaking. 
The view you get on the Portugal coastline from the saddle is purely astonishing. 

Yvonne is a wonderful wild woman with a deep passion for horses, nature, wildlife and human connections. 

Thank you for this incredible experience!
reviews/10/text: We scheduled a ride with Yvonne for me and my daughter (age 10), neither of us have any experience with horses.  We got great instruction, felt safe the whole ride, saw amazing views, Yvonne was very patient and she clearly loves her animals.  Also she was wonderful to talk to during the ride.  We ended up scheduling another session for the following day.  Such a delightful time, the highlight of our daughter’s trip in Portugal!
reviews/10/title: So nice, we did it twice!
reviews/11/text: This has really been the most amazing and beautiful trail ride that I have ever been on! And it was even possible for my boyfriend, who has never been on a horse, to tag along. KP was really a dream to ride, really well behaved and made me feel on top of the world when we could go ahead for a nice gallop. I would love to come back one day.
reviews/12/text:
It was an amazing ride ! The views  were amazing and El Niño was fantastic ! I even realised a child dream... 
Yvonne is a great person who really cares about her horses and people. 

Thank you so much for everything !
reviews/13/text: Adventure Riding is the perfect location for riders who want to have an amazing experience! Yvonne is really sweet and great with her horses. All the different trails are beautiful and worth it. I would definitely recommend it!
reviews/14/text: The sunset horse ride has been the highlight of our trip in Portugal! We opted for the “Partial Ride” since it was my very first time on a horse, while my girlfriend is a more experienced rider. Yvonne is an amazing guide: funny, kind and witty. She taught me the basics and also how to trot, while my girlfriend could still enjoy a little bit of free galloping by herself. Isabel and Dunia (our horses) were really relaxed and easy to ride. And well, the views were just breathtaking! We started at 6.30pm which was just the perfect time to witness a peaceful sunset from the cliffs nearby the ocean. Highly, highly recommended!
reviews/14/title: The highlight of our trip in Portugal!
reviews/15/text:
Yvonne was very welcoming, accessible and really made the tour feel like a tour among friends.
The tour was really beautiful and even though I know the Aljezur area, Yvonne really has shown a different perspective. The sunset was spectacular. 
The teens were delighted by the tour, and the horses were really docile and easy to interact with.
To be repeated for sure!!!
reviews/16/text: It was one of the best riding experiences of my life! Ivon is wonderful and her deep love and passion for horses is immediately perceived. Even though my boyfriend and I hadn't been horseback riding for a few years, Ivon promptly gave us quick instructions as we strolled and then went on amazing gallops with stunning views. I absolutely recommend it to anyone who wants to have an experience of any kind on the back of a horse. I really hope there will be another chance to come to this wonderful place in the future!
reviews/17/text: I went for a ride in the morning with Yvonne and I can tell you it’s called adventure riding for a reason! As an experienced rider you’ll definitely have the time of your life (but I’m sure less experienced riders will also enjoy a calmer ride). Galloping at full-speed on the beach and along the coast overlooking the cliffs and beach is something I will never forget!
reviews/18/text: This horse riding is wonderful, not only due to the beautiful location, but also for the lovely and very well treated horses. Yvonne speaks English and Portuguese fluently and she's a wonderful guide both for beginners and advanced riders. She is also very pleasant to be around and her passion for horses is clear in the way she speaks and in her detailed explanations. This is definitely something you must do when you visit Arrifana. It is a great way to support the local community and the animals!
reviews/18/title: Must do in Arrifana: beautiful scenery, wonderful experience
reviews/19/text:
Yvonne was amazing at guiding us through beautiful nature and teaching me new riding techniques. I was quite unsure about riding as I don't have much experience, but she put me at ease and I had an amazing time.
I would definitely go on another riding tour with Adventure Riding!
tags/animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Adventure Riding tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Rua Poeta Antonio Aleixo N0 13 Montenegro, Faro 8005-173 Portugal
description: Our experienced professional staff and our diversified new fleet will ensure a quality and personalized assistance to our customers. Our main depot is located near Faro Airport, but we also provide our services all over the Algarve and Lisbon Airport. All the cars are delivered with a welcome pack. Assistance 24/7 ensures our client´s peace of mind.
name: Nice Rent
photo/caption: Nice Rent  Rent a Car Faro, Algarve
reviews/0/text: The best car rental experience we have ever had. Alex was already waiting for us in the arrivals hall with my name on a paper. He was very nice and helpful. The car was parked right in front of the exit. The paperwork was done quickly and we were on our way within 10 minutes of leaving the plane. The drop-off was also seamless and comfortable, right in the passenger drop-off area. If you are tired of the bored and unwilling staff of big rental companies, always look for local customer-friendly rentals with fair prices like Nice Rent Faro. The car was like new, clean, and in perfect condition. It also looked good - we got a sport packet version with nice wheels and seats (in the cheapest category). I appreciate onboard e-toll system so you can use the motorway anytime you need and the fee is charged later from your card. We'll definitely use Nice Rent services anytime we come back later to visit Algarve.
reviews/1/text: From start to finish the experience with Nice Rent was amazing. It is the best car hire company we have ever used. Very easy going & you are not constantly looking over your shoulder because you may be scammed like with the bigger uncaring companies. Anytime we are in Portugal we will be using Nice Rent.
reviews/2/text: Best car rental experience ever. Exceptional service - personable and responsive. Graciously accommodated our flight cancellation. Ines, the owner’s daughter met us at the train station instead of the airport. Greeted us with a big smile and warm welcome. The car was like new. No hassle pick up and return. Nice Rent is an industry model. Highly recommend.
reviews/3/text: I can't recommend Nice Rent, Faro enough. Lovely friendly people. I was met at the airport and the car was right there ready and waiting. I was on my way within 10 minutes after a few formalities. Likewise returning the car. I was met at the airport passenger drop off and handed over the car. It was as simple as that.
reviews/4/text:
Best car rental company I have ever used on my holidays. 
Representative met up on arrival hall at Faro airport with my name on a sign. 
We went out to the car and arranged paperwork and payment, got key and that was it. 
The car was as expected. 
Departure even easier. 
The representative met us at the departure car park and I handed over the key. 
I highly recommend using Nice Rent :-)
reviews/5/text: Best car rental experience, no issues, Rui the owner provides a professional and personable service, vehicles are modern and clean. Meet inside arrivals hall. Complete paperwork pay rental pick up car parked literally outside. Return is as simple as collection. I rented 2 cars both perfect thanks for making things simple. Great service I recommend this company 100%
reviews/6/text:
I chose Nice Rental because of the reviews I read on Trip Advisor and was not disappointed. Rui Gomes, the owner, answered my initial email and all correspondences following were answered promptly.
As planned, we were met at the Faro airport. Their employee miraculously helped us squeeze our bags into our well chosen car.  He went above the call of duty.
Our Arona wagon was perfect for five us taking day trips throughout the Algarve. 
I highly recommend using Nice Rental.
reviews/7/text: Great car.  Great service.   Very helpful communications.  Easily accessible.  Rui, the owner, met us at the train station with our car.  Inēs was very helpful with our questions.  Great pricing, too.  Use them for your rental in the Faro area, and you will be pleased.
reviews/8/text: I found Rui Gomes, and his company Nice, on Tripadvisor, and am so glad I did, He has given us the best service I have had in 30 years of going to Portugal. I began by telephoning him. I then sent passport and driver’s license details. He met us at the airport, I signed a form, he then led us to the car outside. When we returned a week later, we rang him to say when we were arriving at Departures, and he was there to meet us and take the car away. He speaks English, and has 85 cars. I can't recommend him highly enough.
reviews/8/title: Unusually positive experience with a Portuguese car hire company
reviews/9/text:
We have been customers of Nice Rent for a number of years now, and the experience has been ‘top notch’. Rui and Mrs Gomes provide a first class, flexible, and tailored car rental service - which is a pleasant alternative to the corporate multinationals.

Rui delivers the car to the airport and meets us outside arrivals - no queueing or waiting, and the paperwork is simple and easy to understand. The process is reversed  on departure, no hassle.

Each time we want a car we simply email from the uk and receive a quote by return. Also hassle free. Rui snd his team are a pleasure to deal with.
reviews/10/text:
I was extremely happy with Nice Rent for my car rental from Faro airport this Summer. I booked the car directly through the official website and had few mail exchanges with Rui the owner before my arrival.

The car was extremely clean, pretty new and suited well my needs. Pick-up and return was stressless and the exchanges were straight forward. No hidden costs, everything was clear.

So if you prefer like me to use the services of a local agency rather than large internation (impersonal) providers, do not hesitate to contact Nice Rent in Faro.

A great experience and 100% recommended.
reviews/11/text: Best car hire experience ever. We were met at arrivals, our car was outstide the airport door, we were on our way in 5 mins. Our car was a Ford Focus estate, perfect for 4 adults for 2 weeks (including our 4 x 20kg suitcases). Return was just as easy with dropoff outside departures door. Rui and team do a great job and I highly recommend Nice Rent.
reviews/12/text: I’ve hired cars from Faro many times over the last 20 yrs. In that time I’ve experienced long queue with the big suppliers, difficult to find budget suppliers and cowboys. This company are faultless. I was met at arrivals on time, shown to my car, all the paperwork was already sorted and left five minutes later. Drop off was equally simple. I rang twenty minutes before arrival and was met by the owner. No forensic examination of the vehicle just a friendly handover. If you want a friendly stress free experience to start and end your holiday go with these guys. I can’t fault them.
reviews/13/text:
It was the best car rental experience I've ever had.
I actually got to rent a car from Rui due to all the good reviews he had, and late planning that didn't leave me with many options, else I'd have been skeptical, but I am very happy I did choose him.
The entire experience was great.
Communication went smoothly, and Rui was very accommodating to my schedule and needs and offered to pick me up and drop me off at convenient locations.
The price was also really good and fair, with no hidden costs and no trials of convincing me to buy any extra insurance and such.
I'd definitely recommend him!
reviews/14/text: Great price and great service. The price was all inclusive with insurance. Car was delivered at the airport in person despite late arrival around midnight. We also got stuck with the car and received help from Rui from Nice Rent immediately. Rui from Nice Rent went above and beyond to help us. Definitively recommended.
reviews/15/text:
Great experience from start to finish despite being a 'bad' customer and not informing Rui that my flight had been rescheduled. 
Rui and the rest of the team were very easy to deal with and we couldn't be happier with the service we received. Highly reccommended.
reviews/16/text: It was our first time using Nice Rent for our rental car in the Algarve and we would certainly use them again. Pick up and drop off was very straightforward and hassle free. The car was great and no hidden costs.
reviews/17/text:
We were delighted that on exiting the arrivals area, we were met by Rui Gomes who took us straight to our car. After a very slick handover we were on our way. 
On returning 3 weeks later, we were met again by Rui at the departures parking. Once again, very quickly completed and directed towards our checking area. 
Lovely people, great car and rates, and best of all a personal service second to none. 
Thanks for making it so simple. 
Will definitely be using Nicerent again.
reviews/18/text: Rui met us at the airport, where he walked us the whole minute to where the hired car was. The drop off was just as easy and efficient. The whole experience was stress free - would highly recommend.
reviews/19/text:
Fantastic!
good and fast service at the aeroport, nice and clean car, no hidden costs, very friendly.  Highly to recommend !   thanks Mr Rui Gomes
reviews/19/title: The best I had for many years

address: Faro 8500-313 Portugal
description: Family run company specialising in Airport transfers through out the Algarve and Portugal. Covering the whole of the Algarve from Faro airport and Lisbon to Algarve or Seville and vice versa. All drivers are fluent in English and offer a private, direct and professional service.
name: Algarve 365
reviews/0/text:
We have just used Algarve 365 for our transfers between Faro airport and Alvor.
My initial enquiries were dealt with very quickly and the quote was very reasonable.
The mini bus was really comfortable with lots of luggage space. Rodrigo our driver was punctual, friendly and professional and we felt very safe being driven by him.
I have already recommended the company to others and will continue to do so. We will definitely use Algarve 365 next time we visit The Algarve.
reviews/1/text: We are just back from Alvor and used Algarve 365 for our transfers  both to and from Faro airport.  Rodrigo was our driver and was very courteous and friendly and didn't miss the journey (approx 1hour).  We were collected exactly at the time appointed for both journeys.  I will definitely use this company in the future.
reviews/2/text: We used this service for our week long trip to the Algarve. We had Carlos and Rodrigo - they were both absolutely amazing. They made it a very personal experience and I couldn’t recommend them highly enough.
reviews/3/text: We have used Algarve 365 several times and always had excellent service. Carlos who was our driver this holiday was exceptionally nice. So friendly and helpful and couldn't do enough to help us. My Covid result didn't come through so had to change pickup time late the night before so I could test at the airport. He even messaged me later in the day to check everything had gone ok.
reviews/4/text: First rate service from our driver Carlos, really great personable guy as well as being professional. Highly recommended
reviews/5/text:
Algarve 365 got recommended to us by the owner of our AirBnb during our out travels through Portugal. After our first ride with Algarve 365, we appreciated the customer service so much that we travelled with them the whole journey. The trips felt like a personal tour guide was with us. Great local stories and very nice drivers. 

Shoutout Carlos
reviews/6/text:
Algarve 365 had been recommend to us by friends who have been visiting Portugal for the last number of years. I would have been willing to give a 5 star review for the quality of the service in general and especially after the experience we had.

At 9PM last Friday evening, we had a family emergency and needed to reschedule our flights to fly home the next day. William could not have been more helpful in reorganising our transfer back to the airport with less then 24 hours notice and on the busiest travel day of the week. Even when Algrave 365 had no drivers available for one of the Ryanair flights, he managed to secure another driver who could bring us.

In the end we could not reschedule our flights due to zero availability from Ryanair, however that does not take aware from the tremendous help and service from William in a time of need.
reviews/7/text: We have used Algarve 365 for ten years. The service has always been amazing. Carlos picked us up and he was very kind and welcoming and every part of the service was still as we had hoped. He could not have done more for us and it was a great start to our holiday.
reviews/8/text: Excellent service from Algarve 365 once again.  Collected us from airport right on time and drove us to our first stop in Alvor.  A week later, again on time, we were collected  from Alvor to our hotel in Vilamoura and then lastly, our trip from Vilamoura to the airport.  Arrangements and timing were spot on.  Will definitely use them again next time we are in Portugal.
reviews/9/text: We always go straight to 365 and the team for any sort of group transport! Very friendly, clean, always on time and just an all round excellent service!
reviews/10/text: Great for kids, car seats for all our young children and plenty room for all the luggage. They were on time and got us to our property in the central Algarve comfortably and easily.
reviews/11/text:
You will not find a better, more professional service that the Algarve 365 experience. Always prompt, always courteous and helpful on every trip.  
We have used many times and would not think of turning anywhere else.
reviews/12/text: Very reliable excellent transfers, as well as airport transfers we had mid holiday transfer nothing too much trouble friendly family service booked again for this year
reviews/13/text: Thoroughly recommend the team at Algarve 365, friendly, reliable, safe & clean vehicles and very competitive prices.
reviews/14/text: Super reliable and friendly service! I have been getting lifts to and from the airport for the last 10 years, never late and always smiling .
reviews/15/text: We travelled in November 2020 Excellent service and 100% covid rules followed ,total professional and friendly service ,thank you William .Obviously will be contacting you on our return to My Happy Place ✈️
reviews/16/text: Fantastic service  very friendly helpful driver, reliable and good price wouldn't hesitate to recommend them.
reviews/17/text: We booked 365 for our family and friends returning to the airport. When booking they were friendly and helpful. They arrived on time and the driver was polite and very helpful to our friends and guests. Will definitely use them in future as price was extremely good too. All in all a great service.
reviews/18/text: Can't recommend this company enough, sorry I'm a little late as we visited Alvor in August, the service was excellent, informative and very friendly, absolutely perfect took all the worry out of getting to the accommodation and then back to the airport will definitely be booking again soon as we arrange our next holiday, thank you Donna.
reviews/19/text: Donna was really friendly and professional and great to email both before we went to Portugal and during our stay. Nice clean vehicles, punctual service but best of all staff were super friendly, chatty and helpful re luggage, kids etc. Darren drove us to the airport to return home he was also fantastic - we didn't miss the hours journey with his lovely conversation and cheerful personality. I would highly recommend them.

address: Olhao 8700-579 Portugal
animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.
description: Guided walking trails in the hills and natural surrounding area of Olhao. These half -day (3- hour) nature trails are conducted in the areas of Cerro da Cabeca, Cerro de San Miguel or the Natural Park of Ria Formosa. All highly interactive trips include full description and explanation of the geology, fauna, flora and the cultural heritage by using field guide books as well as optical equipment.
name: PerNatur - Nature Trails
reviews/0/text: Luis was a knowledgeable and passionate guide. We had a great time and appreciated his attention to detail and interesting facts that he shared.
reviews/1/text: I went on a flora walk with Luis in the Fuseta area and in the hills behind Moncarapacho. We visited three very different sites, each with a different type of flora, and although I am familiar with some of the flowers Luis is hugely knowledgeable and showed me many different varieties in our four hour trip. I wanted to know the botanical names of the plants but I think the walk would be interesting even if you didn’t want that. Luis is an expert and very pleasant guide, and was generous with his time.
reviews/1/title: Flora walk in the Ria Formosa and behind Moncarapacho.
reviews/2/text: Luis is a very experienced guide, who knows where to find all the incredible species around here. I had a great time with him and we saw more than 40 species in half a day. And he can explain the whole special local ecosystem. Not only birds ;-)
reviews/3/text: Had a lovely day with Luis. He is very knowledgeable about the birds and plant life of Portugal. Friendly and helpful throughout, a really pleasant experience.
reviews/4/text: I learned so much from Luis on the cork tree walk. Not only was it a very lovely hike in the area north of Olhao, but it was extremely educational. Luis shared his knowledge of the flora and fauna of the area and the cork industry.  It was a very enjoyable day.
reviews/5/text: The land walk I took with Luís of PerNatura was a major highlight of my week-long visit to the area. I was interested in not only observing and enjoying the natural world of the cork forests area, but also understanding the geology, ecology, and agricultural life there. That's a tall order as a tourist. Per Natural provides both passion and expert knowledge in all of these areas. Plus, Luís communicates so clearly and amiably with his guests as well as everyone else along the path. We met in Faro, and as soon as we began to drive inland towards the cork forests I was learning about the types of rocks and vegetation around us. He loaned me binoculars and was tuned into all of the signs of wildlife around us, so I managed to see a variety of different birds that are specific to the region. We walked at a gentle pace on dirt roads through a rural area and stopped every now and then so that Luís could share various aspects of the history, plant life, and modern day issues related to cork trees. I even learned about how the human population and culture is changing as we explored the abandoned and very beautiful buildings of an old church compound. I truly cannot speak highly enough about this tour, and am so grateful I got to participate.
reviews/5/title: Best Ecological Tour of the Region
reviews/6/text: A very enjoyable half day in the hills north of Olhao. Luis was great company and had so much knowledge to share about the area.
reviews/6/title: Cork tree forest tour and so much more…
reviews/7/text: We just spent a wonderful afternoon with Luis Goncalves from PurNatur exploring the bird and other wildlife of Rio Formosa. We learned so much and saw more than 30 types of birds most of which were new to us. Luis provided context and history of the region and was a wealth of knowledge about the flora and fauna of the area. It was a pleasure!
reviews/7/title: Encountering the birds of Rio Formosa
reviews/8/text: Luis is an excellent host of his birdwatching tour of the Ria Formosa. Luis is very knowledgeable and enthusiastic about the bird life of the Ria Formosa. The tour was focused on bird life but Luis also provided plenty of information on the entire ecosystem of the Ria Formosa natural area. The Ria Formosa is a beautiful area to visit and it was made better by  Luis’s tour and abundant knowledge of the wildlife. I highly recommend Luis’s birdwatching walk of the Ria Formosa. Binoculars are provided for each person in the group and Luis brings along a spotting scope for all to use that provides really close up views of the birds and other wildlife.
reviews/8/title: The Ria Formosa birdwatching your is excellent
reviews/9/text: I thoroughly enjoyed the afternoon hike with Luis, a real gentle man so knowledgeable about the flora and also the fauna. It was the absolute best way to spend an afternoon in the Algarve. Luis even picked us up and dropped us off at our small hotel in Faro. I highly recommend an afternoon with friends in his company
reviews/10/text: Luis gave us a wonderful guided hike on the Cerro de Sao Miguel route.  He was friendly, helpful and very informative about the flora and fauna of the area. I highly recommend this tour.
reviews/11/text:
Luis is an excellent guide and a real expert in his field.
He collected us at our place in Olhao.
His extensive  explanations were like an endless encyclopedia about local nature.
Good value for money for a over 3h walk.
reviews/12/text: Simply a wonderful experience with Luis. We were gently led through his incredible store of knowledge of fauna, flora and history, especially of this area. He is a native son and it lives through him and his enthusiasm. Beautiful place and spectacular views thrown in. Change sthe way you see the Algarve. Very highly recommended.
reviews/12/title: The most wonderful and informative walk through nature
reviews/13/text: With Louis we did the trip to Serra do Caldeirão. He collected us from the location where I stayed and took us to this wonderfull landscape, telling lots of stories about the surroundings, the history, the people and espessially about the corktrees. Very interesting. This guide has lots of knowledge, but most of all a great love for nature. Apart from that he was caring for the people in the group and included a lovely lunch. Definitely recommended.
reviews/14/text:
Don’t miss this!
Absolutely one of the best tours I’ve ever been on. 
Luis is a guide extraordinaire, picking me up punctually in his air conditioned van and off we went to the cork forest with a quick stop to view olive, almond and carob trees. 
His knowlege of cork, the cork forest, harvesting the cork and much more was endlessly fascinating. 
Luis speaks excellent English, is respectful, and listens closely, answering my many questions. 
At the end of the forest tour, we wandered through an almost abandoned village, I learned much about the history and culture of the area. Obrigada Luis!
reviews/15/text: What an amazing day!! Luis picked me up at my Airbnb and we had one other lady on the tour. Th small group made it nice for chatting about the trip to see the cork forest. Luis was so knowledgeable and you could feel his love for the area and his knowledge of the cork wood was amazing. He discussed the flora, the fauna and the cork industry so easily. Thank you so much for a spectacular day.
reviews/16/text: What a wonderful early morning experience, birding in the Ria Formosa area with Luis. He is a knowlegabe and very personable man. His English is excellent and his observations are backed up with reference to his well thumbed bird book. He also pointed out the flora and fauna which is indigenous to the salt pans area. The equipment he provided was top notch. We will be back, corking next time.
reviews/16/title: Birding with Luis - an amazing experience
reviews/17/text:
Out of all the activities in Olhao, I would say this is one of the best. I have not learned so much, in a way that's stayed in my head, than on this walk. A beautiful landscape is enjoyed best with someone with a deep knowleledge, connection, and love for the place.
You MUST go!
reviews/18/text:
When I told a friend I’m going bird watching, he told me I’m an old white man (I’m not). What I can say now is that bird watching is great and is for everyone! Luis is wonderful and very knowledgeable not only about birds but all things nature. I’ve seen flamingos, hoopoes, spoonbills, waders, avocets, black-headed weavers and countless others and learnt amazing facts about nature. Also, did you know there are chameleons in Ria Formosa? 
Luis picked me up and brought all the equipment. It’s also a very enjoyable walk through the Quinta de Lago end of Ria Formosa.
reviews/19/text: Spending a day with Luís is truly a worthwhile investment in one’s education! For us, the topic was corks, however, Luís has a wealth of information and experience regarding the nature, culture and history in all regards. We knew we had a wise teacher when he was answering questions that we didn’t know we had. We have already been impressing our friends with all of our cork knowledge. Getting to know Luís is opportunity that should not be missed, he is friendly, passionate and soo full of fascinating information. Luís was also super helpful in planning and communicating leading up to our trip. To be honest, we are not travelers who usually book tours or guides, and we couldn’t be happier that this was the one time we decided to do so. Hope to keep in touch and visit again!
tags/animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.

address: Rua de Assumadas, Albufeira 8200-406 Portugal
description: CRAZY PAINTBALL ADVENTURE SAFE & CLEAN Our activity is mainly focused on organizing paintball games for birthday and stag & hen parties especially to provide great moments of fun to the participants. The area where the games take place is in Albufeira, in a field with natural obstacles like bushes and trees. Come and try this exciting modality and get a kick out of it! We follow the rules anti covid 19. Safe & clean with álcool 70°.
name: Crazy Paintball Adventure
reviews/0/text: Great Morning paintballing with Miguel and the girls. Very well organised and Miguel took great care of everyone. Explained all the rules very well and took lots of pictures which he then sent on to us. He really took care of the kids which made the experience even more enjoyable. The girls stayed with us until our taxi collected us. A brilliant day
reviews/1/text: Excellent! We enjoyed a great birthday party for the kids and parents! I recommend! Thank you to the staff for everything !
reviews/2/text:
Miguel is a quality host who's only objective is that everyone has fun.
The whole experience was simple and effective: we got there, we got dressed, picked up our markers and played.

In the end he gave us ideas in order for us to have fun and they worked great.
reviews/2/title: We had a lot of fun
reviews/3/text: Good fun, great guy. Good material and well adapted for kids. He was well on time and we booked only the day before.
reviews/4/text: Perfect! Nothing to say. They are nice and game was good. Contact with Miguel was simple and easy. Thank you for everything :)
reviews/5/text:
Brilliant day paintballing. Very well coordinated and we all loved every second. 

Miguel was a brilliant host and to make things even better one of troops left his watch and Miguel met us in the evening to return it. Fair play.

Thank you! 100% recommend.
reviews/6/text: Excellent place in nature and huge welcome by Miguel, without a doubt it provides an excellent experience to those who want to spend a different afternoon, full of good mood, in an environment that becomes familiar! Excellent at the end of the day, where we can enjoy a magnificent sunset! Thank you for the experience provided and many congratulations for the dynamics and good mood.
reviews/6/title: Thank you for the Magnificient experience
reviews/7/text: Unbelievably good fun, very friendly staff and just in general a really nice experience. Would go again
reviews/8/text: We didn't do paintballing but booked go-karting for 16 for my stag in Amancil via Miguel from Crazy Paintballing and the service was great! It was a smooth process to book and we thoroughly enjoyed ourself on the day!! Couldn't have asked for more. The boys loved go-karting!!! Miguel kept me up-to-date and gave me a quick response back whenever I had a query. We also changed transfer pick up location last minute and there were no issues with this. Being abroad and not familiar with places can make you on edge regarding credibility but nothing to worry about. Thanks again.
reviews/9/text: Had a really great time. Miguel is a friendly guy who even gave us restaurant recommendations. I would definitely recommend his services.
reviews/10/text:
Brilliant
Mixed group of ages . Miguel awesome.
Such fun for everyone. Recommend defo.
Brings out the sniper in you
reviews/11/text: Wonderful experience! Miguel and the staff are very helpful and fun! Everything was on point! The photos and videos were an amazing extra. Highly recommended!
reviews/12/text: Our team had a great time with Miguel and his staff. They were extremely helpful and nice. We will definitely come back some day. Highly recommended. Thanks Miguel, keep up the good work.⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
reviews/12/title: A memorable team building day with Crazy Paintball Adventure
reviews/13/text: We really had a blast with Miguel ! The paintball game was so great ! The place, the equipments.. Everything was on point ! Miguel was so invested in the photos, videos with his drone ! Everything was perfect ! Thank you Miguel !
reviews/13/title: Seminar with my company - so much fun !
reviews/14/text: It was a great experience, for someone who never did paintball it was awesome. The battlefield is huge and the price is accessible
reviews/15/text: Amazing experience, Miguel was a great host and kept ourselves and the kids entertained. Paintball experience was brill, would def recommend for a fun morning/afternoon with the kids.
reviews/16/text:
Wow,what a great day( daughters 16 th birthday)! The venue is great, Miguel is a great host,the whole experience was faultless…..

I highly recommend this activity and will be telling all of my friends about it…
All of the photos and videos taken for us was a great added bonus !
Thankyou for a brilliant day Miguel we WILL definitely be back soon!
Obrigada ! And see you soon !
reviews/16/title: Paintballing is my new favorite thing
reviews/17/text: Absolutely amazing paintball!! The instructor was very nice, taking videos and photos and editing right away! I strongly recommend!
reviews/17/title: Best paintball experience you can have!
reviews/18/text: Well organized, Miguel even went as far as to pick us up and bring us to the event. Good price, good equipment and most of all great fun. Well worth the few hours to clear a hangover. Would definitely go again. Daniel K. Ireland.
reviews/18/title: February 2017 (Could not put that in the when did you go title)
reviews/19/text: The games were well organized. To enjoy fully you need time to spare and also friends to play. They have all the equiment required.

address: Aerodromo Municipal de Portimao Montes de Alvor, Portimao 8500 - 059 Portugal
description: Tandem Skydive in Algarve (Portimão) Located just 40 minutes from Faro Airport or 30 from Albufeira. We offer the best beach skydives from up to 15,000ft where you'll experience the adrenaline rush of freefall over the amazing Portuguese Coast. After an exhilarating freefall, your parachute ride will be a peaceful experience as you fly through the air above the spectacular views of Algarve beach, giving you a moment to take in what you just accomplished. All skydives land on the soft grass near your friends, the perfect finish to an amazing life changing experience. We also have AFF training courses (Free Fall Courses) for those wanting to learn to skydive solo. Open all year. Client support 24/7 Call or email now for more information! Skydive and tandem jumps with the best view in Europe.
name: Skydive Seven
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Tandem Skydiving Algarve from 15.000ft — 5000m
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Tandem Skydiving — 30 min from Albufeira
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Tandem Skydiving Algarve 10.000ft — 3500m
photo/caption: Algarve N1 Tandem Skydive Experiences - 2020 Traveler's Choice by TripAdvisor.
reviews/0/text: Amazing experience, really chill instructors and staff. Just choose the highest altitude, way better to have 1 min of free falling.
reviews/1/text: amazing experience ! Very friendly staff! Was very fun experience. I was nervous but John (the man I skydived with) made me feel so comfortable and I enjoyed every moment with so much fun. Highly recommend
reviews/2/text: It was my 1st time the best experience ever in my life. thankyou so much for amazing moment real time .and the guy so  good friendly.once again thankyou so much.
reviews/2/title: Amazing ,wow ,great there is no limit of describe .the moment we feel so high the experience ever i feel in life .
reviews/3/text:
Amazing!
All the staff is very friendly, available on WhatsApp or phone call at all times.
The actual experience was great as well. Felt safe at all times.
My partner and I did the 12,000 ft
reviews/4/text:
We did a tandem 10'000 ft to celebrate my partners 30th Birthday and it was great! An inexplicable feelings when you are fully in the moment with your trusted jump partner! We loved it ! I was treated to a back flip on our way out of the plane !
All in all it was such a beautiful and new feelings when you are in the sky! This company was fun and efficient! We definitely recommend the experience! Thanks Johnny and Co!
reviews/4/title: Somewhere between the Sky and the Horizon
reviews/5/text:
The best experience of my life!! João Lopes and Rato put me even more confortable with this jump, and made it way more fun! 
Advices: smile for the camera and have fun!
reviews/6/text: Actual jump was brilliant, instructors were lovely, however the experience was soured by a few major issues. My jump was due at 1pm but was delayed until 3:30pm for no discernible reason. No excuse or apologies were given for the delays. In addition, the woman on the reception was incredibly abrasive, seemed aggravated by the fact I was British and proceeded to fat shame me for having thighs. The weight limit to jump is 17 stone and I am 11 stone, so to be faced with multiple comments of ‘wow, you are not fitting in that either’ and ‘gosh I will have to find a separate suit, the xl clearly doesn’t fit’ isn’t great for the confidence. I would definitely skydive again, but not with this company. It is a shame because the actual tandem instructors are lovely people, the lady involved just completely let them down.
reviews/6/title: Fat shamed and delayed multiple hours
reviews/7/text: First time skydiving and I don’t regret a thing! Everyone was really nice and it was an experience to remember. There was a slight delay but it wasn’t their fault. If you can wear earbuds, I’d recommend because of the pressure when you jump but overall a good experience
reviews/8/text:
This was the best birthday gift for my wife.
Very well organised and coordinated.
Dion was very helpful through the booking process.
We had amazing instructors - John and Nunu
The views from above were just breathtaking!
This should definitely be added in things to do in Algarve, Portugal.
reviews/9/text:
Thank you Skydive Seven
Thats was unforgettable experience.
You doing a great job and Jr. His a excellent instructor
reviews/10/text: My instructor Simon was the best @ dealing with me, I was quite anxious but he made it memorable and fun for me..unforgettable memory, it was not just him but all the other instructor's helped me to relax and made it sound like it's easy.. I just loved it, he was just right for me ... bless him
reviews/11/text: What better way to celebrate graduating than jumping out a plane. Brilliant experience, couldn’t ask for a better team!
reviews/12/text: I was absolutely terrified to go but the team is so professional, funny, and reassuring. Recommend for anyone even slightly considering skydiving!!
reviews/13/text: Awesome experience! The staff is extremely professional, they take all the safety precautions and ensure you are enjoying every minute of it. Cant wait to be back!
reviews/14/text: Unforgettable experience and for an affordable price. Would recommend anyone in the Algarve area to try this and do the full 5 km jump!
reviews/15/text: Best ever sport experience in my life! The team and tandem masters were incredible, funny but also absolute professional.
reviews/16/text: is a must of life, you will never be disappointed. Skydive seven is a great team, make you feel so secure.
reviews/17/text:
My skydive was amazing! If you want to make the jump, I highly recommend Skydive Seven! 

My mom recently died and I needed a mind reset. To do something for myself. I wanted to jump for years now... and I'm so glad I did! I called them via WhatsApp, asked all my questions and it was so helpful! I'm glad I chose the 15,000 feet, wanted to jump in the morning and added all the extra camera's and external handy cam. You really need all that for your first jump, document it, because it is definitely worth it.

The ride down was crazy fast, I could not believe the power of falling and basically forgot everything else I was a bit static up there while going down, but it was amazing. I asked for some salto's and was not disappointed. When the parachute opened, it was even more amazing! We did 360 degree sideways circles and I loved it!

I want to thank the whole team. Sara, thank you for being my key keeper and for all the help and information. Andy for the great external videocam work! I saw you did hold my hand on the video, but I was so surprised by the power of falling... I never noticed in the sky. Furthermore, I want to especially thank João for the awesome fun ride and experience! I'll never forget it! Thank you for letting me tag along. p.s. the restaurant recommendation was superb! 

So all in all... If you want to jump. Do it at Skydive Seven. Amazing team!

Linda ♥
reviews/18/text: The company has accommodated me on the day , as I was not able to jump with another company due to weather conditions. They have made my experience exceptional. The skydiving instructors were super fun! Loved it! Highly recommended!
reviews/19/text: coolest experience ever. once of a lifetime. amazing. DO IT!! my friend B***** and I talk about this experience literally all the time and we will both never forget it for the rest of our lives. best staff ever also! this was the coolest thing I've ever done and always felt safe.
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Skydive Seven tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Lagos 8600 Portugal
description: Surf guide Algarve will guide you to the beaches in the south-west Algarve where the waves are the best for you for that given day. I do not teach lessons and cannot take beginners. You don’t have to be a pro to join us, but you do have to be able to surf unbroken green waves, know and respect the rules in the surf, be aware of such things as rips and most importantly – be stoked!
name: Surf Guide Algarve
ranking: #28 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #28 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: I highly recommend Niels as a surf guide in the Algarve. We had the pleasure of using his services twice and were impressed by his knowledge and expertise both times. He has a deep understanding of the local surfing spots and always recommends the best times to surf at each location. Niels is an enthusiastic and energetic guide who knows his way around the area, which saved us a lot of time and effort in researching. His passion for surfing and his commitment to ensuring a safe and enjoyable experience make him a top-notch surf guide.
reviews/1/text: Came to the Algarve with a small window to surf. The forecast didn’t look prime by any means but my man Niels was always able to find the goods. Plus the dawn patrol sessions meant that we always beat the crowds and were surfing 0-3 people in the water a session. Unfortunately, he was out of the water with the surf ear surgery but pointed me into the right spot every time with great knowledge of all the spots we surfed. Also, the photos he took were amazing. 5 days , 5 different breaks. I would recommend SurfGuideAlgarve to anyone!
reviews/1/title: Surf Guide Algarve Delivers the Hoods
reviews/2/text:
I can highly recommend to book Niels for surf guiding. I was in the Algarve with my family and didn’t want to spent hours with spot checks. That’s what you usually do there ;)
Niels told the spot to go one day before, picked me up and we went to the spot.
Everytime on point. 
I will definitely do the surf guiding with Niels again.
Thanks a lot Niels!
reviews/3/text:
With only a short amount of time available to surf engaging Niels as a guide was without doubt the best way to use my time. Super easy going with a great local knowledge, he managed to put me on uncrowded waves every day! I wouldn’t surf here without him. 
I can’t recommend Niels highly enough !
reviews/4/text: Thanks for the photos Niels and thank you for some amazing days! So grateful for all the waves we scored, your awesome guiding and good company! And pastel de natas not least  really hope we make it down here again. We will hit you up for sure ☺️‍♂️‍♂️‍♂️
reviews/5/text:
I had an amazing day with Niels. A great surfer and an even better person, willing to help and boost the experience to its highest potential. He perfectly know Algarve´s spots and allways ready to give you his best smile&advice. Apart from this, a great writer :-)

Whitout any kind of doubt, I will repeat.

Alejandro
reviews/6/text:
Highly recommend Niels as a surf guide when visiting the algarve. His knowledge and understanding of the the beaches we visited helped us feel safe and confident when we took to the waves. He also planned our session to be early in the morning to beat the crowds so we got the beach to ourselves. Niels is a very friendly and knowledgeable guide! 
We are super stoaked to have experienced the algarve waves along side Niels and will definitely book with him again!
reviews/7/text: Niels was a perfect guide. He picked up my group in Lagos with all of our equipment and took us to an incredible beach a short drive away. He knew the exact waves we were looking for and got us out before the crowds came. He was also a wealth of information and was very interesting to talk to. I hope I’ll be back to this area to enjoy another day with Niels.
reviews/8/text:
In short: Swell and wind conditions were very challenging but I scored more great sessions with fewer people (often alone!) and muuuch less time driving around that I would have with Niels. 
I have been to the Sagres area several times already but this time was the first time with Guiding through Niels. I know the area a little bit but there are just so many elements to take into consideration (swell, direction, wind, tide, crowds) to find a good place to surf. On past trips I have had good sessions but also a very high share of mornings driving around, checking everywhere and then going back to the first spot (at this time then usually more crowded and not as good anymore).  
Traveling with my family I need to be more “efficient”. With Niels you get to the best spot on that day - and have an amazing and super fun time. 
I’ll definitely go with Niels again on my next trip and can wholeheartedly recommend him to anyone who wants to score!
reviews/8/title: Want to score better, emptier waves? Go with Niels!
reviews/9/text: Neils is totally dedicated very enthusiastic  surf guide who will simply find you the best waves available within say 30 minute drive of Vila do Bispo. He takes your level, wave period, swell size, wind speed and direction all into consideration and can supply equipment too. He also has wealth of local knowledge on all local services.
reviews/10/text:
Niels is a quite nice guy and a reel good surfer ‍♂️ Although i went just for one day surfing with him, he showed me a perfect spot for my skill level. All in all got some really good waves and had an awesome time. Definitely recommend go surf guiding with him - especially if you are new to the spots on the Algarve. 
Ps: He also organised a board and a wetsuit for me 
Cheers Michael
reviews/11/text: I can only chime on on all the five star reviews before - Niels knows where to go, beating the crowds and even at the otherwise busy SW Algarve we had the spots often to ourselves. On top, he really shares the stoke and cares about his guests having a good time. And when Piri Piri, the little doggie who feriously guards the items left hat the beach makes friends with you, you feel you are part of an awesome team :)
reviews/12/text:
I have only the best to say about Niels' surf guiding. 
I spent 1 out of 4 weeks Portugal in the AIgarve. I was working remote and wanted to go surfing as much as possible. However my time was limited, since i had to squeeze in my sessions between work. I am a mediocre surfer and didn't know the area. Hence i didn't have time to scout 5 spots before hitting the water. Thank god i found Niels and his guiding service which was exactly what i was looking for. Niels took a group (allways limited to 3 pax) to locations that suited our abilities. Mostly we even surfed in an almost empty line up. I had an amazing time and Niels is just great fun to hang out with. I can only recommend hitting Niels up once in Algarve!
reviews/13/text: Going surfing with Niels is an absolute blast! He always manages to find the right spot for your abilities - great waves without the crowds. Moreover he is just brilliant to be with in the water, full of positive energy and just a really nice, cool guy. Add to that that he is really helpful with everything from tips for second sessions to restaurants, there is really no better way to go surfing in the Algarve!
reviews/14/text:
I echo all the other positive reviews on this page with GUSTO!

This is a ruddy fantastic way to find out where to surf in the algarve.  Getting up early and out there before the masses.  Nils rented me a board and suit every day that we went out and let me keep them until the next day so if I wanted to paddle out again it was all good.

But best of all, Nils is an outstanding dude.  He has crazy energy + enthusiasm for the sea, so do yourself a favour and be guided by Nils!  Safe brother, see you soon!
reviews/14/title: Do yourself a favour - be surf guided by Nils
reviews/15/text: I had the best week with Neils. Very professional, super friendly, with all the local knowledge you need for your surf trip. Highly recommend his service. Gergo
reviews/16/text:
Best fit for those that don’t need surf school anymore but not pros or live in Algarve permanently. 
Niels will make sure you get your best waves every day and give you some tips what to improve when you surf together. 
Good mood for free as a bonus
reviews/16/title: You surf Niels does all the thinking
reviews/17/text:
Niels is a great guy and a very knowledgeable and experienced guide.
We did several sessions together and each one was a real standout!

I cannot recommend Niels' service highly enough! The Algarve is not an easy area to figure out if one does not know the spots and conditions well. Having Niels to help made what would have been an average trip an unforgettable experience with beautiful spots off the beaten track and awesome surf conditions.

Apart from his local knowledge Niels is a highly skilled surfer who is happy to give advice during the sessions.

I will happily use Niels' service again during my next trip and recommend him to everybody who is looking to explore the Algarve coastline.
reviews/18/text:
Super good choice for anyone who can surf independently but just wants to make the most out of a surf trip to the algarve. With the numerous spots around, it is hard to know which spot works best on a given day or what are the potential hazards. With Niels, this is no problem and I was able to focus on just surfing and improving.

Besides providing really good surf guiding, Niels is a super friendly and social person and it is fun to chat with him, drive to the spots or get a café after surf :-) 100 % recommended!
reviews/19/text: We can highly recommend Niels. We had the best and most fun time. There was nothing that we had to worry about because Niels took care of everything. He picked great spots and made sure that we had a good time. In addition to the great guiding, Niels gave us some hints to improve our surfing, which was more than we expected. We hope to come back very soon!
reviews/19/title: Thank you for the great time!
