address: Marina de Vilamoura Kiosk 19, Vilamoura, Quarteira 8125-409 Portugal
description: Luxury Yacht Charter - Vilamoura Marina - available to charter for mornings - afternoon - all day - sunsets
name: James Charters
ranking: #29 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #29 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: Had a fabulous full day charter, crew were very polite and chatty, stopped for padel boarding and darting in an out the caves! Beers, wine and nibbles on board then stopped for for a delicious seafood lunch more beers and dancing on way home, can’t wait to book again! 5 stars!!⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
reviews/1/text:
What a fantastic experience we had on Yolo One. We pre-booked from England before we arrived in Vilamoura and had no issues at all. 
We opted for a 3 hour tour and honestly it did not disappoint. 
Claudio and James are fantastic hosts and nothing was too much trouble. They were both very attentive and topped up our drinks throughout the trip. 
The boat is immaculate, it has a toilet is downstairs and plenty of space for sunbathing or shade if you prefer. 
They have a paddle board and also a dingy that took us through the caves. 
We enjoyed the afternoon so much we hoped to book the sunset trip but sadly ran out of time. 
We would 100% recommend this as part of your holiday memories.
reviews/2/text: From start to finish this company is highly professional! Seeing the yacht was breath taking! Being on it felt like such luxury! Staff amazing and nothing too  much trouble. Breathtaking views. We did the 3 hour cruise and wish it was longer. Just complete and utter luxury! We will all be back! Thanks so much
reviews/3/text:
Fantastic day was had by all. 
Service was outstanding a really unforgettable experience. Would highly recommend
reviews/4/text: Excellent service and beautiful boat… we had the best day… James and claudio was fabulous, very attentive and we could not of asked for a better day… thank you James charters
reviews/5/text:
James and Claudio made the first night of our holiday one to remember with a fantastic sunset trip.

It was really easy to find the meeting point on the Marina and they were there waiting with YOLO ready for us to board. 

They pointed out interesting places along the coastline and make sure we were in the best spots to see the sunset.

They let us play our own music and kept our glasses topped up all the way there and back. 

Would highly recommend to others!
reviews/6/text: Return visit to James Charters on board YOLO, it’s the most amazing way to spend the day, great crew, relaxed and professional. The coastline is stunning and has to be seen! We will be back guys, thank you!
reviews/7/text: Fantastic private boat trip from Vilamoura along the coast, the Captain and skipper James were very informative, attentive and gave us some great snacks and drinks throughout the trip! We could hook up our down music to the sound system or they were happy to put on some of there own music, I would highly recommend James Charters, amazing day out
reviews/8/text:
Fantastic Hosts
Fantastic Boat
Everything you could imagine 
Would highly recommend and if we come back to Vilamoura then we would definitely book another trip with James Charters
reviews/9/text: We have chartered boats in Vilamoura marina for many years now. After experiences with different companies, we can confidently say that James Charters really are the best in the business! Extremely professional from start to finish, this is always our holiday highlight! As returning clients they always try to offer us something a little different and new and this makes each trip special. The boat is in immaculate condition and it's a pleasure to spend time onboard. I would recommend a full day charter as a morning or afternoon simply isn't long enough!
reviews/10/text:
We joined Yolo at Vilamoura Marina on 15th April along with 6 other friends.  We have been on Yolo2 previously which is a smaller boat and decided to go with friends on the larger 48ft Sunseeker called Yolo, You only live once..
There was plenty of space on the boat which was presented immaculately, we were greeted at the pontoon gate by the Skipper and led to the beautiful white Sunseeker Portofino.
After a glass of champagne we were off on our way destined for Portimão which is where we went previously on Yolo2, we decided to go back to the same place as we had such a fantastic time before.  The weather was amazing and pretty soon the music and generous offering of drinks began to relax us to a whole new level.  On route we were shown inside a few of the stunning caves that exist on the rocky coastline. We were given lots of interesting information from the crew about  the area, but it wasn’t forced upon us as happens on some tours.  It was more like talking to friends about a mutual love of a coastline .  We had lunch in Portimão and headed back to Yolo to continue the fun.
We saw some dolphins on the return journey along with the simply incredible Benagil cave, you can’t mistake this cave as it has a giant hole in the top, but Skipper James got us right inside, amazing.
A simply unbelievable day on a fantastic boat, highly recommended for couples, families or groups of friends.  Thank you GUYS❤️

Top Tip: Book a full day and stop off for lunch at Portimão or Armona
reviews/11/text: Decided only the day before to go out on the boat. From the beginning e-mails we’re responded to and we were looking forward to the trip. It was just perfect from boarding to leaving. I couldn’t have asked for more and will return.
reviews/12/text: The service was 10/10 and such a great experience. Will certainly be back and would recommend to all
reviews/13/text: I booked an afternoon charter for my friends 50th birthday and Sally and her crew were excellent from Start to finish. The booking process was fast and efficient and the crew, Claudio and Carolina, made us feel very welcome and looked after us brilliantly. Will absolutely be coming back - Thank you all!
reviews/14/text: Absolutely fantastic boat , crew and trip. Proper champagne  I’d recommend you try it. Immaculately kept. The whole trip from booking to leaving the boat was excellent.
reviews/15/text: Me and my family have had such an amazing trip today. Would 100% recommend to everyone. We will definitely be returning!
reviews/16/text:
You need to book a DAY CRUISE as there are so many amazing places to see. 
Lunch 5 Star at Ferragudi!
reviews/16/title:
Absolutely amazing. Breathtaking scenery 
Staff and hospitality outstanding, 5 Star service.
reviews/17/text: Fantastic day on YOLO. Really friendly crew and drinks kept on flowing. Easy to James Charters as they are on the first jetty. The boat was fantastic - very luxurious and had everything we needed for a great day out. We will definitely be back !!!!
reviews/17/title: Fantastic day on YOLO - we’ll be back !!
reviews/18/text: Can’t rate them enough wonderful service on board very friendly staff .. when my beer was just getting empty another one was there . Food was lovely cant thank them enough .
reviews/19/text: What an amazing day from start to finish, we were treated by the crew Joal and James to spectacular views of the coastline and the caves whilst nibbles and the prosecco's flowed before being taken to lunch at Sueste restaurant at Ferragudo  we all had great fun on the "toys" donut, snorkelling, SUP before a sunset cruise back to the marina a trip not to be missed
subcategory_ranking: #29 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve

address: Avenida Sa Carneiro, Albufeira 8200-341 Portugal
description: We do tours to the old town and new town of Albufeira. You get to see all the attractions and best beaches of Albufeira. You can all so do a night tour to the strip where theres all the shops, bars and restaurants.
name: Tony's Tuk Tuk Tours
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Tonys Tuk Tuk Tours
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Albufeira and Armaçao de Pera by Tuk Tuk
reviews/0/text: This was a fabulous private tour of Albufeira. We were able to request stops for photo opportunities and also were taken to all the best viewing points. We never felt rushed and were given loads of information about the sights we were seeing - including the local plant-life. All in all I would highly recommend this experience.
reviews/1/text:
Alex our tour guide was waiting at arranged pick-up point. Great fun ride with experienced and knowledgeable guide around Albufeira and surrounding area. Took us to fantastic beaches and hidden gems. A little music along the way. Alex thanks so much we would gladly recommend.
Ian Sharon and Charlie
reviews/2/text: Really nice man spoke very good English and very easy to talk too. Was polite and knowledgable of the area’s travelled would highly recommend. Thank you
reviews/3/text: Tony was fantastic went over and beyond to show us around. My 8 year old and 17 year old thoroughly enjoyed it. We visited some amazing little gems around Albufeira. Would definitely recommend this.
reviews/4/text: We would thoroughly recommend Tony’s service for people who, like us, are paying their first visit to the area. Despite his near-native speaker level English, Tony is Portuguese, was born and brought up in the area and is obviously imbued with a love and passion for it which he is keen to pass on to others. The vehicle was ideal on what was a very warm day and with the sides and back fully open allowed for lovely cooling breezes throughout the trip. Tony arrived at our hotel “on the dot” at the time agreed and we enjoyed the two halves of the Trip very much; firstly, overland to two local beaches where the sand and rock formations were stunning, and then into Albufiera itself. The vehicle allowed for access to narrow alleyways which you would not dream of trying to enter with a hire car or in a minibus! Tony’s very informative commentary throughout was also very informative and interesting. (The only part of the Schedule we did not undertake was a visit to the “Strip”. Tony said he would be happy to take us IF we wished but warned us it had become a very unpleasant place “in the last three or four years” full of brainless yobs who only had two aims; to drink themselves senseless and then pick a fight with each other - or anyone else! We thanked him for the advice, said we had (more than) had to our fill of such places elsewhere (Aida Nappa/Cyprus and Malia/Crete) and we enjoyed the “extra” time spent visiting a restored old windmill my ch more than I am sure we would have done seeing a bunch of drunken losers sprawled in the gutter, thank you!) (To add to the problem, England were playing a crucial World Cup match at the time of our Trip, so we are sure Tony’s advice was right.) Dropped back at our hotel “on the dot” after two hours despite this curtailment of the advertised Schedule - the final proof of Tony’s excellent, fully professional and trustworthy service. As I say, thoroughly recommended.
reviews/5/text: An excellent way to see around Albufeiras old town. The 2 kids,10 and 11 really enjoyed it, and we were able to get a good idea of all the places we wanted to revisit. Definitely worthwhile experience, thanks Tony!!
reviews/6/text: Had an excellent afternoon tony showed us some wonderful beaches ones u wouldn’t normally see . He was very knowledgable on everything in Albufeira and we had a great time would highly recommend such a nice man
reviews/7/text: Welll worth the price.  Great way to see the sights, we have been to Albufeira many timess but Tony showed us some hidden gems
reviews/8/text: This was a first time experience for my friend on New Year Eve.  The driver was great and we felt save.
reviews/9/text: Tony is very friendly man who know what you need visit in Albufeira...good fun with him and he do the best for customers❤
reviews/10/text: Went on a tour around albufeira by tuck tuck,  I was great it tuck us all over. Really great fun rcommend it.
reviews/11/text: We tried this on one of the days and it was so much fun. They are very fast so please hold on tight to avoid the bumps....
reviews/12/text: Mad drivers if you like . So much fun, makes you feel alive. Best fun off the holiday.  Best 10 euros spent.
reviews/13/text: What a great way to see places we had 30 min tour the driver was great pointed out loads of places and told  us some history of where he took us
reviews/14/text: We had a blast on this guided personal tour around the nooks and crannies of Albufeira. Alex showed us some hidden beaches and areas of interest that we wouldn't have seen on our holiday otherwise. It was a pleasure from beginning to end! Many thankyous :)
reviews/15/text: Tony is a lovely man with alot of knowledge, we just turned up with no bookings and it was not a problem for him, we all really enjoyed it and he did lots of stops at different places for photos, would definately do it again. Lots of fun.
reviews/16/text: heel vriendelijk, een goede uitleg, laat je tijd om foto's te maken. Zouden dit ten zeerste aanraden.
reviews/17/text: Ótimo passeio . Tudo perfeito. Quando estiver em Albufeira super recomendo o passeio com o Tony’s Tuk Tuk.
reviews/18/text: Met vrienden golfen we jaarlijks in Albufeira. Tony en zijn collega brengen ons dan met twee tuktuks  naar bijvoorbeeld Pine Cliffs. Heerlijk om op die manier een golfdag te beginnen. Wind door de haren, onderweg van alles te zien en een prettig sfeertje. Een stevige aanrader!
reviews/18/title: Met de tuktuk naar prachtige golfbanen: top!
reviews/19/text:
Es una muy buena opción para ver sitios especiales con unas vistas de la costa, acantilados, playas y el pueblo de pescadores.
Destacaría la amabilidad de Tony, que aunque no habla muy bien el español se esfuerza y hace que el tour sea muy agradable.
Recomendaría el tour de dos horas para realmente ver zonas preciosas un poco más alejadas de Albufeira.
El precio me pareció correcto. 80€ 5 personas. Y además solo ver la cara de felicidad de los niños en tuk tuck es recompensa suficiente.
Gracias tony

address: OceanBlue Portugal, Monte Novo Colina dos sonhos, Burgau 8650-117 Portugal
description: Offroad bike tours (Specialized), beach and lake paddle board trips and sea safaris aboard our 9m catamaran.
name: OceanBlue Portugal
ranking: #30 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #30 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: The most beautiful view and setting for a fun fitness session with Lucy - watching the sunrise with your heart rate as you get put through your paces - but the stretch and chill session ending with a dip in the pool and coffee makes it so worthwhile.
reviews/0/title: What a setting for a workout!
reviews/1/text: Some great cross country MTB riding in the Algarve with scenic and challenging routes. Lucy an Sean are brilliant, entertaining hosts and I'd certainly return to cover more of the coastal routes.
reviews/1/title: Highly Recommended for XC MTB Routes
reviews/2/text:
My husband and I booked the half day Sea Safari and cannot recommend it enough. The boat had shade if needed and areas that we great for sunbathing. We were able to paddleboard around the caves near Lagos. Lucy had loads of advice and tips for maneuvering around the caves which were beautiful. 
We had plenty of time to also do a bit of snorkeling and swimming. An added bonus was the photos and videos that Lucy took and sent to us that day. Would totally recommend this trip. Thank you Lucy and Sean.
reviews/3/text:
Ocean Blue Active is an amazing place to stay. We had an incredible week for half term and left feeling totally rejuvenated. The accommodation is really lovely with a great kitchen and outdoor seating area (as well as indoor). The apartment is lovely and fresh and light. The outdoor Pool is wonderful as is the communal bbq and bar area. 
The location is great- about a 10 minute walk from the village of Burgau which has some lovely restaurants and a nice beach. 
We were a family of 4 and it was perfect for us. 
Lucy and Sean offer some amazing activities which we loved. We did the half day mountain bike trail, as well as the boat trip with snorkelling and paddle boarding. I also did some runs through the hills with Lucy which were pretty breath taking. I also did some Pilates by the pool in the morning which was such a bonus. 
We thought Ocean Blue provided the perfect balance for the family - I got to do some great activities and my hubbie got to relax by the pool with our younger daughter. 
All in all an awesome week and we will return as we all loved it so much. 
If you are thinking of booking it then DO IT!!
reviews/4/text:
We had the half day cruise with paddle boards, there were 8 of us in our party . Having explored the caves beneath the lighthouse at Lagos we sped across the the Alvor inlet where we spent a few hours swimming and SUP ing in the warmer and calmer waters. Tuition for SUP was essential and excellent especially as the average age of the debutant SUP ers was about 70 !!
Everyone swam and got up on the top deck for the exploration of the caves.
The boat was spacious even with 6 paddle boards, the ladder out of the sea was easy to use, and the whole experience was superb .
We are very grateful to Sean and Lucy for their professionalism and for making the morning such fun.
We have tried 2 other similar companies in Lagos Marina over the last 10 years and Oceanblue are the best !!
reviews/5/text:
We loved Ocean Blue Active! The appartments are very nice with all shades of white and blue, the pool is amazing for both play and actually swim laps and the view over the village and the sea is beautiful.
Lucy, Sean and Sophia are great hosts who took us for a boat trip from Lagos to a beautiful beach behind the rocks, where we did paddleboarding and snorkeling. We also went on a mountainbike tour through the inlands, Lucy went out of her way to help our youngest get over her fear and cycle along. 
And she convinced us of early morning bootcamp and yoga at the pool, what a great start of the day!
Burgau is a very charming small village with a beautiful beach, streets like on postcards and great little restaurants. And delicious take away coffees, smoothies and sandwiches right next to the small supermarket that make for a perfect strand picknick. We had difficulties to leave and already are planning for returning. 
Thank you Lucy, Sean and Sophie for the great time!
reviews/6/text: I really loved the SUP tour to the caves with Lucy! You get to see beautiful remote places that are perfect to discover with the SUP. Lucy was very helpful and a great guide! We got a thorough instruction at the beginning and she tried to help us improve our paddling also later on the water. I felt completely safe the whole time. The little break on the beach with tea and cookies was a nice idea. I would definitely recommend doing this tour with Ocean Blue, I had a blast!
reviews/6/title: SUP: Amazing and safe way to experience the coastline
reviews/7/text: Our 3rd time staying at Ocean Blue, Burgau and once again it didn't disappoint.  The accommodation is fabulous and the welcome from Lucy and Sean is perfect.  All sorts of outdoor activities to indulge your time in from mountain biking to paddle boarding to yoga.  Or you can just spend time visiting the great local beaches and restaurants in the area.  The western end of the Algarve is so scenic and picturesque but at the same time it is relatively quiet and unspoilt.
reviews/8/text:
For the past few summers, we have used OceanBlue for our SUP excursions. Sean, Lucy and Sofia make the perfect team when you’re out on their boat. We have had friends visit from Africa, Europe and elsewhere and they cannot thank us enough for introducing them to these fabulous people. It doesn’t matter how many times you go SUP boarding with them, they always explain the housekeeping rules as if it is your first time with them. They are very thorough regarding matters of safety too. This makes you feel confident that the information they provide is constant and the same as the great service you get from them. 
We have been able to go as far as Alvor and Ponte da Piedade, paddled through ‘caves’, had a go at snorkeling and identified animals in the cliff and rock faces for fun!
Thank you and see you all again soon!
reviews/9/text: Amazing fun days out Paddleboarding around the beautiful coastline of the Western Algarve. Lucy and Sean make it really fun and know exactly where to go to show you the hidden caves and coves and stunning deserted beaches. My teenagers absolutely loved their trips out with Ocean Blue Active and would thoroughly recommend.
reviews/10/text:
An amazing day out with the super friendly team. 
Big boat with ample space to move around (group of 9). 
Roof deck with an awesome height advantage, to jump from or sunbathe on. 
Definitely do the trip to alvor River area, great place to dock and spend the day on your own small island. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
reviews/11/text: Great SUP tours with these guys. Different routes and beaches to go to depending on weather conditions. The cave tour is just spectacular.
reviews/12/text: Lucy & Sean from Ocean Blue Active are awesome in their detail of making sure you have the best experience while visiting this beautiful area of the world. Make sure you go on a SUP Tour with them while staying here .... simply amazing!!
reviews/12/title: Great day paddling on the water
reviews/13/text: I was lucky enough to embark on several cycling trips with Lucy. She's an excellent host and gave a brilliant tour of the Algarve on two weeks; exploring hidden trails in the forests and quieter roads through local villages. The trips were fun and paced perfectly. The bikes are of a very high caliber and cater to all sizes. A fantastic experience all around.
reviews/13/title: Knowledgeable and personal local cycling routes
reviews/14/text: Had a lovely time at Ocean Blue. Beautiful  warm, sunny blue skied days, lovely bike ride, fab guidance from Lucy, Sean and Sophia about the local area. Great apartments and perfectly located for an easy and fun trip on the coast. Would definitely recommend to couples and young families. Thank you Ocean Blue, we’ll be back!
reviews/15/text: This was our second visit - we had a marvellous week of water and land adventures, sun, good company, fine food, and glorious beaches. Lucy and Sean were the perfect hosts and shared their top tips for trails and beaches. The accommodation was perfect and the underfloor heating just right for chilly mornings and evenings. Algarve is such a perfect location to visit from the U.K. - just two hours in the air and an hour’s easy drive from Faro. Top places to visit have to be Sagres Fort, Castlejo beach, and Salema. We enjoyed a great hike from our doorstep down to Cabanas beach, along the cliffs back to Burgau. I can’t recommend Ocean Blue enough - get yourself out there!
reviews/16/text: Had a fabulous week at OceanBlue Portugal over Christmas. Sunny blue skies all week so we were able to walk, cycle and swim in the sea! (okay with wetsuits but still pretty amazing). The apartment was really comfy and stylish with great views out across the pool to the sea.  We were able to have breakfast and lunch outside, being perfectly comfortable in shorts and t shirts most of the time, with a fleece for the evening. The bike and surfing equipment at OceanBlue is a massive bonus as it is all onsite and Sean and Lucy help with finding the perfect kit for you and giving advice on cycle trails and the best beaches for bodyboarding or surfing. It was just great to be outside in the winter! Highly recommend. Great location for a quiet break or an active week. It's not too touristy either, no high rise anywhere to be seen!
reviews/17/text: I had a great morning exploring the area via mountain bike.   Lucy was great.  Very knowledgeable about the terrain and made my first time on a mountain bike a great experience.     Can’t wait to go again when I return in March.  Lucy and I also had a great run on some super scenic trails too.  Can’t recommend this company enough.   I would definitely stay in one of the villas if I didn’t already have accommodations reserved.  Do yourself a favor and check them out!
reviews/18/text: An excellent weekend of mounainbiking, Lucy was very knowledgeable. Bike were good. Their base is wonderful with a lovely swimming pool.
reviews/19/text: Our second bike ride this year with OceanBlue. Lucy took us on a great ride, lovely tracks, fab refreshment stop in the middle of the countryside. Thoroughly enjoyed yet again. We will definitely repeat next year!
subcategory_ranking: #30 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from OceanBlue Portugal tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Largo Portas de Portugal, R/C Shop 1 & 2, Lagos 8600-657 Portugal
description: SideCar 32 is a company specialised in Motorbikes & Scooters Rentals in Lagos - ALGARVE. We suggest a selection of itineraries which will take you through magnificent roads. UNLIMITED Km's, Phone Holder and Cases - Visit us now! Rent an experience...Because Two Wheels Move The Soul!!
name: Sidecar32 Scooter & Motorbike Rental
reviews/0/text: Family-run business/owners who are super-friendly and very professional. Pick-up and return fast and straightforward. Bike fleet modern and well-cared for (I hired a 850GS for two days). The daily fee includes full insurance - whereby max liability is deposit fee (€1,500 in my case) which can be reduced to €500 for extra €20 a day. A huge bonus compared to other bike rentals in Algrave is that they also hire full riding gear (jackets, gloves, trousers) for a small fee - so you don’t have to lug all your gear (unless you’re hiring for a long period, in which case bringing your gear makes sense). A mobile phone holder, top box (side cases can also be hired) and chain & lock also included in rental. Can’t recommend this lovely company enough. They’re brill! (They’re also located in beautiful central city location by waterfront). AAA service and very good value. I’d also recommend the 850GS - comfortable, powerful lightweight bike, perfect for roads in this region.
reviews/0/title: Best bike hire in Algrave. Great value, fab service and modern bikes, with all riding gear also available for hire.
reviews/1/text:
I rented a bike last week. For a long time that I hadn't driven a bike. The team recommended me a suited bike, with a very friendly and professional touch. The bike not being new was in a very good condition, and well entretained. No hidden fees, no tricks in the sleeve, all was very transparent. As it always should be!
As I am a regular tourist in lagos, I will certainly rent a bike here next summer.
I strongly recommend their services.
reviews/2/text: We looved this place! We didn’t know which motorcycle to choose so they helped us find the right motorcycle for us and took all the time we needed to feel right about the one we choose. We were so happy we choose this one! We extended everyday until we really had to go back home. So many beautiful moments and adventures! Really sad we had to bring the motorcycle back. Wish we could stay there forever. The people were so so nice. Definitely will come back soon!
reviews/3/text: Friendly and efficient service, an almost brand new Honda NC750 combined with wonderful route suggestions made for a brilliant day of riding on some great roads through wonderful scenery. If you're considering renting a motorcycle or scooter in Lagos head to Sidecar32!
reviews/4/text:
For me they had the  perfect motorbike for a perfect trip in the Algarve. I rented a brand new Honda ncx750, which is a perfect bike for the narrow and steep streets in the beautiful villages along the cost, and handles great on the windy coast roads.
The owner in Lagos was very friendly and helpfully and gave good trip advise.
I also think you get best value for money here.
reviews/4/title: Best place to rent a motorbike in Lagos.
reviews/5/text: We arrived and asked for a scooter without  reservation. They told us, that they will call us, as soon as they will get one returned from other costumers. About 15 Minutes later, we got the recall und were able to get an awesome scooter about 30 minutes later, which took us save and comfortable to many beautifull locations around Lagos. The Helmets were clean, we got a big Security lock and if this wouldn't be enough, the guy at the service even gave us a little map and told us some Places we should need to visit. We often travel woth scooters in our holidays all over the world, but this scooter was by far the most reliable. Brakes, Light, Tires all in top condition. We truly recommend this place for a bike rent. We left today (Sunday) and they allowed us, to store our Bags till our bus to the airport left. Great place! Peter
reviews/6/text: Wonderful and helpful people. Great, mechanically solid motorcycles. Awesome  suggestions for routes (do the N2 if you can). Will most definitely be renting a bike from them next time too.
reviews/7/text: Overnight the bike repair kit went missing. They didn't charge me for that and wished a nice trip :)
reviews/8/text: A 5 star rental experience, the customer service was exemplary and the bikes were in very good condition... the BMW 310GS was brand new!.  The team provided suggested routes/itineraries and we had 5 days superb riding around the algarve for a very reasonable price. The roads are generally very quiet and the driving here is considerate. The twisty small back roads around Monchique and in the hills north of the algarve generally were absolutely superb although you need to keep an eye on the road surface and pot holes on the rural roads. Superb and would very happily recommend sidecar32.
reviews/9/text: Helpful and friendly staff, no unexpected costs, easy, fast, professional rental of the motorcycle. I recommend to anyone.
reviews/10/text: Hired the V-strom 250 for a week. Really fantastic service, great bike and very good value. The staff were very friendly and had some great tips for some awesome roads to ride. I've explored a lot of the Algarve but hiring a bike really allowed me to go that little bit further and I enjoyed every second!
reviews/11/text:
This company is really good! The scooter was in great shape, cheap and the service was excellent. At one point I made a mistake and left the battery on, therefore the scooter didn’t work anymore and someone had to pick it up. 

This was no problem for them and they provided us with a new scooter. 

5/5 rating is well deserved!
reviews/12/text: We rented the F850 GS for a day and had a wonderful time. They are very friendly owners, the bike was in good conditions and everything was well arranged, looking forward to renting the 1200 GS next year?!
reviews/13/text:
We have rented a 125cc scooter for three days from Sidecar 32 which has been one of the best decisions we made in Lagos. The scooter was very reliable and we enjoyed the ride to both west coast and the highest peak Fóia. 

What made our experience so memorable was the great staff with their restaurant recommendation, patience and reliability. Thank you very much for all of that!
reviews/14/text:
Really great experience end to end. Very good communication, excellent english, booking process was easy. Pick-up and drop off without a hitch, 2 helmets, GPS, carry box all included. Bike was in excellent condition in fact I felt bad i made it quite dirty :)
Can highly recommend this place.
reviews/14/title: Really great experience end to end
reviews/15/text:
Great new bikes, fair pricing, easy communication, excellent service - incl. Emergency management ;)

Super fair handling of a view scratches & a broken footrest, which was a very positive surprise:
Filipe could have charged me for the full deductible of EUR 700 but charged the actual damage/replacement parts only. VERY fair deal!
reviews/15/title: Excellent bikes - excellent service. Clearly recommended!
reviews/16/text:
I have been hiring scooters, motorbikes and bicycles from this company for the last 10 years. The reason I keep going back are many. Firstly the staff are really helpful, everyone seems welcome. Loads of info about the area is available and the staff speak excellent English. 
The second is the vehicles are well maintained. There are some companies in the algarve I would not dare to take on the road. The roads are really safe in the algarve, a lot safer than back on the m62 at home trust me. The last thing you want is to be riding a scooter or bike that’s not been serviced properly. 
The prices are pretty average to be honest but that’s not top of my list when it comes to putting my wife on the back of a scooter. 
For car rental see Luz cars 3 doors away from sidecar 32. I have always used them too.
reviews/17/text:
Fantastic, open en helpfull communication. We were very satisfied with the motorbike provided. At the start the owner takes the time to inspect the motor and explain everything you need to know. Everything was well disinfected related to COVID19 and bike technically in very good shape. The BMW 310GS fitted very easily 2pax, in combination with the box at the back, it was perfect to cruise down the coast of the Algarve.
A very big recommendation to rent @Sidecar32 a motorbike in Lagos !!
reviews/18/text: Last year my friend and I rented a bike with Sidecar32 to explore the city and we couldn't have been more pleased with the service provided by Filipe and Marta. They were super friendly and made the whole process effortless, making sure all our needs were met just so we could just enjoy the beautiful city. All the safety gear was provided, and the equipment was all in excellent condition. The location is also very convenient as it is right in the heart of the city. If you are looking for a reliable and quality rental, this is definitely the place to go. :)
reviews/19/text: This is definitely the most top notch rental service in Lagos. I've rented many motorbikes from Sidecar32 over the last few summers. The owners are extremely friendly and will help you with anything you need. I usually rent the BMW GS310 bike, which is a lot of fun to ride. The bikes are all very well maintained, kept clean, and always offered in a perfect condition. I hope to continue riding with them in the future! There are some amazing twisty roads close to Lagos, so I highly recommend you try them out.
reviews/19/title: Great service, bikes in top condition

address: Avenida Herois da Patria, Faro 8005-103 Portugal
animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.
description: Portugal Safaris offers Buggy / Quad and Jeep 4x4 tours every day from 2 hours, 4 hours or the whole day, the Algarve mountain or coast, or any other region of Portugal. With possibility, if you wish, to go see the sunset on the mountain or the view on the sea. The 4-hour tour or the full day includes a picnic. Prices include pickup and drop off at your hotel. Reservations are made through the website of Portugal Safaris, by e-mail, or by telephone. We do not have a shop. Portugal Safaris is a registered trademark.
name: Portugal Safaris
reviews/0/text: We did a half day tour with Ricardo which included olive oil production, hand produced tile, swimming at a waterfall and a great introduction to the trees and plants in the region. Ricardo is a great host, considerate, passionate and fun. The open jeep connects you even more to the sites, smells and sounds. Very authentic memorable experience.
reviews/1/text:
We were only in Faro for two whole days.  Faro is quite a small town,  and by the afternoon of Day 1 we were looking for something to do on Day 2 rather than spend it in bars and restaurants!  Saw a leaflet for Portugal Safaris in the Tourist Information centre, checked out the reviews online and then gave Alberto a call to see if he was free. He sent over more info via WhatsApp and then after a bit of back and forth re. our choice of vehicle, collection time etc, he picked us up in his open top UMM (the one in the pic) at our hotel the next morning.

As other reviewers have said, for the countryside safari you get a full day visiting olive oil plants, hand made tile works, a windmill, a waterfall (where we also met a lovely friendly Rottie), baby turtles and many fruits, herbs and nuts to identify and try along the way.  We also stopped by a piggery where the adult pigs are semi-wild and we could see the baby piglets, and by chance the owner's daughter also had a cute little puppy for us to see too.

Oh and of course I mustn't forget the lunch picnic!  Absolutely lovely wholesome food, all prepared by Alberto - some hot and some cold, and even homemade jam!  He had brought enough to feed the five thousand, even though there were only three of us including himself :)  Alberto was a brilliant host and is clearly very passionate about what he does.

The day was ended with a gorgeous mountain top sunset, and then Alberto whisked us back to our hotel.  Thank you Alberto for a fantastic day out and a very memorable safari, we will be recommending you to anybody we know visiting the area!
reviews/1/title: Fantastic day out seeing the wilds of Portugal!
reviews/2/text: Very highly recommended. Alberto is helpful, knowledgable and ensured the trip was fun for all. make sure you book him up when in Faro as you will experience great beauty with him by your side. thank you!
reviews/3/text: An activity I can definitely recommend, we did an 8 hour safari across the coastlines, Alberto knows the best spots and took us to the most magical places. He was kind enough to pick us up from our hotel and make a few pit stops at grocery stores for some things we needed. He is very knowledgable about anything you can think of, from plants, fruits, flowers and portuguese culture and tales. The tour included a super tasty picnic he made all by himself, as he is a talented cook as well! Alberto also made sure to take us to the airport two days later even though we had to be there by 4am and even made delicious cake and brought some for us to enjoy :) We enjoyed our trip to Portugal so much more, thanks to Alberto. Will definitely book another tour when we visit again.
reviews/3/title: A complete, magical tour of Portuguese coasts
reviews/4/text:
Where do I begin. If you’re looking for a tour where the guide is genuine, kind and actually loves what they are doing this is the agency for you. We were only in Faro for three days and we managed to see all the scenery and i mean ALL with Alberto’s help. He showed us places even a person living in Faro has probably never seen. We took some really fun routes and saw the ocean from an amazing view in Albufeira and we got to explore the caves! 

We also got to sit down and eat a delicious picnic with a beautiful view of the ocean. 

Alberto took everything into consideration with allergies and food preferences and for some one who is a picky eater I was truly happy. It was all home cooked and the jam he made was great too. I couldn’t stop eating it. It made our trip and we are grateful we found him online, he knew details about everything, down to the rocks. We took the coast route and it was phenomenal and with Albertos expertise it made it even better. 

We travelled in December, so please don’t be put off from booking with him in the Winter. It was still worth it! 

I hope to return to Faro and have another tour with Alberto! Maybe to the countryside next time. 

Thank you for your kindness and for the experience! It is one to never forget :)
reviews/4/title: WOW what a tour. I will never forget it. It was AMAZING.
reviews/5/text: This is the best travel experience I've had in a while! Alberto is a lovely person and you can tell he is passionate about what he does. He is very knowledgeable about the land and Portugal, and loves transmitting his knowledge with travelers. I like that you can build your own itinerary for a very personalised safari, and the "picnic" was amazing...homemade with love and enough for a family of 10! HIGHLY recommend exploring with Alberto!! He's great with children too :)
reviews/5/title: Amazing day in the countryside with Alberto
reviews/6/text:
My boyfriend and I booked 4 hours Sahari trip to see the countryside and it was amazing! Alberto is very friendly, knowledgeable and warm person. We enjoyed every single minute of this trip and I really recommend this experience to everyone!
Also, I have to mention our picnic! it was just amazing!! it was not lunch, it was a feast! Food was delicious and Alberto prepared everything by himself. I was so touched of everything he did for us! 
It was one of the nicest experience I had in a while and the reason for this is Alberto. Million thanks to him for a lovely time and ability to learn about nature and culture.
reviews/7/text:
We arranged for Alberto to pick us up outside our apartment. He duly arrived early and was most welcoming. We toured around the south of the Algarve and learnt about the plants, animals and local landscape.
A homemade picnic lunch was provided. Great food and plenty of it too! 

Alberto takes immense pride in his job and really aims to please.
reviews/8/text: We had a superb nature safari and picnic with Alberto; A great countryside tour with a very knowledgeable guide that we can  highly recommend.
reviews/9/text:
Our holiday was centered in Olhau and we contacted Alberto to take us on a Safari. He arrived at our hotel on time and took us on a great tour of the countryside. He included a homemade picnic and the food was fantastic. Alberto is very knowledgeable about the local landscape, plants and animals. Our 12 year old daughter accompanied us on the tour in Alberto's open top jeep and it was a wonderful experience for us all.
We also booked Alberto to drive us to and from Zoomarine in Albuferia as the public transport and organised tours to there from Olhau were non-existent or inconvenient. He brought us right to the main entrance and was there to collect us when we were finished in the evening. Alberto is a very helpful and reliable guy and his service is second to none. We highly recommend him.
reviews/9/title: 4 hour safari tour of Faro/Olhau countryside and taxi to and from Zoomarine, Aluferira
reviews/10/text:
We have booked several safaris with Alberto and on this occasion we decided to book the coast and cave safari. 

It was very easy to book (at very late notice) with Alberto and his English is ever improving. 

We explored some amazing places. Beaches, caves and countryside. 

Alberto’s passion for the country he lives in is amazing and comes across on his safaris. 
He looks after his guests well and I would highly recommend booking a safari with him. 

Thanks Alberto. See you next time. 

Rachael
reviews/11/text:
Had an amazing day with Alberto last week. We saw stunning cliffs and coastal sceneries, had an incredible homemade lunch at an nice lookout place and got lots of tastings from local fruits and plants during the whole day. Pick up from the airport and drop off at the hotel was perfect.
Highly recommended tour if you want to spend a magnificent day at the Algarve!
Thanks a lot, Alberto!
reviews/11/title: Jeep Tour with Portugal Safaris and Alberto
reviews/12/text:
Fantastic tour with Alberto who was extremely friendly and accommodating. We have a 2 year old toddler so a little hesitant to going on a jeep tour however Alberto recommended we go in the closed jeep as it would be safer and provided a booster seat for our son. 

Excellent views on top of the mountains and a vast amount of knowledge imparted on us about portugese culture and culinary. We stopped at numerous locations where we were able to sample the abundance of fruits and herbs growing from the agriculturally rich land.

Must do if you are in the Algarve region!
reviews/12/title: Highly recommended, excellent informative tour of Algarve
reviews/13/text: We had a beautiful day. Alberto was very kind and wanted us to enjoy every moment. He took us all day to visit a lot of places, explained about the history, food, plants and much more. He prepared a delicious lunch for us and we will never forget about the MEDRONHO:). We were with teenagers and they really enjoy this day.We absolutely recommend it. Thank you so much for this experience.
reviews/14/text:
Alberto from Portugal safari is a very happy, enthusiastic man who loves to impart his knowledge. His communication when booking and arranging to meet was outstanding. 
We did the 4hr safari in the open top jeep which was amazing, it’s like going on a foraging safari with a local history tour. Very interesting. 
The picnic lunch was superb, so much tasty Portuguese food. 
We had a lovely morning with Alberto, thank you
reviews/15/text: We stayed in Faro for 4 days, and wanted to do a Jeep tour to end our time here by seeing the lovely views that we may not have seen otherwise. We contacted Alberto to see if he had any availability, and he was extremely accommodating for us. He has different lengths of tours, and different jeeps depending on what sort of a tour you want to do, but he lets you decide! We opted for the 2 hour tour as it fitted our schedule best. Alberto took us all through the countryside, showed us the fresh salt farming-looked like a mountain!, we stopped off when we saw a herd of goats to say hello. Alberto stopped and gave us freshly picked almonds, herbs, fruits and showed us cork trees-a very traditional thing in Portugal! We even managed to catch the sunset, and Alberto took us to the most beautiful setting for it. The tour was incredible and Alberto was the most genuine perfect host. Suited us to a T! Thank you Alberto!!!!
reviews/16/text:
We called last minute to inform about the possibilities of the tours. Alberto made sure we had a great time! We booked a four hour tour, but were easliy gone for five. The enthousiasm of Alberto was amazing, he showed us all kinds of fruits, herbs and nuts growing in the Algarve. Also, we went to a stone factory and an olive oil manufacturer. The picnic he made was supposed to feed three people, but six would not have been a problem. 
All in all, a great day and highly recommended.
reviews/17/text:
Great day out in the countryside interesting stops and information Alberto made lunch for us which was amazing.
Great communication by email,  even asked for our favourite music which he bought along on the Safari for us to listen to. Thanks Alberto from Steve Sandra James and Tina
reviews/17/title: Great day out in the countryside
reviews/18/text:
We had four hours trip to country side. Alberto was very friendly and he provided us with great info about country side and customs there, together with info about different types of fruits and other plants. During the trip he would stop and get us different type of local fruit taken from trees to try. He showed us some very interesting places and some great views. We had nice opportunity to see sunset from the old windmill. Alberto also gave us a great picnic with a lot of food he prepared. We liked the food very much, especially the homemade one, made by him. 
Alberto is very familiar with the places he is showing and he has great customer approach. 
Overall we liked the tour very much and we’d recommend to everyone. Minimum 4 hours one. 
Great trip Alberto. Thanks for this experience.
reviews/19/text: Sorry it’s a bit of a long review but I believe it deserves the time and effort after such a great day out. We have a house in Portugal so have been travelling here for last 10 years whilst our 3 kids have been growing up. They have always been to young to go on a full day out on a Jeep safari until now. They are 4,7 & 9 years so we thought it’s high time we ventured out (not saying we don’t go out but a full day out with 3 fully charged boys in a car is a challenge on its own, it’s hard enough getting to the beach or water park) we searched the web several weeks prior to arrival and we found “Portugal Safaris” by chance. We messaged Alberto and he was quick to respond day and night. Naturally one wonders how these days will start and if anyone will actually turn up but good thing is that Alberto never once pressured for money or anything like that, we set a date a time and he arrived bang on time. My wife and I went on a Portuguese Jeep safari many years ago so it was great to do it again but had high expectations. Needless to say that Alberto did not disappoint, the whole day was amazing. He’s knowledge of plants, fruits and wildlife is brilliant. The places we visited were superb, we stopped at a really nice place in S B Aportel for a picnic. We were expecting some dodgy sandwiches or stuff like that but we were well and truly gobsmacked with the spread Alberto laid out. Our kids (as most maybe) are quite fussy eaters, the tuna, chicken, salad and pasta were all divine. We all had a great laugh and left with our belly’s full. The open top Jeep really made it feel special especially going off road and standing up in the back filming. I would recommend to anyone. Well done Alberto, thanks for such a great day, see you next year for another special day trip.

address: Faro 8005-143 Portugal
description: Private Low Cost Transfers & Tours in Algarve
name: iCAB Transfers
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Private Faro Airport Transfer from Albufeira (up to 4 passangers)
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Private Faro Airport Transfer to Albufeira (up to 4 passangers)
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Private Faro Airport Transfer from Albufeira (up to 8 passangers)
offer_group/offer_list/3/title: Private Faro Airport Transfer to Albufeira (up to 8 passangers)
offer_group/offer_list/4/title: Private Transfer Algarve-Lisbon or Lisbon-Algarve ( max 8 pax)
reviews/0/text: Luri was an amazing taxi driver! We visited Portugal as a group of 10, which included two children under the age of 2. He was very accommodating with car seats too. We used Luri for both our transfers and journeys whilst in Portugal. He was polite, punctual, friendly and very informative. Couldn’t recommend him enough!
reviews/0/title: One of the best taxi drivers!
reviews/1/text: Lovely service set up through our hotel for transfers to and from the airport. Owners were enjoyable to chat with on the car rides and have a great sense of humor. Vehicles are clean and ride smoothly. Couldn’t have asked for a better experience!
reviews/2/text: We used iCab twice on a recent trip to Albufiera. They collected one of our party from the airport and then brought us to and from the waterpark. They were brilliant. They collected us on time and were extremely friendly. Would recommend.
reviews/3/text:
Luri and Naomi run the most reliable, cleanest and best value for money taxi service in the region. They drove our family of 4 adults and 2 kids around the area for 5 days. This included airport transfers, trips to the Marina and Salgados Beach.
I compared prices with other larger transfer services and Uber and Luri was €10-15 cheaper for each journey. 
Facebook site doesn't appear to be updated but contact them via the call option on WhatsApp.
reviews/4/text: Iuri and his family run a great taxi service in Albufeira. The ride is comfortable, they are courteous. They are also knowledgable about the area when we needed recommendations. I would highly recommend them.
reviews/5/text: Excellent trips to local restaurants from Felasia Hotel on many occasions. URI & May were always on time and cars were spotlessly clean . They were always available for going to & return journeys to our restaurant choices . We also got a transfer from our hotel to Faro airport and will definitely use them on our next visit to Portugal!!
reviews/6/text: Cannot recommend these guys, enough. On time, every time, friendly & informative. We used their cab service, for the whole week ! Give them a shout.
reviews/7/text: Great service, very competitive, drivers speak excellent English. On time for both collection and departure.
reviews/8/text: had a transfer from airport to olhos de agua and return ,always on time polite ,well driven , used them around the local area too, never had to wait long (oct) reasonable priced
reviews/8/title: faro to olhos de agua transfer
reviews/9/text:
2nd time of using this company. 
Cheaper than Hoppa with much less waiting time.
Was not met immediately at airport inbound but this may have been because flight showed a delay.
Polite drivers speaking fluent English and good knowledge of area.
Book return to receive better fare.
reviews/10/text: Very good communication by email. Punctual pick-up and friendly service. Good value for money. I recommend
reviews/11/text:
Brilliant Taxi / Transfer company , like I said I wish I found them sooner . Reliable , friendly, everything can be sorted out with email or a phone call . They also do the little jobs as well as the big jobs ( most taxi firms we came across were only interested in airport transfers minimum) . It was a great help to us to have a company who would take you to shopping centres , old town, airport transfers and return  journeys etc.

Family business , small enough to care and big enough to handle all your transportation requirements , I was at ease and relaxed with all their drivers, ( special mention  to luri ( Yuri ) and his wife . Excellent  english so easy to communicate , extremely friendly and chatty ( no awkwardness and broken English that you get with some mass production  taxi / transfer services ) 

Prices were extremely reasonable ( trust me , I know as we used other taxi firms ranging from metered taxi's to luxury taxi's) and like I said , I wish I found iCAB sooner )

These guys have everything , the " correct child seat " which is so important,  clear instructions for meeting places for return journeys etc , they definitely  took the stress out of travelling on our holiday.

Well done iCAB we will definitely  be using you again and you only die to your amazing , stress free , relaxing  service , thank you again !
reviews/11/title: I wish I found iCAB sooner
reviews/12/text: Fantastic service, picked up at Faro airport and transferred to our villa on time and in comfort. We also used iCAB most days during our stay for transfers into Albufeira and always on time and always available. I will definitely use again when we return to Albufeira!
reviews/13/text: Absolutely fantastic service. A lovely family run service. So punctual and friendly at all times. Highly recommend them!!
reviews/14/text: iCAB transfers were a first class service. We used them for our all transfers, day trips whilst we were in the Algarve. Nothing was too much trouble and even gave us recommendations for restaurants. Highly recommend
reviews/15/text: Prompt, professional, spotlessly clean, safe, comfortable and very friendly. We simply wouldn’t book with anyone else. Thanks again guys
reviews/16/text: Excellent service, on time , reasonably priced, very good communication , very clean car excellent all round service
reviews/17/text: Outstanding service.  Drive was on time, courteous and safe.  We arrived at our destination, rested and ready for a day on the beach.  Excellent way to land in Lisbon and transfer to the Algarve to arrive shortly after noon on the same day.
reviews/18/text:
On time 
Friendly service.

Had to change one taxi time at quite short notice but this was not as issue.

Would recommend
reviews/19/text: We used iCab for our transfer from Lisbon to the Algarve. Our driver was on-time and communicated with us every step of the way. His driving on this long trip was safe and pleasant. Our driver who is also the owner, knew a lot about the area as he has lived here his whole life. He was so friendly and nice. We also used him for our return trip to Lisbon and again the service was perfect! I searched many transfers and iCab had the best price. We received the best service at the best price! You can’t ask for a better transfer than Iuri’s,  iCab transfer service. He made our group of first time travelers to Portugal feel safe and comfortable!!!

address: Sagres Portugal
description: Sea kayak tours with a certified guide in the natural park around Sagres, exploring the coastline with its impressive cliffs, hidden caves and beautiful beaches, and learning basic sea kayak skills. The main attractions are our half-day Coastal & Cave Tour and the full day trip to Cape St. Vicente, the most southwestern point of Europe mainland . We offer high quality kayaks, paddles and life jackets, to guarantee a comfortable and safe paddling experience.
name: Sea Kayaking Sagres
ranking: #32 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #32 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: Really enjoyed the half day trip from Sagres to Ingrina. Lovely coastline with several caves to explore. Amandio provided nice relaxed guiding and Lea briefed and picked us all up at the finish and brought us back to the start. Very good communication and Amandio provided us with good information about other possible paddling locations nearby. Great value for anyone wanting to explore the coast in real sea kayaks.
reviews/1/text: We booked a half day trip to see the sunrise around Sagres and had an amazing time! Amandio and Lea organised a transfer for us and had everything prepared to make the trip as easy and accessible as possible. The view was amazing and we were able to explore caves and try out maneuvers. It was especially kind of them to even shoot some pictures for us and make the tour as long as possible instead of having a shorter round trip. We can only recommend it since it was one of the best experiences for us while travelling around the Algarve. Thank you!
reviews/2/text: Fantastic half day exploring the coast of Sagres. Amandio was always make sure we were safe while having fun.
reviews/3/text:
Joined a half-day kayak group (of just 5 boats including Amandio) and had a fantastic few hours exploring caves and coves. Got a little lucky with the weather perhaps - hardly any wind - which meant we could fully explore caves. In different conditions you might do more open-water kayaking, I expect. Also learned a few things about kayaks and kayaking technique from a clearly very experienced guide.
One thing I had not anticipated was how peaceful the trip was, and to explore without the crowds you associate with Lagos for example was incredible.
reviews/3/title: An amazing and peaceful sea-kayaking experience
reviews/4/text: We had a lovely half day tour with Amandio along the coastline back to Sagres. Lots of sea caves to explore, and good equipment. This is the place to come if you want to  go sea kayaking as opposed to the sit-on-top kayak tours for tourists.
reviews/4/title: Real Sea Kayaking in the Algarve
reviews/5/text: We had a fantastic trip, just our family of 5 and Amandio our guide. Completely deserted caves unlike kayaking around Benagil. A half-day trip was plenty, we were tired out afterwards.
reviews/5/title: Great family kayak trip away from the crowds
reviews/6/text:
I Would highly recommend it for everyone.
It was a very special experience, Dolphin-watching inclueded. We've had the lucky punch to see a group of dolphines very close to us.
It's really stunnung to see the cliffs and the caves by kayak.

Thank you very much Amandio and Lea!
reviews/7/text: We had a great experience with Amandio. The tour was great and very relaxed. We really got to see a beautiful and quiet part of the Algarve coast
reviews/8/text:
This was such a fun experience. The caves Amandio took us to were amazing! Amandio was very friendly, an expert kayaker, and took some great pictures. We had such an amazing time. If you’re visiting Lagos or anywhere in southern Portugal it’s worth the bus ride over to Sagres just for this. 

Thanks Amandio!
reviews/9/text: Great views, boats were good and there was a shuttle so we got dropped off at the put in and paddled back to take out where our cars waited. They took pictures for us as well which was nice of them and emailed them afterwards. We didn’t the option for the full day tour because of when in the season arrived, which was the only shame.
reviews/9/title: Fantastic half day or sea kayaking
reviews/10/text: Had a wonderful day kayaking along the coast of Sagres with Amândio . Would highly recommend no matter what skill level you are at!
reviews/11/text:
We really enjoyed our trips kayaking along the coast at Sagres. It's really beautiful.
Amandio is a great guide and clearly very experienced helped us get into many of the caves. He and Lea are very friendly and helpful and really took good care of us - we would highly recommend them
reviews/12/text:
A super day's kayaking with Amândio! We were a party of two, joining with a second party of two for a full day. We all had kayaking experience but one with more formal training. We did a really lovely 16-18 km out to the "lighthouse at the end of the world" - (Cabo de São Vicente) from Sagres and back. Explored caves and rocks on the way out, with a straightforward more open water stretch on the way back. Trip was planned by Amandio to optimize the conditions and respond to the group's abilities and interests. Kayaks and gear in good shape.  

Communications with Lea were great, and she took some great long-distance photos as we returned. 

Highly recommend.
reviews/12/title: Wonderful full-day kayak trip to the end of the world.
reviews/13/text: We had a lovely kayak trip with Amandio and his daughter Lea, they were very helpful and friendly. Amandio is a great teacher and we learnt a lot about sea Kayaking in the few hours of the trip. The scenery was beautiful and the photos taken for us by Amandio were great, really enjoyable I would love to go again, thank you!
reviews/14/text:
We had a great experience on the half day trip with Amândio and his daughter Lea.
Lea drove us down including towing the kayak trailer (great driving)
It was a lovely beach and Amândio and Lea helped me a lot (I am disabled) 
The instructions were clear so as beginners we were confident to make the 8 km trip.
Highly recommended.
See you next time Amândio and Lea
reviews/15/text: We booked a day trip with Sea Kayaking Sagres the day before our trip. It was very easy to set up and find the location of the tour. The tour itself was amazing!! We had a great time and saw some really cool things. The guide, Amandio, really knows what he is doing. He was very friendly and taught us some new techniques. We were able to go into some sea caves that were really magical. I wish we were in Sagres for longer and could have done a multiple day trip. I will be recommending this tour group to everyone!
reviews/16/text: Fantastic trip, with a wonderful guide and great company. Our family of four (with 12 and 14 year old kids) were in two double kayaks. Great to get out on the water, and enjoy the beautiful coast line and caves without the motor boats and large tourist groups that are typical further east.
reviews/17/text: Thank you for this wonderful experience in Sagres ! It was the perfect ' off the beaten track ' kayak tour, in a gorgeous setting without the mass tourism of other parts of the Algarve. We were given high quality kayak equipment and Amandio is a very skilled instructor who makes you feel safe on the water. The additional pictures from the trip are a big plus. We would absolutely recommend anyone to take a tour with him and Lea and explore the scenery around Sagres !
reviews/17/title: The perfect 'off the beaten track' kayak tour !
reviews/18/text: I had a very good time. The approach is responsive and helpful in any matter. With a wide smile and flexibility. Very recommended!! The
reviews/19/text: Enthusiastic, knowledgeable and helpful guiding along with small groups make for a great experience exploring the beautiful coastline of the Algarve. Thanks to Amandio and Lea for taking us out kayaking. Highly recommend!!
subcategory_ranking: #32 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve

address: Praia do Castelo, Albufeira 8200-000 Portugal
description: SUPA was born out of the passion that its founders have for the sea and for adventure sports. We are a young and dynamic company, specialized in exploring the coast and the sea caves of the Algarve, with extensive experience in water sports such as Stand Up Paddle, Surf and Kayak. Our goal is for the client to know the Algarve coast in a different way, providing emotions and memories that will last forever in your memory! We have a range of activities suitable for all levels of experience and age, so you can have fun with the family or with a group of friends. Come with us to live a unique and unforgettable experience, discovering the secret side of our coast, its beaches, cliffs and caves!
name: SUPA Sea Adventures
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Albufeira SUP Tour
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Benagil Caves - SUP Tour

reviews/0/text: SUPA was so organized and equipment clean and ready for our ocean kayaking adventure for our family.The SUPA staff was incredibly friendly, fun, and oriented to safety. They monitored sea conditions at all times to provide real time assessment as to whether it was safe to enter caves from the sea, etc. We had an inexperienced 8 year old with us and the staff could not have been more caring and attentive. We had an unforgettable wonderful experience and would highly recommend SUPA.
reviews/0/title: Safe, Fun and Breathtaking--SUPA is the best!
reviews/1/text:
We tried our first time surfing and it was just amazing! It couldn’t have been better! We definitely come back!
Thank you so much
reviews/2/text:
Amazing people, they help a lot and take nice pictures. 
We surfed twice and went kayaking, we would definitely recommend both.
Shout out to Antonio!!
reviews/3/text: Super nice and helpful instructors. Gave useful tips to everyone and also did many pictures & videos which their later sent to us. Was overall a lots of fun and can just recommend!
reviews/4/text: All arranged with ease. The guide was a really nice chap - knowledgable about the area and keen to ensure that the group were all having a great time.
reviews/5/text:
The whole day was great. The team carried out the instructions well. We then paddled down the coast through caves to a nice quiet beach where we had a short break before we returned 
Good team 
Good equipment
reviews/6/text: Originally was going to book boat, but glad I went with this instead. Instructor was very patient and helpful, kayaks were clean and in good condition, and the trip all round was an amazing experience
reviews/7/text: I couldn't recommend SUPA more for all activities they offer - Surf, SUP, Kayak - you'll meet great people and have a great time in an absolutely wonderful location. 11/10 highly recommend it
reviews/8/text: We we a little worried if we would be able to Kyak in December.  Lucky the waters were warmish and calm.  3 guides took our group of 7 for an amazing experience exploring the beautiful coast and the caves.  Don't miss this experience.   THey even went out of the way to drive us home but showing us different destinations we should visit during our stay.
reviews/9/text:
Amazing experience, new experience see you soon next time 
My students enjoy it. It was challenging
reviews/10/text: We enjoyed this so much we will definitely love to do it again and it was worth it for the cave at the end. Also we love our pictures too!
reviews/11/text: very complete course that allowed us to get to the waves very quickly and the instructors are very nice!!!
reviews/12/text: We loved their customer service, how quick they got back to us and their willingness to adjust to what we needed.  Diogo arrived at the site ahead of us and got everything ready.  We had a non-swimmer with us who was nervous and he took great care to make sure she was comfortable.  He took lots of time to explain everything to us and he carefully kept checking in with us to make sure we were good.  Would 100% recommend this company.  We loved Diogo.
reviews/13/text: It was so much fun. The teachers have prepared us very well. I felt safe and confident to surf alone. I liked the practices and how the class was structured. I will come back. Thanks!
reviews/14/text: Beautiful location to kayak. The boats made the water really choppy so it was nice to have a guide out there with me. Lots to see on the tour.
reviews/15/text: We had an excellent time with SUPA in Portugal - everyone was very friendly and professional, we got an excellent amount of time on the water, and kayaking through the caves was amazing!
reviews/16/text: I spent one week with SUPA Sea Adventures! The teachers are great, especially Diana! Thank you guys again it was a lot of fun!
reviews/17/text:
Recommended experience 

Staff very friendly and experienced

We really enjoyed the tour. 

Thanks for sharing the pictures
reviews/18/text: We had a great time. The three guys that led the tour were fun and definitely knowledgeable. Due to rough waves, we were unable to go near any caves which was disappointing, but understandable.  Not sure if we will ever get the chance to do it again, but would consider them again .
reviews/19/text: Myself & my daughter had a fabulous trip & would recommend to everyone  as the staff were super friendly & helpful, I’m terrible with remembering names so sorry I can’t personally mention the guy who did our kayak tour

description: Marine Biology and Sustainability As Marine Biologists our main goal is to organize eco-friendly experiences that promote the well-being of the families who come with us, interfering as little as possible with the surrounding ecossystems. We believe that the first step for Nature Conservation is to connect people with the environment. For most of us the ocean is just a blue layer, but once we are able to see through it our perception changes forever. We will always try to preserve what we love. It's fascinating to create this bridge between the ocean and everyone who wants to explore the Algarve. You're welcome to join us! ​Inês and Pedro
name: Zip & Trip
