reviews/0/text: I was apprehensive about doing this as I don't like cold water and can't swim very well but Ines was Fabulous! She looked after me and I was soon very comfortable and began to enjoy the absolutely stunning secret caves of the Algarve <3 It was really a breathtaking experience. Both Ines and Pedro were lovely and very professional!  I'd highly recommend this tour.
reviews/1/text:
Me and my two sons (23 and 25 years) took the cultural walk and food tasting tour in Ferragudo our last day in Algarve. Should have taken it in the beginng in our week in Algarve instead. Our exellent guide Ines gave us a lot of other nice things to do in Algrave and actually whole of Portugal. 

The walk in Ferragudo was really nice and we got to know a lot of interesting things about this small fishing village and also tasteful things to eat and drink. During the walk our guide Ines took nice photos of us and the environment, and it was included in the price. Both me an my sons where really satisfied with the tour and will gladely recommend  this to anyone
reviews/2/text:
What an amazing day this was! We are now a week back in NYC (two weeks since our amazing tour) and we cannot get this snorkeling/hiking/hidden caves experience out of our minds! We met the van in the square in Ferragudo-only steps from our Air BnB-and picked up the rest of the party (limited to 8 which made a perfectly intimate tour!) We were then quickly outfitted with wet suits and water shoes, and headed to the beach.  After leaving our personal belongings and grabbing fins and goggles, we were OFF!

After short, easy (stunning) hike over the cliffs, and then down to a hidden beach, we suited up and were on our way! I chose this tour because I wanted to face my fear of snorkeling and being vulnerable to sea life...Also to discover some more "untouched" parts of the Algarve coast in a purer way. I have to say: these goals were satisfied on ALL FRONTS.

This company absolutely LOVES what they do; and that love is infectious. We always felt safe. At one point, we were given the option to take a dive under some rock into the hidden alcove--or simply follow our other guide around the other way around. It was nice to be as risky or timid as you wanted to be (but I would definitely recommend the risky route!!)   :)

Hours exploring the ocean through a snorkel with buoyant wet suits and fins left me feeling serene and "one with the ocean". We were both encouraged along the swim path and also allowed to explore areas we found interesting. Our lead guide pulled up a sea cucumber at one point, and let us touch it, which delighted the two little boys in our group! We saw a stingray burying itself in sand; cuddlefish, sardines in droves; and tons of other sea life..!

A day later, we had a ton of GoPro photos in our email--What a fully delivered tourist experience! We feel very lucky to have found Zip & Trip, and you will be glad you chose them too!

HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!  INCREDIBLE VALUE!!  AMAZING EXPERIENCE!!
reviews/3/text:
This was a beach based trip, so be aware it is not from a boat.
Booking was super easy with Inez! Remember to bring cash to pay at the end of the trip.
Pedro and Kenneth led our trip, and they were very knowledgeable about the sea and the flora and fauna. Remember to ask about the starfish fossil in the roof of the cave!
1st, we snorkeled over to the Cacém then into the cave. As it was low tide, we were able to go up on the beach inside the cave for a while, where we were shown the features of the cave band how it was formed. Really cool. The, we snorkeled out, and around a big haystack rock, over to some old sunken ships cannons, then into the beach. We saw lots of fish even though the water was a bit murky from the low tide. After the snorkel, we have a nice fruit and cheese snack on the beach. All in all, a very pleasant way to spend 1/2 day.
reviews/4/text:
Was looking for different activities for us to do while on holidays. came across zip and trip and was by far one of my favourite parts of our holiday.
Pedro and leila took our tour and made us feel like home the whole way through excellent guides had a lot of fun and were both very knowledgeable on the marine life 
Dont miss the chance to do this tour
reviews/4/title: Snorkelling Trip [Best experience we had in portugal]
reviews/5/text: Pedro gave us a very nice walking tour in Ferragudo. He showed us some very photogenic places and told us many interesting facts about the history of Ferragudo & nature in the Algarve. Also, the food and wine was very tasty. Thank you for this great experience!
reviews/6/text:
Our teenage boys - 15 and 12 - had been looking forward to the snorkelling trip for weeks and it did not disappoint.  What an amzing, fun experience led by a really knowledgeable and passionate team with a genuine pride for their local area and environment which came through in the tour.
We were a small group of just six which made it a really personal experience and gave us the opportunity to really explore without spending lots of time waiting for others to catch up or dealing with different levels of ability which is often the case with bigger groups.
There was also a real commitment by the team to make sure everyone got the most out of the tour and they were really helpful beforehand, answering our emails - they take out a small inflatable 'dinghy' which can hold a couple of small bags which was really useful for us with a Type 1 Diabetic in the family.
It's a full three hours - two hours actually in the water - and if the sea is choppy as it was for us then it's tiring but our boys managed it easily and loved the detour into the hidden cave.
The picnic at the end was the best any of us had tasted (probably because we were so hungry!)
Would definitely recommend and can't wait to do it again next year.  Thank you!
reviews/6/title: A massive hit with the whole family!
reviews/7/text: Pia picked us up at the agreed time with a van and brought us to a place to fit a wetsuit. She’s very interesting and a good conversationalist. From there we went to the beach where Pedro took over, and he and his young colleague though us how to snorkel. We felt very safe in their hands, and they were very friendly and considerate. At first the water felt very cold and I thought I wouldn’t last even a minute, but with because of the wetsuit most of the cold went away soon and I felt perfectly fine. The snorkelling was amazing, the cave is beautiful and we saw plenty of fish. After the activities Pedro surprised us with a little picknick on the beach with some fresh fruit and some toast and cheese. If we’re in this area again we will go with Zip & Trip again, but this time for the longer tour.
reviews/8/text:
It was my first time snorkeling, they are very understanding and can give you a lot of support as you go in small groups. I got to see a beautiful cave that even most of the locals are not aware of it. I learnt all about its history from how it was created to how it was used by pirates. 

While snorkeling I saw some amazing sea life anything from crustations, barnacles, different sea plants such as sea searching, and anemones and of course some very interesting fish. As well as getting to see this brilliant animals we were also informed of there biological facts and history, and the kids enjoyed it because of Nemo:). 

We swam around a protected bird reserve and got to see some nesting birds, then to finish of the tour we were able to see 3 old sunken cannons, followed by a nice picnic.

 They take photos through out the trip as well as underwater photos where I got some great shots of not only the wildlife but also me snorkeling underwater with ginger hair, I still refuse to admit I'm ginger. 

I had a great experience and am defenetly going to go again.
reviews/9/text:
In August 2019 during a trip along the coast of the Algarve, I took the 5 hours snorkeling tour together with my girlfriend. We had a thoroughly great time in and around the sea and we would always take the same trip again. It is more than worth it!
Whereas the actual snorkeling was a great experience (we saw various animals, including a squid and a chameleon after the tour), the attitude of Ines and Leila was especially exceptional. Both of them genuinely cared for us and our wishes. One could feel that they were dedicated to getting us in touch with their home and the environment. The tour really is not just another commercial snorkeling tour, but one which tries to discover the less crowded places at the Algarve in small groups, always in both eco-friendly and humorous manner.
A combination of familiarity, awesome hosts and great, non-commercial snorkeling spots - one could not really wish for anything else!
reviews/9/title: Awesome experience with genuinely nice people
reviews/10/text: I did this tour with my two teenage sons aged 12 & 14 and we absolutely loved this. It was a highlight of our holiday so far. It is amazing swimming out to the caves which is a real privilege to experience with such expert local knowledge. Pedro and his team really look after everyone and you feel this is a much more personal tour than maybe some others. I can not recommend this highly enough - Pedro, Ines and team have 5 star reviews for good reason.
reviews/10/title: Wonderful snorkelling tour - you must do it!!!
reviews/11/text: Lovely people and scheduling was right on time. Secret caves were amazing and underwater life was truly beautiful. We really loved the experience with Pedro and Ines. Recommended for everyone who wants to have dedicated and custom tours instead of common tours with a bunch of people. Definitely something to look for in Ferragudo/Portimão.
reviews/12/text: We had a group of 7 friends and we wanted to try something different, we all live in the Algarve but this was a completely new experience for all of us and we had the most amazing day. Ines and Leila were fantastic hosts, we were picked up from Ferragudo and taken to a wonderful beach which none of us had ever been too and from there we explored the wonderful hidden caves and beaches. I have only tried snorkelling once and found it hard to relax but Ines had a great way of making us feel comfortable in the water and it was a truly magical experience seeing all the sealife underwater. At the end we had a gorgeous picnic on the beach (all arranged by Ines and Leila) and relaxed in the sunshine whilst trying to identify what we had seen. Thank you for a truly fantastic day, I will be recommending to everyone and I can´t want to try again.
reviews/13/text:
It was amazing ! Thank you so much! 
Pedro and ines are so friendly and professional too 

I recommend, it’s not like a “tourism trip” 
We was 8 peoples, and that’s it, 

Thank you so much! Obrigado! 

I really loved this moment when they sang birthday music in the cave 

See you soon!
reviews/14/text:
The planning and pick up we’re on time, both hosts are very chatty and accommodating. 
The snorkelling route is very good with a cave trip, around a large rock and 2 old cannons on the seabed. 
We’d highly recommend this trip to anyone looking to snorkel around the Ferragudo area, cheers guys, obrigado!
reviews/14/title: Lovely trip, well organised and great hosts
reviews/15/text: We absolutely loved doing this walking tour thru Ferragudo!  Pedr & Inez were awesome. Our family of five -including 3 teens w/ attitude - had a great time. It was fun, informative and something different.  & the local food & drink was great!
reviews/16/text: So great meeting Pedro and Ines. Great trip, Pedro patiently managed group of inexperienced and experienced snorkellers. Lovely trip saw some great stuff, book it. Passionate Ferragudians.
reviews/16/title: Great memories, great experience, great value.
reviews/17/text:
We went on the five hour snorkelling trip to Alvor and I could not recommend. it more highly.  Our guides Ines and Leila were lovely and from start to finish it was a really memorable experience. We went as a family of four, with two teenagers, none of whom had snorkelled before, and they made it so relaxed and so much fun. 

The snorkelling was superb - we saw so may fish, anemones, crabs, sea cucumbers and sea urchins, and it was a truly magical experience.  The beautiful caves, which you couldn't reach any other way, were amazing and the fact it was in such a small group made it even better.

This was one of the best excursions we have ever done as a family and I would urge anyone to try it.  Excellent all round - the local knowledge and obvious passion for the local area and the sea just made it an unforgettable experience.  Many, many thanks.
reviews/17/title: Best day out of our holiday
reviews/18/text:
My wife and I went on both the snorkelling trip and the food and culture walking tour. Pedro and ines were amazing hosts with a real passion for the local nature and culture and they couldn't do enough to make our trip memorable. Was sent a copy of all photos and videos taken the next day!!

My wife does not have sea legs and was really well looked after when she felt poorly without any impact on the rest of our group. We saw some amazing caves and learnt a lot about the local area. Picnic on the beach was first class, exactly what was needed after a few hours in the water.

Walking tour took us to some places we would never have found on our own and was amazing to see how Ferraguda has changed over the last 50 or so years. Food, wine and company were all excellent.

We wouldn't hesitate to book another trip if in the area again, thankyou both.
reviews/18/title: Great experience with a personal touch
reviews/19/text: Had a fantastic time on the snorkelling experience, went with my wife and couldn't fault our trip. We were picked up from Ferraguda and all the equipment was provided. We felt very safe and looked after, our guide Pedro was very informative about the different fish and the geology of the caves. Would highly recommend this trip to anyone looking for an intimate and interesting trip away from the hussle and crowds of the usual tourist beaches and trips on offer. We were pleasantly surprised with the pricing and thought that it was really good value for money. We enjoyed the experience so much we booked a second trip the following week.

address: Lagos 8600-537 Portugal
description: Hey there, traveler! Since 2013, I have been crafting, refining, & sharing one-of-a-kind hiking adventures to the Algarve's wild West coast & historic End of the World, one small batch at a time. My approach is unconventional: I create hands-on, full-sensory outdoor experiences that blend movement, action, and discovery with space for wonder, reflection, education, and surprise, then I sprinkle it all with laughter, stories, music, food, and wine. I choose wilderness & remoteness over guidebook tourist destinations; intentional, mindful travel over superficial sightseeing; discovery & learning opportunities over photo opportunities; and rustic, physical experiences over easy, mass-market ones. My aim is simple & sincere: To share a travel experience that's not just fun, but meaningful; not just good for us, but good for the world; not just a social-media moment, but a memory for life.
name: The West Coast Adventure Co.
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: West Coast Hiking Adventure with Dinner, Sunset & Stargazing
reviews/0/text: This tour was an incredible day. TJ put together such a fun, thoughtful and adventurous day for our family.  We have 3 kids (17,14,10) he made sure the hikes were challenging but also very rewarding.  We started at the top of the cliffs on the west coast with some of the most beautiful views I’ve ever seen.  Then we hiked down close to the water where we could see the waves crashing in.  The day ended right at sunset where he setup a little picnic for us on top of the cliffs.  It was honestly pretty magical.  He was great with our kids too! This was all of our favorite day we spent in Portugal.  If your looking for something unique, this is the tour to book.  Thank you again TJ!
reviews/0/title: The best day we spent in Portugal!
reviews/1/text: Hiked with TJ in Sept 2022. This is the best small group tour I have ever experienced. TJ has really curated an amazing hiking experience for those who love to be outside! When we reached the West Coast shoreline, it was undoubtedly one of those “is this real life?” moments. Best day of my 8 day trip to portugal. Hope to return to do another tour with TJ some day. Final note, the food he provided for us was divine.
reviews/1/title: A MUST DO if you love the outdoors and a good adventure
reviews/2/text:
TJ’s planning and personal approach made the experience exceptional.  He is a skilled
leader who gave the group enough direction and support when needed and space when appropriate.  The experience was something we would never have done alone which made it a high value experience.  The small group dinner, on the edge of the cliff, after dark completed a perfect day. No hesitation recommending for all able body ages.
reviews/3/text:
I have travelled a lot to be honest 
And this was seriously one of my best adventure experience  ever!

I was quite nervous before since it was my first hike alone plus I am afraid of hights plus I am not the most fit person…

It was just wow, seriously wow!

The view was breathtaking, the guide was simply amazing, organized, resourceful and caring for are needs. 

Then when you made it to the end of your journey you get to enjoy amazing wine and home made finger licking tapas!

Seriously enough said! How can I say this politely? What are you waiting for, book already you won’t regret it!!!

Sincerely

N. From Montreal Canada
reviews/4/text: One of the most memorable experiences of my life was touring the Algarve West coast with T.J. and some other amazing people!    T.J., our tour guide, was engaging, informative, and fun!  He challenged us to take in the beauty with all of our senses.  T.J.'s style was relaxed but he kept us moving so that we received an experience  that surpassed expectations!  Truly, it was an incredible day with breathtaking vistas, full of energy, and opportunities for contemplation.  Lasting until well past sunset, we ate a delicious dinner under the stars.  Perfect day!
reviews/5/text: Wow... we had been recommended by a friend to do the Algarve tour, and it surpassed even our high expectations. It was hands down the best thing we did in Portugal, and something we will always remember! T.J. does a great job of bringing the group together, appreciating nature, and pushing you to explore. If you want something unique and off the beaten trail, this is the way to do it!
reviews/5/title: Hands down best thing we did in Portugal
reviews/6/text:
I dare to say that the tour with the @westcoastlagos was a life changing experience. Walking through the intact parts of nature, I truly became part of it. There was no need for endless triggering of buttons on the device by which we create memories. As I stood on the edge of the cliff, I felt the breeze on the fingers of my hands, I breathed the freshness of the ocean through the two openings on my nose, I felt free. I felt like a humble believer in the most beautiful cathedral that only can be created by the nature. I will have enternal memory in my mind and heart, I just need to close my eyes and imagine and again... I am standing small, full of respect in front of the vast expanse of water that blends into the horizon with the sky ruled by a powerful wind. I've never felt like that before. I am happy and grateful that I can be part of this beautiful world. 
Thank you T.J.
reviews/7/text:
I'll start by saying this review is about 5 months late but maybe that will make it more meaningful. Five friends and I were in Lagos and decided that we would give this tour a try, having no idea what to expect. This was probably the best decision of the trip. We have not stopped talking and laughing about our experiences on this tour, from the moment it ended until now and i'm sure it will continue into the future. 

I can't say enough about TJ, he really made the day perfect for us. He felt out our group, knew we had different comfort levels and tailored the tour to make it enjoyable for all of us. He was able to put up with inside jokes and have fun with us but also able to find perfect moments for thought provoking conversation. 

I highly recommend this tour to anyone, I know that they adapt the tour to your needs and provide you with a unique experience that you wont forget. Thank you TJ for the amazing time!
reviews/8/text: I booked the Classic Adventure, the end of the world hike, thinking it would probably be the highlight of my trip to Portugal. It actually exceeded my expectations! Such a great time, a great adventure, beautiful scenery. TJ was an excellent host and guide, knowledgable, considerate and helpful.
reviews/9/text:
if you are traveling to Lagos & the Algarve region, you MUST book this adventure. i spent 2 weeks in spain & portugal and this was (by far) the best day of my trip.
where do i start?
the views - absolutely breath-taking spectacular scenery around every turn (rocky cliffs, crashing waves etc., finishing at the 'end of the world' for perfect sunset & stargazing
the hike - moderately challenging...the perfect level to make it feel like you were exerting yourself, but not to the point of 'too much'; and you are out there without the tourist buses!
post-hike - the most authentic/awesome food & wine under the stars...home-made & delicious...couldn't stop eating it
tour group - our small group of 7 started out as strangers but developed a level of camaraderie that it ended up feeling like i was spending the day with long-time friends...primarily driven by T.J. creating a welcoming/open environment.
...and with T.J. leading & guiding us through the day, it was THE most memorable experience and one that you'd never be able replicate on your own.

simply stated, if you visit this part of the world, book this adventure...you will be super glad you did!
reviews/9/title: Way better than a 5 rating! Highly recommended!!
reviews/10/text: What a wonderful experience!  T.J. was an excellent guide and made the day incredible. Spectacular views, great company, and a delicious picnic dinner under the stars to top it all off. A highlight of our trip to Portugal for sure!
reviews/11/text: This tour was recommended by a friend and we booked at very short notice.  We were a little concerned that, as a couple in our 50’s, we’d be the odd ones out but our fears were quickly banished once we met T.J. and saw how skilfully he runs his trips.  He’s passionate about nature and the environment but there’s nothing preachy or puritanical about his approach: he encouraged us all to step just a little outside our comfort zones, both physically and socially, and it worked.  By the end of the day we’d seen stunning, unspoilt scenery, scrambled up slopes I never thought I’d scale, gazed at the stars and eaten a wonderful Portuguese picnic by lamplight with a really interesting group of people.  It was the highlight of our holiday.  As for those carrots… book on and find out for yourself!
reviews/12/text:
It was brilliant! You hike places that you would never find on your own - gorgeous scenery, great photo opportunities, lovely to be out in nature.

We were a group of 9, 2 Canadians, 3 Aussies, 2 Italians and us (2 Brits), TJ was great at getting everyone to chat with each other and feel relaxed.

The day lasts from 1pm to about 10pm, but you are not hiking all that time. The actual hiking distance is only about 3-4 miles. 
There's a bit of a drive (30mins - ish) out to the west coast at first, then the getting to know each other bits, and then there are plenty of stops during the hike to look at the views or where TJ will tell you great facts about the area/flora/rocks/history and then the picnic on the beach at the end. If you have an basic level of fitness and dont mind climbing over a few rocks you'll be fine.
At the end you have a little picnic on the beach and do some star gazing, TJ knows his stuff... get ready for the laser!

It gets windy, very windy - take more layers than you think you will need, as you'll be chilly, esp after sunset, but dont worry if you forget, TJ has plenty of back ups and will make sure you take enough with you. Also note as you are in the wilderness - the bushes are your loos! 

My favourite things were:
- not seeing another soul the whole day - you're out in the wilderness
- the varying scenery....rocks, cliff faces, beach, sea
- TJs facts about the area - seeing rosemary and sage growing in the wild
- the food in the tapas picnic as the end - your plate(s) are slices of bread, then you top with olive tapenade, sweet tomatoes, marinated carrots, white bean hummus - it was so so tasty
-star gazing - usually i couldnt care less about this but out there it really was spectacular
reviews/13/text: TJ was great in making it a wonderful experience.  He took us to areas that we would never found on our own.  He challenged us but kept us safe.  He is knowledgeable and clearly enjoys what he does on a daily basis.  We highly recommend this experience.  We ranged in age from 25 to 64 and we all enjoyed it.  If we ever go back to Portugal I hope that TJ will still be there to take us on another hike:)
reviews/13/title: It was an amazing experience and we all felt the best of all of our experiences in Portugal.
reviews/14/text: I'm not someone who likes tours or touristy things, but TJ's tour was absolutely the best. He took us away from the crowds and the chaos to the remote west coast of PT. We hiked, we soaked in the scenery, we learned a ton, and we finished with a picnic under a sky that was dripping with stars. Oh! And it was even warm enough to swim at this breathtaking little beach that pretty much became my favourite beach ever. TJ will take you places you can't find on your own. Cannot recommend this tour enough!
reviews/15/text: The scenery was breathtaking. T.J.’s knowledge and love of the former “end of the world” was deep. Our larger than average group of 11 included 4 Canadians, 2 Germans, 2 Taiwanese, 2 NYers and an Australian.  T.J. made  it a point to foster group cohesion, which really added to the experience. His focus was on having us use all 5 senses to take in this beautiful yet, at times inhospitable place.  The hiking was not that challenging, in total about 3 miles, though there were points where climbing up and down rocks,  to reach cliffside vistas, added just enough difficulty to make it very interesting.  We got to see a wonderful sunset, then had a tapas picnic under the stars.
reviews/16/text:
We are avid hikers, day-trippers.  This hike ranks up there with some of the best we have done.  It is very rigorous and high!   Despite that, we had several first time hikers that did fine.  TJ paces the day just right and the team works together.  The scenery is great and the BBQ under the stars is unforgettable.  

Be sure to pack plenty of snacks.  You will be burning calories!  TJ says hiking boots are not necessary, but I sure wish I had had mine.  Wear them if you have them.
reviews/17/text: My husband and I went to Portugal on our honeymoon. This was our favorite activity! We did the day tour and Treven was our tour guide. He was great and very knowledgeable about the environment. The views were stunning. I’m so thankful for the tour since I wouldn’t have seen them otherwise. Crazy heavy fog rolled in right before the sunset so we didn’t get to see it or the stars. We made the best of the situation. The food he brought was delicious. This tour is a must and I will continue to recommend it to anyone I know going to Portugal.
reviews/18/text: Do not hesitate to book this tour. TJ provides an unforgettable experience on the SW coast of Portugal. You spend the day with beautiful cliffs, landscapes, wind, water, beach, and fellow international hikers. After the day of walking and the picnic dinner under the stars, you’ll feel like you’ve truly experienced all that this corner of the planet has to offer. Couldn’t recommend more highly for anyone looking for a little adventure. Thank you, TJ!
reviews/19/text:
I’m an avid hiker and I love to travel independently, to peruse maps and guidebooks to find the most exciting trails wherever I’m going. So I was rather skeptical about going on a guided group hike. But it turned out to be one of the most remarkable outdoor travel experiences I’ve had in recent years. After he picked us up in the touristy resort town of Lagos, it took our guide TJ just a half hour or so of driving to bring us to southern Portugal’s windswept, wild west coast. Just about the only other people we saw were beachgoers below us in the far distance, who probably had no idea about the natural beauty around them, waiting to be explored. 

If you’re in southern Portugal just for a few days, like I was, it’s hard to imagine that you’ll find this natural beauty by yourself. The hiking along the unsigned trails wasn’t particularly hard or long (there were people of a wide range of ages and fitness levels on our tour) but it all felt much more remote than I’d thought possible in such a popular tourist region. 

TJ, an American who has lived in this part of Portugal for a number of years, was an incredible guide. He was brilliant at bringing the group of about 8 people together and making sure that we paused to smell, hear, feel, and even taste the nature around us. And the way he ended the evening — sunset, picnic, wine, stargazing — was wonderful and creative. I couldn’t recommend this tour more highly, even (and perhaps especially) if you’re visiting the Algarve for just a couple of days.
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from The West Coast Adventure Co. tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Rua Dr. Francisco Vito M. Corte-Real 2, Loja T, Lagos 8600-642 Portugal
address_obj/street1: Rua Dr. Francisco Vito M. Corte-Real 2, Loja T
description:
Closed for holidays! 
Magic Board Center is a surfboard shop and rental center in Lagos. Test, rent and sale of quality surfboards. - "Try before you buy". Wide selection of various shapes and sizes, technical advice, surfboard accessories (fins, leashes, wax, traction pads, boardbags etc). - Surf rentals. - Wetsuits for sale. - Surf lessons. - Surf guiding. - Stand up paddle boards (SUP). - Ding repairs. - Custom artwork and custom made surfboards.
name: Magic Board Center
photo/caption: Test, rent and sale of top brand surfboards. Try before you buy
ranking: #35 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #35 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: Some people are happy to sell you what they have in their shop without telling you too much about the product, this was a completely different experience. The boards were selected to match my ability and laid out for me to view with absolutely no hard sell. I bought a fantastic board, 7' 2" Surfactory Play, it's the right board for me and I can't thank you guys enough for all of your advice.
reviews/0/title: This should be your first and only stop for advice or a surfboard purchase
reviews/1/text:
My girlfriend and  I  had a brilliant experience with the Magic Board Centre.

Ksenia was incredibly sweet. I texted some hours before arriving because I was anxious not to miss the opportunity to rent quality boards from them. Ksenia kept aside a mounting rack for our car (provided when you rent boards) in anticipation of our arrival, which was a blessing as it was the last one. She also provided some quality nuggets of information about the local area and beaches . This made a big difference.

Rick was also kind and incredibly helpful in taking the time to demonstrate how to use their mounting racks effectively, which we both valued and appreciated!

Thank you both for your professional and friendly service. It made a significant impact on us and was a highlight for us during our two-week tour. Hope to see you again during the winter!

Duncan and Meike.
reviews/1/title: Fantastic shop with a professional and friendly service.
reviews/2/text:
This place and the owners made my days in Lago more than worth it!! they really take the time to give advise about the surf conditions and what beach to go. Without them, I would have felt lost and gone to the wrong beaches at the wrong moment. They know all the ins and outs. I am so grateful. 
Also, the prices are very affordable. You can rent for a whole day and you get discounts from 4 days. 

Lagos is a good place to surf when on the west coast it is too big. That was in my case. From this centre it is possible to walk with the board towards meia praia and porto mós. If you have a car you can also rent boards and go to other beaches. There are many options nearby. 

Thank you sooo much!!!
reviews/3/text:
THE BEST!
Ksenia, works in the shop. She is the most kind and patient person I’ve met on my travels. I’ve never surfed before, and regardless of the long lines, she took time to explain to me each and every little thing I’d need in order to have a wonderful time. Marcus and Marcelle, the instructors were a perfect teaching pair. One stern and direct to tell me what I needed to know and one that jokes and encourages. They are an incredible shop. If you’re looking for a surf rental, are a beginner, or are nervous, magic board centre is the only place I recommend
reviews/4/text: This shop is the best!!! Flew all the way from South Africa, airline lost all our surfboards. So we were stuck in Portugal with no boards. And this shop really saved our lives. Managed to get 2 new surf kits boards, fins and leashes at a very suitable price. Staff are friendly. Would highly recommend.
reviews/5/text:
Professional, very helpful and friendly service. Boards are high quality and well maintained. It’s the best value for money you’ll get in the area and much better than renting at the beach (in case you are a beginner). 

We got a roof rack and wax for our boards included with the board rent and the team helped us in a heart-warming way to install the roof rack to transport the boards safely. You can also switch boards once a day, if conditions change or you want to try something else.

If you’re looking for lessons, board recommendations or surf spot advice, this is the spot in Lagos. The team knows the area inside out and will provide you with high quality and pleasant support, no matter what it is you
reviews/6/text:
These guys went above and beyond and I can't recommend them highly enough. It's a bit of a tale...

We borrowed two stand up paddleboards for four hours (I think it was 25 euros ish) to explore the beautiful coastline from Lagos. We arrived without a booking and managed to get a couple. The lovely woman who runs the place checked the usual safety things plus showed us a live webcam of the surf conditions and a map of coves to check out. One thing to look out for: it was cash only! You also need ID and something valuable (said ID) to leave behind. We'd actually only got a photo of our ID and a bank card to leave and they were kind enough to make an exception. They threw in life jackets and drybags for no extra cost.

Off we trotted on the 8 minute walk to the beach (a bit cumbersome with the boards so do factor that in). We had a lovely half hour exploring and I'd really recommend SUPs to check out the area at your own pace. HOWEVER...

Out of nowhere I got the most seasick I've ever been in my life. For the course of about 30 minutes, I was stuck in the ocean, lying on my board, vomiting my breakfast directly back into the sea. Grim. We eventually managed to paddle our way to a cove but even on dry land, I was totally gone. No idea what hit me but hey ho...

We called the shop to explain and they immediately hopped in the car and came to the random beach we were at. They helped us dry off the boards, deflate them and get them in the car. After dropping those back at the shop, they then came back to give us a lift to the shop and make sure us pathetic landlubbers were safe.

So kind and thoughtful and without a snarky word or disgusted glance despite our ridiculous condition... Please do visit these guys and give them your business - you never know if you're going to need rescuing!
reviews/6/title: Great value board hire BUT ALSO service above and beyond
reviews/7/text: My wife and I bought our new Boards at this place and we really appreciated the help to figure out the best boards for us. We could even test the boards before buying - that’s very uncommon for a surfboard shop but helps a lot! The Magic Board Center offers nice boards for a good price with an outstanding consultancy. If you want to buy a board in Portugal, go to this place!
reviews/7/title: If you want to buy a surfboard in Portugal, go to this place!
reviews/8/text: Super helpful and super friendly. First class service. Great boards for rent. Would look no further if looking to rent a board
reviews/9/text: Surfing around Lagos? this is where you want to hire. So helpful! So kind! Awesome service! 10/10! They want you to have a nice time. An awesome couple own this shop and they do it with style. The boards are in beautiful condition and are a good price. We will be coming back :) thank you for making our surf trip easy. I couldn’t recommend them more.
reviews/9/title: Everything you need for a surf trip.
reviews/10/text: Mega friendly and helpful people. They gave us good advices and recommended nice places to practice. For sure we will visit them again :D
reviews/11/text: The shop has all the equipment you need, from beginners up till professional surfers. On top of the material, the owners give great advice on where to surf depending on your level and the weather conditions. They were extremely friendly and helpful. The boards and wetsuits are of very good quality and the prices are low. You can even get a free roof rack for easy transport by car!
reviews/12/text: Some friends of mine and I rented boards for a few days. The shop is beautiful with options for pure beginners to experts. The owners are wonderful people who took their time to inform us of the best locations to surf for the coming days and to give us some tips on how to start. The rentals (which were already very cheap and of great quality) came with a free system to attach them to the roof of our car.  10/10 would recommend!
reviews/13/text:
These guys are great! Very helpful and friendly! They gave me some great advice. 
Got a super good tail repair with a tail that was pretty messed up, and this at a great price

Would highly recommend this place to anyone! Peace out✌️
reviews/14/text: Super helpful and friendly people. Always ready to help and give tips about the surf and other nice spots
reviews/15/text: Best place in algarve to buy boards! Super friendly people who give good and honest advice. I like the 'try before you buy' concept.
reviews/16/text:
The best place to rent or to find a new board! 

Rick & Ksenia are very kind and attentive. 

They explain to us all the technical details to surf better, even in the shop we improve our surfing, because rick has the experience as a surf teacher.

You can choose your new board and then you can try it for free! 

Super service! Thank you so much guys
reviews/16/title: Best place to rent or to get a board!
reviews/17/text:
Super friendly. Amazing Boards. Great advice!
If you're looking for getting an amazing high class board this is the place to go. You can try them all out before you buy them or just rent them for your Holidays. I was looking for a long time but there is no place where you can rent such high quality boards anywhere at the algarve. 
Xenia and Rik always provide you with the best local advice on where to surf or give you some great tips to improve your surfing. 
Definitely don't want to miss out on this gem if you want to surf the Algarve!
reviews/17/title: THE BEST PLACE SURFSHOP AT THE ALGARVE
reviews/18/text: MBC has all the choice of Boards one needs and they make recommandations you can rely on. I loved the board they gave me (rusty smoothie 6.0). Thank you. Will return for sure!
reviews/18/title: Choice and great advice - just perfect!
reviews/19/text:
Super friendly, helpful and supportive staff that goes the extra mile.

They took a lot of time to explain us the different beaches in the region, how to decide independently which beach to choose depending on the different weather conditions and also offered us to help if we have further questions during our rental time (9 days, 2 boards and a 4/3mm wetsuit). 
They also allowed us to exchange boards from their wide variety of boards as often as we wanted - which we did. If necessary they also borrow for free rooftop racks to transport the surfboards safely.  

Finally, something we would like to highlight:
Unluckily, during the rental time one of the boards broke during our Surf. Despite this loss they were very supportive, stayed longer than their opening hours to give us a new board so that we can directly continue to surf the next morning and supported us with the necessary documents for the insurance. 

Overall the interaction was uncomplicated, super friendly and helpful.

Therefore, I would highly recommend to rent your surfboards at the Magic Board Center.
reviews/19/title: Get your boards there! Great surf rental with staff that goes the extra mile and a variety of bards.
subcategory_ranking: #35 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve

address: Cais Vasco da Gama Praia da Rocha, Portimao 8500 Portugal
description: Come and visit the most beautiful caves and rock formations in the Algarve. Enjoy aboard our boats, meet and explore more than 30 caves on a pleasant and fun ride. Embark on this tour that starts in pier Vasco da Gama in Portimao to the famous Benagil cave one of the most beautiful in the world.
name: Carneirinho's Boat Trips
ranking: #33 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #33 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text:
An absolutely perfect day!  The captains were funny, knowledgeable, and very kind. The boat size was perfect for our group of 8 to be able to get in and out of caves the bigger boats couldn’t. Even though initially I wanted to kayak, I am so thrilled we did the boat ride instead!  Kayaking looked stressful…

Thank you Rui and Jose for a wonderful time!  I would do it all over again in a heartbeat!
reviews/1/text: Awesome 2 hour trip around the stunning coastline and caves. Only had 1 other couple on the boat with us. Small boat meant we could go in and out of all the caves whilst much bigger boats just looked at the caves from outside! The two Captains were so knowledgeable and their English was excellent - great sense of humour!
reviews/1/title: Brilliant boat trip to see the caves!
reviews/2/text: Perfect trip, wonderful captains on board, they are very experienced on what they do, and the size of the boat is perfect to go into the caves, you can’t do this in a bigger boat, we did in the past and we regretted badly as we didn’t had the chance to see all the beauty in this paradise. Highly recommend!!! Thank you so much Rui and Zé for this memorable day. See you next year ❤️
reviews/2/title: Highly recommend, best ones in Algarve
reviews/3/text: Great staff! Awesome tour for Portugal coasts...raccomanded! The crew will bring you to visit all the best caves of the coast!
reviews/4/text: Small boat, max 10 people with 2 excellent and funny captains who know and share a lot of usefull local info. . Small so you can go into coves where bigger boats can't get in. We were also very lucky cause 2 saw on two occasions dolphins. Next time we will book them again
reviews/4/title: Excellent small,fast boat with 2 great captains
reviews/5/text:
Fantastic cave & boat tour - with the best captain/crew

Had an amazing tour today with the company «carneirinho’s Boat Trip».
Visited a lot of caves, even got time for a swim from the boat.
Highly recomended. Our teenagers/young adults also loved it.
reviews/5/title: Highly recomended - we visited all caves with the best captain/crew ever!
reviews/6/text: Fantastic boat trip, with great captain and tour guide. If ever in Portimao, this is recommended show gaves in best way possible
reviews/7/text: Fantastic! You get very close to all caves! Good guide. And extra treat- dolphins! 2 hours and just the best part of the vacation
reviews/8/text: Excellent experience! We visited literally every cave from Portimão to Benagil (meaning we entered every cave! Many boat rides can't do this dur to the boat size). Everything was safe and fun, we enjoyed the views, the ocean, the breeze and the company of our captain and 1st mate!
reviews/9/text: Captain Rui & his First Mate provided a world class experience. Professional and highly entertaining. These guys have the best office in the world and we are grateful for a fabulous experience!
reviews/10/text:
All was perfect! Great trip, great skipper,...
Boat reserved just for our family.
No risk with COVID.
I recommend.
 Alex
reviews/11/text: We ended up renting a boat for 3 people but my friends ended up getting sick, so I couldn’t pass up the opportunity to see the coast of Portugal and I decided to go alone. The guides, Riu and Jose, made this trip more than perfect! I saw beautiful caves of all sorts of different colours and gorgeous rock formations by the coast. This trip is a MUST see if you love natural wonders! The guides made me feel so comfortable, and even accommodated me by taking many photos of me since my friends weren’t there to do so! I highly recommend.
reviews/11/title: Amazing tour!! Great guides. MUST SEE!!
reviews/12/text: We had a great time on this boat trip. Amazing scenery! The captain was very entertaining, informative about good places along the coast and good tips about places to visit. Very easy to book via facebook. Worth every penny!
reviews/13/text: We really enjoyed this trip! Lots of great memories. The nature we got to see is just stunning. The guides made the trip fun
reviews/14/text: We went as a family, 4 children ages 2 to 10 years old, 4 adults and a couple that we didn't know. Everyone had an amazing time! The captain and tour guide were very experienced at what they did. Not only did we get to see, we actually went in some unbelievable spaces in the caves because we chose to go on  the small boat. We were treated to Dolphin site seeing too that day. It was perfect!
reviews/15/text:
We went from Faro to Portimao just because of this tour :) we were 12 in the boat including my friend and the rest of the guys were portugese speaking. But Jose and Louis were accomodating us so nicely in both languages. They were really fun and showed us even better caves than Benagil :D the boat was small, so we could go in very small ones too and see amazing nature in/out.The time passes soo quickly, highly recommend to book a tour with them. 
A side note: better you take a thin jacket/towel as it may get a bit cold on the way back.
reviews/15/title: Best tour company with great captain and guide!
reviews/16/text: We took this trip as we were driving from Lagos to Albufeira and really didn't want a long boat ride from either city so drove to Portimao for this tour and was so glad we did!  Jose and Louis were both so awesome in their commentating and presentation of the sights that made the trip even more fun!  Really enjoyed this cave trip and saw the highly rated caves like Benagil, the heart, etc but even the more unheard of ones where you go in complete darkness and all you see is blue water - spectacular.  Very worthwhile and highly recommend.
reviews/17/text: There is so many companies who provide the visit of caves, but this one was for sure the best option. I am glad we've chosen Carneirinho. We had a small boat so we could go even to the smallest caves, it was really exciting. The capitain was very funny. I would recommend this to everyone, thank you !!!
reviews/18/text:
Our family of four had a very nice 2 hour trip to the caves east of  Portimao. 

We also got good advice on places to visit by car also. 

Highly recomnended!
reviews/18/title: Very nice boatride to the caves
reviews/19/text: A 2 hours boat trip visiting the caves and beaches:) it was really fun and interesting!! Rui and Jose make it a very pleasant ! Totally recommend it !

address: Armacao de Pera 8365-186 Portugal
description: PRESTIGE DAYS - Travel Agency, Lda - Transfers Company is based in Armação de Pêra, Algarve - Portugal and we operate 24/7 Airport & Local Transfers. Our private Faro airport transfer services are ideal if you don't want to share a car or minibus with anyone else or for those who don't want to wait around. Our private airport transfer will provide you with the comfort of knowing that after you arrive at Faro Airport, our chauffer will be waiting to pick you up and take you and your luggage to your destination, without any hassle.
location_string: Armacao de Pera, Faro District, Algarve
name: Prestige Days Travel & Transfers
reviews/0/text:
Possibly the best airport taxi transfer we have ever had. 4 adults and 2 children. Pavel was the best, communication was excellent and he even went out of the way to get us tickets and transport to the Zoomarine park. So bear them in mind for those sort of excursions too. Will happily use again if we come back.

5 star service. Tickety Boo!
reviews/1/text: The best taxi’s around!! We arrived in Portugal earlier this month and was really unsure about booking taxis and getting around, but Pavel and Diana continue to be amazing, answering any questions we have, including sending us links to recommended places we have asked about. The name really suits the service, prestige all the way through! We will certainly continue to use Prestige throughout our holiday! Both Pavel and Diana are lovely people and our little boy (18 months old) doesnt stop smiling at them throughout. Best wishes, Mr Keegan (aka Batman)
reviews/2/text: I have been using Prestige Days Travel for 4 years - taxi journeys to and from Faro Airport and journeys during my visits to Portugal locally.  The service is wonderful, Pavel and Diane very professional, hospitable, knowledgeable, reliable and friendly.  I recommend their travel service to all.   Lorraine Powell
reviews/3/text: Pavel was indispensable during our recent week in the Algarve. Very nice, clean car, always on time and instantly available on Whatsapp or by phone. Pavel himself is a super chap and also was able to give us some very helpful local recommendations. Will 100% use Pavel again on our next trip to the Algarve. Thank you Pavel! Alex
reviews/4/text: Pavel was amazing. We used him all week and he was so reliable.  A simple phone call or WhatsApp message and he was there. He recommended restaurants and gave us some great tips. We will definitely use him again. Very clean big car and excellent driver. Thanks Pavel you made our holiday very easy it was like having our own chauffeur xx
reviews/5/text:
We stayed as a family of four in a villa in Alcantarilha around 2 years ago during the summer. It was only by chance after our taxi didn't turn up at the supermarket that Olga (Pavel's sister) gave us a business card and offered their services if we needed them later in the week. She wasn't pushy - she was polite and professional. And so, the following evening we booked with Pavel, and with his genuine, friendly and punctual service, we used Prestige Days for the rest of the holiday. Pavel took us back to the airport on our last day too. 

The prices were perfect, the vehicles were immaculate and modern, and both Pavel and Olga had fantastic local knowledge for restaurants in the surrounding areas.

Having been a year before this and unfortunately not being aware of Pavel - if, in a post-COVID world, we return to the area (we hope to!!) then Prestige Days is the only company we would use. Highly recommended.
reviews/5/title: A fantastic service! Will use again when we return.
reviews/6/text: Our driver was amazing was at any destination within 5 minutes. He also helped us from recommending places to eat to checking what desks are check-in at the airport. Great man and definitely would call a friend. If I ever come back to the area he will be the only person I would call extremely recommend
reviews/6/title: Best taxi service in the area by far
reviews/7/text: What a great service, very prompt at replying to messages and always there to pick you up when needed, even at very short notice. Both cars are immaculately clean and air conditioned. Pavel and Diana are very polite, friendly and very happy to provide recommendations, and help purchase discounted vouchers for parks. Our boys loved travelling in the larger vehicle which had blacked out windows (they were amused noone outside could see them :-) )  They are no more expensive than any other service, and you get to travel in luxury (you cant beat jumping into an air conditioned vehicle.)  I just wish we knew about Pavel at the beginning of our holiday rather than half way through as we would have no doubt used them everyday. I highly recommend Pavel and his wife Diana to make your holiday even better.  If we ever travel to Portugal again (which I'm sure we will), we will 100% use them.  Thanks Pavel and Diana.
reviews/7/title: Highly recommended - you wont get better than this!
reviews/8/text:
I can’t recommend them enough! Diane was such a lovely lady, we used the services a number of times during our holiday To go to and from the main town. She always greeted us with a smile and was
Lovely with my 4 year old daughter. She was also very useful in making recommendations and supporting with discounted tickets for places.  We would definitley use them next time and will also book a
Private transfer With them instead of the pre organised ones via the tour operator.
reviews/9/text: Pavel and his wife Diana were fantastic. We came across them by chance and for the rest of the week, Pavel was able to collect us at short notice, replied immediately to messages, offered us excellent recommendations (the meals Pavel suggested were our best two meals by far!) and they were both very cheery, polite and friendly on each and every journey. A lovely couple and the bee's knees of taxi services! Thank you for all your help.
reviews/10/text: I cannot recommend Pavel and his lovely wife Diana more highly.  He was recommended to me and he was in touch prior to our trip to confirm all arrangements.  He gave us great advice on perfect places to visit with our family and recommended what turned out to be our favourite restaurant of the trip (Lobo Del Mar) He checked in with us during our stay to ensure all was well.  And, when my youngest daughter was sick his wife gave us great advice on the best clinic to see her, drove us there and even waited for us until she had been seen.  I cannot thank her enough.  Again, for our return journey, he was always in touch well in advance to confirm arrangements and even knew our check in desk at the airport before it was even visible on the airport screens meaning we were first in the queue!  They were bot so friendly, caring , efficient and such generally lovely people on top of never keeping us waiting.  I look forward to seeing them very much again hopefully next year.  And, hopefully post-COVID, we will finally be able to shake hands.  Truly, sound as a pound! :)
reviews/11/text:
Olga is super nice and very helpful. She drove us where we needed safely and gave us tips on other things to do too.  
I highly recommend their service. They are very professional, kind and honest.
reviews/12/text:
What an amazing time we had in Portugal. If it was not for Olga we would not have known of the various places to go. 
We spent our time in Armacao de pera and carvoeira. Olga, Dianne and Pawel really helped to make the experience great. Great fares, great advice and always friendly!
reviews/12/title: Great service from Olga, Pawel and Dianne!
reviews/13/text:
The best service I have ever had from a taxi. Thanks to Olgas local knowledge and Pavel and Diana's amazing service, we had a holiday far out weighing our expectations! We would not have seen or known about half the things we experienced with out these marvellous people.

A truly outstanding service, more than just a taxi, but local advisor and advice on all matters.

Thank you from Jamie and Salwah
reviews/14/text:
Pavel is a realy nice guy. Everyting was excellent. Good price, he is on time and verry friendly. I could recommend his service.
Greets, Patrick
reviews/15/text: I cant say enough nice things about pavel, he was always available, always on time and always smiling! Pavel always goes the extra mile to make sure you have an amazing experience and has great recommendations about the area. 10/10 would recommend!
reviews/16/text:
We had our first stay in Portugal this year and we found Prestige Days Travel & Transfers
through Trip Advisor. We used these folks to transfer us from the airport to Armação de Pêra.  Pavel made sure that we knew where we were going (we didn’t) and assured we knew where to find essential first day supplies.  He got us around, and for our needs we found he and his team better than renting a car. He and his wife have a travel business and steered us in the right direction for good tours in the area. 
After making contact with them they helped us in so many ways. Pavel, the main man, was always on time and called before arriving. We had several last minute requests and he came through  for us and always with a smile. I cannot say enough good things about Pavel. He showed us how to take full advantage of offers at the grocery store saving us a lot of $$$. When things went sideways in mid March (Covid 19) they helped search for some airline fares for our return trip to Canada and Pavel knew what was happening at the airport in Faro and helped us work around the situation.  When we arrived back in Canada Pavel even messaged us to make sure we had arrived home safely.  If you want to make your vacation a hassle free zone get Pavel on your team.
reviews/17/text:
First met Pavel when we arrived in Faro. 
From the start he was an excellent host. Polite and very courteous. Loved to chat with us and welcomed us to the area . We used his firm quite a few times when we were there with family. No job to big or small. From airport runs to shopping runs and local taxis. 
Fantastic family guy with a small private business who enjoys every minute of his day. Pavel , you are a top man with fantastic family. We will return and you are on our contact list already. 
Take care and stay safe. 
Denver and Jennifer.
reviews/18/text: Superb looked after us in the 2 weeks we were there excellent service and 1 to 1 service, also the best and cheapest airport transfers,would of paid double what they charged for the excellent service, thanks again you guys made are holiday
reviews/18/title: The best company in the algarve
reviews/19/text:
When enquiring at our hotel, for a taxi to take 8 adults to Albufeira, along came Pavel. Good English spoken and always on time. The vehicle was clean and tidy and looked quite smart, with an executive type minibus.
We continued to use him for any travel during the rest of the holiday . Messaging him simply via WhatsApp. Reasonable prices and always punctual. Thank you for your excellent service Pavel. I have your card, for when I return to Portugal .

address: Estrada da Gale, Albufeira 8200-424 Portugal
description: Surf 4 Fun is a new concept wave surfing, and stand up paddle (SUP) school in Albufeira, and we intend to give you a different and unique experience, different form all the other schools. Our goal is to make you smile and have fun, and discover your hidden talents and adventurous side. Surf 4 Fun has the best professionals instructors, with lots of experience, who will help you develop your skills
name: Albufeira Surf4Fun
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Stand Up Paddle Tour
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Albufeira Surf Lesson
ranking: #34 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #34 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: It was so cool to be able to try ourselves out in the setting summer today! Rafael talked us through all the basics and then made sure we were safe and having fun! We hope to come back soon! ❤️❤️
reviews/0/title: First time goers - don’t think twice, just gooooo
reviews/1/text:
We took a whole week surfing class with 10 children and 6 adults..... we had so much fun....
Excellent organisation, teachers and surfing equipement.  Everybody improved their surfing skills (beginner and advanced). 
Everyday a nice warm up, explination on the beach, practice in the water, evaluation on the beach... it could not be better!!
reviews/1/title: A fun surfing experience with families
reviews/2/text: I participated two days the surf lessons with my children (9 and 11) in the end of Oct.. There were some windy and wavy days, which means the conditions for surf beginners were not guaranteed. By signing in the course, Ricardo checked first the best weather conditions for us, while in other surf school the daily business is going on even for beginners. Ricardo is such a good trainer, who is professional, patient, reliable and responsible. He stayed in the water during the whole course helping the children and giving valuable advices. On the first day we had a small group with 6 persons, everyone gets a successful surf experience - stand up on the board. My children had so much fun with Ricardo and joined another course on the second day. Even this time even smaller group, the course was not cancelled, as you feel that Ricardo really enjoy teaching surfing and tries to fulfill every wish. I recommend this surf school anyway. It is professional and also makes fun.
reviews/3/text: Great experience first time ever surfing solo, would recommend to beginners and individuals with some experience. Instructor was friendly and knowledgeable and made everyone feel comfortable.
reviews/4/text:
Great Team! Safety, fun and patience to bring us to success. Ricardo was a great and helpful teacher. The hole team did everything that we have a good experience. As we had no waves at booking date they offered a lot of solutions to support us. 
Finally we choose next day and as promised the wind/waves were perfect. 
Thanks a lot, we will come back. 10/10
reviews/5/text: It was my second surf lesson and i also did one before but not there, but when i should choose where was the best than i will choose surf4fun because they did a great job, the people are so kind and they know what they do, they stay side by side and help you how to surf right! It was so much fun i thank you so much for this unforgettable memories
reviews/6/text: Just one word. Amazing. Amazing lesson, amazing coach (Rafael), amazing experience. That's my second time and it's absolutely worth attending. Just try, don't think twice
reviews/7/text: The lessons were very professional. Good contact. Ricardo- the best teacher, with a lot of patienece. He was very kind and motivated to learn us as much as he could . Totally recomend 10/10
reviews/8/text:
Excellent surfing lesson from an excellent guy,definetly coming back.
Thankyou Riccardo.
Grtz from from Vincent :)
reviews/9/text: Booked Sam a surfing lesson for his 14th birthday and he had an amazing time. Ricardo and his team are so friendly, really nice people. Ricardo is a great teacher and spends time with everybody. Wetsuits and boards are provided and we got way more than the full two hours in the sea. Can't recommend it highly enough. Obrigado Ricardo!
reviews/10/text: I've had a few surf lessons before, but none of them were anywhere near as good as the one I had with Surf4Fun. The lesson was 3 hours of pure fun and excitement. The instructors are very professional and passionate about giving surf lessons, constantly motivating us to do better! The whole lesson is also translated into perfect English. I will be going here again whenever I get the chance! Thank you Surf4Fun for the great experience. :)
reviews/10/title: The best Surf Lesson I've ever had!
reviews/11/text: We went here for surf lessons with the 4 people (three with the age of 25 and one with the age of 55). Another group of 4 persons joined the hroup. Our instructors were Ricardo and Igor. Ricardo is very enthusiastic and really teaches surfing with the goal of getting as much progress as possible. They took al the time needed to teach the basics and they took time for personal assistence where someone could not catch up with the group. Ricardo didn't care about the time, he just let is decide when it was enough. We paid for 2 hours, but the lesson took 3 hours. We stopped because the group was tired, but i'm sure we would have gone on if anyone wanted to surf any longer. In the end we all stood surfing on the wave! Great lesson and great progress. I would recommend this surf school to anyone. I Promiss you won't regret it! It's worth the money!
reviews/12/text: Went surfing with my family for the first time. We had a lot of fun, the lesson was good. So if you want to learn how to surf, i would really recommend surf4fun. They take all the time you need to teach you everything. Thanks a lot!
reviews/13/text: My girlfriend and I booked a surf lesson for today and we had an amazing time! It was very fun and we were taught to surf in no-time. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to learn how to surf the best and most effective way possible. Thanks again, Ricardo (and crew), you were great! Joyce and Dries
reviews/14/text: Wow. It was amazing we highly recommend. We had Ricardo as our tour guide he is very friendly and chatty. Some tours we did were very rushed however Ricardo took his time and we were out for 5 hours with him when it should have only been 2.30.if we are to visit Portugal again this is the first company we book with. Amazing thankyou so much. Sights were amazing also. Ps. Expect to fall in and have a laugh
reviews/15/text:
I totally recommend this school ! I had a really good time. Ricardo is a really nice instructor. He pays attention to each person taking the class. You can feel that it is his passion et he wants to share it ! 
When you take this class, forget about time and enjoy ! 
Thanks again :)
reviews/16/text:
This was my first time when I tried surfing and I guess I will do all my best to surf more often. The surf school is amazing, my coach 
Ricardo really is a professional. I was the only person who didn't speak Portuguese and he translated everything to me. It was very nice. And just because of him I had a chance to catch my first wave in my live. Thank you, Surf4Fun for great experience!
reviews/17/text: One of the best experiences in my life. Never tried surf before this class, the staff is amazing, friendly and really enthusiastic. Loved it. Definitely try a class if you are up to catch some waves. Thank you Ricardo for the day❤️
reviews/18/text: Great surfschool! Our instructor (Ricardo) was very kind and patient and learned us the surf techniques the best way possible!
reviews/19/text:
It was a very good experience! We had a surflesson from Antonio, he was very nice and a very good instructor. We were with 4 girls and in the end we all could stand up on the board.
All the staff is very friendly. An experience we will never forget!

address: Rua Marechal Furtado 36a, Lagos 8600-752 Portugal
description: "In a village with very few inhabitants, where almost everyone is religious. It is said that no one has been seen entering or leaving the Clarksons house for a long time! Too long to believe everything is ok… There is a rumor that they left the house without saying anything to anyone, while others believe the family is still in there! Some say, at night, scary noises can be heard, that a mere human being would not be able to reproduce." It is up to you to discover what happened to the family and end this mystery once and for all! THE EXORCISM - DO YOU DARE TO ENTER?
name: Holy Trap - Escape Room Lagos
reviews/0/text:
We have done quite a few escape rooms and really enjoy them…  This may well be our favourite one ever!

No spoilers, but the hosts were FANTASTIC and made this such a spooky experience.  

Really well thought through puzzles and areas are so creepy you just never know what you’ll uncover next.  If you want to try it, you’ll definitely need to work together, and we would say a 12+ age rating is definitely a good idea… some real scares in there!

All in all it’s a fantastic experience with great rooms and puzzles, made even better by the amazing hosts.

Huge thanks, from us and highly recommended
reviews/0/title: Brilliant escape room; and so spooky!
reviews/1/text: I had a couple expectations that weren't met and yet I left the escape room extremely satisfied by this unique experience. The game was super imersive and I found myself looking behind my shoulder most of the time because the ambience was so well built that I always felt like something was about to happen. The survival instincts really kick in moving forward in the game and the pressure just increases as we move towards the end. I genuinely feel like it's going to be a tough task to find another room as imersive, entertaining and scary as this one, and I only wish that I could go through it once again as my first time. The people in charge of the game were also super nice and it was a great time speaking to them and learning the mechanics behind our terrifying experience.
reviews/2/text: Holy Trap is well organized and great communication. We had a great time and enjoyed solving the clues. A few surprises thrown in that we were not expecting which made the escape room better than any others that we have done previously. Great staff and a well thought out experience. Everyone enjoyed it and would definitely recommend to others.
reviews/2/title: A great experience, well worth the visit.
reviews/3/text: So much fun! Terrifying and challenging at the same time! Super friendly staff. A great way to spend time with family or friend.
reviews/4/text:
First, I agree with all the other reviewers who rave about this place. The escape room and puzzles were SO well done, and the mood and props and plot were all fabulous. We were especially impressed at the care that the owners took to ensure that we had the best visit possible--e.g. when we were clearly spending time in a fruitless direction, they would give little hints so we didn't waste our time. I love that the room works equally well in multiple languages.

I don't like horror movies and get scared easily, but I LOVED this escape room--I was so engaged that I never wanted to tap out. Our 13-year-old son also had a fabulous time, and the older teen boys and my husband loved it as well. 

This escape room is a must-do if you are in Lagos.
reviews/5/text: Brilliant. It would be easy for this kind of activity to settle for a mediocre experience as it is the only escape room in a popular resort but this is a GREAT experience. From the outset you get a friendly welcome and briefing and then into a well designed set of puzzles with (what we thought) had just about enough scares in it without being too scary. We have had a great time in Lagos but this will probably be the activity we talk about most on our return. Very highly recommended.
reviews/6/text: such a fun and lively experience! so entertaining and definitely frightening, the lady and guy that ran it were super fun and engaging!
reviews/7/text:
Definitely the best I’ve ever done. Cleverly constructed it starts with a bang and is full of jump scares as well as seriously good puzzles. Interactive, it requires at least one member of the party to have balls…and that isn’t always the person you think it will be….
Congrats to the couple running this. Top fun
reviews/8/text:
We've done many many escape rooms and this one wins the grand prize!  The 'home-grown' ones, made with the imagination and passion of the owners, tend to be better than the big branded franchise ones, and this one wins in its category.  

The 2-person team behind this room are exceptional.  There is so much thought and attention to detail here, but the best thing is the theatre, the scares and unexpected twists that they have woven into the experience.  We were all thrilled, scared, horrified and amused and all while trying to solve the clever puzzles, riddles and explore our way through a very cleverly constructed room.  Seriously, we have done like 20 of these rooms now and this one was BY FAR the best!
reviews/9/text: A very scary escape room with well designed puzzles and very friendly staff. Lots of rooms and variety of challenges with creative solutions.
reviews/9/title: Very cool very scary very fun very spooky very intense very chilling very epic very jedward
reviews/10/text: Have to say a really great way to spend an afternoon, really enjoyed it. The couple running it are so nice and very helpful when we got stuck on clues. Highly recommend
reviews/11/text:
Brilliant! I've done 3 other Escape Rooms and this was the best. And plenty of scream-out-loud jump scares!

The staff were excellent - explained it all perfectly and gave clues along the way via walkie talkie when we needed them.

Really fun activity.
reviews/12/text: Really brilliant time. Honestly probably the best escape room I have done. We did this as a fun date as a couple though would defo recommend for a group of friends. Would highly recommend as a fun ( but scary ) way to spend an hour!
reviews/12/title: Brilliant- best escape room we’ve been to
reviews/13/text:
Utterly amazing & terrifying!! Hands down the best escape room we’ve ever done. A must-visit for anyone in Lagos, even for those who haven’t done an escape room before.
The hosts have put in so much effort to make it as scary as possible with the atmosphere. Really fun and scary. We did it as a couple but would be just as fun for a group. Don’t want to give anything away but will say that from the first to last minute we were on edge. Clues were just the right level of complicated without too much frustration. The ambience really added to the experience as well. 
Thank you so much for a wonderful and truly scary time!
reviews/14/text:
That was an exhilarating experience! I could literally feel the hair on my arm and neck standing up on several occasions. Luckily, my partner was with me and went bravely ahead while I watched his back ;) 
The owners and inventors designed great riddles within a very scary setting. You can feel that they love what they are doing and are putting a lot of thought into the game.
The owners gave the hints with good timing and just enough information.
I highly recommend it (even if you are - like me - not a horror fan)!
reviews/15/text: We allready did many escape rooms before, but this one really scared us to death:)we had a lot of fun to solve the riddles of the rooms. the guys did a really great job and were very kind and friendly. we can highly  recommend this game.thanks for the nice experience.
reviews/15/title: we highly recommend this super scary game!
reviews/16/text: This was such a great escape room! Me and my boyfriend went when one of the days was looking a bit rainy and this did not disappoint! As there was only 2 of us and we we’d almost escaped they did let us go over our time. I’d definitely recommend this, just be ready to be scared!!
reviews/17/text:
Lovely little details & riddles. We are a couple with some experience and needed 1h15m. Really nice hosts which cared a lot before and after. It was medium scary with good supporting effects.

We can totally recommend it.
reviews/17/title: You can run, but you cannot hide...
reviews/18/text:
Do it! 
Never been to an escape room before but this was a fantastic experience: the entire family loved it, we made it out & lived to tell the (many) tales. Deserves 6 stars!
reviews/18/title: Highlight of our trip so far
reviews/19/text: We do a lot of escape rooms and this is possibly the best we've done. Solving clues is one thing but doing it with a constant fear of being made jump is another! We spent at least 2 hours analysing and laughing about it over dinner after. Owners are great, showed us around and let us watch the embarrassing CCTV of us screaming after. Horror fan or not (we aren't!), you must do it!

address: Praia da Rocha, Portimao Portugal
description: We're a passionate team that will be delighted to take you aboard on an unforgettable eco friendly electro-solar boat trip! From our big concern with sustainability, environmental protection and passion for boating, we came up with the idea of creating the first eco-friendly nautical tourism company. Algarve Sun Boat Trips is Algarve's first tourist company with an 100% ecological fleet of electro-solar boats, without any carbon emissions, enabling comfortable, silent and, above all, environmentally friendly tours. We contribute to a more ecological form of tourism, reducing pollution in water beds and producing zero carbon emissions. Evolving into a brighter, sustainable future, our boats use the Sun as its power source. Solar energy is collected by photovoltaic panels and stored in existing batteries on the boat. Without fossil fuel consumption or exhaust fumes our boats were designed to sail at zero cost for the environment, reducing our carbon footprint to the limit.
location_string: Praia da Rocha, Portimao, Faro District, Algarve
name: Algarve SUN BOAT Trips

ranking: #39 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
