reviews/0/text: Ricardo was our tour guide and boat captain.  He was most knowledgeable about the river and the region.  He was funny, personable and made the trip most enjoyable.  The Arvad Winery and vineyards are beautiful.  Our guides were interesting and engaging.  We tasted 4 wines.  Each one was very good and was accompanied by a range of delicious charcuterie.  We would absolutely recommend this tour.
reviews/1/text: Third trip and love it every time! The views are spectacular, the boat is comfortable and the caves are amazing! Highly recommend as the BEST choice!
reviews/1/title: Sunboat is THE way to go!
reviews/2/text:
Very relaxing, great guide. Very friendly and considerate towards travelling with small children. 
We have really enjoyed it.
reviews/3/text:
The catamaran is a beautiful, brand new and 100% sustainable boat which glides smoothly along the stunning Algarve coast. 
Our captains gave us great insights into the historical and geographical intricacies of the region. 
I can recommend it highly to anyone who is interested in seeing the coast, without polluting this region.
reviews/3/title: Incredible boat tour along the coast of Algarve
reviews/4/text: Great tour. Great guys. Great boat! We had a nice chilled time. The boat is amazing and we got a lot of interesting information about the area. Even though we were the only ones that day, they continued with the tour. We enjoyed it!
reviews/5/text: Super nice experience and tour on the Sun Boat. What we saw was absolutely amazing. The crew, Ricardo, Samuel and Pedro, was nice and careful. All was safe, nice and joyful ! Thank you guys for what you offered my kids, wife, friends and I. Unforgettable trip. And ecological friendly. 100% sustainable. Mickaël
reviews/5/title: Tour trip to visit the cliffs and caves
reviews/6/text: We had a  wonderful  boat trip down the river  Arade from Portimao to Silves. Ricardo is a great guide. Great experience, not to miss
reviews/6/title: Fantastic boat  trip  from Portimao to Silves
reviews/7/text: Our taxi driver couldn't find the departure point and we thought we would miss the cruise but Pedro kindly came to find us! Such an enjoyable, relaxing day. Pedro joined us for lunch in Silves then kindly gave us a tour of the town! He was great company. Cruise took an hour longer than advertised as Pedro showed us several extra places of interest. He also allowed us all to steer the boat. Good value for money.
reviews/8/text:
We had an afternoon sail with Ricardo and couldn’t have enjoyed it more. The boat is solar powered, so very quiet. We were able to get close to wildlife along the river. Ricardo provided a educational background to the trip. His knowledge of the ecosystem is amazing. We had 2 hours in Silves to explore before the return trip, which was even more enjoyable. We saw a larger flock of pink flamingoes and many storks. We also were served refreshments to make it perfect.
Highly recommend!!
reviews/9/text: We took a great trip up the tidal Ariade River from Portimao to Silves. Our guide, Ricardo, was excellent - enthusiastic and knowledgeable. We saw wild boar, flamingos, herons, storks and much more. The solar-powered engine is very quiet, which adds to the atmosphere as you travel on the river. Silves is a beautiful town with an important history. A visit to the castle is a must.
reviews/10/text:
Great trip and customer care & reception, everyone can follow!
But from the start: I found the phone number on one flyer. I texted and asked for trip to Silves for 8 people + dog. We agreed everything very quickly. Then at agreed time we have met with Riccardo, very charmfull guide with lot of experience from the region... The boat was clean and nice but moreover it is 100% ecofriendly which means it is powered by SUN!!! Even easier to observe birds and breathtaking landscape in silence... The only thing which was preventing us from find ourselves in paradise was other petrol engined boats... On board we've been offered some drinks... After 1.5h hour of beautifull and relaxing trip we arrived to Silves. We had 1.5h hour for lunch (BTW simple lunch left no trace of hunger from  Valdemar offer just in front of boat arrival) and had a trip back. Except of observing number of birds, listening to Portimao's history and brave Portugal people, we finished by listening to the local music! I can honestly suggest this trip to anyone who wants to pass an excellent, full of impressions and relaxing day with family & friends. Best regards to Ricardo, our captain & guide!
reviews/11/text: We left early (8:50) at the marina to match the tides. The boat was so quiet that we were actually could hear the birds when cruising up the river. The guide told us about the surroundings, history and local economics. It was a very enjoyable and relaxing experience for the whole family. After a few hours we reached Silves and walked through the city centre. On the way back we were offered a good glass of wine and some snacks. The absolute highlight for the children was when they were allowed - under close supervision - to steer the boat. Highly recommended for a different view and experience, off the beaten track.
reviews/11/title: Relaxing on a solar powered boat up the river to Silves
reviews/12/text: We can thoroughly recommend the Sun Boat trip to Silves from Portimao. Ricardo and Pedro as well as trainee 1 and 2 made for a very relaxing and eco friendly day out on the Rvier Arade. The care and knowledge of this company are second to none and we had a superb sail. Even down to emailing me with the information about the Jacaranda trees the day after which was totally unexpected and very much appreciated. I hope that the boys will be able to get the sea going eco boat soon? Can't wait to join them on it on our next visit.
reviews/13/text:
Cannot recommend this trip any higher. It's excellent value for money, informative and on a boat second to none. The crew are fantastic and booking easy.
Pedro and Ricardo are a font of historical knowledge and also on the ecology of the river system and the wildlife upon it. The boat is small enough to feel like a personal trip but large enough that your comfort is not compromised in any way.

Snacks and drinks are provided on the journey and I can highly recommend the lovely wine we sampled.
This is not just a simple river tour but is a history lesson,a beautiful relaxing journey and and a chance to discover the water ways and those that live on them or alongside. 

Close your eyes and you hear nothing but birdsong, the waves gently lapping the boat or fishes splashing softly on the surface. Being powered by solar energy there is no chug , chug ,chug to spoil the atmosphere. 

We all felt this trip was undervalued for the experience we received in return, having left the boat feeling like we had journeyed with friends having shared many laughs along the way.

Silves is a beautiful place to visit but the boat ride especially made it more memorable as did the return journey where we sampled more of the coastline before sailing home into the sunset.

We wish Pedro, Ricardo and Ana continued success in this venture and will 100% do this journey again whenever we revisit Portugal in the future.
reviews/14/text: We booked this boat trip 1 day in advance on our holiday in Ferragudo (a village a few kilometers from Portimão). When we arrived we were waiting near the boat at the harbor instead of the meeting point at the kiosk (because we couldn't find it). We called the company to say we were already standing near the boat. This was no problem for them and we started to continue the boat trip. When we met the guide and the family who were also joining us we were warmly welcomed by them! Normally the tour takes about approximately 75 min, but the tourguide told us if it was a big problem for us if the tour would take a little longer then expected, this was undoubtely no problem for us because we were on a holiday. The family who also joined us were portugese. This was no problem for us because the tourguide would also take the time to explain everything in English. The tourguide learned us a lot about the history of the city during the trip and even would take the time to learn us a little about how to drive the boat! We even got the chance to drive the boat by ourself! This was a great experience for us and also for the kids who were on the boat with us. Furthermore we all got the chance to relax with a lovely local rosé wine that was given by our tourguide. The tour eventually took about 2+ hours. I strongly recommend this trip for tourists (or families) with or without kids. It was great to see the passion this tourguide had! When we are back in this city we would definitely do this tour again! 10/10!
reviews/15/text:
At first we wanted to thank Pedro for the great tour, he took 3 hours to guide us through the Arade river and even showed us some beaches. 

Surely would recommend this trip, great experience, we had a nice swim and Pedro is very friendly, relaxed and helpful.

Thanks again for the nice trip Pedro, hope to see you soon in Rotterdam !
reviews/16/text:
Excellent boat trip. 

Pedro is a really joyfull man who guides you with his local expertise through the magnificent landscapes. We wanted a trip with some rest, the boat is small so you won't have a crowded feeling like on the other touristic boats with big groups. 

The groups are so small that it even feels a bit like a private tour. The boat doesn't make any noise. Ideal trip to become zen, to enjoy mother nature and to see Portimão and its surroundings from another point of view. 

The only advice I can give: do not hesitate and take this trip. You won't regret any second.

Pedro, I am really thankfully for this wonderful experience. Thanks for letting me sailing. This trip made me really happy.
Obrigado!

Dimitri from Belgium
reviews/17/text:
Great trip recommend to all
Beautiful scenery and excellant guide
Silves is really beautiful and worth a visit
reviews/18/text: We were staying in Silves, so took the bus (only 3 euros) down to Portimao (we were charged a little less for the one way trip back to Silves). They picked us up in a  car Portimao and took us to the marina. The trip up riverin an electric boat (with shade) was interesting and we learned lots from the two
reviews/19/text:
This trip is nice break from ordinary holiday routines! Ana and Pedro host a friendly, professional and relaxing trip up the Arade river to Silves. They provide you with local anecdotes and historic details with enthuiasme and are enjoyful company as the solar boat brings you almost silently passed birds and fishermen along the river up to the ancient city of Silves. 

We had a great  with the couple, and was well looked after and catered for all in our group, ranging from 9 yrs - 80 yrs!

reviews/0/text: Excellent location to learn kite surfing, especially this time of the year. Nice, knowledgeable instructors. Good equipment.
reviews/0/title: Great place to learn kite surfing
reviews/1/text:
Sandra is the best teacher ever! Very knowledgeable and experienced kite surfer. Even though we were complete beginners she had a lot of patients with us, and explained everything to us very well. We had a lot of fun!

We recommend Eolis Kitesurf school with the amazing teacher Sandra to everyone who wants to learn kite surfing and have fun doing it!
reviews/1/title: Keep calm and release the bar!!!
reviews/2/text: I can’t recommend Sandra, Mario and the Eolis kite school enough. I really enjoyed the lessons, and felt the attention to detail, and focus on safety really added to my experience of feeling safe and comfortable with the kite. There is no better spot to learn Kiting, it’s a hidden gem!
reviews/3/text: Sandra provided Kiteknowledge und -experience very friendly, quiet and relaxed. Savety first! She has always adapted her training sessions flexibly to my beginner-level of learning. So I could feel a better relationship with the kite at my own pace, even if my coordination skills are not the best. I enjoyed very exciting, funny and memorable moments during this time and I am very grateful for Sandra!
reviews/3/title: Great Kite experiences - keep calm & relax
reviews/4/text: Sandra was super nice and patient since I was a beginner that gave me confidence! She was also very profesional and has a lot of experience!
reviews/5/text:
High quality instructors and lessons. Very range of equipment available. 
Excelent care concerning safety during kitesurf lessons. Covid safety rules well acomplished.
reviews/6/text: I've been kiting in the spot during vacations for the last 9y and wanted my 11y son start. I've kite in several places around the globe and this is one of the best spots I've ever been for beginners. Calm sea, lots of space and a marvelous team to support you. Sandra and the instructors are not only very professional but also very friendly! Unfortunately they were overbooked, and he could only take two lessons....the results was, we are going to come back for him to finish the course, me for riding and the rest of the family to enjoy the beach and the sun.
reviews/7/text:
Very professional team that helped me Kite Surf for the very first time!
With Mario as an instructor, I was able to enjoy my first rides in 3 sessions! The process is very well structured to get you there and I have always felt very secure. I would definitely recommend and will come back for sure 
The team is very nice and welcoming!
reviews/8/text: My husband and I took some kite boarding lessons with Sandra and Lucky and we had a great time. Cabanas has very good conditions for beginners with stable wind and mostly calm sea. We will be happy to return to advance our skills in a near future
reviews/9/text: Sandra is an excellent iinstructor. I had a great lesson with her. Definitely recommend kitesurf eolis!
reviews/10/text: fantastic lesson of 4 hours.  very competent guidance.  learned much. Good instructors. definitely a recommendation
reviews/11/text: It was great experience for my husband, we will continue the next year! Very professional and pleasant staff. I recommend
reviews/12/text: Three days of professional kite instructions by the eolis team made me progress. Thank you Eolis. Your systematic approach and your passion for kitesurfing amazed me.
reviews/13/text:
I had three days of kitesurf lessons and I really recommend Eolis school.
The spot is perfect, the equipment is first class and my teacher (Lucky) was great, always with a lot of patience and focused in safety and fun.
reviews/14/text: Sandra and the whole Eolis team did an amazing job in refreshing my few skills from 2 years ago and coached me to successful first rides on the open water. Will definitely come back next year. Thank you all so much!
reviews/15/text: Sandra and her team were fabulous. I had three days of lessons and was a trembling wreck! I was keen to learn, but petrified! The instructors were all very patient with me and very professional, ensuring I was competent before moving onto the next stage. I can’t wait to come back to Cabanas to continue my training! Thank you so much!!
reviews/16/text:
Thanks to Sandra and all the team for an excellent refresher lesson 
Hopefully see you again next year 
John m
reviews/17/text:
Excellent team of professionals and passionates,always available to yours queries...
Great spot and beach, excellent material.
reviews/18/text:
To the hole team of Eloisa kite Surf:
You did a great job! From open water self rescue Theorie that’s needed to feel confident, to really good practical tips,-  Nothing was missing! Thanks so much! Coming back for sure!
reviews/19/text:
This is my third kitsurfing course in the last 4 years and by far the best! The conditions and spots to kite are perfect for beginners and also for people who want to improve. I had lessons with Salsa and Clement, both excellent teachers focused on improving technique, staying safe and get us to sail independently as fast as possible. In addition these guys are great motivators and super fun! The best part of all is that you feel so relaxed because the whole team Including Sandra and Lucky are constantly taking care of you without you even noticing it! Another advantage is that the spots are never crowded! 

Ah! My kite had some issues with the valves and Sandra didn’t even blinked, she puts hands on work and resolved the whole thing for me. 

I can’t wait to return, Cabanas became my Homebase for kiting!
reviews/19/title: Excellent lessons, paradisíac place, fantastic teachers
subcategory_ranking: #38 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Kitesurf Eolis tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Lote Rua de Sao Pedro, Alvor, Portimao 8500-006 Portugal
description: A22 transfers are a friendly, reliable and family run company which offer the most efficient, private airport and golf transfers in the Algarve, Portugal.
name: A22 Transfers
reviews/0/text: The staff are always clean, and friendly.  The service is always reliable, and the vehicles are in a very clean and hygienic condition.
reviews/0/title: I always use this service, always excellent, clean, friendly, reliable
reviews/1/text: Pick up on time at Faro by a very nice but professional gentleman.  He was informative and answered all my questions as we drove along to Alvor. His driving was top class and we felt safe in his car which was comfortable, clean and tidy.  Thank you A22.
reviews/2/text: Excellent service, reliable, safe drivers and friendly staff. We have used this company on several occasions and haven’t been let down. They are competative and for a return airport transfer to Alvor charge 130 euros. Excellent if you want peace of mind and dependability from an experienced family business.
reviews/3/text:
We have used A22 on numerous occasions when going to Alvor from airport. All their drivers are polite friendly and are always happy to chat and give advice on the local area and what restaurants to go to. 
They are always punctual and easy to find at airport. When booking it is easy and hassle free. Very good rates. Wouldn’t use anyone else.
Good customer service. Well done again for making our journey a pleasant one
reviews/4/text: Booked a couple of excursions  at A22 good advice and service. Office in Alvor and easy to find up from the taxi rank.
reviews/5/text: Transfer Faro to Alvor. 4 cases and 2 golf bags, 2 adults, 2 kids 65 euro. Transfer from Alvor Baia to Penina Golf 15 euro each way. Transfer Alvor baia to Boa Vista 35 euro each way. TRansfer from Alvor Baia to Palmares 30 euro each way. Prompt and reliable service. Would defo use again. Also booked a cave viewing by speedboat excursion with them too.
reviews/6/text: Family business run well, with nice and friendly drivers, great communication from Roisin in the office, English speaking, easy to find in the airport, baby seat provided.
reviews/7/text:
Always use A22 Transfers. All the drivers are so pleasant and friendly. 

Always on time to collect you from airport and for your return to airport. 

Even if your flight is delayed there's no problem.
reviews/8/text: Excellent service provided. Quick response to enquiries  and reliable collections. Would highly recommend and will definitely be using A22 again.
reviews/9/text: Always there no problems even when the flight has been delayed.  Nice comfortable drive to and from the airport. Well organised
reviews/10/text: First time using A22 transfers and will be using again for sure. Divers bang on time, friendly and chatty and got us to and from the airport without a single issue. Highly recommend
reviews/11/text:
We have been using A22  for airport transfers from Faro to Alvor for years. (Naturally they go all over the Algarve)
 Always an English speaker. Always on time, always a good price, always safe and good drivers, always use the fastest route ... Why bother looking elsewhere. I rate them the best on the Algarve.
reviews/12/text: I have now made a note of the on-line booking and phone numbers for future use. PLEASE do book ahead and not last minute as they are very busy and don't want to disappoint.
reviews/12/title: Super organised, reliable, friendly - highly recommend
reviews/13/text:
We used A22 for a return transfer from Faro to Alvor. A lady driver met us as planned and took us to her spotlessly clean car. The transfer was smooth and very comfortable. James,  her son,  collected us 3 weeks later and drove us back to the airport. I must say he was personable and entertaining company. 
This was the first time we have used A22 and I would recommend the company to anyone wishing to support a local Alvor business. I'm sure we will use them again.
reviews/14/text:
My wife and I used A22 in 2020 when COVID restrictions cut short our holiday and James transferred us to Faro airport.
On our recent stay we were unsure if the transfers were still being operated and unfortunately did not arrange for them to pick us up from the airport at the start of our holiday. We did have a taxi from Faro to Alvor and of course the cost  was more expensive.
We contacted James at A22 for our return journey and he was in touch within minutes to confirm our booking.
The day before our pickup we again contacted A22 and received confirmation of our hotel pickup time.
Sure enough right on time our transfer arrived driven by James mother, Karen.
Our ride was very smooth and enjoyable in a pristine conditioned car.
Once again we are extremely happy with the service we received and recommend A22 to everyone.
reviews/14/title: Transfer from Alvor to Faro airport
reviews/15/text:
Thanks to James and crew for looking after our group of 12.this included taking bag to hospital on day of departure for one of our group  who ended up  there after emergency. Super servce. Highly recommended
Brian
reviews/16/text: Another faultless transfer with James from Alvor to Faro airport.Always reliable and friendly and spotless clean cars. Highly recommend.
reviews/17/text: Still the best on the Algarve. Welsh family business, very easy to deal with and totally reliable. Caters for all sized groups, kids seats and booster seats available.
reviews/18/text: I always use and recommend A22. They are exceptionally good value, utterly reliable, and easy to contact by phone or email.
reviews/19/text:
We had a very good ride from our Holiday location to the Airport. The Driver was half an hour too early, so we had enough time to pack and take a seat. The Communication after booking was also good and reliable. 
We can recommend Driving with A22!

address: Lote 7 Rua Manuel Teixeira Gomes 1 Direito, Albufeira 8200-291 Portugal
address_obj/street1: Lote 7 Rua Manuel Teixeira Gomes 1 Direito
description: fun-explorer-laid-back-adventurer-unique "COAST AND COUTRY SIDE" Smile tuk tuk is a fun, relaxed and easy experience to explore places that sometimes do not make themselves known in another way, both on the coast and inland, allowing in a few hours to know our culture, our cuisine especially outside the tourist areas , from secret beaches, hidden viewpoints, windmills, castle, typical restaurants, markets among others ... with guide / animator / driver who will take you on paths that by bus and train cannot go
name: Carlos smile tuk tuk
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Tuk tuk tour- the best way to see coast and country side
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: TOURS CARLOS SMILE TUK TUK - coast, country side or mix
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: All Day Private Custom Tuk Tuk Tour
reviews/0/text: Carlos picked us up on time and took us to many places, from the country side to the ocean, fabulous beaches and important viewpoints to take awesome pictures for us. Also gave us recommendations local seafood restaurants, I'm highly recommended him to everyone!
reviews/1/text: This was my favourite part of our trip to Albufeira.  After calling Carlos to arrange, he picked us up from the hotel and showed us some great sights and beaches.  Really knowledgeable about the area and have us a great restaurant recommendation. Such a lovely guy, I can't recommend him enough.
reviews/2/text: Excellent tour!  Carlos knows how to give you the full experience of visiting local towns and villages, and takes you to breathtaking views of the coastline!  Lots to see, and learn about the Algarve.  Lunch with locals in a lovely little town Paderne that was delicious!  A tour of an outstanding winery, trying the best Portuguese tart, and so much more!  Carlos was a wealth of knowledge -  great learning experience, and so much fun!  We highly recommend such a tour with Carlos, you will not regret or forget it!
reviews/2/title: A MUST DO WHILE IN ALBUFEIRA!  Tour with CARLOS!
reviews/3/text:
We really enjoyed the tour with Carlos ! He showed us places we would never seen alone. In addition he told us a lot about the history of Portugal.  
He took pictures of you want to and is such a nice and lovely person. 

We will come back & book a longer tour ! 
Thank you so much Carlos.
reviews/4/text: Always available when ever we messaged him, never made us wait any longer than 20 minutes and when he did turn up he always had a huge smile on his face that made us feel welcomed. Pricing is very reasonable!
reviews/5/text:
Dear Carlos,

Thanks for the nice tour and lovely places.
Now we know everything about the Algarve and you know so much about the nice spots and best restaurants.

Thanks for the nice pictures for in our photobook ;-) 

Greetings,
Justin and Lisa
reviews/5/title: Best tuktuk driver in the Algarve
reviews/6/text: Went for a ride around with Carlos, who is a wonderful host.  Full of knowledge of Albufeira.  Took me to the secret beach and it was wonderful.  If you want a tuk tuk then look no further than here.  Very pleasant and his English is very good.  Get on a tuk tuk of Albufeira and visit the secret beach - its a must!!!
reviews/7/text: É divertido tem muitas emoções e é fresco, as crianças adoram kkk, podemos percurrer muitas zonas, Albufeira e arredores boa opção para se divertir com a família e amigos
reviews/7/title: Emoções ao rubro Não sou adepto de tuk tuk mas é bom tem muita energia, as crianças gostam de emoções fortes kkk
reviews/8/text: foi uma experiência unica eu e a minha esposa fomos tratados com muita generosidade e simpatia assim como explicou tudo o que foi a visita aos monumentos adorei.
reviews/9/text: Foi uma ótima viagem! O Carlos é muito profissional e atencioso, para além de conhecer a zona como a palma das mãos!  Uma experiência a repetir!
reviews/10/text:
Condutor muito atencioso, gentil e conhecedor dos vários cantos e recantos da zona.
5 Estrelas
Recomendo

address: Sitio Eiras de Cima, Raposeira, Sagres 8650-282 Portugal
description: Coasteering and cliff jumping experts in the Algarve. We provide unforgettable adventures for families, groups and individuals between Sagres and Lagos. With our experienced guides, you will jump from extraordinary heights, swim in hidden caves and climb on the Algarve's beautiful cliffs. Discover something new and join the adventure today!
name: Sagres Coasteering Tours
reviews/0/text: Great activity for team building. The build up from smaller to bigger cliffs was helpful, especially for people afraid of heights. It was an allround experience with climbing rocks, jumping and swimming. The views were stunning. I felt safe thanks to the safety gear we received as well as being guided using the safer paths. Highly recommend!
reviews/1/text: Jim was a great guide. We had an amazing first coasteering experience! We would recommend it to everyone. We saw some amazing caves and did cool jumps!
reviews/1/title: A great way to discover the coast of the Algarve!
reviews/2/text: My partner and I were lucky enough to enjoy this adventure, and we have to say that it is the best thing we could have done in terms of adventure activities. Jim was a great and very friendly guide, and he and his partner made the route great and full of fun. 100% recommended
reviews/3/text: Ongelofelijke toffe ervaring! Alles is super goed geregeld, van pick up tot de begeleiding tijdens de coasteering, tot aan de mooie prachtige omgeving waar dit hele spektakel plaats mag vinden! Ik zou het zeker aanraden!
reviews/4/text: Chouette expérience en famille le long des falaises. Guides très sympathiques et sécurisants. Hauteur des sauts adaptées aux plus téméraires (jeunes de 15 et 17 ans) comme aux plus craintifs. Bonne ambiance et super souvenir photo envoyé le jour même.
reviews/5/text: Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit an der wunderschönen Algarveküste. Der Küstenabschnitt, an dem wir unterwegs waren zum Klettern, Schwimmen und Felsenspringen war auch nicht so überlaufen und unser Guide Jim hat das Ganze auch super gemacht. Vielen Dank Jim.
reviews/6/text:
No sabiamos muy bien en que consistia esta activitad però Ha sido una gran experiencia. 
La combinación de escalada, nadar y saltos és perfecta. El nivell va subiendo pero es assumible y en Todo momento te sientes seguro. 
És una actividad 100% recomendable.
reviews/7/text:
Foi uma experiência espectacular.
O staff foi super disponível e ajudou sempre durante o percurso, paisagens deslumbrantes.
Os saltos são altos mas é seguro, recomendo vivamente
reviews/8/text: Nous étions 2 groupes d amis accompagnés de nos enfants de 15 et 11 ans. Tout le monde a adoré l après midi coasteering. Nous n avons pas regretté l heure de trajet depuis Albufeira. Nous avons passé un super moment avec Jim et Bobby. Merci pour cette belle activité, merci aussi pour les photos et vidéos souvenirs.
reviews/8/title: Coasteering en famille et entre amis
reviews/9/text: Het was heel gaaf! Echt een beleving voor heel het gezin. Stoer om van de rotsen af te springen en te zwemmen door het koude water!
reviews/10/text:
Une superbe sortie avec Jim ce matin du 23/06/2022 !! 
En petit comité, 5 en tout, un pure régale et un cadre d'enfer !!
Je recommande à 1000%
reviews/11/text: Jim et Matt étaient incroyable et super sympa l'activité encore plus et le cadre magique. Une super activité pour découvrir autrement la région de sagres et faire le plein de sensation forte ! Merci encore !!!
reviews/12/text:
Die Tour war einfach großartig! 
Nachdem ich vom Hostel abgeholt wurde, sammelten wir noch die anderen Teilnehmer ein und fuhren dann zur Location. Hier erhielten wir die komplette Ausrüstung und los ging es. Klettern, Schwimmen, Springen - für jeden ist etwas dabei. Am Ende der Tour folgt das absolute Highlight!
Ich kann die Aktivität allen naturbegeisterten Abenteurern wärmstens empfehlen!!!
reviews/13/text: Waren nur zu dritt bei unserer Tour. Jim ist ein klasse Guide und versteht es eine lockere Stimmung herzustellen und allen ein sicheres Gefühl zu geben. Wir wurden in Lagos abgeholt und dort auch wieder abgesetzt. Die Mischung aus Klettern, Schwimmen und Klippenspringen ist absolut empfehlenswert!
reviews/14/text: Das Abenteuer mir Jim hat super viel Spaß gemacht. Jim war ein klasse Guide, der neben den Coasteering Aktivitäten noch viel über die Umgebung erzählt hat. Wir haben uns die ganze Zeit sehr sicher gefühlt. Es war ein tolles Erlebnis.
reviews/15/text:
Absolute aanrader! Leuk om eens een ander soort dag-activiteit te doen. Prima te doen voor iedereen en toch heel avontuurlijk. 
Bij Jim staat veiligheid en fun hoog in t vaandel. Makkelijk te boeken en laagdrempelig in contact. Foto’s en filmpjes nadien (en gratis). Samen met m’n pubers een leuke ochtend gehad.
reviews/15/title: Aanrader voor iedereen die van klimmen, zwemmen en in t water springen houdt. Toegankelijk voor iedereen..
reviews/16/text: Coole Tour für Erwachsene und Teenager. War locker und hat Spaß gemacht. Alles lie unkompliziert ab.
reviews/17/text: Der Ausflug war der Wahnsinn, ivh würd es jedem empfehlen und es sofort wiederholen. Der Guide ist sehr bedacht auf die Sicherheit, trotzdem kommt jeder Adrenalinjunkie auf seine Kosten!
reviews/17/title: ein einmaliges Erlebnis abseits vom Massentourismus!
reviews/18/text:
Wir haben zu zweit eine Tour gebucht und waren dann alleine mit Jim unterwegs, wodurch wir echt viel Zeit hatten alles zu genießen!
Jim war ein total guter Guide, hat uns immer das Gefühl von Sicherheit gegeben und war einfach cool drauf.
Die Route war abwechslungsreich und angeschnitten von jeglichen Touris. Die Sprünge waren aufregend und es gab immer eine Alternative für nicht ganz so waghalsige.
Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit und würden es jederzeit wieder machen!
reviews/19/text: Sagres från en annan sida. Gillar du hopp från klippor ska du definitivt testa detta. Klättring, hopp ock lite simning längs med de höga klipporna.

address: Faro Portugal
description: We do transfers from and to the airport, as well as all day sight seeing tours.
name: Happy Days Algarve
reviews/0/text: Used Luis and Happy Days to take us from Faro Airport to Lagos.   He was so helpful and friendly.  He then picked us up as we were going back to stay in Faro for a few days and took us to some lovely places on route .   He was so informative and interesting.  We asked Luis to take us to the airport a few days later which he did.  First class service and will always  recommend and use again.
reviews/1/text: Excellent service at a reasonable price. The driver (Marco) arrived on time andwas very personable and arrived on time . Highly recommended.
reviews/2/text:
Used Luis and Happy Days for a return transfer between Faro airport to Lagos.
He was very responsive and friendly in communications before we travelled and met us with a smile and friendly face at Faro.
Very happy to chat and knowledgeable on the region - it was great talking with him and our transfers to and from the resort were quick, comfortable and a really good price.
Would definitely recommend and use again in future.
reviews/2/title: Great transfer at a good price
reviews/3/text: Can't recommend Luis & Happy days enough for our airport transfers, prompt, friendly , first class service what more could you ask !
reviews/4/text: Perfect. No hassle! Met at airport and dropped to door of hotel. Picked up early morning at end of holiday and dropped to departures without any problems. Reasonably priced.
reviews/5/text: Great, professional and friendly service.  Luis kept in touch all of the time, will have no problem in using again.
reviews/6/text: Excellent service ..def recommend ..used this company twice and will again ..both drivers that we got were on time and very pleasant
reviews/7/text: Excellent service! Luiz is a very friendly person, professional and speaks perfectly English. Fair price.  Highly recommended.
reviews/8/text: We used this combo at based on a recommendation from a friend. I cannot say enough good things about Luis! He arrived on time and his car was very clean and he is very personable! I will only ever use this service when in Faro and area!
reviews/8/title: Clean car and punctual professional service!
reviews/9/text: Fantastic service every single time, Louis and his drivers are friendly, knowledgeable, professional and go out of their way to make your stay in Algarve as pleasant as possible ( even managed to reunite us with our hats when we lost them ). Highly recommended
reviews/10/text: Recently used Luis for a transfer to Lagos. What a lovely man he is. He is a mine of information and is great at keeping you entertained throughout your journey in the Algarve. My friends who I returned from Lagos to the airport with said how much they enjoyed his conversation and it made the journey go really quickly. I am a frequent traveller to the Algarve and will be using Luis for my future transfers.
reviews/11/text: Always a pleasure to be collected or dropped off. Reliable and punctual service comes as standard! Traveling can be stressful so its nice when you know all is going to be ok with your transfer :)
reviews/12/text: Professional yet friendly service. Luis was waiting for us on our arrival in Faro. Also arrived promptly for us on our return journey back to airport. I would use this service again and also be happy to recommend to others
reviews/13/text: We have used Luis on three occasions (2022) and will be using him again on Saturday 4/3/23. Luis is very personable and a mind of information, (if you need to know anything about the Algarve or even Portugal, Luis is your man), he is punctual, reliable and very competitively priced. I would highly recommend.
reviews/14/text: Great service with everything on time and great knowledge of the Algarve as a whole.. would recommend without hesitation.
reviews/15/text: Louis has been on time for all our pickups in Portimão as well as Faro Airport on our return. He is very helpful and friendly and his price is competitive.
reviews/16/text: First class service and the best value transfer service available. Fast and friendly communication, a seamless pick up at the airport, and Luis is a very friendly and interesting driver. Can’t recommend Happy Days enough!
reviews/17/text: Luis from Happy days taxi service  provides a first class service...he collected me and  my teenage daughter  from the airport (and waited patiently for over an hours delay)he is wonderful company so knowledgeable about Portugal and its history .We used him for multiple trips during our stay and nothing was too much trouble...in fact one night we were unable to get a taxi home from Vilamoura and we rang luis ...he was not in the area but organised a colleague to collect us ...he couldn't have done more and  I would highly recommend him for  value ,service and  almost a tour guide!
reviews/18/text: Great transfer there and back , driver was very good and polite even though he had a long wait for us as our luggage took forever but the journey was stress free and good value for money !
reviews/19/text: Excellent service door to door between Faro airport and Cabanas de Tavira. Contact was easy and both drivers spoke excellent English making experience easy

address: Vilamoura, Quarteira Portugal
description: If you are looking for an exciting way to spend a couple of hours or the whole day, you will not find anything more enjoyable than one of our Quad Bike Tours. We can taylor make our treks to suit your requirements and abilities. We have been operating Quad Bike treks in the Algarve since 2010. Safety is our Nº 1 Priority! ( Places need to be booked in advance )
name: Quinta Quads
reviews/0/text:
This was a fantastic experience for me and my son. The training given is excellent for newbies to quad biking. The location is just fantastic with miles of tracks. 
I cannot recommend this company enough.
What a great day.
reviews/1/text:
Before leaving the UK I spent time planning a few activities for our trip to Quinta do Lago. We are a family of three and all wanted to try either buggy riding or quad biking. I got in touch with a number of providers and just felt from the initial response from Rute that this was the one - professional, personal and quick to respond with information and advice bespoke to us.

When we arrived in Quinta I got in touch again with Rute and she guided us through the process. This is a family business with passion for their business and most importantly their customers.

The instructor Rui collected us from the meeting point and made us feel relaxed as soon as we met. The equipment they use is second to none - too many try and cut corners in this area - not Rui and Rute, you and your family will be 100% safe with these guys.

 Rui is clearly a natural coach and host - we all felt confident to ride the quads as soon as we set off (after Rui spent time with us to teach us how to deal with the Quads properly in each 'challenge' we would come up against). 

He has a 'practice area' on his land which you send time on to get used to the quads, and then we headed 'off road' up into the hills - the climb and descent were so so much fun! On the summit of the climb Rui stopped us, gave us water (it was a hot afternoon!) and then took time explain what we could see in our 360 degree view (including Spain) and provided some suggestions of where to go to experience 'real Portugal'.

This was without doubt one of the best holiday experiences we have ever been on - yes, this is a business, but it never felt 'commercial' - we went as a family of three and the experience was based on us, not some pre planned route with a large group.

One final thing - I would definitely recommend paying the extra 10 euro's to have Rui take photo's - you are too busy having fun to worry about this yourself, and it would be difficult to do so anyway until you are not moving. Rui takes a lot of photo's and all of ours are great quality - group shots, individual shots and actin shots.

Thank you Rute and Rui - I hope your business continues for many years to come, so more people will be lucky enough to experience what you have to offer.

Jason, Jo and Jack
reviews/1/title: Amazing fun/experience - if you are in the are, this is a must do activity
reviews/2/text: Best Tour that you can make. Profesional Teacher, perfect Quads, nice Tour and a mot of fun. When you want to see more from the Algarve then go with him (Rui) and he will show you some nice places.
reviews/3/text: Amazing and great value for money! This was my first time driving a quad bike and i felt so confident driving the quad and learnt a lot from Rui! Rui was an excellent instructor and made the experience enjoyable and comfortable. He is highly experienced and makes sure your safe. I highly recommend booking with Quinta Quads.
reviews/4/text:
What an incredible experience!  

With ages varying from 18-53 this activity hit the spot for everyone.  

Rui is an incredible host and whilst your enjoyment is a priority, he will not compromise on safety which I find very reassuring as a nervous first time quad biker! 

The route was excellent and we got to see parts of Portugal completely off the beaten track.  

Communication from enquiry through to the time we arrived was first class.

Highly recommended activity
reviews/5/text: Had a wonderful experience on this ATV tour with Rui. It was just Rui (tour guide) and I which made it even more pleasurable. First and foremost Rui is very particular about safety which is a good sign. He gave me all the protective gear I could possibly need. The tour went across various surfaces from an even tarred/gravel/dirt road to rougher terrain with steep inclines,dips and rocky obstacles along the way. I had the opportunity to cruise and also challenge myself with the more demanding areas of the tour. I also got to see the wonderful landscape and get a pretty detailed history lesson about the area from Rui. This was a great escape from the normal touristy areas. I thoroughly enjoyed myself and I HIGHLY recommend this tour to anyone interested in atv riding. You will be in good hands and it is a guarantee that you will have fun!
reviews/6/text: Best quad biking experience ever! Amazing adventure with a very cool and safe instructor. Great off road experience
reviews/6/title: Epic off road quad biking experience!
reviews/7/text: For me and my wife was it the first time, we ever ride a Squad bike and we have to say, we love it :) Rui our Guide for the day is very very professional, as an ex Squad bike race champion, he knew a lot about this bikes & could explain us with patience & passion everything we needed to know to make us feel comfortable & secured, highly recommended
reviews/8/text: Quinta Quads......thank you for one of the best afternoons we have ever had in the Algarve.  Myself and my son booked an extended Tour 1 and we cannot recommend this enough.  Rui is a fantastic teacher...patient, informative and passionate about safety.  We booked this in the UK and the communications could not have been better (thank you Rute).  If we could rate this a six we would.   We will be returning for more in 2022.
reviews/9/text: This was a great family run experience for the family or just groups of friends!  It was easy to book and the communication from Rute and Rui was excellent.  It was highly professional and safe but above all really good fun ! All the tours are individual to your group which means you have the entire attention of the team and they could not have done more for us! Thanks and we hope to be back soon !
reviews/10/text: We had an excellent family ride in the morning along some  great scenic tracks. Lovely people, great equipment and the views at the end were worth it. We will definitely be coming back again and would definitely recommend to anyone interested
reviews/11/text:
Excellent Quad bike tour through the Algarve countryside. We only had our group of 3 for the tour which was great. Meeting point is about 20 mins from Vilamoura and easy to find, Rui is very experienced quad biker and was very patient with one of our group who hadn't done it before. You are given proper bike boots and protective top with safety a real priority, Quads were excellent and we spent about 2 1/2 hours on the tour with a stop at pretty local village. There was a few challenging spots for our inexperienced rider but Rui stopped and coached her through them and she grew in confidence with his support, so we all had a fantastic morning riding through the countryside.
If you just want to get on a quad and go as fast as possible this isn't the tour for you, if you want a really enjoyable, well managed and safe ride with great views through the countryside, and you're fairly new - intermediate to quad biking this is perfect, you won't be disappointed.
reviews/11/title: Superb, safe and professional quad tour through the Algarve countryside
reviews/12/text:
We booked to go out for the 2h+ quad safari on the strength of the other reviews and we weren't disappointed.  We were staying in Vilamoura and an Uber up to the meeting point was only about 11 Euros.   Rui met us at the petrol station and was on time - their base is only a few minutes drive away.  

After getting kitted out in MX boots, armour, helmets and gloves we had a ride around the track in their orchard to get used to the quads and once we were happy it was time to go.

Rui led us at a gentle pace through quiet roads and rough tracks.  We stopped after an hour or so at a very pretty village and enjoyed an ice cream at a cafe.  We enjoyed fantastic views, the riding was easy and Rui took good care of us - even the section through a dried up river bed was easy for us to manage.  We had a fantastic day out and it was a real highlight of our holiday!
reviews/13/text:
Excellent. 

We have been on other quad bike tours before and this experience with Quinta Quads was really a different standard. My (hard to please) partner described it as the gold standard and I honestly could not agree more.

Great route and the guide (Rui) was and is kind and really very passionate about quad biking. Above all, it’s clear his priority is to make sure you are having a great time and are kept safe at all times. This was our experience and I’m sure it will be yours should you decide to book too.

I highly recommend Quinta Quads and will book again without hesitation when I’m next in the Quarteira/Vilamoura area. I believe Quinta Quads is family run, by Rui and his wife, so all the more reason to go with them rather than a big chain.
reviews/14/text: Found Quinta Quads on Google and after reading good reviews we decided to book Tour 2. It was amazing. It exceeded all expectations. My partner was new to Quads so Rui gave us a great explanation then a safety circuit then we were away. My partner had no issues at all despite having had no experience thanks to Rui's explanations. We went up the mountains an down the valleys. We saw goats, dogs an even a shepard as well as amazing scenery. We stopped about half way in an amazing little village, an had a coffee/water. We had a great chat with Rui an then we were back on the trail again. More off roading, more  excitement. Was sad it ended as I could have stayed out there all evening, There is nothing I coud fault with this tour, which was the highlight of our time in Portugal. We will definately be back! Thanks Rui!!
reviews/15/text: Impressed by the previous comments on Trip Advisor I contacted Rute and arranged for myself and my 15 year old twin boys to do the short trip. It was an absolutely fantastic couple of hours. Rui was our instructor and was excellent from start to finish. We hadn’t been quad biking before and Rui was patient with us as we gained confidence. After the health and safety instructions, and getting to know how the quad works, Rui took us on a small winding course in a field to build up our confidence. We then set off on a journey across farmland and up a hill with some breathtaking views of the Algarve. We then descended down some dirt tracks back to the base. A thoroughly enjoyable couple of hours that myself and  the teenagers loved. Highly recommended and can’t thank Rui enough.
reviews/16/text: This was our 2nd time out with Rui, having done Tour 1  three years ago when last in The Algarve. This time our 18-year old son, 16 year old daughter and 2 of her friends quad biked.  Rui was very patient going through a thorough safety briefing and checking they could control the quads before setting off for their adventure. Despite a few nerves initially, they all had a brilliant time! Thank you Rute and Rui for accommodating our group. We will be back again, for tour 2, once the girls have passed their driving tests!
reviews/17/text:
Rui has been amazing, so professional & patient with our group that had 2 children. He made us all feel comfortable & in control, slowly increasing our speed. We felt safe & enjoyed it a lot, will be returning again 
Thank you Rui
reviews/18/text: This was our 2nd time out with Rui having done the quads a couple of years ago and again an amazing day out. Booked it pretty short notice, but Rui managed to fit us in. Managed to do Tour 2 which is longer and takes you thru some stunning countryside. We even stopped for nice coffee and cake in one of the lovely wee villages. Rui provides a great day and balances safety and excitement in equal measure. Highly recommend the tours and make sure you take the photo package as we got some really good moments and action shots to look back on.
reviews/19/text:
Incredible day out. Great way to see the more 'unseen' parts of the Algarve. Loved the breathtaking views at the tops of hills and biking through shallow streams in a jungle like environment.

Highly recommend the half day trek, well worth the price! Massive shout out to Rui who puts your safety first but also gets the adrenaline pumping.
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Quinta Quads tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Only By Booking, Quarteira 8125-171 Portugal
description: Stand Up Paddle is the fastest growing water sport in the world today. It´s easy and fun to learn and can be done by almost anyone, from 5-6 years of age upwards. ZEN SUP is based in the Central Algarve in Portugal and offers a fantastic way to enjoy the region´s waterways on your next holiday break or for local residents also. SUP offers freedom, fitness and fun on the water and from once you master some basics you can do it anywhere. There is no better time or place to learn than right here and right now in Portugal´s sunny Algarve.
name: ZEN SUP
photo/caption: ZEN SUP - Stand Up Paddle in the Central Algarve
ranking: #37 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #37 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: A wonderful sunrise SUP experience.  We beached in some spectacular caves, inaccessible by land, and enjoyed a delicious snack of homemade smoothie and biscuits en route. If you want to beat the crowds and see the scenery in the soft glow of sunrise, I would thoroughly recommend this trip. Thank you John for such an amazing experience - I will be back!
reviews/0/title: A perfect start to the day
reviews/1/text:
We did the sunrise tour of Benagil Caves.  As others have mentioned, the early morning start allows for a much more serene experience before the onslaught of day tourists join later in the morning.

John was a flawless and experienced guide and I cannot recommend enough.  He’s able to adjust to your experience level around paddle boarding, while having a group size of 2-6 allows for a truly bespoke experience.  The trip was just the right length for the average traveler, seeing several different sites along the coast but not to the point of exhaustion or fatigue of full day trips.

Great experience with John and this tour will remain at the top of my recommendations list for Portugal activities!
reviews/1/title: Expert Guide in a Fantastic Setting
reviews/2/text:
Frequent travelers and not so easily impressed - my husband and I booked a sunrise paddle board experience with John and his company Zen SUP last minute while we were in Algarve. 

It was an early start at 630 but ended up being one of our all time favorite travel experiences  ! John supplied us with wet suits/life jackets/safety tips/basic SUP techniques and off we went literally into the sunrise exploring not just Benagil Cave but so many magnificent others! We were the first in these areas so our views were spectacular and not ruined by too many tourists looking for the perfect Instagram shot. 

John - thank you so much for giving us our last perfect morning filled with unforgettable memories and phenomenal photos !
reviews/3/text: As a complete beginner I felt supported and well taught in the water to get the best out of the SUP on the Ria Formosa. We were treated to a spectacular sunset and pretty much had the whole area to ourselves. A wonderful and highly recommended couple of hours, thank you Heike and John.
reviews/3/title: Magical sunset on the water,  you will return relaxed and invigorated
reviews/4/text: From the beginning of our exchange on What's App to have more information, John has been very friendly and helpful. Once the class started, clear instructions on the beach were given to gain confidence once on water. My friend and I recommend this class because John knows how to teach step by step and increase the difficulty as we progress. The spot for the picnic was precious, all by ourselves at that time! The picnic or snacks were simple but delicious and fresh. We can't wait to review the fabulous pictures John has taken! Have fun during your own experience!
reviews/4/title: - SUP for beginner: perfect spot & professional instructor.
reviews/5/text: John created a great experience from the time of query all the way to  receiving pictures of the experience. Heike was so patient with our inexperienced group, turning  it an adventure that our kids will surely remember.
reviews/6/text:
John at Zen SUP is totally committed to getting people, at whatever age and ability, out on the water to enjoy, not only the standup paddle boarding (Supping) experience, but also to appreciate the Algarve coastline from a unique perspective. Always ensuring  people are safe and comfortable on the water,  understanding not only their paddling ability, but also the tides, winds, and currents, (which is a skill in itself), getting it wrong could make for a very difficult trip.  I have now paddled with Zen Sup about 6 or 7 times over the last few years, sometimes in a group, but other times, a tailor made trip just for me! Going out with John on the water is my ‘must do’ thing when I am in the Algarve, each trip has been a different experience, to a different location along the coast, and equally fantastic.  The most recent trip, a couple of days ago, was just magical, a superb trip out to a sand bar just off the Ilha da Armona....spectacular! 
 Zen Sup customer service is ten star!
reviews/6/title: Supping to a sand bar just off the Ilha da Armona?....spectacular!
reviews/7/text:
Heike and John are just fantastic! Kind, friendly, good instructors, the whole lot. We took an evening tour in the Ria Formosa with our five year old. Very calm conditions even on a windy day. The whole experience was very personalised,  adapting to our skill level on the go, nice and pleasant chats during the tour, some delicious water melon juice for the break. 
Highest recommendation. We'd definitely do it again.
reviews/8/text: My first time doing paddle boarding, it was great and I will definitely do it again! Thanks to John for explaining us the technique before going into the water, and being supportive throughout the experience! 100% recommended, very fun morning!!
reviews/9/text:
What a fantastic experience we had doing the Benagil tour with Zen SUP. 

Please, picture this is your mind: "You start the tour early enough in the morning to catch the beautiful sunrise at an empty Benagil beach; You then get a set of very clear instructions on how to paddle that will make you a pro (at least in your mind); You get into the water and as you get on your board, you get a better look at the sun coming up in the horizon and a look into Benagil cave and you feel that waking up that early was totally worth it; You then get inside the cave and wonder at its immensity and feel great about having the cave all for yourselves since at this time of day there are only bird in it; you take lots of amazing pictures that will make your Instagram friends envy you forever."

This was just the first of at least three caves you will visit in this tour! We also had the pleasure of being guided by John who also doubles as a photographer during the whole trip. I can tell you that I have done tours in many parts of the world and John is simply one of the best guides there are.

The are just some many things to love about the experience we had that I could go on forever. I will just finish by saying that the time, location and guide where just a miracle to come all together for us, the good news is that it can come together for you too when you book a tour with them.

Happy paddling!
reviews/9/title: The best way to experience Bernagil's caves miracle of nature
reviews/10/text: We went for the sunrise tour. Besides having to stand up early in the morning, this tour has only advantages :) And John is the perfect guide!!
reviews/11/text: A fantastic way to spend an evening and enjoy the sunset!  John was a great tutor - attentive and informative - I would highly recommend for anyone looking to learn SUP in the Algarve area!!
reviews/11/title: A fantastic way to take in the Algarve sunset!
reviews/12/text: John was a great host for our SUP tour of the lagoon, a really enjoyable afternoon on the water. Highly recommended!
reviews/12/title: Brilliant SUP tour in the Algarve
reviews/13/text: We booked the sunrise tour on Ria Formosa. We were a small group of 4 people which was great. John was explaining the technique to improve our paddling. We made a small stop to watch the flamingos and the view while drinking fresh watermelon juice and some cereal bars he had brought for us. Then we continued our paddling until the spot where we watched some planes landing next to us while being on the river. Very quiet water (compared to the sea tours). Beautiful light, great atmosphere with John - we HIGHLY recommend to book sup tours with ZEN SUP when you are in Algarve! Thank you we will be back
reviews/13/title: Beautiful experience with John on Ria Formosa
reviews/14/text: Great instructor, did a 2 hour beginner course and by 30 mins in both new and my wife  were standing and paddling with confidence, highly recommend
reviews/15/text:
Had a wonderful experience learning to SUP in during sunset on Ria Formosa. Really magical.  Excellent - can do  - instruction.  Was ready to go again until our trip cut short by quarantine etc. 
Have already recommended to other friends and will definitely be back.
reviews/16/text: I had an amazing experience with John and a lovely couple. John is a very experienced guide and Paddleboard instructor and his immense knowledge of the local area and all the best places to explore and the best times to see them meant we saw beautiful caves and beaches which we had to ourselves. It was spectacular and the perfect end to a lovely week in the Algarve.
reviews/17/text: I have been keen to learn and this was my first experience on a paddleboard so I was a bit nervous at the start. John turned out to be a very competent, friendly and encouraging teacher who took great care to address the health and safety aspects of the experience and at all times ensured that the pace was appropriate.  It was a thoroughly enjoyable experience  which I highly recommend. I certainly plan to join one of John's expeditions next time I am in Portugal.
reviews/17/title: OAP learns how to paddleboard!!!!  (And plans to go again)
reviews/18/text: Fantastic experience watching the sunrise exploring the Benagil caves. It was a lovely small group of us, John was a brilliant guide and took us to some spectacular scenery and through little caves. I would highly recommend this to anyone going to the Algarve and the early start is 100% worth it. Thank you for such a memorable morning.
reviews/19/text: This was our 2nd trip with John.  This time we booked his sunrise trip to the Benegil caves. We are not particularly experienced paddle boarders but John made us feel very confident and we felt safe in his hands. The whole experience was amazing. We met with 3 others who were all extremely friendly. The caves were fascinating and was great to be away from the crowds. We would thoroughly recommend Zen SUP and can’t wait to return for another experience next year.
subcategory_ranking: #37 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve

We do quad trips with, the guide is alwalys one of the brothers who also own the company. So you can be sure they will do their best to make your time a good time. Quality of service and safety are our main focus. Book now and find it by yourself!
name: Sharks in the Mud
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Small-Group Quad Adventure in Lagos
reviews/0/text: Sharks in the Water is a family company that doesn't sell their tickets at the street. I found them via a flyer in our hotel. It's very easy to book with them online. We were very lucky that we were the only 3 passengers on the boat. Roberto told us everything about the csves and the beautiful coastline. If you are planning a boat trip to the caves, I would strongly recommend to book with Sharks in the Watrr.
reviews/1/text: We found Sharks in Water among various leaflets and decided to go with them due to the great info available on tripadvisor, google reviews, instagram etc. The booking site was super easy to use and the company got in touch on whatsapp immediately to confirm our schedule. Upon arrival at the Marina, we were led to the boat by our tour guide Roberto who was super friendly and professional. It ended up being just the 3 of us and the tour guide on the boat... great great views of the coastline and insight on all the names and stories of the grottos. Roberto was also fabulous handling the little speedboat - great fun. Highly recommend!!
reviews/2/text: We went today and had a great time. The boat goes right up to the rocks and caves so you get a good look. You will also discover all the best beaches to visit. The boat was great. The operator had good quality life jackets of all sizes. Our little man lost his sea legs so the driver looked after him and he helped to steer the boat. An excellent trip!
reviews/3/text: My husband and I booked them for a trip to Ponte da Piedad. The sightseeing is beautiful and the guide knows a lot! The guide showed us different rocks and the story behind each one of them. I would definitely recommend them to any person and to be honest I would take the tour again! Amazing experience.
reviews/3/title: Amazing experience and even better tour guide
reviews/4/text: I went to visit with friends and loved it, an excellent guide, I recommend to anyone who wants to know better the coastal area of ​​the city with family and friends !!
reviews/4/title: very good company and a very good guide
reviews/5/text: Richtig guter Ausflug macht richtig spaß!Gute Strecke an der Küste und sehr gut organisiert! Super Reiseführer muss man einfach machen!
reviews/6/text: Wer die Algarve von ihrer schönsten Seite sucht, findet Sie mit dieser Tour. Sowohl angenehme authetische Guides die einem die schönen versteckten Plätze zeigen als auch für den Adrenalin-Kick mit der vollen Bootsleistung wurde gesorgt. Keine typische Touristenfalle, Preis-/Leistung ist Top.
reviews/7/text: Foi fácil fazer a marcação e falam com os clientes pelo WhatsApp, muito prático. O guia era simpático, prestável e experiente. Recomendo sem dúvida.
reviews/8/text:
Fuimos con una niña de 3 años y un niño de 8. Roberto maneja la lancha con una destreza pasmosa, a la vez de con una seguridad y suavidad magnífica para los que vamos con niños. Salieron emocionados, supo darle “la caña” justa a la lancha para niños amantes de la velocidad 
No nos confundimos al escoger sus servicios. Por el tamaño de la embarcación puede meterte hasta dentro de todas las cuevas. Con las grandes es imposible.
Son gente de la zona y conocen aquello como la palma de su mano. Aquello es maravilloso
Muy, muy,muy recomendable
reviews/9/text:
me and my family had a private trip of four people and it was amazing we went through all the caves we really enjoyed the trip we took amazing photos and more ... I can say it could be the best tour to relax and have a good time thank you very much.

yo y mi familia tuvimos un viaje privado de cuatro personas y fue increíble pasamos por todas las grutas disfrutamos mucho el viaje tomamos fotos increíbles y más... puedo decir que podría ser el mejor tour para relajarte y pasar un buen tiempo muchas gracias.
reviews/10/text: Magnifique balade au cœur des grottes de Lagos accompagné d'un super guide. A faire sans hésiter !!
reviews/11/text: Hoy hemos hecho el paseo en el barco de Roberto.Un lujo de excursión, el paisaje precioso. Roberto nos ha ido explicando con calma todos los detalles del paisaje,se ha parado y nos ha explicado todo muy bien.Un viaje tranquilo, nos divirtió mucho el camino de vuelta.A nuestras dos hijas les ha encantado ir descubriendo formas ocultas en las rocas.Gracias y mucha suerte .Trato muy familiar, lo recomendamos y mucho y de precio más económico que otras compañías.
reviews/12/text: Foi a terceira vez que visitei as grutas da Ponta da Piedade e a primeira vez que fui através desta empresa. Foi sem dúvida a melhor viagem que fiz. Desde o cuidado na embarcação à explicação das formações rochosas e brincadeiras com os passageiros. Recomendo levar smartphone ou máquina fotográfica para recordar o momento. É uma viagem de 1:15 minutos aproximadamente que deu tempo para conhecer todas as grutas. Recomendo!

reviews/0/text: Nicole, our guide was awesome and the whole crew was friendly. We saw some beautiful sights and it was a great tour in general.
reviews/1/text:
First, let me start with Carlitos and his team … because they are who/what makes this experience so incredible. 

Carlitos: He is an incredible captain. He knows those waters and caves inside and out. Just when you think you’ve seen it all, he will turn the boat around and surprise you! He’s genuinely a good guy. He makes the experience so so fun! 

The crew: Carl had team members sitting with groups according to language, to make sure we each got a personalized experience that we could understand. This was incredibly thoughtful. Not only that, but the crewmembers were really great people who shared stories and brought the experience to life. 

The views: I thought we were going to see one cave, but surprise after surprise we saw caves, villages & lighthouses, and learned a lot about the area. I won’t spoil the fun for you, just know you will be delighted. 

Weather: We went at the beginning of March, so the weather wasn’t the greatest. No other company was taking boats out that day. Carl and his crew watched the weather, and as the ocean calmed down and the sky brightened up, he was able to take out our small group. I am incredibly grateful for the experience. 

Value: We booked this on get your guide, you can do that or go direct. I will say, we got way more out of the experience than we paid for. This is how they make their living in an economy that depends on tourism. We tipped them generously at the end. 

This showed me views I never would have seen from land. I cannot wait to go back to the Algarve region when the weather is calmer and paddleboard through these caves. 

I’d book with Carl again in a heartbeat. This adventure was absolutely the highlight of our week in Portugal. 

I can post a few photos, but I will tell you that they do not do justice to the actual experience we had on the boat. I recommend you book with Atlantis Tours, ask for Carlitos and have a fabulous time!
reviews/1/title: Best experience in Portugal with Carlitos & Atlantis Tours!
reviews/2/text:
​We had booked this tour on our last day of our trip. We were very excited and showed up more than an hour before the time we had to meet up. We walked over to a cafe (there were 4 on that road) and had a coffee. They had wifi so when the tour guide was able to call us to confirm and we told them we came very early and just having a coffee. We walked back to the tour guide van and there was 5 guys there from the tour playing soccer and not paying attention to any customers. We checked in with one of them and he told us since we are early we should walk to the end of the road and relax and have a coffee and we will be launching from there. Since this is the first time we have been to the area, we walked to the end, which was the marina. There was another tour guide there and we asked her if this is the meeting spot and she said yes. When we started to get into the boat, they realized we were with the wrong tour. We ran back to the van and the boat had left us. No one told us where to go or where to wait or any signs indicating the waiting spot.
No one bothered to walk the 10 meters to check if we were waiting on the bench at the marina for over an hour.
They told us the next boat was at noon but we had to drive to the airport. And they tell us, this is not the first time this has happened...like this should make us feel better! We told them, if this is not the first time it has happened then why not give better directions! or tell us to wait with you and we all walk to the boat launch. They really didn't care. We drove to the airport with a bad taste in our mouth. Not a great way to end a vacation. I was crying the whole way and like I said, they really didn't seem to care. They were too busy playing soccer than to attend to their customers. We waisted the whole morning just waiting and leaving extremely disappointed.
reviews/2/title: DO NOT BOOK THIS TOUR!!! SO DISAPPOINTED!! LEFT CRYING!
reviews/3/text: WOW, WHAT AN AMAZING TOUR! The caves are simply beautiful and the Captain and the Guide have such knowledge that you will come out enriched with such history! Highly recommend it!
reviews/3/title: AMAZING TOUR TO THE BENAGIL CAVES
reviews/4/text:
I can say that we really had a good time and amazing views all the time. Our guide Rafael  was so nice and attentive to details on the explanations  and telling us all the stories behind. So funny!

Ps: take a tower with you
reviews/5/text:
A professional boat trip to the coves and caves, crew were very informative answering all questions asked.
We booked this excursion through jet2 holidays at what we though was a very competitive cost Note got a chilly on the way back so remember to wear a jumper before attaching the bouyancy aid. Again many thanks on a very enjoyable tour
reviews/6/text:
Een geweldige belevenis! 
De gidsen zijn prima, spreken uitstekend Engels en kunnen de boot op alle mooie plekken brengen.
reviews/7/text: La experiencia no fue del todo buena, el día que hicimos el tour se juntaron una serie de circunstancias que no contribuyeron a pasar un buen momento. Además de que se supone que el tour era en español y al guia no se le entendía practicamente y apenas daba explicaciones, mientras que el guia destinado a los portugueses no paraba de hablar.
