address: Albufeira 8201-916 Portugal
description: Do you want to do something really fun, exciting and spice up your holiday? Then come on a quad tour with QuadVentura! It’s truly the best way to discover the Algarve. Riding your quad along forest tracks, rugged trails, over rural terrain and up and down woodland paths is sure to bring a smile to your face. Each tour has stunning views and scenery that will take your breath away! Never driven a quad before? No problem as this is a fab activity for all ages! Literally all of our guests are beginners. They are simple and easy to drive as fully automatic. And you can either drive your own or travel as a passenger. And as we want this to be your holiday highlight, we keep the group sizes really small with a maximum of 10 people on each tour. This provides a unique and boutique experience and the reason so many people book with us! So, come with us, spice up your holiday and we guarantee this will be the best thing you do!
name: Quad Ventura
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Quad Biking Adventure Tour in Albufeira
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Quad Biking Sightseeing Tour in Albufeira
photo/caption: Quad Ventura boasts a number of unique quad biking tours that allow you to see rare and awe-inspiring sights of the Algarve from the comfort of your very own quad bike. Exploring these hidden gems couldn’t be easier! We’ve done extensive exploration and thorough research in order to carve out the best quad biking routes that offer a little bit of everything.
reviews/0/text: What a cool trip! We wanted to do a unique quad trip and Mark and Simone did not disappoint. Marks in depth knowledge of the local area and Portugal as a whole made for some interesting chat, we got to see the real side of the South of Portugal and learn a whole bunch about the local flora and fauna! Can't thank you guys enough!
reviews/0/title: A great trip through the real South of Portugal
reviews/1/text: From the minute we arrived until we left it was Brilliant. Great hosts, good bikes and an interesting route. Just so happened it was only myself and my teenage son on the 4.30 'track' trip.
reviews/2/text: My girlfriend and I had a steller morning out with Mark on the quad tour. Getting on the bikes and seeing the countryside up close is a brilliant way to get a true fee for the Portuguese landscape. Can highly recommend as a must do in the Algarve
reviews/3/text:
With miles of trails, a quad bike is the ideal way to explore off the beaten track. 

Husband and wife team, Mark and Simone took over Quad Ventura in September 2020 from previous owners (who we travelled with on an earlier trip) and I am pleased to say the business is in excellent hands. 

Simone made the booking process clear and easy and Mark is an experienced adventure guide (you’ll have to chat to him about his interesting career over lunch) and clearly knows some great routes in the Algarve. 

We had a small group for the four hour extended tour, about 50 km, which included a tasty lunch at an authentic place that the locals use. 

Take my advice, avoid the large groups and see the real Algarve up close and personal on this great experience.
reviews/4/text:
A really nice tour!! During the jaunt you will see beautifull landscapes. We are really thanksfull for this experience.
Mark and Simone are super nice!
Try and enjoy!
reviews/5/text: We had an absolutely great time on the tour with Mark. The scenery was amazing and we had great fun blasting through the countryside - both on road and off road. Definitely go with mark if you want a more personalised adventure as he doesn’t take more than groups of 5. It was just the two of us on the tour and couldn’t have asked for better! Simone looked after us from start to finish too via WhatsApp and was super accommodating when we asked to change our timings. Couldn’t recommend these guys more, a great day out.
reviews/6/text: Really nice 2hours tour through different types of area's just outside albufeira. Mark the tour-leader gives you all the time to take pictures along the tour. Some parts are adventurage and on other parts you can enjoy the views. Would recommend this tour for all kind of people. Also very easy to contact for reservation via WhatsApp.
reviews/6/title: Excellent quad tour within different areas
reviews/7/text: After two years on the trot, I am booking again! From the 2hr tour to the 4hr tour (preferred), I have done both. Both times I had great fun and cannot wait to go back again for another adventure! To the side tracks, views and pit stops, Rory has great knowledge of the local area and both Claire and Rory are really friendly!
reviews/8/text:
Claire and Rory are both very sweet and careful !
We took the two hours tour and we had a very good time ! 
We, as a family with two young kids, felt very safe with Rory.
We would definitely recommend Quadaventura !!
The kids asked : mommy can we do that more often ?
Thanks to Claire and Rory for their kindness and this great family time ;)
reviews/9/text: We recently went on a trip with Quadventura and absolutely loved it. This is our third trip now. There were 6 in our group, and we all throughly enjoyed ourselves. We did the 4hrs and had a few stops throughout the ride for a drinks break and lunch. Rory & Claire are really friendly and helpful, thanks again. See you again soon!
reviews/10/text: Fabulous 4hr ride through the Algarve countryside with a few stops for coffee en-route. Claire was excellent in checking us in and Rory took great care of us on the bikes... very professional.... we enjoyed it immensely and would highly recommend.
reviews/11/text: The quad tour was a great experiece. Claire and Rory are two very kind and open hearted people. We immediately felt very comfortable and in good hands. It was so much fun.
reviews/12/text: Very easy and quick booking with Claire. She explained in detail what to expect during the adventure, answered all the questions and explained how to get to meeting point. Her and her partner Rory are very friendly and helpful. Even though we went there out of season they agreed to organise the adventure just for two of us without extra costs. Rory is a great guide, and gave us lots of interesting information about the surrounding areas. We picked the 4hrs option and were amazed by the beautiful scenery of Albufeira. We would highly recommend them to anyone. Thank you Claire and Rory for the amazing experience!
reviews/12/title: Best quad adventure we have ever had !!
reviews/13/text:
A massive thank you to Claire and Rory for a fantastic activity for myself, husband, father and our two daughters age 9 and 12. 

From the minute Claire collected us from the hotel in the jeep she was so much fun! Such a pleasant couple. 

We would highly recommend the quad activity. An experience that we will never forget. 

Rory even stopped along the way and got us a refreshing cold drink lovely touch!  

We will definitely return to Albufeira and book another activity with Claire and Rory! 

Thanks again

Danielle , Craig and Family xx
reviews/14/text: My 19 year old son and I did the two hour tour. We were lucky enough to have a private tour. Fantastic to get out of the tourist area and see the real Portugal. Lemons and oranges on trees etc. Claire and Rory make sure you have a good time. Lovely lovely people. Great to get picked up from you hotel in a jeep too! Adds to the fun. Don’t think for too long. Book it!
reviews/14/title: Great fun driving while seeing the real Portugal!
reviews/15/text: Booked at short notice, Claire picked us up. Made us feel at ease. Rory and Claire are such lovely people. It was great fun, I would highly recommended it if you are considering!!
reviews/16/text: We thoroughly recommend a four hour trip with Rory. We had a great time, best day of our November holiday. Claire collected us promptly from our apartment and everything was very smooth from then onwards.
reviews/17/text: This is our 2nd time in 7 months, 1st time was 2 hours this time 4, loved every minute from when Claire picked us up we were made to feel welcome, sights we saw with Rory were amazing and loved bed being away from the hustle and bustle, quads are easy to drive too. Totally recommend here if you have not tried it why not?
reviews/18/text: Well what can I say but absolutely brilliant. Booked last minute but it was not a problem for Rory and Claire. Looked after us from the minute they picked us up til we departed. The 2 hour tour was great taking in the unseen Algarve. Rory was very knowledgable and took us to a couple of picturesque spots. Defo worth using them :-)
reviews/19/text:
Fantastic!!!  We had not done a quad bike ride before.my wife and I are in our sixties and were very apprehensive about it.
we were picked up from our apartment by Clare in a 4x4 jeep. On the way Clare was very friendly and informative. We met up with Rory who was just as friendly as Clare.
Rory fully explained the controls and the procedure to us.
We put on our helmets and followed Rory, who was very observant for our safety at all times. We stopped at a few places of interest and Rory was interestingly informative. About an hour into the ride we stopped for a coffee (which Rory paid for).
We had social chat and than headed back.
It was a 2 hour tour. Can't recommend Clare and Rory enough. Will definitely go back and maybe do a 4 hour tour.
A massive thanks to Clare and Rory.
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Quad Ventura tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Rua Dunfermline Fat Cats Bar, Albufeira 8200-391 Portugal
name: Fat Cats Transfers
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Private Airport Transfer Faro - Albufeira
photo/caption: Available for bigger groups or large families travelling together.
reviews/0/text:
If I could give this company more stars I would. 

Nothing short of fantastic from start to finish. 

They had to deal with a lot from me between cancelling a booking, re-booking and then changing pick up times at last minute and truly nothing was too much for them. 

Their customer service via Facebook and whatsapp was brilliant and I cannot recommend them enough. 

We used their services to get us from our apartment to Zoomarine.
reviews/1/text: Clean vans, on time, good communication for a family day out. Flexible arrangements possible and phone call to let us know driver running late. Car seat and boosters provided on request. Recommended.
reviews/2/text: We used this company for airport transfer for 15 people and for waterpark transfers. They were courteous helpful and reliable. Would definitely recommend
reviews/3/text: Absolutely excellent in every way, great communication, fantastic customer services, brilliant drivers clean vehicles and very reasonable prices, I could not recommend this service enough
reviews/4/text: We have used Fat Cats previously, and this time was no different. Reasonable price for return trip  from Albufeira to Vilamour. Driver was waiting for us for return trip to Albufeira
reviews/5/text: Used them all the time to get around everytime I am in Albufeira. They are always on time,all the drivers are lovely,  polite, prices are very competitive,  I wouldn't use anyone else. Keep up the good work guys and hopefully see you soon!
reviews/5/title: The best taxi/transfer firm in Albufeira
reviews/6/text: Booked a couple of trips to the waterparks and the service was absolutely spot on , vehicles were clean and modern, drivers on both occasions were punctual and polite - nothing was to much trouble. Would recommend anybody looking to book a transfer or trip get in touch with them and you won't be disappointed!!!!
reviews/7/text:
Booked via their website. Very easy to do.
Driver turned up 5 mins early, large clean comfortable vehicle. Great service and would definitely use again.
reviews/8/text: We used this company twice whilst we was in the Algarve, once to go to slide and splash and once for Zoomarine. On both occasions they were on time both to pick us up and the return journey. Car was very clean and felt very comfortable will use again when we are back in the Algarve.
reviews/9/text: i love everything fat cats so this is great. it was a smooth ride from start to end and i will recommend this to my family.
reviews/10/text: The driver was waiting for us at the airport which was lovely, very comfy journey to our hotel and back to the airport the following week, very reasonable prices too
reviews/11/text: Couldn’t fault fat cats whatsoever!! Our hotel told us they couldn’t get us a taxi with a car seat and as we have an 11 week old baby, this was an issue - so we looked on trip advisor and came across Fat Cats who answered our call immediately and came within 15mins to our hotel to collect us with car seat and WiFi in the car!!! Great company, would definitely recommend - thanks fat cats!!
reviews/11/title: On time, child friendly, reasonably priced and free WiFi!!
reviews/12/text: Wonderful restaurant with great people and good service.... Most important the food was wonderful chef tommy did his thing right
reviews/13/text: We used this company twice during our stay in Albufeira and would use again.  Once, when our plans changed at the last minute and we wanted to go to a water park and second when going out for a celebratory meal.  We have a large party of 10 including two children - 6 years old and 15 months so it is not easy to find transport.  They accommodated us at short notice, communicated quickly and provided safe car seats for the children.  We had to turn back on the second occasion to retrieve keys from the rest of the party and the driver obliged no problems at all.  Highly recommended!
reviews/14/text: Just come back from 10 days in alberfuria the fellas went golfing for 4 days were picked up at hotel promptly just had to ring an hour before when wanted picking up from golf course not a problem, even went to vilamoura for the day too very polite drivers would definitely use them again
reviews/15/text: Reliable, punctual, trustworthy, friendly, helpful, spacious & comfortable wagon as well as very reasonably priced!!! What more one asks for, eh?!
reviews/16/text: Having been using fat cats  as my transfers for years now  the service just gets better and nothing is too difficult for them . 7 guys arriving to play 2 rounds of golf in Vilamoura and transfers to and from the airport   we also used then to taxi us out on the evenings we required  . Daniel was very prompt  and reliable in every way and nothing was too much trouble . Thanks again for all your help , a must for hassle free transfers at keen prices  **
reviews/17/text:
Very accommodating and helpful. Free rain of his music collection, gave us water and kept checking we were cool.
Fab!
reviews/17/title: Brilliant! What a guy Jonny is!
reviews/18/text:
Our driver was very helpful and went that extra mile by playing children’s songs and giving each of us a bottle of water on our return journey which was really appreciated.

Will definitely be using you again when we return back to Albufeira and will recommend you to friends and family. 

Many thanks!!
reviews/19/text:
Just back from a weekend away in Albufeira and we used fat cat transfers on a number of occasions 

Each time we used them they were on time ready and waiting and the drivers we very polite 

Would certainly recommend

address: Praia Do Carvoeiro, Carvoeiro 8400-557 Portugal
description: The Neptunos Surf school was born from a great desire from many years to pass on our knowledge, culture and satisfaction that surf has provided over 25 years of experience, we felt the need to reciprocate and share it. So in 2013 we advanced to this dream and so was founded the Neptunos Surf School, the school is enrolled in the Portuguese Federation of Surf and Tourism of Portugal and licensed in the Captaincy of the Port of Lagos and coaches have surf coaching degrees. The school has a premium concept, which only accepts 8 clients per class (day), and with 2 trainers having a ratio of 1×4 or 1×5, which guarantees an excellent quality and attention to all clients, being possible to give feedbacks in a timely manner and keep the group safe.
name: Neptunos Surf School
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Surf lessons in the Algarve
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Surf Guide in Algarve
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Aulas de Surf Privadas
ranking: #45 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #45 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: Duarte is a great teacher ! He was so patient because I was a beginner. He knows everything about surfing and really loves surfing, I had a wonderful surf day and can highly recommend Duarte as a surfteacher, would definitely book all my classes with him !
reviews/1/text:
Thanks you so much Duarte for your patience. You helped me a lot to improve my surf and to take off. Bordeira and Zavial where 2 beautiful places to learn with you. Hope you will stay in South Portugal to see you next year. We keep in touch. Wishing you good waves, good vibes and all the best in your carreer.
See ya!
reviews/2/text: We did a beginner surf course with Duarte and really enjoyed it, finally decided to go for another day with him. He knows how to teach, can show you good beaches on the west cost. We had a great time with him and would repeat at every time.
reviews/3/text:
I went to algarve to try out surfing and found Duartes surfing school. I am happy i did because this is propably the best surfing experience you could ever ask for. Duarte is a great teacher and you can tell that surfing is a big part of his life. 
He really cares about teaching it the right way and explains everything very well. Duarte teaches you to become a surfer, not only to try it out once like many other schools do.
Thanks for this amazing experience!

Ps. The beach that we surfed in was beautiful
reviews/4/text:
Duarte was great teacher for us!!
We were really excited and enjoying that's our first time surf.
We had a lovely time during all day.
I definitely recommend Neptunos surf school.
reviews/5/text: It was mine and my brother's first time surfing. We thoroughly enjoyed our day! Duarte's passion for surfing and teaching was evident throughout! Would recommend to anyone wanting to try surfing in small group. Fantastic (and tiring) day!
reviews/6/text: Really honest and genuine guy, teaches in small groups and gives some really good advice! Provides all the gear and transport, could not have been happier with the experience. Would fully recommend it to anyone!
reviews/7/text: Duarte is an excellent teacher with much passion for surfing. Me and my girlfriend had a great day and if we could, we would do it again! Would recommend Duarte to everyone :)
reviews/8/text: Duarte is an excellent surf teacher, both for first timers and for the slightly more intermediate surfers. He teaches with such passion and enthusiasm for surfing! In contrast to some other schools, he only takes 8 students per day, so he can also focus a little bit on individual follow-up. He will be in the water with you to push you and help you to get up on the board. I was with him for five days and I felt really good about my accomplishments in those few days. In my opionion, hans down the best surf school in Algarve.
reviews/9/text: Duarte was a very professional and enthusiastic surf instructor. The communication was great, booking was very smooth and easy. The whole day was relaxed and he took his time to explain every aspect of his passion surfing. He was patient with our skills and gave great personal advice for every individual of our group. Would definetly recommend.
reviews/10/text: Searching for a possibility to surf during our holidays in Lagos, Duarte was recommended to us by another well known surfschool. In contrast to other schools, Duarte was willing to teach our kids (15, 9 and 7) as well. For them it was the first time on a board, and after some theoretics, we all stood on our boards within a couple of tries, riding the waves of Bordeira. He has a sharp eye for details, so you will become a better surfer every lesson. Thanks Duarte!
reviews/10/title: Take Duarte as your (first) surf teacher!
reviews/11/text: Duarte was an excellent teacher who was obviously passionate about surfing. This was the best surf lesson we’ve ever had. Gave us great techniques to work on, and helped us to stand up early in our first lesson. Highly recommend!!
reviews/12/text: Ours was clearly the best instructor on the beach that day. The other schools had someone watching them from the sand while they were out trying to catch waves, but Duarte was right there in the water with us the whole time making sure we were doing it right, and helping us on the spot. It was both mine and my wife's first time surfing, and not only did we have a great time (and caught some waves on our own!), but we left feeling prepared with a much better understanding of how we can get even better the next time. Duarte doesn't just teach you for the day, he sets you up with the skills to keep surfing. Highly recommended.
reviews/13/text:
Great surfing best teacher 
To become a good surfer you need time in the water that’s for true.
But whit the right start you will Improve and starting doing right and whit help from the best teachers whit the surfing attitude and love for the sport it’s will getting you to the top of your own ability.
I get my best days in Lagos and are now thinking of how I should take care of all new knowledge and get any better.
Don’t miss a chance in life get out there in the ocean and if you will get it right take some lessons whit Neptunos surfing.
reviews/14/text: Duarte analysed my surfing and highlighted my weakness and spent the lesson concentrating on technical improvements. This would not have been possible if I had gone to a surf school with lots of students and few teachers. Duarte emphasis on low ratio of students to teachers means you can actually learn how to surf.
reviews/15/text: Duarte was absolutely great, a real surfer and respects the sea (and teaches you to respect). Learned us the basics in half a day, and gave us the opportunity to try it ourselves the second half of the day. Never thought we would “learn” surfing so fast, but it was great. Also, our group consisted of only three persons, meaning we got all the attention we needed. We also saw other surf schools with big groups (20/30 persons), which I would not recommend.
reviews/16/text: Duarte took my 9 year old son for a full day of surf lessons. He took the time needed to teach him and the group the proper techniques, that by the time they actually went surfing they were are doing it really well. I would highly recommend Neptunos and Duarte. 5 stars!!!
reviews/16/title: Great teacher and loads of fun!
reviews/17/text:
We really enjoyed our day with Duarte! It was our first time and since then we really want to go surf again. Duarte was really involved with the group, he came in the water with us and gave us a lot of advices and feedback.
We recommended this Surfschool to everybody!!
reviews/18/text: Duarte is a very attending, friendly and passionate trainer. Me and my friend who were first timers enjoyed it so much that we decided we will keep surfing next summer as well. If you are looking for a detail oriented, inspiring teacher choose Neptunos!
reviews/19/text: I’ve been twice and used Neptune’s with Duarte each time at Easter and it’s been one of my best experiences. He’s a really good teacher and accommodated the times I was free and the best days to surf and can’t wait to go back again next year.

address: Rua Joao Brandeiro, Faro Portugal
description: Are you planning to travel to Algarve and looking for a transfer from Faro, Lisbon, Seville or Málaga Airport? We provide private door-to-door airport transfer service to and from Faro, Lisbon, Seville and Málaga Airports to any Portugal or Spain destination, as well as to golf courses, waterparks, one-day trips at low prices. - Private door to door direct transfer - Modern and comfortable vehicles - Motorway Tolls Included - Free wi-fi on board - Free baby seats and booster seats - No extra charge for luggage or golf bags - Mobile chargers on board - English speaking drivers - No cancellation fees - Pay online or later to the driver - Fully ensured and licensed by Tourism of Portugal
name: Algarve Family Transfers
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Private Transfer from Faro Airport to Tavira (5-8 pax)
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Private transfer from Faro Airport to Alvor (1-4pax)
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Private Transfer from Faro Airport to Monte Gordo (1-4 pax)
offer_group/offer_list/3/title: Private Transfer from Monte Gordo to Faro Airport (1-4 pax)
offer_group/offer_list/4/title: Private Transfer from Alvor to Faro Airport (1-4 pax)
reviews/0/text:
I can totally recommend Algarve Family TransferS
Brilliant service. Honest and reliable with realistic pricing.
Throughout the booking process and the transfers from Faro into El Rompido and back to the airport AFT were a pleasure to deal with. Reliable, helpful and punctual.
The drivers were also great company on the journey 
I will certainly use them again and recommend all other travellers consider AFT

This is a genuine review and I’m in no way associated with this company
reviews/1/text: Very clean an punctual. Driver was very polite. Help us with luggage and everything. Set us off to a great trip.
reviews/2/text:
We booked return transfers from Faroa to Armacao de Pera.  The driver was bang on time when we arrived in Portugal with our family of five.  The driver was superb.  He spoke good English and made our 40 minute journey really comfortable.
Our return to the airport was a 4am pick up from the hotel.  I always get a bit wary that drivers don't turn up.  But i needn't have worried.  The driver arrived approx. 10 mins early and had us back to the airport in plenty time to drop our bags.  Again, a really comfortable ride.  
I would have no hesitation in recommending this company.  
The office confirmed my journey a few days before and immediately responded to any questions.
reviews/2/title: Fantastic Company - One of the best
reviews/3/text: Booked online a few days before, picked up at faro airport on time by a friendly driver, the same on the way back, really took the stress out of queuing for a taxi, paid the driver on the day, definately recommend and will use again.
reviews/4/text: We met up with family in Seville.  Drivers were on time and excellent.  Mini van was clean and drivers were helpful in finding destination.
reviews/5/text:
I just wanted to write and thank you and all of the fantastic drivers that took us to and from the airport and the three golf courses last week.
They were always on time and provided a great service with a smile!
We all had a great time and hope to return again in 2023,
Kind regards
Simon
reviews/6/text:
We spent one week in Vilamoura playing golf. And we were 50 pax. Sofia and her crew is the best transfercompany I ever hired. Always on time, the minivans takes lot’s of luggage and superserviceminded. If you visit as a big group this is the company to use. No doubt about it!!
Fredrik Gustavsson
reviews/7/text: We used Algarve Family Transfers during a visit to Portugal. We stayed at Ferragudo and they were waiting at arrivals at Faro airport when we arrived and arrived a couple of minutes ahead of schedule for a 5am return to Faro airport on our day of departure.  Good vehicle, friendly drivers and most importantly fixed price transfers.  I would highly recommend Algarve Family transfers to any visitors to Faro.
reviews/8/text: Staying in Albufeira as a group of 16 golfers we used Algarve family Transfers for airport and golf transfers to various golf courses around Vilamoura. They were easy to deal with and very flexible with changes required to the booking. Great value for money and were always on time. The drivers were helpful and polite. I will definitely be using them again.
reviews/9/text: First class service, excellent price from faro to praia da luz, rui our driver was extremely helpful, thank you Sofia for everything.
reviews/9/title: Comfortable journey, supplied by algarve family transfers.
reviews/10/text:
I have used Algarve Transfers a few times now from Ayamonte (Spain) to Faro airport and return.
They are always on time, very polite, courteous and helpful.
Communication is excellent and always eager to assist wherever possible.
Their prices are very good and service easy to book online.

Thank you for a great service and look forward to using you again in the future.
I will continue to recommend you!

Thank you
Mike
reviews/11/text: If I could give a 6 star I would! I booked online late night before flight (12 hours before hand) the lady Sofia from the office rang in the morn and was very friendly and confirmed, the gentleman turned up on time came into the hotel to find me and my child (very friendly also) we chatted in the taxi about places to revisit in the algarve area for myself and places for children.  It was a very pleasant journey and felt taken care of, he got a trolley for us when we arrived, I highly recommend their service and was nice to discover it was a family business. I have never left a review before but think this was best taxi journey I had and the dealing with them was great so felt I had to share for future travelers like myself!
reviews/12/text: although we had to change the pick-up time on the same day, everything work great! Nice driver, clean and big cars, cheap and great service! we will book again.
reviews/13/text:
Excellent service transfer from Faro Airport to Isla Canela (in Spain). It was great from start to finish: easy and quick communication, very professional and everything was of an excellent standard. They were also very flexible - I had a last minute change of flight and sent them an sms at 23:55 to change the pick up hour next day in the morning and they answered immediately!)

Our driver was waiting for us as arranged and was extremely nice. I strongly recommend this company and i will certainly book them in our next trip in August!
reviews/13/title: Excellent transfer company from Faro Airport
reviews/14/text:
Outstanding service, used for airport transfers for 8 people and for trips during our holiday.
So easy just to arrange a driver to pick us up through a WhatsApp message.
Tiego and his wife and Mr Rui where outstanding.
Thanks for great service x
reviews/15/text:
We used this company for our transfer from Faro Airport to Vila Vita Parc. From start to finish, this was very professional and everything was of an excellent standard including the spotless, luxury vehicle.
Our driver was waiting for us as arranged and was extremely pleasant - the same driver also took us back to the airport which was a nice touch.
reviews/15/title: Excellent transfer company from Faro Airport.
reviews/16/text: Fantastic service. Driver arrived exactly on time, car was clean and in perfect condition and we arrived in excellent time. A very professional service that I would highly recommend
reviews/17/text: I booked a transfer from Lagos to Faro airport. The process was simple, excellent communication and driver was punctual and professional. I would definitely use this company again and recommended them to other guests at my hotel. Many thanks and 5***** service
reviews/18/text:
fantastic service from the arranging to the three separate journeys we booked from Faro to Alvor and return with separate parties.
Excellent throughout from Sofia on the end of a phone and email to the friendly drivers.
We will most definitely use you again.
Thank you
reviews/19/text: Fantastic and amenable communication whilst arranging the transfers, followed by friendly drivers who were great with our children, within modern and super clean vehicles. Perfect.

description: Quad biking at its best. This is the real deal. Authentic, unique, and tailor made quad tours recommended for all levels of rider from novice to the more experienced. Professional, friendly and personal service. Bookings by appointment only. English, French, and Portuguese spoken.
name: Rooster Quad Tours
reviews/0/text: Amazing, Mark and Clair showed us a wonderful time. It’s a must do!!! What a beautiful country side and just a Great time.
reviews/1/text: Fantastic experience.  What a quad excursion should be.  Good quads beautiful scenery  enough  stops to relax dory our inexperienced group  they care and are genuinely interested in your safety.  A definate  recomend
reviews/2/text:
We had a blast! When driving to the address, the weather took a turn for the worse. Marc and Clare took their time to get protective clothing for all of us and we drove off. In retrospect, the weather added to the fun we had! The area is great, the guides made sure the tour was challenging for our experience level.
As other reviews already stated, Marc and Clare are very helpful and really care about their guests. The experience was marvellous, we had a great time!
reviews/2/title: Even when it's not sunny in the Algarve!
reviews/3/text: I recently went on a Rooster Quad Bike tour with Clare and Mark and it was an absolute blast! The owners were incredibly helpful and made sure to tailor the tour to our group's needs, ensuring that we all had a fun and adventurous experience. I would highly recommend this tour to anyone looking for a unique and exciting way to explore the great outdoors. Thank you Clare and Mark for a memorable time!
reviews/3/title: Rooster Quad Tours is an excellent choice for a quad bike adventure.
reviews/4/text: Fantastic experience. Quad biking on really interesting terrain that is based on your skill level. Felt safe and well looked after but exciting and adventurous as well.
reviews/5/text: This is a must do activity when your in the Algarve. The team, Clare, Mark and Sol are extremely knowledgable, friendly and experienced, all combined, make this a fantastic day out. The routes they take you on are stunning. Having been on several of these quad tours with various other companies, and none come close to Rooster Quads. Safe, professional and most importantly, loads of fun. Can’t wait to go back. See you guys soon
reviews/5/title: A MUST do activity in Algarve
reviews/6/text: Absolutely book this tour! I was in faro for a few days and by chance I found out about this tour and it completely made my holiday. The folks at rooster are incredible accommodating and Clare especially was just lovely! The tour itself was incredible, very fun and the views along the way are amazing. Already looking forward to the next time we’re back
reviews/7/text: Great safety briefing that made you feel safe to ask anything or feel ok to stop and ask if not sure. Myself and two teenagers 13 and 14, had a brilliant time as we kept swapping with Mark taking the girls on more adventurous routes and so we all got to have a go.
reviews/8/text: what an adventure we have had, this is just a pleasure, not so touristic tour but real action on dirt road, you are well informed about the Quads, and how to act to drive them, the route is great with a beautiful view, this is definitely a must that I definitely want to experience again when I'm in the area.
reviews/9/text: If you're looking for a place to have a good time and you enjoy the adrenaline rush, then this is the place!  Lovely owners Mark and Clare who are also close friends, best algarvian views, amazing trails, quads in great condition and overall an experience to remember! Highly recommend !!!
reviews/10/text: Best ever family quad tour in Faro. We have a lovely time in the beautiful valleys and amazing landscape. Kids were enthusiastic and wished it lasted more.. The owners are very friendly and professional. Highly recommended!!
reviews/11/text: I have been on a number of Quad Tours in both the Albufeira and Loule area's and Rooster Quad Tours is by far the best Quad experience. Clare is an amazing instructor,  and tailored the tour for our group's varied levels of experience. She led us through some challenging terrain. Awesome fun, and I will definitely go again. :)
reviews/11/title: Best Quad Tour in the Algarve
reviews/12/text: Another great adventure with Clare and Mark. Two adults and two older teens visiting #roosterquadtours for the second time. The variety of quads and trails is outstanding with superb guidance all the way from start to ending with an icy beer. We even saw a turtle along the way. If you’re in the Algarve and you’re thinking quad tour, I cannot recommend these guys enough.
reviews/12/title: RoosterQuadTours - Sao Bras de Alportel - Portugal’21
reviews/13/text: The folks at rooster are just great. Took me and my 13 year old son on a great trip through farm and forest tracks which was a great adventure! They did everything they could to make it a great experience for us both and I was really impressed by their attitude to safety as well. Highly recommended.
reviews/14/text:
We went on a full day tour with a group of 5 accompanied by 3 guides. Mark and Clare took really good care of us and provided us with some interesting facts about the area and the local life.

The tour itself was amazing and probably one of the best things we did during our stay in Faro / Portugal. They took us through beautiful landscapes and a variety of different terrain. Dusty roads changed into rocky riverbeds and steep hills.

The tour started at 10am in the morning and included a coffee stop and a traditional Portuguese lunch break and they provided water along the way. Once we got back to the base at around 6pm they offered us a couple of - much needed - cold beers/drinks to wash down the dust ;)
The bikes were really fun to ride, and we got equipped with all the required safety gear.

The booking process in advance was super easy! Clare responded super quick, and everything was really easy going. They are checking on your skill levels in advance so they can make sure you ride with people of the same skill level to ensure everyone is getting the most of it.
reviews/15/text:
The half day tour was very complete, around 4 hours with strategic stopping points.

The quads were working properly, well maintained and with more than enough power to go through the entire track without any difficulties.

Mark and Clare were great hosts and very friendly. A safety briefing was done prior to our departure.
reviews/16/text:
Great quads, great views, and Mark and Clare were fantastic guides who knew the trails well and ensured the group had an excellent time.
We went on the full-day tour which included an amazing lunch stop and gave lots of variety in trails, allowing us to really gel as a group.
reviews/17/text: What an amazing experience we had!! We did the half day tour which suited well with our one week holiday in Portugal. I highly recommend to book a Quad tour with Rooster Quad Tours. The area is a paradise for quad riding. Mark and Clare have been very kind and helpful through the whole booking process and showed us the best trails in beautiful Algarve. Definitely going to come back!! Thanks again for those great memories
reviews/18/text:
à l'instant
I've been to the short tour with a friend of mine. We've been so we'll welcomed !
All the materials were given and the explanations clear.
The tour was just amazing, adequate to our level. Clare was a perfect guide, a really nice person.
At the end of the tour, when we came back, they offered us some drinks.
I really recommend to go there if you want to have a good time with good people !
reviews/19/text:
Great quad tour through the Portuguese hills with stunning views, great tracks and stop off points to take it all in, including a coffee and snack stop! 

Well organised by experienced Mark and Clare, both leading the way providing varying levels of riding amongst the same group with Clare leading the beginners and Mark branching off for more challenging tracks and routes for those with experience, always joining back up with the rest of the group to continue the tour. 

Well looked after, friendly and able to accommodate groups from all over. Not to be missed during your trip to the Algarve and we’ll be back next time!
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Rooster Quad Tours tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Rua 25 de Abril, n_2 cave Luz Beach, Lagos 8600-176 Portugal
description: This year even in covid-19 times, you want to SURF MORE??? We have safety measures and prevention. Whatever your surfing aims, make this year your best year of surf yet. Goals: - think positively - eat healthy - work hard - worry less - SURF MORE... Book your next surf session and check our schedules. Surf Lessons all year Round for all levels. Life is better when you learn to surf with US.
name: Salty Wave Surf School
photo/caption: surf lesson in  praia da luz, lagos
ranking: #44 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #44 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: I had a great experience with Salty Wave Surf School! The instructor, Marcos, were obviously passionate and knowledgeable. I liked that he takes time to teaches things about surfing before going to the water and teaching the technical part. I liked learning more about surfing in general. I enjoyed the experience so much that I booked for a second session the next day! I had another instructor in the second day and he was very nice too! I highly recommend this surf school!
reviews/1/text: I spent two days surfing with Salty Wave Surf School and I am completely hooked. Never having surfed before, I was happy to get a full safety rundown from Marcos before heading out into the waves. On water, Marcos was a great coach and offered constant adjustments and coaching to get me standing up on the board. I felt safe, met a bunch of great people from all over, and had a very fun experience.
reviews/2/text: Really enjoyed this experience, instructor Marcos Is very professional, helpful and full of knowledge ready to teach, I really recommend giving this surf school a try you won’t regret it
reviews/3/text: Great surf experience in a great location! A special Thanks to Marcos! I really enjoyed the lessons and hope to come back soon :)
reviews/4/text:
Over new years eve I wanted to get back into surfing after few years of no surf opportunities. Even if it felt like starting from scratch, I also had the chance to learn a lot more than I ever had in other Surfschools. I loved that Marcos places much emphasis on mediating theory, rules and security aspects. He has always given honest tips in the water, shown movements or answered questions instead of waiting in the water and giving only short pushes to beginners. If you really want to learn surfing step by step with honest, experienced and supportive teachers, Saltywave is the perfect school. Also in wintertime!
see you next winter :)
reviews/4/title: a school to make a true progress
reviews/5/text: I had such a great first surf lesson with Salty Wave - booking and pickup was a breeze, and my instructor Marcos was the best! The lesson was really thorough, I learned so much about surfing, technique, safety, equipment, etc. - both on the sane and in the water. The class size was really small so I got a lot of one-on-one time with Marcos too, which was really appreciated. Marcos was super patient with me as a first time surfer, and really helped maximize my time in the water/learn to stand up! He also helped provide resources for tips and exercises to help prepare me for next year (because I plan to return, and would absolutely return to Salty wave for my future lessons.) Thank you again to Rodrigo and Marcos for a great first surf experience. I'm hooked! :)
reviews/6/text: First time surfer, did 3 days of lessons and had a blast! Great instructor, safe, knowledgeable and extremely  fun. Will definitely be going back next year for more! Highly recommend
reviews/7/text: Very good instructors and beautiful landscapes. Lessons perfectly explained and focussed on the careful study of the basics of surfing. Totally trust the advice of Marcos and the other guys, and most importantly, listen with respect and education.
reviews/8/text: Very well selected surf spots, excellent and professional teaching, helpful instructions to get a lot of waves, a wide choice of equipment also to rent (including soft racks) and a lot of fun as well. I therefore highly recommend Salty Wave Surf School :)
reviews/9/text: I had my first surfing lessons with Salty Wave Surf school and enjoyed it a lot! The coaches were great and explained the basics really well. They also always motivated us to keep on paddling and catch the next good wave after falling in the water. :) On the second day I already saw a lot of progress and look forward to coming back next year. :) Thanks for this great experience! I can totally recommend this surf school.
reviews/10/text:
We would totally recommend Salty Waves when you are staying near Lagos and looking for a beginner surf class. We spent the 2 days of our lesson with Marcos who gave us a really good instruction about the basics and always had a good tip for us - as well as some jokes, so you'll always have something to laugh ;)
Thank you for the wonderful experience and keep the great work going
reviews/10/title: Best choice for our first surf class :)
reviews/11/text:
We had an awesome time surfing with salty wave! Marcos and Marcel were very helpful and we were able to improve our surfing skill. Marcos gave us a lot of recommendations how we can improve our skill at home when we can’t Be in the water. 

Only wish for next time: going a bit more outside to learn surfing green waves better. We will definitely be back for that! 
Thank you!!
reviews/11/title: Awesome time with Marcos and Marcel ❤️
reviews/12/text:
Had an amazing time while taking my classes with Salty Wave All coaches are great professionals who give clear instructions, they were there for me each step of the way and helped me to progress a lot Also super punctual when picking you up and organized when it comes to going to/from the beach so you do not waste any of your time. 
They are also super fun!! 
Thank you for the great time!
reviews/13/text: Really loved the surflessons!! We went to a beautiful surfspot!! Had a lot of fun in the water!
reviews/14/text:
We started with a 3 days course without any previous experience. We enjoyed the time and learned how to start, stand up on the board and surf the waves in a beautiful spot with the right conditions for us.  Marcos our instructor was accurate and clear with the theory and followed us in the water to support and correct our mistakes. He's also very funny !
The school is well organised, they pick up the participants at their accommodation on time every morning.  We managed easily the booking on Internet, followed on WhatsApp for details and updates. Overall, it was a beautiful experience, we had a great time and we recommend the salty wave school!
reviews/15/text:
My partner and I (who have surfed a few times before) had a terrible experience which was caused by 1 individual at this company. I never got his name but he was older and had been providing surf instruction for 20+ years at this company, and was our instructor that day. Logistically, everything was ok - we were picked up at our hotel in Lagos in a large van, drove to the beach, got wetsuits, boards etc. They were no places to change in & out of clothes or use a washroom but this wasn't a big deal for us.

What was a big deal was the atmosphere our instructor created. The instructor was confusing, did not provide much initial direction, and for the entire duration, he did not say one positive thing. He complained and yelled at everyone. This included getting mad at people for how they walked with the board, how they dismounted after catching a wave, how they changed out of their wetsuit, how they carried their belongings, and even got mad if people cheered after their friend caught a wave. He was very mean and provided no positive reinforcement for those just starting out - just yelling and negative criticism. I remember a few surfers caught waves for their first time, and instead of congratulating them he would just yell at them to do something different. It seemed like he honestly didn't care at all and just wanted our money to pump us through the production line. It got to the point where some people just stopped surfing, out of fear they would get yelled at no matter what they did. 

My partner and I were shocked at how bad the environment was and we were both very upset which ruined the experience - we understand there are safety components that need to be rigorously followed, however the experience should still be very fun and rewarding. I have no idea how this guy still works at the company but maybe no one ever provides him feedback or he has a power complex where he just doesn't care. He needs to be taught that HE is working for US; WE are not working for HIM. He should treat clients accordingly. 

The day would have been A LOT better with another instructor. There was another lady who seemed more positive and created a welcoming, fun environment, however I didn't directly interact with her. I'm sure the majority of 5 star reviews are people with these other instructors, so overall this experience may be worth doing, but I would try to make sure you don't get the guy we had. He will likely see this review and not reflect on it at all (unless this is the first time he's had feedback in over 20 years). All of our other experiences near Lagos were awesome!

Enjoy your time in the Algarve! Cheers.
reviews/16/text:
Amazing day. Marcos and Kim were too great instructors and allow us to surf the waves.
I truly recommend this school.
Obrigada!
reviews/17/text:
My lessons with salty wave have been great, they brought us to an amazing beach with guaranteed waves. The teacher was expuerienced and explained everything very well.
Highly recommended, had a lot of fun!
reviews/17/title: Great way to get some surf skills
reviews/18/text: Our first try with waves and boards made us happy because of the experience and our good choice of the right surf-school. We had a 3 day surf course. We got in contact with a lot of salty waves, nice people, beautiful landscapes and feelings of excitement. The surfinstructors are always there for you and help to improve your individual development. We liked the small groups and the drive to the spot (on the last day with a lot of funny music). We would do it again with your surf-school and send smiles to Marcos, Kim and Marcel.
reviews/19/text: Very good and accurate explanation of techniques, safety measures. It’s really difficult to get the hang of it but with these close instructions it gets really clear waht to do. Practice practice practice. Marcos did a great job and the beach (ruiva) extremely beautiful.

description: Stand-up Paddleboard & Coasteering tours. SUP tours: to the Grottoes and caves, secret Beaches and SUP equipment rentals. Coasteering with Cliff Jumping: climbing, cliff-jumping and swimming in Caves along the coast! Pick-ups possible between Sagres and Lagos.
name: Coastline Algarve
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: SUP Adventure in Algarve's secret Ingrina Caves with Photos Included
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Coasteering and Cliff Jumping Near Lagos
ranking: #41 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #41 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text:
Went to this for my 23rd birthday and it was absolutely great. The tour guide was very friendly and talkative. The jumps went from 1-10 metres. It all involved climbing up the cliffs. Jumping off the cliffs and swimming in the ocean to the next jump. Even a little swim into a cave passage. 

The tour guide was super patient with everybody. Didn’t push you to do something you didn’t want to do. It truly was something special and will be a day I remember forever. The people I did it with also made the day amazing. Thanks again for the experience.
reviews/1/text: Perfect mix of adrenaline and beatifuk views! Our instructor was great, very patient and even gave us a history lesson while we were climbing. Such a beautiful location as well!
reviews/2/text: We did the sunrise SUP tour and it was the most amazing experience! We had a wonderful time with a beautiful sunrise, caves all for ourselfs and an amazing guide! Would totally recommend it!!!
reviews/3/text: Did both the SUP and Coasteering, thoroughly enjoyed both, though I was exhausted afterwards. Definitely worth doing the Coasteering even though it is scary.
reviews/4/text:
We did the Sunrise Paddle Tour. 
This was such an amazing experience. 
Nelson was such a great tour guide and we enjoyed that morning so much. 
Highly recommend that for everyone staying or visiting Lagos.
reviews/5/text: We did the sunrise SUP tour at Lagos with Nelson. It was a great experience! Getting to see the sunrise at the ocean en from within the caves was really magical. Nelson is a realy friendly and experienced guide, he told us lots about the caves and ocean! Highly recommend this tour!
reviews/6/text: Monitor is an amazing guy and the activity is very interesting. I truly recommend this activity to everybody.
reviews/7/text: If you love any kind of water - ocean, lakes, and rivers - this is the place for you to go. Nelson is a true native, knows every inch of the area and keeps you completely safe while doing tons of activity. The area itself is an amazing spot on earth. I am reviewing it since it deserves it but honestly...hope the right amount of folks will go there. The earth cannot afford to lose this piece to mass tourism.
reviews/8/text: Excellent experience and worth every bit. Unique location on the coast and our tour guide Nelson was great
reviews/9/text: We had an amazing time coasteering with Nelson. He is very friendly, gives clear information and directions. Great guy! The tour itself is wonderfull where you follow the coastline and can jump from different heights. For some parts you swim in the swelling sea, while also going into several caves, and to top it off with a high jump in a wonderfull cave. Highly recommended!!
reviews/10/text: My friends and I had been traveling Portugal for a couple of weeks when we booked this tour with Nelson. He was so responsive on email and was even more fun to hang out with in person. One friend was an experienced paddleboader, another friend had only paddle boarded twice before and fallen, and the third friend had never paddle boarded. All three of us had a total blast. The wetsuits that Nelson provided were clutch and made the experience that much more comfortable. I imagine we would have all three been freezing if it weren’t for that helpful component. Nelson gave us a head’s up that the swells were too high and that it was safer to go earlier in the morning (a sunrise SUP tour) at a different location, which ended up being an insanely cool experience. I’ve paddle boarded numerous times before but this was the first time that a SUP guide ever taught mechanics or gave me helpful cues on how to navigate the water. We LOVED our time with Nelson - absolutely recommend to anyone visiting in the area. We are already talking about how we can’t wait to visit him in the future for a cliff jumping tour.
reviews/11/text: Our group booked a private SUP tour with Nelson at sunrise.  Wonderful experience, worth getting up extra early for!  Beautiful caves and lots of fun.  Everyone had a great time.  Thank you, Nelson!
reviews/12/text: Had a great coasteering experience with them. Really enjoyed that! Matt taken us thru this and he was fun, professional and encouraging. Couldn't do them big jumps without someone with knowledge. All gear included so you don't have to worry about nothing. Would definitely recommend. Big jumps is a must!
reviews/13/text:
5 blokes in our 40's who should know better at this stage did the coasteering tour with Matt.

What an amazing day out. Coming from albuferia it was great to see some of the real Portugal rather than the neon lights and loud music

Matt was a great guide and worked us all the way up to the 15 metres cave jump which was an amazing experience and gave both of us who did it a great buzz for the remainder of the trip.

Highly recommended
reviews/14/text:
Went on a 3-4 hour paddle board tour with Nelson. He was a very personable host and was very professional during the tour. We saw unreal views of the caves and coastline in the area. We also
Got to try out surfing on the paddle boards! He even took pictures for us and shared them later free of charge. Highly recommend Nelson and his tour!
reviews/15/text:
My girlfriend and me went for the coasteering experience. Due to the time of the year, we were the only guests so we had a 'private tour', which was fun. My girlfriend actually is scared of heights and open water, so I must have been a bit crazy to try this experience. Nelson really took his time and went very easy on her. She even jumped a few times and dared to climb the high rocks, which is admirable. 

The thing I enjoyed most, is feeling very liberated in the open water, with waves passing by and feeling the real power of the ocean without feeling scared. We also have seen some beautiful caves, which was cool!

The only feeling I had is that we had not so much time to really enjoy the scenery and the experience itself, but I think the reason must have been my girlfriend, who took a lot of time to dare the jumps, swims etc.

We had a great experience and I would recommend this to the more daring people out there. If you are a novice in open water or really scared of heights, you might want to skip this one because you'll maybe feel unsure and will not enjoy it as much. If not so, just go for it!
reviews/16/text: We did an allday activity including Coasteering and SUP. Befiele, Nelson checked the weather conditions to enable us a Great and Safe experience and wrote us E-Mails everyday to keep us uptodate. We then had a great day with Nelson. He gave us all important instructions before we started and was always concerned about our safety in everything we did. During the tours he told us interesting things about the coast and nature. He took a lot of Great pictures for us to always remember that day. Thankyou :)
reviews/17/text: Nelson was a fantastic guide for our trip in June! We were staying in Lagos and were provided with a free pickup and drop off right in the center of town. We were also able to get to know more about the Algarve history during these commutes! For the SUP trip we drove to a remote beach and got a quick intro to paddle-boarding (we all had previous experience) and paddled out through the bluest water I've ever seen. Three hours was plenty of time to enter many unique caves and grottos (some of which we paddled into and some of which were small enough that we had to swim into). Jumping off the cliffs was the highlight of the trip for us! Would highly recommend for anyone who loves adventure and wants to see the Algarve coastline off the beaten path!!!
reviews/18/text: Nelson is a good experienced, safety conscious guide and takes you to some hidden gems on the coast. You are always at ease to go at your pace so if you don't want to jump 10 metres off a cliff then that is perfectly fine!
reviews/19/text: My 15 year old son and I did the coasteering tour. It was great: wonderful nature with nice caves and beautiful coastline. Amazing jumps (I stopped at 5 meters, my son continued up to 10). Climbing the rocks was sometimes challenging. Nelson was a very friendly and helpful guide. Thanks for the great afternoon and the pictures afterwards. Ann (Belgium)

reviews/0/text:
The best bar in albufeira by far! From the minute you walk in you are looked after and made to feel very welcome! A special big shout out to Andreia, Gabi and Raika who all go above and beyond every time, will definitely be back soon! 

You can not visit albufeira and not come to this bar! 

Thanks again girls x
reviews/0/title: You will not want to leave!
reviews/1/text: Great music, good vibes and atmosphere, the drinks are the only thing that lets it down, prices changing depending on which bar staff and clearly use the cheapest standard of spirit available.
reviews/1/title: would return, great for a couple of hours
reviews/2/text: Had a great time the staff where friendly and engaging from the minute you walked in especially Andrea funny sense of humour and pleasant, the breakfast was top and hit the spot
reviews/3/text:
Best bar ever stafff are the best during the day time 
Thanks girls, Elsa, Denise, Andreia, Gi and Raika. 
Very nice time
reviews/4/text: The friendliest bar here in Albuferia, went above and beyond to get the channel for the under 20's rugby  and a special thanks to Jean from Mallow  for your great service and for making my birthday so special.
reviews/4/title: Can't wait to come back again.
reviews/5/text: What a place, spent many of days and hours here on a stag do. Staff were amazing and couldn’t do enough for us, crazy games and an even better atmosphere. Special mention to Andreia, took extra care of us Welsh lads, would highly recommend and will definitely be paying a visit here again!
reviews/6/text: The best place in albufeira to have a drink, watch some sports and have fun with friends during the day. By night only craziness with great bar staff, big shoutout to Andreia and Gigi!!
reviews/7/text: I go to Portugal a lot and always make time to go see Andrea at legends bar, she is always happy, smiling and causing trouble :)
reviews/8/text:
This is a special place, with special people, the whole atmosphere and the waiters have made it great, impossible for me to forget the performance of
Joao varanda 
Frederick
Henrrique tomas
reviews/9/text: One of the best bars on the strip! Great night out and great music. Special mention to Andreia who really looks after you which makes us keep coming back every year! Thanks for making a good holiday even better!
reviews/10/text: Brilliant night out. Great atmosphere Andreia the bar manager is awesome always makes you feel welcome. All the staff are great. Party every night. Plenty of shots
reviews/11/text:
Such an amazing bar with great staff, especially Andreia. Felt like we were visiting friends every time we went there. 
Great for day time drinks too and a game of pool.
reviews/12/text: Best bar on the strip, always the busiest, DJ always plays really good music, visit everytime we’re in Albufeira
reviews/13/text: Gabi is amazing, super friendly and the rest of the staff are so good they cater to all your needs!would 100% recommend when you are in the area
reviews/14/text:
Best staff ever! Such a good vibe all day long. Good food. Good drinks. Definitely worth a visit. 

Miguel and Joanna have been amazing!!!
reviews/15/text: Denise and Carina Are the best bar staff in town. Very helpful and happy to help. This is a must go place. Good food. Good company. Great chat. Would highly recommend. Bar staff are very beautiful too!
reviews/16/text: Freddie, Carlos and guri Sandhu best barmen and best bar! Amazing cocktails! Definitely recommend!!!
reviews/17/text: We was greeted by Raika who served us all night. Great banter and great service in the legends sports bar. Highly recommended.
reviews/18/text: Raika is the best barmaid. I need to leave more information to meet the standard. If you are reading this leave your Number.
reviews/19/text: Best bar I’ve been to in Albufeira and the waitress carina is amazing! Can not wait to come back again

Timeless Moments offer the best options in the Algarve for Yacht Charter and Private Boat Hire options. Contact us today for your personalised proposal.
name: Timeless Moments - Vilamoura Yacht Charter
ranking: #42 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #42 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text:
Amazing sunset cruise in Algarve. 
Boats go from Vilamoura Marina with lots of amenities like parking, restaurants and bars. 
Boat was in perfect condition and crew was absolutely amazing, thank you Sandra for your hospitality and João for all the arrangements you made. 
Had an amazing time with friends. It’s absolutely worth it
reviews/1/text: Amazing experience for someone who wants to witness the beauty of the Algarve's atlantic ocean in the best fanciest and personalized way. Worth every penny!!
reviews/2/text: Well us old men and and stag with his chums had an absolutely amazing time with these guys totally professional chill and ready for fun thank you so much …….if you can do it please do it it’s fab xxx
reviews/3/text: Our afternoon spent on the fabulous “Columbia” was incredible! A group of 12 of us were celebrating a hen do and Sandra and Joao did a fabulous job of making our afternoon one we will never forget!! Couldn’t recommend highly enough!
reviews/4/text:
After enjoying the sunset cruise last year, we decided to book the 7 hour trip to celebrate my 50th birthday with friends this year. It did not disappoint and we cannot thank Ricardo and João enough for making it so special and memorable 
We paid the balance on the day and picked up 'Colombia' at Vilamoura Marina at 10am.  A glass of fizz started the celebrations which continued throughout the day as we sailed towards the caves and stunning beach coastlines. 
A dip in the sea and tapas on board before we anchored for lunch at Restaurante A Sardinha.  The staff were so friendly, the view was amazing and the fresh tiger prawns were so delicious.
Back on board to complete our sail with birthday cake and fizz before returning to Vilamoura Marina.
What a trip! Would totally recommend and have already booked to do it all again in 2023. 
Thank you so much to all of the Timeless Moments team for making our day so very special!
reviews/5/text:
The boat trip was amazing, but know what you are getting. This trip is to experience "yacht life", not scenery or dolphins or culture. We had a fabulous time laying out on the deck watching the water and sky, and the lovely Barbara making sure our wine glasses were never empty. We toured briefly through some caves, which were lovely, and stopped briefly to swim, cold! 

Do make sure you get very specific directions on where to check in. The marina is huge and our group of 30 spent 30 minutes walking in the heat to figure it out.
reviews/6/text: We had a fantastic afternoon cruise yesterday up the Algarve coastline to the caves at Albufeira aboard the Princess V55 ‘Dream’ with Pedro and Miguel our crew. The crew were very professional, knowledgable and confident. The boat was clean and we had a totally relaxing afternoon. Thank you we will recommend and we will be back.
reviews/7/text: We had a wonderful 5 hr afternoon trip with timeless moments yesterday. Erica & Ricardo looked after us so well thank you
reviews/8/text: Lovely afternoon cruise to see the Bengali caves. Andre & Eurico were amazing in sharing local knowledge and looking after us, including 4 children 7-12 years old. We spent 2 hours driving around the caves and had the opportunity to swim to a remote cave, which was so beautiful and then headed back to the marina. The whole experience lasted just over 4 hours. I would recommend sea sickness tablets if you are susceptible to feeling queasy as it was a bit choppy in places but a great afternoon.
reviews/9/text: Had the pleasure of spending 7 hours on board Colombia with my wife and our 2 sons on my birthday. The whole experience was amazing from start to finish. The two crew members we had with us were great hosts and really looking after us. Highly recommend and will definitely be back soon.
reviews/10/text: This experience is in the Company Title (Timeless Moments) something our family will never forget such an amazing day! Crew were fantastic and would highly recommend this company!
reviews/11/text: The trip was amazing, captain João and Barbara were superb & kept the drinks flowing. Boat was lovely & we had plenty of time in the water to play around & use the stand up paddle board. Cant recall why, but we didnt make it into the cave & the stereo system wasnt working on the boat, but they did offer to make it up to us next time. Great day on board there dream boat!
reviews/12/text: We chartered Columbia through Timeless Moments, a lovely Sunseeker yacht with an amazing crew, Ricardo and Erica. We have been lucky to enjoy many treats and special days out in the Algarve but this beat them all. They brought us to the caves, out on the rib boat that was hidden in the garage, found a private beach to moor up for a swim at and to top it off found a family of dolphins on the way back, where we were within a couple of metres of them. Worth every penny, a truly memorable experience. Thanks guys, we will see you again!!
reviews/13/text: Fantastic private charter, captain took us to the caves, we did paddle boarding and swam in sea watching sun setting.
reviews/14/text: Do yourself a favor & book this! Our 4 teenagers were thrilled with the jet skis, the sites, the music, the boat. My 78 year old mother enjoyed the boat as well. A must do treat. Very grateful to have this memory through the care of the Timeless Moments team!
reviews/14/title: Yes! Yes! Yes! Book this treat for your teens & family
reviews/15/text: Hired ‘be happy’ for 7 hours, service, crew were fantastic! Had the best time! Would highly recommend. Stopped off for lunch and a bit of jet skiing and paddle boarding! Simply amazing - will be back
reviews/16/text:
This was our second trip with Timelessmoments. 2019 being the last time. Unfortunately Covid prevented earlier return trips. 
We sailed on Dream with Joao and Barbara as our crew for 5 hours
The whole experience was fabulous. From my initial booking with Olga, which was professional, timely and very helpful. Always keeping me informed. 
Joao and Barbara were the perfect hosts, making sure our experience was perfect. 
We were a party of 11 and everyone commented it was the best thing about our holiday to the Algarve. 
You see the coast from a different view and with Joao’s excellent navigational skills we were able to explore the caves. Stunning. 
We stopped for paddle boarding, swimming and general fun in the sea. Our trip was one of those ‘backlit’ life experiences and was worth every penny. Some wonderful life memories made. Priceless!
reviews/17/text: This was our first yacht charter in the Algarve, and it was excellent - more than comparable to the others we have had elsewhere. There was a slight mixup over parking, but this was resolved brilliantly on the day once I had contacted them. The yacht was perfect for the seven of us and we had a great time. This wasn’t the Caribbean or Maldives so there isn’t any snorkelling, but we had stand up paddle boarding, which my boys loved. Captain Andre and Leo made us feel perfectly at home. I was most impressed above all by Andre breaking off our conversation mid-word to steer into the wake of some young buck who went well above the speed limit next to us when leaving the harbour - clearly an experienced professional sailor. Our snacks were excellent - alas, second portions were needed for my greedy boys and their girlfriends. I would definitely recommend this experience, and I’m sure we will try it again.
reviews/18/text: Absolutely amazing charter on the Be Happy ship.  Andre and Gurico were incredible guides and sailors.  They pointed out all the key things to see, provide incredible service.   Highly recommend.
reviews/19/text: Booked a sailing charter through them. Communication was excellent. Did everything through WhatsApp. They were responsive and provided excellent service.
subcategory_ranking: #42 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Timeless Moments - Vilamoura Yacht Charter tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: R dr Henrique Gomes n13 B, Benagil, Lagoa 8365-133 Portugal
address_obj/street1: R dr Henrique Gomes n13 B
description: We are local guides established in 2016 as a company to share with our visitors the secrets and information about the best Algarve has to offer.
name: Blue Xperiences Benagil
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Benagil Cave eco-Tour
ranking: #43 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #43 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: This was the best experience of our Algarve vacation. Bruno was an amazing guide and paddleboard instructor. We got to see the Benagil sea cave as well as many others that are more off the beaten trail. Can’t recommend more highly!
reviews/0/title: Best way to see the Benagil Sea Cave!
reviews/1/text: Beautiful experience! Bruno knows the place perfectly and explains it very well. Great in morning…..
reviews/2/text: Bruno is a great guide. He was very professional and gave a great overview on safety and procedures for paddle boarding prior to heading out. He took us to caves that no one else was going to. Benagil was a bit disappointing as there were so many people and boats coming and going, so we really loved that we got to see some of the other ones which a lot of boats can't go into. He also had a GoPro and took great shots which he sent us afterward at no extra cost, as well as dry bags to use for each person. Wonderful experience!
reviews/2/title: Best way to see the caves
reviews/3/text:
Doesn't matter if you are advanced in standup paddling or a beginner - you are gonna have fun. Bruno is an amazing instructor who just wants to put a smile on your face - and he did!
If we're ever back in Algarve, this tour will definitely be on our to do list again!
Would recommend.
reviews/3/title: Best place and instructor for stand-up paddling
reviews/4/text: We had an amazing time on this paddle boarding tour, it was one of the most enjoyable experiences of my life. Bruno is a fabulous instructor and it is all very relaxed. The caves we went in were stunning and Bruno had a great deal of knowledge about the caves. Thanks for a great time, we will be back next year!
reviews/5/text: Best SUP tour that we ever made! I really recommended it, specially with Bruno as the tour guide. You will not only have fun doing SUP but discover beautiful locations
reviews/6/text: Nous avons visité les grottes de Benagil de la plus belle des manières : sur un SUP en compagnie de Bruno. Toujours attentif et prêt à donner des explications, il nous a fait passer une très belle matinée.
reviews/7/text:
Tres beau.A voir absolument.Nous sommes arrivés en hors bord.
tres belles photos a prendre.C'est un endroit magique.
reviews/8/text:
Super expérience avec Bruno.
Nous hésitions à seulement louer un paddle et visiter la grotte seuls mais nous ne regrettons pas d’avoir choisi l’option avec guide. Bruno nous a emener dans des endroits superbes où nous ne serions pas aller seuls. De supers petites grottes et des vues vraiment magnifiques. Il explique également très bien le paddle pour les débutants. Je recommande!!
reviews/9/text: Experiencia genial! Vistas, cuevas, paddle surf y y el mejor monitor Bruno explicando! Para repetir!
reviews/10/text:
Bruno est un super guide pour expliquer le contexte (sédiment..) et le paddle. Il y a aussi quelques surprises..
A 50 ans et 95 kg j ai pu me lever. On peut aussi rester à genou ou assis ce qui rend la discipline accessible à tous, même à mon épouse qui n en avait pas dormi de la nuit ;)
Bruno parle anglais, espagnol, portugais, francais et catalan donc la discussion est facile, même si l anglais est privilégiée dans un groupe multilingues, mais il vérifie à chaque fois la compréhension avec plaisir. 
Il fait des photos, y compris à la demande et les envoie le soir même. 
Sachez qu on peut laisser quelques affaires au local ou alors achetez vous un sac étanche chez décathlon ;) 
Bref, à faire !!! 
Encore merci pour votre gentillesse, 
Stephane, Ludmilla et Charlotte
