address: Rua padre evaristo do Rosario guerreiro, Tavira 8800-340 Portugal
address_obj/street1: Rua padre evaristo do Rosario guerreiro
description: Fatia Transfers is based in Tavira, we provide direct door-to-door Private Faro Airport Transfers, Lisbon Airport Transfers and Seville Airport Taxi Transfers to and from any location in the Algarve, Portugal and South of Spain. Since 2015 providing Faro Airport Taxi Transfers to hotels, villas, apartments, resorts, golf courses, water parks and all other destinations. Ultra-competitive prices for quality transfers!
name: Fatia Transfers
reviews/0/text: We used FATIA to get to the airport for an early flight home. It is very easy to book through their website, and they arrived outside our apartment right on time, no hassle! Only 45 euros!
reviews/1/text: Great transfer service -- I am a repeat client. Easy to book and super-reliable. I don't have to worry about whether or not they will show up. The drivers are professional and friendly. Vehicle was spotless.
reviews/2/text:
We used them for transfer from Faro Airport to Tavira and 3 round trips to golf courses for 8 people.
The vehicles were all excellent and turned up at the right time for each trip.
reviews/3/text: Leo, our driver, was on time and drove smoothly and efficiently to the airport.  The car was spacious and immaculate.  Great service and we will use Fatia Transfers again.
reviews/4/text: This was my first time using Fatia transfers and I would not hesitate to use them for future journeys. The driver was friendly and punctual, and the car was clean and comfortable. Thank you!
reviews/5/text: Second time users and wont be the last, highly recommend this company, drivers have been friendly and professional, lovely clean comfortable cars and waiting for us at the airport no problems.
reviews/6/text: First time using Fatia Transfers and booked online. Flight was slightly delayed, but driver was waiting for us as arranged. Excellent driver and car was immaculate. Will definitely use again and would highly recommend using this company.
reviews/7/text: We've used FATIA transfers on several occasions. Always on-time and friendly service. Highly recommend.
reviews/8/text:
Living between Tavira and Olhão,  I quickly learned that when I needed a 100% reliable ride to/from the Faro airport that the Fatia gentlemen were the real deal. 

Even well before sunrise on 26 December!     Fantastic service, good cars and superb guys.   Cannot recommend them more highly.   Will always be my choice.
reviews/8/title: Number one for me in the East Algarve.   Reliable, Quality, Friendly
reviews/9/text:
We regularly use their service.
Always on time, very professional! 
Absolutely best!
They could  accommodate unusual request of transportation as well.
reviews/10/text: Driver very polite and punctual. Car was very comfortable and easy ride. Service was straight forward and trusted.
reviews/11/text: Great service. Our driver, Joao, arrived right on time for our airport transfer from Tavira to Faro. He was very friendly and helpful, and his vehicle very clean and comfortable. No hesitation in recommending Fatia Transfers.
reviews/12/text: Excellent service.  Waiting for you at the airport and spot on time to collect you for your return.  Courteous chauffeurs.  Reasonable price.  Good recommendation from a friend.  Will use them again.
reviews/13/text: The Driver are always on time, clean vehicles, staff are friendly, and knowledgeable and make sure you're well looked after
reviews/14/text: Great communication before and during our service, Very friendly service also.  prompt replies to inquiries, driver was professional and drove cautiously.  I was a little concerned about the amount of luggage we had (4 adults and 10 suitcases), but no problem as the van was big enough to accommodate everything.  The one thing that was a little challenging was just meeting up with the driver at the airport.  We understood that the driver would meet us inside the terminal at the coffee shop but he was outside, thankfully, I was able to text our contact at Fatia and he immediately put us together.  The driver did have a sign with our names on it, and he also spoke English very well.  Highly recommended
reviews/15/text: reliable and comfortable service, on time. The both drivers of Fatia Transfers are very friendly, patient (as the flight arrived in Faro with delay) and careful.
reviews/15/title: More than a taxi service, excellent and professional
reviews/16/text: Excellent taxi service, booking online was so easy and straight forward. The driver was a really nice guy, he arrived on time and got us to the airport with no issues. I would definitely recommend this company
reviews/17/text: Fatia was reliable, professional and friendly. They were very responsive through WhatsApp when I missed my connection to Faro and I had to reschedule everything. Joe picked me up from the airport and returned me to Faro, giving me warnings and help  about the cost of going to the airport from my Faro hotel at 4 am the next day. Definitely would use them again.
reviews/18/text:
After reading such positive reviews online we decided to book with this very professional company and were  not disappointed.

Both drivers were very welcoming and the service was absolutely brilliant.  We would certainly recommend this company.
reviews/19/text: Such a relief to find Leo waiting for us at the Faro airport after our 25 hour trip from California, and an hour delay getting into Portugal. It was late, it was dark, we were in unfamiliar territory, and we were exhausted, so it felt like Heaven to be taken such good care of by your company. We will definitely use Fatia Transfer‘s next spring when we return.
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Fatia Transfers tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Urbanizacao Marachique, Alvor, Portimao 8500-045 Portugal
description: Treat yourself, or a friend, to the total "Mind & Body Experience" at Swan.Day.Spa, where the exotic combination of Aroma´s, Sounds & Sensations blend together to create a total rejuvenation of all your Senses.The Swan.Day.Spa welcomes you the minute you step inside it´s beautifully designed and decorated rooms, and encourages you to Relax and to be totally Pampered with the many treatments on offer.
name: Swan Day Spa
reviews/0/text:
A wonderful experience from the moment I walking into Swan Day Spa.  So friendly, professional and what an amazing relaxing atmosphere.  Enjoyed it so much I bought the same package leaving for someone else to experience.  Thank you for 90 minutes of pure relaxation.  5*
Rose
reviews/0/title: A Beautiful Experience from start to finish
reviews/1/text: Couples massages on holiday in Alvor. Cinia was absolutely amazing; made me feel beautiful and loved not to mention relaxed. A very professional service in a lovely setting, great value for money. I’d highly recommend and will be back next time we are holidaying in Alvor. Thank you ladies.
reviews/2/text: This is a lovely spa, beautiful decor, lovely ladies and very professional treatments. Can’t recommend enough! Thanks Cinia and Andreia!
reviews/3/text: This spa was gorgeous - a lovely relaxed atmosphere, beautiful setting and amazing massage and facial. I left feeling very relaxed.
reviews/4/text:
This day made my trip here to Portimao. I spent my last day in the spa and took 3 hours to treat, 
Luzianne (hope I write her name correctly) is an excellent masseur. The atmosphere and the beautiful decoration of the saloon make you instantly feel relaxed and welcome. Thank you ladies for greeting me today ❤️
reviews/5/text: I really recommend this spa. The ambience is great. Cinia and Andreia are both lovely ladies, very professional and the treatments excellent!!
reviews/6/text: Very welcoming and friendly spa which is decorated beautifully. Looking forward to going back to try more treatments.
reviews/7/text: The best Manicure and Pedicure I’ve ever had. Very thorough and relaxing experience and my nails look great! Super sweet staff and small but classy spa! Definitely recommend
reviews/8/text: We just had the best massage we’ve EVER had! The atmosphere was really nice. Really nice and relaxed ladies. The way they did the massage is indescribable, they really knew what they were doing. 10/10 recommend
reviews/9/text:
Simply outstanding! I’ve been for hundreds of treatments in May countries and this one really was up there. 

I was staying in the hotel next door but always try to use a local business as you tend to get better service-and this didn’t disappoint!! 

The facilities are tastefully decorated and ambiance carefully looked after. I particularly liked the scrolling pictures of beautiful landscapes which were on an iPad under the bed so I could watch them whilst being pampered-nice touch! 

Incredibly clean-I was asked to sanitise on my way in and was given sanitised flip flops for the time I was there. 

I’d emailed the spa to book prior and asked for a full body oil massage-focusing on my feet, hands and head-which is exactly what I got. Real mixture of technique at, warm oil and towels. Just bliss! 

If you’re staying in Alvor-please give them a visit. You won’t be disappointed! 

Thank you ladies-real highlight of my holidat
reviews/9/title: Amazing local spa-don’t use your hotel one!
reviews/10/text:
Absolutely fantastic and heavenly massage! The spa is the nicest we have ever visited. So much attention to detail, feels like someone's home in the best way possible! The decor is stunning the atmosphere is perfect. It's impossible not to feel relaxed from the moment you arrive. The two owners are so friendly, welcoming and professional. Such smooth hands and incredible technique... We had the hot stones 70min and the relaxing 90min, both were so good that we booked in again for 2 more!

If you are visiting Alvor or staying in nearby Pestana Blue hotel, this spa is a must visit! We had a massage  in the hotel too but this was so much better in quality, experience and even better value.

Thank you again for a wonderful experience and making our holiday special :)

Steve and Ally x
reviews/10/title: Heavenly massage, beautiful setting! A must visit for anyone staying in Alvor or nearby!
reviews/11/text: Both me and my girlfriend were very satisfied with the massages! The staff was very friendly and professional and we felt at ease. We'd come again!
reviews/12/text: We had two relax massages (Romeu & Julieta), and also a pedicure. Very cosy and relaxing place, we got excellent massage, by very professional staff. We are very happy with the treatment and would very much like to return.
reviews/13/text: I visited swan day spa with my mum for a facial and back,neck, head massage. It was one of the best massages I have ever had! The masseuse was incredible, the room was very relaxing and I loved every second. The spa is decorated so lovely with lots of nice interior touches that created such a relaxing atmosphere. Will definitely return when I’m next in Alvor! Thank you!
reviews/14/text: The relax full body massage was very good. I felt very relaxed after. The staff were very friendly. I really recommend this place!
reviews/14/title: Very relaxing massage with good result
reviews/15/text:
First but not last time using this spa. Wife and I both had massages.

First point would be the whole set up is very comfortable, well laid out with several treatment and waiting rooms and a nice outdoor waiting area too. 

We both very much enjoyed our massages which were reasonably priced.
reviews/16/text:
wow! best massage i've ever had!my hubby did his research when on our honeymoon and it didn't disappoint. A proper massage... got all the knots out of my tense neck and shoulders! Everyone was friendly and helpful and it was pure relaxation. Even the low lit screens of inspirational pictures and quotes below massage table were a lovely touch, never seen before. 
I had my eye lashes tinted, full body massage and facial. I would highly recommend x
reviews/17/text: Hi, we had a  good, relaxing back massage experience (one to one in private rooms) with friendly and highly competent staff and at a very good price. We will definetely go back, can recommend!
reviews/18/text: Visited here on our last visit to Alvor so we made sure we booked again.  We love to have a massage on holiday and have had many all over the world.  Swan Day Spa is most definitely the best massages that we have ever received.  From the moment you step through the door you feel chilled between the music, the aroma and the beautiful surroundings. When I went I had a problem with my neck and lovely Andrea worked her magic.  My husband received an amazing massage from Ivana and was floating.  We were so impressed that we booked another massage each for the following week.   A definite must do on your trip to Alvor ...  recommend you try this place.  It's such a treat!  Barbara and Bill
reviews/18/title: Best Massage Ever!!!!  A Hidden Gem in Alvor !
reviews/19/text: I have been attending at this Spa when on holiday in Alvor for the past three years. The therapists are amazing and there is huge attention to detail. Wonderful treatments. This is a must when in Alvor. Thank you again for a lovely visit.

address: Sitio da Malvada, Cx. 64-Z Braciais, Faro 8005-553 Portugal
description: We are a reliable, experienced company and leading provider of private transfers from Faro Airport to any hotel, resort, villa or holiday accommodation in the Algarve. Door-to-door airport transfer service ideal for all group sizes, carried out by professional chauffeurs and supported by a modern vehicle fleet also suitable for golf transfers or any type of private transport.
name: Algarserra Transfers
photo/caption: Spacious Ford Galaxy - Private Faro Airport Transfers
reviews/0/text:
Used this company for transfers to and from Farop airport.  Its pricey but then the drive was about 90km away.  
please be aware though they druiver will ask you if you want to use the motorway via toll roads and its €7 each way! I used it from Faro to hotel and then on the way back chose the non toll route and it only takes an extra 15mins.  Drivers like to use the toll road as its straight road via motorway but you pay the price! Apparently the cost of the toll is only €3.50 so they make money...(I cant be 100% sure on this but thats what a local guy told me)

But car was comfortable and arrived on time, so would use again but will avoid paying the toll charge as it really doesnt make much difference in time.
reviews/0/title: Reliable service - avoid the toll roads
reviews/1/text:
We’d been loyal to another transfer service for many years, however driving standards were declining and prices were becoming exorbitant. We’re so pleased we switched to Algarserra for our transfer to Gale, and our daughter’s the following night.
Booking was easy, with pick-up confirmation the day before, and various payment options. The service is friendly and professional, with great drivers and immaculate vehicles.  Prices are good, over the two transfers we saved over €70 compared to the previous company.  We look forward to using Algarserra on future trips, highly recommended.
reviews/2/text: First class service both ways, would definitely use again. Spotless vehicles and professional drivers.
reviews/3/text: We were traveling today from Lagos to Faro airport with such a lovely driver Vasco. He was very friendly and made our journey unforgettable. Algarserra transport is very reliable and trustful. Definitely we will book with them again in the future. 5 stars
reviews/4/text: Antonio is possibly one of the best drivers that I have had the honour of meeting. It was my first solo holiday with friends and we had booked the taxi back to Faro, immediately he kept us informed of the traffic and arrived promptly to the time he said he would. Antonio them helped us all with our bags and assured us we would get to the airport on time. He was professional, polite and was great at telling us all about the history of Portugal! It was a great taxi service and as it was my first time booking this company - it was amazing. Would definitely book this again!
reviews/5/text:
Fantastic service from start to finish. First time travelling to Portugal and made the booking as the price was unbeatable, didn’t have to pay online could pay on arrival. 

Antonio was waiting for us in the airport and carried our bags to the car.  He was great on giving us 
Advice on where to go for beer and food. Great advice. Thanks. 

Vesco picked us up on the way home and was waiting for us on time. Great conversation a lot in common so was a nice ride home. 

Both spoke great English. 

Thank you
reviews/6/text:
Very simply, they're brilliant.

Booked from the UK in advance of our holiday to the Algarve. They met us as instructed at Faro airport, within good time (in fact we were a tad early!) and our driver was really friendly, polite and presentable with excellent English. 

The vehicle (Mercedes MPV) was spotless and comfortable.

Return journey much the same, arrived bang on the agreed time and got us to Faro for our return flight in comfort with loads of time to spare. 

Really did take the stress out of the holiday. Will 100% use these guys again if we hit the Algarve.

Thanks Algarserra!!
reviews/7/text: We have used Algarserra Transfers on several occasions and always had an excellent experience. On our most recent journey from Faro to Praia da Luz our driver Rui was most courteous, helpful and shared his local knowledge and history which made us realise why we love returning to this beautiful part of the world. We would certainly recommend this company to anyone seeking the service they offer. 5 stars are not enough.
reviews/8/text: We have used this service for the last 20 years or so, I don’t know how much other Taxi firms cost and not bothered, travelling  with this company is a pice of mind, i email the company with flight times/ number and that is it, when i get out of departures the taxi is there plus the drivers are friendly and very professional, even if i have to change the times last minute by email within 10 minutes i have an email with conformation.
reviews/9/text: Yet another visit to Alvor, and without hesitation I rebooked Algarserra for the return transfer - yet again, the stress of getting from the airport and back was simply not there, as you simply know Algarserra would be on time, courteous and professional - there fees remain extremely competitive and to be honest, I would simply not contemplate using any other transfer service - over the last 12 years we have been to Algarve 8 or 9 times and every time we have used Algarserra - what can I say, if you are flying into Faro and need a transfer - check these out.. you will not be disappointed
reviews/10/text:
Very efficient booking and both legs of our journey from Faro to Tavira were on time.
Car was clean and tidy.
reviews/11/text: Fantastic service from Vasco this afternoon on my journey back to the airport. He was very professional and courteous, and was very easy to talk to during the long journey from Barão de São Miguel. The booking process was very straight forward and agents were quick to respond to the online transfer request. I will definitely be using the service again next time I visit Portugal!
reviews/12/text: After my error on booking a taxi for the wrong month, the gentleman at the airport was very nice and accommodating. He got us a new taxi within 30 minutes and didn’t charge us any extra at all. Great service and company.
reviews/13/text: Easy to book on their website with dates flight details confirmed by email. Driver met us at Airport at meet and greet area. swiftly taken to apartment in air conditioned vehicle. on return email 24 hours prior to leaving, driver on time. Brilliant service would highly recommend
reviews/14/text: We used this company for our outward and return transfers . The drivers were professional and polite, but most importantly, punctual. Great communication with reminders about our transfer. Another great bonus is you can pay the driver when he drops you off ( must be in Euros). This is great company, would certainly use again
reviews/15/text: Both drivers were so polite and well groomed and punctual. So easy to use they meet you with a sign and the next minute your on your way. Pick up was amazing ready and waiting. I've used taxis many times and this company the best so far.
reviews/16/text: We booked to get a transfer back to Faro airport and I would definitely use them again. Not only were they cheaper than the average taxi but friendly and on time. Would highly recommend them.
reviews/17/text: We are very grateful to Algaserra for a wonderful airport transfer experience. Our driver, Vasco, went out of his way to ensure that we had a safe, comfortable and very efficient transfer from Faro to Praia da Rocha. We would highly recommend this service, thank you.
reviews/18/text:
Easy to book online with options to upgrade to minivan, tolls for express route, text updates.
Very happy with service: on time, professional, courteous and safe driving. Transport provided was immaculate.
Highly recommended and would definitely use again.
reviews/18/title: Excellent transfer from Faro airport to Lagos
reviews/19/text: Our driver was waiting for us on arrival at Faro and another was also waiting for us when we checked out of our hotel at the end of our holiday. They both spoke English, were polite and their vehicles were a recent model and clean. They drove well. We could not have hoped for a better experience. We would certainly use Algaserra again.
reviews/19/title: Faro Airport Transfer to Alvor - Excellent in every respect

address: Cerro de Aguia Orada Cx P 113, Albufeira 8200-371 Portugal
address_obj/street1: Cerro de Aguia Orada Cx P 113
description: Our tours are as unique as you are. Johnny's Tours came from a dream of mine and exists since November 2019. I took advantage of my previous experience, where I created and performed tours. Johnny's Tours intends to make a difference in private trips / private land tours. Johnny's Tours performs tours that range from routes in the Algarve, Évora, Lisbon and Seville. My tours are carried out with passion and dedication. Each tour performed is unique and special just as our tourists are special to us when they visit us. look no further
name: Johnny"s Tours
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Full Day Private Tour in Western Algarve
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Algarve Coast Full-Day Private Tour
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Private Historical Tour in Algarve
reviews/0/text: I can not more highly recommend Johnny's Tours. From beginning to end, Johnny exceeded our expectations. He asked detailed questions to get an idea of what we wanted from our tour and then added things we were interested along the way. He was thoughtful and considered alternatives for older members of our group. Johnny is very knowledgeable about the area and there was not a question he couldn't answer. He was also so patient with the younger children who bombarded him with questions, always answering with a smile. The bus was pleasant and clean as well. Book a tour with Johnny today, you won't regret it.
reviews/1/text:
Johnny's tours was fantastic with easy pick up at our hotel  in Lagos , Stops along the way to see great views and walk the little towns . 
We went to Alvor , Portimao,  Ferragudo and finally our last stop in Carvoeiro. He was very passionate about his country and loved providing us with information and the best views .
reviews/2/text: Our day with Johnny in the Algarve was very special. He was so informed and planned the trip according to our interests. He was punctual and so kind. Will plan more trips with him when I return.
reviews/2/title: Day in the Algarve with Johnny’s Tour
reviews/3/text: We spent a lovely afternoon with Johnny.  He drove us along the coast from Albufeira, showing us many hidden gems.  Along the way he was always entertaining us with stories of the history and culture of Portugal.  Johnny was prompt, communicated with us prior and after the tour and even sent us a wonderful video of our afternoon together.  He was always making sure we were comfortable and was flexible on where to take us based on what we wanted to see.  I would definitely recommend Johnny and when we return to Portugal I will book with him again.
reviews/4/text: Wow where can I start! Johnny was so accommodating with our small group from start to finish. His pre trip communication was spot on. Johnny picked us up at our home to start the trip and that’s where the fun began! Johnny totally personalized the tour due to time of year and weather. Our tour along the coast was breathtaking!!!  If you are looking for a guide anywhere in the Algarve Johnny is your man!!! Above and beyond with the lovely video he sent us our the tour. Many thanks Johnny!!!! Go Benefica!!
reviews/5/text:
I booked this company and been let down at Faro Airport for two hours, was planning to book a tour as well but after this decided not to.

I had no answer on this and that's why decided to jump in a cab at the Airport.
reviews/6/text:
We booked this company based in good reviews and what a disappointment.
First they forget to colect us at the hotel in Albufeira, after several atempts to contact them they replied us back telling there was no booking and they were not able to do the Tour with us on that day.

And i was just stayng for 3 days and was looking forward to do this tour.

It ruined our plans as i cold not book with other company.
reviews/7/text: We went to Evora private tour with Johnny on Feb 2023. This is our second private guided tour with Johnny. He is amazing guy so passionate about presenting Portuguese history and culture to his clients. We are charmed by Evora because our tour with Johnny. His service is excellent and he is attentionate  about our special requests. Johnny was ready to go extra mile for us. ( examples looking for almond blossom)
reviews/8/text: I can't recommend Johny enough. Extremely helpful, friendly, and knowledgeable. At the conclusion of our trip, he went completely out of his way to assist me when I was a bit stranded and needed help during a recent train/labor strike, and made sure to help get me where I needed to go. A true gentleman and pro. Book with him, you won't regret it!
reviews/9/text: We did a Coastal  tour in west Algarve with Johnny in March 2022 and we had a great day. Johnny showed us Luz , Lagos, Carvoeiro and some other hidden gems in Algarve. He is a wonderful guide and driver who know so much about History and Culture. He took many great photos for us. We will tour with him again.
reviews/10/text: The tour with Johnny was wonderful. Johnny was very friendly and informative. We could converse with him about any topic. We were with our toddler and we never felt rushed. We saw many beautiful places in the Algarve region. Johnny’s passion for his region, culture, and history shined. We thoroughly enjoyed our day and highly recommend Johnny’s Tour to anyone. We look forward to seeing him again.
reviews/11/text:
What a great day with Johnny. We loved the Algarve Shades of Blue Tour that he organized specially for us four. He was on time and when we left the hotel after our breakfast to meet him Johny was already waiting for us with that smile of his that he kept all day. Well, we can say that his tour was the highlight of of stay. and for that we are truly grateful. Best tourguide ever!!!!!!!! He was so friendly, polite, flexible with everything helpful and knowledgeable about his region. we can feel it.We felt we made a friend in the algarve and this experience with him will bring us back to the Algarve again. Thank you very much Johnny!.We´ll see you again.
Erika   Mikaela   Dagmar  and Kristofer
reviews/12/text:
Absolute highlight of our trip. From our first message Johnny was passionate about giving us a trip we will never forget. His knowledge of the area is second to none and he took us to places we didn’t even know existed…beautiful and unspoiled areas that a tourist would just never find. We do a tour on every holiday we go on - hands down, no competition, Johnnys tours is the best we’ve done. And what a lovely guy! Fantastic with the kids too. He made our tour personal to us. We told him what we liked to do as a family on holiday and he delivered an amazing package. He is different to the rest - he isn’t delivering speeches he has given a million times before… he isn’t just driving you around in a jeep pointing at popular attractions … he is talking to you like a new friend who wants you to fall in love with his country and leave it open mouthed…he is taking photographs for you.. he is showing you the Algarve that only a local has seen and he makes you fall in love with the place even more than you thought you ever would. We have never seen such beauty. 
We sat here tonight - on our last night in the Algarve and agreed that we will come back next year and book 2 or 3 days with Johnny and see as much as we can. Because we know we only just scratched the surface of this beautiful place. 
We cannot recommend Johnny enough and we wouldn’t even try anyone else when we come back. The man delivers everything you want and more. Already we cannot wait for our next tour with him. 
If you are wanting an unforgettable experience - book with Johnnys tours. You won’t get better. Our youngest daughter has not stopped talking about him - he has inspired her to learn more, to want to see more. You cannot put a price on that and we cannot be more thankful.
reviews/13/text: The best private tour.  Learned a lot about Portugal and the Algarve region.  Johnny is an excellent tour guide.
reviews/13/title: We had an amazing day w Johnny.
reviews/14/text: Great tour guide we had named Johnny's tours always on time and generally just a nice guy give us some good tips for places to eat ect we weren't disappointed and we will certainly use his services again highly recommended
reviews/15/text: We used Johnny’s tours for a golfing holiday he picked us up from airport and dropped us off he also took us to and from our golf outings he also gave us some very good tips on restaurants and best places to visit Johnny is very helpful and genuine good guy   I would highly recommend using Johnny’s tours
reviews/16/text:
Ive travelled all over Europe playing golf but never had service like johnnys travel what an amazing guy he is, we were picked up from the airport then used him for our golf trips and restaurants we’d booked… nothing is a problem for this man ! 

He is very knowledgeable with the area and recommend a few good restaurants and bars. 

I’m returning next year with my family and I’ll definitely be travelling with johnnys travel
reviews/17/text: Fantastic service. Highly recommend his services. Great knowledge of Albufiera and all round lovely guy.
reviews/18/text: Johnny's fantastic he collected us from Airport last Tuesday he's like have a private tour guide for the trip from Airport as it was our first time to Portugal he's such a lovely guy we would highly recommend Johnny and will definitely be using him again thanks Johnny
reviews/19/text: Spent one day with Johnny during our trip to Albufeira.  The boat trip we had planned was cancelled due to bad weather but Johnny more than made up for this by taking us to places we wouldn't otherwise have seen.  Johnny is very accommodating, friendly, knowledgeable and extremely helpful.  He went out of his way to find us a restaurant that would cater to one of our party who is a picky eater during a heavy downpour.  He will adjust the tour to accommodate your wishes and make suggestions along the way.  Would definitely recommend him to anyone wishing to tour the Algarve and will be calling on him again during our next trip.

address: Urbanizacao Vila Sol 8125 307, Vilamoura, Quarteira 8125-307 Portugal
description: During this period of closure we can offer coaching at Edge Golf Academy in Troia. Portugal's most advanced coaching environment and our twenty years of experience will make your lesson simple, understandable and enjoyable. We know it is a bold statement, but we will improve your game. "Never be too proud to take a golf lesson, I'm not" - Jack Nicklaus. Get in touch to learn more details. We are open Monday-Friday, 9.00am-5.00pm, and by appointment on Saturday and Sunday. If you would like to pop by outside of these times, give us a call and we would be delighted to ensure the Academy is open to welcome you. Additionally if you would like to go ahead and book a coaching session with us, please contact us and we will be delighted to help. It is advisable to book ahead due to demand.
name: Golf Integrated Academy
ranking: #1 of 586 things to do in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #1 of 586 things to do in Algarve
reviews/0/text:
I was in Vilamoura for a week and I noticed the Golf Academy was nearby and highly recommended on Tripadvisor. I rarely get golf lessons but after a round at Monte Rei where I started very poorly, I thought why not get a lesson - it was nearby and what better way to spend an hour talking golf swing. 

Neil has a great setup with a nice range on the Pestana golf course to hit into. He all the latest Trackman type equipment. 

Neil has so much experience and I only had to hit a few balls before he had lazered into the key issue in my swing - lack of rhythm. He was able to back up his eye by showing me the data about my club and ball speed. He was honest that I would need to up my practice to train my swing before i could expect consistency on the course. But he gave me great confidence that I am on the right track and by focusing on rhythm and not going 120% every shot I would get consistency. 

My only regret was that I was only in Vilamoura for the week so could not start a lesson plan but i hope to be back next summer for a check up and hopefully with a lower handicap!
reviews/0/title: Gave me the confidence I needed
reviews/1/text: Neil is a great golf coach and works just as hard on the mental side of the game as the physical.  My chipping and putting have improved a great deal since we had a session on them.
reviews/1/title: A very good golf coach - recommended.
reviews/2/text:
Took 6 private lessons from Neil only 2 months after I started playing golf, will never forget these words after the first lesson: "It is a good thing that you have such a great hand-eye coordination, my god everything else is wrong", haha nice start, but no seriously he was right, looking back at the recordings of my lessons: really incredible what we achieved in just 6 lessons !
We all know this game can be extremely confronting yourself, as is one of the most valued part of the lessons I had from Neil, very confronting, but spot on and followed by a clear and sensible explanation, and if that isn't enough there is always the the use of video technology ;-)
Would highly recommend taking some lessons from Neil
reviews/3/text:
A great coach and skilled pedagogue
After some lessons with Neil, I can say that he is the best coach I ever have had. Neil explains verry easy the different parts of the swing and with small corrections make big improvements. For me as a low handicapper the biggest difference in my game after the lessons is his coaching advice. How to plan the attack of the green to keep the score as low as possible and how to keep statistics on the shots of a round to see where my biggest weaknesses is.
reviews/3/title: A great coach and skilled pedagogue
reviews/4/text:
Neil has very interesting and unconventional teaching approach. His advice are on spot and put you on the right track. Regardless of your handicap he will improve your understanding of your game and ultimately your scores.

I was there with my teenage daughter for a week a we both enjoyed it very much.
reviews/5/text: I attended Neils short game boot camp and I have to say, with some additonal practise from me, this aspect of my game has improved. My putting especially has improved using a simple but very effective technique I learned at the camp. Can't recommend highly enough.
reviews/6/text:
I have been using Neil’s coaching on and off for some years now. His depth of knowledge is first class but more importantly he explains the process. 

I find it easier to retain tips, advice and instruction when I know how it has been arrived at. 

Neil is very thorough and professional. Combine this with all the tech apparatus and teaching aids. A complete package and a joy to work with.
reviews/7/text:
Just finished a course of 6 lessons at Golf Integrated Academy Vilamoura. Had previously had some golf lessons back in the UK but to be honest it hadn't really clicked for me and my golf was going nowhere.
Lessons at GIA with Neil exceeded all my expectations. Tuition is delivered in an informative but relaxed environment and, ably assisted by his wife Fiona, was both fun and motivational. Neil concentrated on improving my technique without dismantling my own game, but at the same time sensitively removing my bad habits along the way!
As well as concentrating on practical technique, Neil also offers an invaluable  and interesting insight into the mental aspect of the game, imparting the knowledge he has no doubt gained from his own experience as a golf pro.
The emphasis however remains a focus on an enjoyment of the game at the same time as helping his client realise his or her potential.
Whether a complete beginner or an experienced golfer seeking to improve and take their game to the next level, I would highly recommend that Golf Integrated Academy is the place to be.
Go on. Give it a try. The sky really is the limit!!
reviews/8/text: Neil is a superb golf coach. His coaching set up with the video is excellent and it means he is able to identify immediately what is happening and provide expert guidance to improve your game and correct faults. His is patient , positive and very knowledgeable. I've had golf lessons from others over the years but no one has helped me improve so much so quickly. Lessons with Neil are something to really look forward to and enjoy. Highly recommended.
reviews/8/title: Neil is a superb golf coach
reviews/9/text: Neil has dramatically improved my game.  Practicing the techniques taught by Neil, on a regular basis, is guaranteed to reduce your score, and enabled me to enjoy my golf.  I would highly recommend taking a session of lessons (or even one!)
reviews/10/text: Neil Connelly has been excellent in getting my game off the ground. Technically superd and very knowledgeable but patient and supportive when required. I am looking forward to more great coaching and have never made such progress with any previous coach.
reviews/10/title: You can learn golf when you retire
reviews/11/text:
Best golf lesson ever. Dont miss it. Great to have the video to review later. Niel has the gift of not over complicating the lesson,
Mick Slein,
Dublin.
reviews/12/text: I've had a couple of lessons with Neil now and have been impressed with his simple approach to teaching. He takes time to understand what you need and works out the best way to convey this to you as an individual. Very impressed and will be returning in due course.
reviews/13/text:
Attended the academy for lessons whilst in the area.
5 stars all the way through, patient and very professional approach to teaching.
Much appreciated.
reviews/14/text: Neil is an excellent, engaging, and interesting golf coach; he would do well as a motivational speaker! We've made rapid progress and very much enjoyed our lessons.
reviews/15/text: As a low handicap golfer, Neil was recommended to me by a friend in order to help me further improve my game. I have had a series of lessons focusing mainly on the short game which we identified after recording statistics. Neil has a wealth of experience and this comes across in his coaching. His calm manner with clear concise instructions are key to not overly complicate coaching. I highly recommend the Golf Integrated Academy
reviews/16/text: I booked a 10 hour lessons in december 2019, after 5 times I know how to make a good swing, but ofcourse I still need traininig. The lessons have been fun, jokes, truth and good method of getting me understand
reviews/17/text:
We are beginners, but with a lot of energy to learn. 
Mister Nigel Connolly have been a fantastic coach for us and give the first advise
reviews/18/text:
Being a latecomer to golf and wanting to give myself the best possible start, my golfing daughter thankfully recommended Neil.
Before I’d arrived in Portugal, Neil had already set out the plan for my week.  It was structured and well thought through and what’s more, I loved it.
Couldn’t recommend Neil and Fiona more highly.
reviews/18/title: Started my golfing journey with Neil
reviews/19/text: Working with Neil Connolly at Golf Integrated is an absolute joy. Neil is an excellent golf pro who clearly describes the golf swing and short game and gets excellent results. If you are serious about playing golf, improving and reducing your handicap, Neil is a must. Neil is also very good at answering your questions and queries in a concise, helpful and understandable way. He gives such great confidence to the golfer. I look forward very much to my lessons with him. It is also a delight when going for a lesson to have a chat with his wife Fiona who is responsible for the admin side of this smoothly run, excellent business. I cannot recommend them highly enough.

address: Largo da Liberdade, Salema 8650-195 Portugal
description: The Way Tours is an innovative tourism company based in Salema and its surroundings, where the most stunning landscapes are, as well as unique places, and the most beautiful and secret beaches in the world. For this and much more we will provide you the best moments of your holidays where you can meet and enjoy by the best possible way the better beaches in the world, hidden places that are known by many people to be enchanted, between places of great historical importance... We have rentals for Kayaks and Paddle boards, Kayak Tours, Grottoes, Private charters, Inflatable and wakeboard and surf, Transfers, Private tours, among many many others. What are you waiting for? Check your tour or activity, choose the one that best defines you, and go on an unforgettable and unique adventure. The Way Tours ... The way to spend your day!
name: The Way Tours
ranking: #49 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
ranking_subcategory: #49 of 485 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Algarve
reviews/0/text: Daniel was very helpful.   My daughters loved learning to surf and snorkeling along the beach was definitely a highlight of our stay in Salema.
reviews/1/text:
So this is just to describe the awesome fishing experience my ten year old son and I had.
After a quick introduction into the local way of fishing, what’s unique and special about it and which steps to observe, we headed off into the night in a small boat, packing just the four of us and a lot of fishing gear to choose from. Once the sun had sunk and the boat was parked at our buoy, we turned on the fishing lights. With the illuminated ocean around us, the night turned magic. Dropping our hand lines in, we went for squid, which we pulled on board in kilos, along with a large cuttlefish. Splattered with blue ink, we then went for mackerel with proper fishing rods, trying different techniques. We caught enough to provide us for probably two nights of abundant family meals (each!) so we decided to stop, watch and listen to the dolphin mom and kid coming very close to the boat. An absolutely priceless experience, thoroughly thought-out and properly planned by very cool people. Even for a non-fisher like myself!
reviews/2/text: We met Martin our first afternoon in Salema, Portugal at The Way Tours beach front sports  office. He set us up with a 2 hour catamaran tour. He checked the weather and suggested we skip the day we had planned on because of high winds. The day we went was perfect! We drove to Lagos and met our boat captain and took off right on time. We cruised across the bay and all along the coast to the Caves of Benegil. We went into the caves, we rode on the front deck and took fabulous pictures. It was a lovely way to complete our month of travels in Portugal!
reviews/3/text: What a beautiful way to end the day!  Gorgeous sunset, good company, and sparkling wine too!  I highly recommend the Sunset Tour
reviews/4/text: Great experience for us being the first time on a paddle board. We got excellent instruction and saw some amazing coast line. Would definitely recommend !!!!!
reviews/5/text:
We did a tour of the grottos and it was very enjoyable. My 10 ten old son was getting restless so this was a fun thing for all of us to do. 
The team were very professional and gave really clear instructions on what to do and where to go.
reviews/5/title: Really beautiful tour of the grottos
reviews/6/text: We appreciate the transfer to and guiding through Lagos and the visit to Ponta da Piedade. Daniel was helpful and cooperative and listened to our wishes where to go. This was a good complement instead of going by boat seeing the beautiful cliff formations. Daniel was patient and friendly dealing with our small kids.
reviews/6/title: A nice trip to Ponta da piedade.
reviews/7/text: Great trip to see the Algarve coastline with numerous amazing rock formations, sea stacks and caves. Tour guides took the time to point out all the interesting facts and figures. The guys at The Way Tours were really helpful and friendly and the booking process fast and simple. Will definitely be back for more.
reviews/8/text: My driver Daniel was dependable and understood my concerns about catching my flight on time. He was early so I was early. The airport was so busy that if we weren’t early I would have missed my flight. I still appreciate that to this day. Thank you. Best service ever!
reviews/9/text: Daniel at The Way in Salema went out of his way to accommodate our needs and his expertise had him suggest the perfect tour and timing of our  trip. We saw so many dolphins and the convenience was top notch. Daniel is also very committed to the people and community of Salema and takes pride in his work. He also silk screens tee shirts- a new addition and they’re beautiful!!  We’ll be back for sure!!
reviews/10/text:
We had a wonderful tour with Daniel, the owner of The Way Tours. The trip is called “Our Roots”, and we spent the day in the Western Algarve. We first drove  thru Sagres, then around the southwestern coast, stopping at some amazing ocean viewpoints. Then we went inland, seeing a completely different landscape environment,  where we had a delicious lunch-probably our best meal in Portugal, at an out of the way restaurant.   The trip was capped off with a tasting of Medronho, a liquor made in the Algarve.         
We learned about the region thru the eyes and life experiences of Daniel, who grew up here. This personal touch made it very special.
If you are looking for an opportunity to learn some history about the Algarve region, while enjoying some amazing scenery, I highly recommend Our Roots, one of the tours options offered by  The Way Tours.
reviews/11/text: The Way Tours office provided a great support and help to pick up the best trip as we were family with two kids and senior citizen along me and my spouse. The person in office, Daniel, was very nice  and supportive. Trip price is reasonable and very organized. We all loved it and for sure recommend to  others.
reviews/12/text: Great tour my husband and I can highly recommend it.  They provided us with detailed information. Staff were friendly and informative. Loved it.
reviews/13/text: Daniel took me and my wife out (on our honey moon!) on a private ‘Salema Experience’ tour and it couldn’t have been more perfect! His knowledge of the area is superb and he made the experience one we will never forget! - we will be booking another one next year for sure!
reviews/14/text: Our party of 5 adults plus a 6 and 10 year old enjoyed a lovely 2.5 hours boat trip to explore the caves of Benagil. It was an exciting afternoon, well organised, punctual and comfortable. A great we to see the beautiful caves and coastline! Suzanne, Estepona, Spain
reviews/15/text:
Had a wonderful morning exploring the coast around Salema in a kayak. We stopped to snorkel in wetsuits ( provided) as the sea is cold. Went to a beach and a short walk to see some dinosaur footprints.

Daniel was very knowledgeable in the local area and history of the protected natural park. 
Full of interesting facts!
We even mined for some mineral dust for a spa experience.

I would thoroughly recommend this company they are very professional and their equipment is excellent! 
Thank you Daniel and Martin
reviews/16/text: We had a wonderful time with the Way Tours! We kyaked with the group through the caves. We highly recommend! They were able to get us on board last minute. Staff was so supportive!
reviews/17/text:
Daniel took us in his van around Western Portugal.  We made several stops at some interesting sites along the coast.  We had lunch at a fantastic restaurant we wouldn't have found on our own.  We finished the tour with a tasting at a local distillery.  

This is a great way to learn more about Portugal.  The trip was fun and interesting.
Thanks Daniel!
reviews/17/title: My Roots Tour through Western Portugal
reviews/18/text: We booked two tours with The Way.  We went on a Jeep  safari with Sandro one day, and the next day Daniel took us on a personalized tour.  The Jeep tour took us to dramatic coastlines as well as a woodland preserve, and an off-road track through the hills.  It included a delicious fish lunch at a local cafe.  The personal tour took us to Lagos and then up the mountain.  We went to the highest point in the Algarve and then hiked to a waterfall.  We had lunch at a traditional restaurant with a variety of pork and wild boar.  Both guides were very professional and gave us a full experience.
reviews/18/title: Wonderful Jeep safari and extensive tour up the mountain
reviews/19/text:
We were a group of 10 people and we did a mixed tour (3 paddle boards and 3 kayaks). Daniel gave us a good instruction and a lot of helpful hints during the tour. At the first beach we stopped we had a short break. And at the second beach we did a nice walk through some grottoes. We felt very safe and had a lot of fun. 
Furthermore Daniel showed us some dinosaur footprints (which you can see from water) - really impressive.

I can highly recommend this tour - it´s so beautiful to visit beaches by water and paddle along the coast. The team in Salema is really friendly and helpful. Would like to visit again :) Thank you guys!
reviews/19/title: Paddle board and Kayak tour - highly recommended
